name: Be Nijs * Business- & Concept Development
location: Bilderdijkkade 60, Amsterdam, Noord-Holland 1053VN, NL
about: Voor Startups, ondernemers en bedrijven die het maximale uit de onderneming, concept en als persoon willen halen. Het realiseren van strategische, operationele of organisatorische doelen die leiden tot nieuwe inzichten en bedrijfsresultaten. Ik creëer de mogelijkheid om samen met een team van experts te bouwen aan nieuwe conceptontwikkeling en het bedenken van een effectieve merkstrategie tot de gehele realisatie van het concept. Van een passende logo en huisstijl tot de complete visuele presentatie. Ik ontzorg jou met het totaalpakket voor een succesvolle lancering van jouw business concept. Als persoon functioneer ik als klankbord, strateeg en vertrouwensman in één. De combinatie van ervaring en mentaliteit, waarbij gedrevenheid en het vermogen om anderen te inspireren kenmerken mijn belangrijke eigenschappen. Competenties: Connection - Als eerste het zien van veranderingen en trends in de omgeving, het koppelen van perspectieven en daarop inspelen voor een innovatie opdracht. Creativity - Het overwegen en selecteren van nieuwe, verrassende en waardevolle ideeën. Developmental Strength - Kan mogelijke ideeën uitwerken tot een duurzaam levensvatbaar concept. Entrepreneurship - De juiste omgeving creëren om een innovatief uiteindelijk te implementeren en te kunnen uitvoeren, dit kunnen zaken zijn van een business plan tot aan het financiële plan. Investigative Capacity - Het kunnen verzamelen, analyseren en informatie uiteindelijk verwerken en structureren om tot inzichten te komen voor een innovatief vraagstuk binnen of buiten een organisatie. Personal Leadership - Het zorgen dat individuele mensen en multidisciplinaire teams samen werken in welke fase van een innovatie proces.
specialties: Expansie bedrijfsactiviteiten, Marketing strategie, Target management, Time management, Effectief communiceren, and Senior business developer

name: Texas Deaf Chamber of Commerce
location: 2028 E Ben White Blvd, Ste 240-1856, Austin, TX 78741, US
about: MISSION STATEMENT: “The mission of this Chamber shall be to develop, promote and perpetuate a positive and profitable business and civic climate for deaf owned businesses. Sharing information to teach areas including but not limited to capitalism, expanding access to capitalization, technical support, procurement opportunities, and effective networking. The languages, cultures, and heritage of Deaf, DeafBlind, Late-Deafened, and Hard of Hearing business owners will be acknowledged and respected in the pursuit of life, liberty and equality.” PURPOSE: - Serve as a community voice for Deaf-owned businesses, - Advocate for the creation of a firm economic base and civic climate supporting Deaf-owned businesses, - Create financial opportunities for the growth and stability of Deaf-owned businesses, - Promote development and support of deaf businesses through greater access to market opportunities and capital, - Foster entrepreneurial development through workshops and training, - Collaborate with coalitions supporting public recognition and political influence among deaf business owners and - Monitor pending legislation that may affect business ownership, business growth, and business activities. USAGE OF “DEAF”: Texas Deaf Chamber of Commerce is using the term “deaf” is being used in an all-inclusive manner, to include people who may identify as Deaf, deaf, DeafBlind, Deaf-disabled, hard of hearing, late-deafened, and hearing impaired. The Chamber recognizes that for many individuals, identity is fluid and can change over time or with setting. The Chamber has chosen to use one term "Deaf" with the goal of recognizing experiences that are shared by all members of our diverse communities while also honoring all our differences.
specialties: Business Development, Mentoring, Networking, Advocacy, and Deaf
updates: [{"text":"ATTENTION! Texas Deaf Chamber has updated the Services and Membership Benefits document (which has been uploaded in the website) with the following changes: 1) New option of membership investment installment plan and automatic deductions for renewal. 2) Added regional map to clearly define the regions of Texas along with list of counties each region serves. 3) Minor changes with future services to include membership with BBB which Texas Deaf Chamber is working on partnering up to give members discounted registration with BBB. Link to find the document: https://lnkd.in/et2tRM4 If you are interested in investing in Texas Deaf Chamber as a member, go to this link: https://lnkd.in/eKreHMG","time":"1y Edited","title":"Texas Deaf Chamber of Commerce"}]
slogan: 501c6 non-profit organization by Deaf businesses and organizations promoting the civic/economic progress of Deaf Texans.

name: CellPraxis®
location: Avenida Paulista, número 2001, 5º andar, cj. 521, São Paulo, São Paulo 01311-931, BR
about: Fundada em 2008, a Cellpraxis® é uma empresa de bioengenharia que pesquisa e desenvolve produtos e serviços inovadores em medicina regenerativa e terapia celular, especialmente para patologias para as quais as alternativas não são eficazes ou viáveis. Trata-se de um modelo nascido de uma empresa irmã, a Cryopraxis®, o primeiro centro de processamento celular dedicado a coleta e ao armazenamento de células-tronco proveniente do sangue de cordão umbilical e placentário do Brasil. Com sua unidade de armazenamento localizada na UFRJ, e atuando desde de 2001, a Cryopraxis® ocupa a liderança absoluta de seu segmento, possuindo atualmente mais de 40 mil amostras armazenadas. Tanto a CellPraxis® como Cryopraxis® fazem parte da holding Axis Biotec Brasil®, grupo que atua na área da saúde há quase 30 anos e possui reconhecida capacidade na tradução de pesquisas em produtos e serviços.
specialties: Saúde, Ciências da vida, Terapia celular, Medicina Regenerativa, Pesquisa, Biotecnologia, Bioengenharia, Inovação, Desenvolvimento de produtos, and Desenvolvimento de serviços
slogan: Empresa de bioengenharia que desenvolve produtos e serviços inovadores em medicina regenerativa e terapia celular.

name: Sicurnet Milano
location: via della Pace 27/B, 20098 San Giuliano Milanese , MI 20098, IT
about: È stata la conoscenza trentennale del settore antincendio come produttore che ha fatto comprendere, al nostro amministratore Gianmario Malnati, che nel settore mancava un approccio al servizio al cliente finale all’altezza delle sue aspettative: tranquillità di avere in azienda tutti i documenti secondo le normative, sicurezza della completa efficienza di tutti i presìdi. Sicurnet Milano è nata fa per risolvere questi problemi, conoscendo bene tutte le difficoltà che le imprese hanno nel seguire i diversi aspetti della sicurezza sul lavoro. E in tutti questi anni di attività abbiamo lavorato per migliorare continuamente il livello qualitativo dei nostri servizi. La nostra attuale metodologia ci permette un grado di autonomia così elevato da consentirti di delegarci la gestione della sicurezza della tua azienda, sollevandoti da ogni incombenza tecnica e burocratica per lasciarti libero di concentrarti sul tuo core business.
specialties: antincendio, sicurezza sul lavoro, manutenzione antincendio certificata, corsi sicurezza, corsi emergenza, piattaforma e-learning, assistenza tecnica, valutazione rischi, incarichi RSPP, piani di emeregenza, gestione pianificazione sicurezza sul lavoro, segnaletica aziendale, fornitura materiali pompieristica, vendita: estintori, idranti, porte tagliafuoco, and linea antincendio di design
slogan: Assistenza e manutenzione antincendio certificata.

name: Rancho Compasión
location: P.O. BOX 566, Nicasio, California 94946, US
about: Rancho Compasión’s mission is to provide a loving, lifelong home for rescued farm animals, and to change global public perception about animals typically viewed as “food”. Our Sanctuary promotes a compassionate and sustainable lifestyle for animals, our planet and our health, while providing education for humans that include programs on sustainability, health, wellness and adoption of vegan eating. Founded in 2015 in the beautiful hills of west Marin, California by Miyoko Schinner starting with the adoption of two goats, this became a community effort, blossoming into a non-profit 501c3 sanctuary that provides a safe haven and forever home for over 100 animals today.

name: FLI - France Linéaire Industrie
location: ZA bois Saint Pierre, JANNEYRIAS, FR
about: France Linéaire Industrie is a French company with several years' expertise in linear systems. Our experience in this specific branch of industry together with our perfectly mastered applications enables us to meet our client's needs quickly and efficiently. To offer comprehensive service to our clients, we have a manufacturing workshop wich allows us to carry out the orders following tailor-made plans. All of our machines are capable to work on hard metal: for example, precision shafts and ballscrews. The workshop was created in 2001 to broaden our capacities and to establish a specialized production facility. Our company's major asset is the ready access to a wide range of raw materials used in the production of linear guides and the amplitude of stock in dedicated systems to linear guides with always on stock more than : • 130 tones of precision shaft • 50 000 ballbushing • 10 000 housing for ballbushing • 30 000 cam followers • 1 600 meters of ballscrews and trapezoidal spindle • 1 300 ballscrews nut • 3 000 meters of linear guideway rails • 6 500 linear guideway blocks
specialties: Precision Shafts, Linear Bearings, Ballscrews, Linear guideway, Lead screws, and Linear table and actuators

about: Lithko Contracting is a full-service concrete contracting company with a town-based model. We are focused on building strong local teams that keep coworkers close to home, create local jobs, support our communities, and foster career growth. This unique model creates an exceptional customer experience in each of our towns, allowing our local teams to exceed expectations. Lithko is one of the country’s largest concrete contractors, earning us the #2 ranking on ENR’s Top Concrete Contractor list for the past two years. Additionally, Lithko was recently recognized by Deloitte and The Wall Street Journal as a US Best Managed Company. Whether it is a small commercial building, a large warehouse, or a multilevel structural building, we can build it! We have experience in placing more than 40 million square feet per year of slabs, tilt-up, and precast. Our expertise in placing and finishing floors to high tolerances in all kinds of weather allows us to meet schedules, quality standards, and cost parameters in a safe and efficient manner. While placing over 2 million cubic yards of concrete per year, Lithko also has substantial experience with cast-in-place, steel frame, heavy structure, concrete cores, and elaborate site work. This experience positions us to bring formwork, reinforcing, large foundation, slab, structural/architectural systems, and field-engineering expertise to the table, allowing us to deliver the results you desire. It is the policy of Lithko Contracting, LLC. to provide Equal Employment Opportunity to all individuals without regard to race, color, national origin, religion, sex, age, disability, veteran status, or any other classification protected by federal, state, or local law.
specialties: Cast-in-Place Walls, Tilt-Up Walls, Structural Concrete, Slabs on Grade / Deck, Site Work, Foundations, and Pre-Construction Services

about: Tailored Support Services (TSS) is a Private NDIS Registered Service Provider that was founded in 2017. Alex started TSS to further her skills, passion and love for the industry in providing the much needed support to people with disabilities. Driven by her own experience, TSS provide tailored support plans for individual support, accessing the community, Supported Independent Living arrangements in accomodation settings, Respite, Emergency Respite, in-home support, accommodation support to our participants using a person centred approach. We currently hold a team of well-trained and knowledgeable support staff who provide support to individuals accessing currently accessing our services. Extensive time is spent in getting to really know each participant and their family members to really understand the support that is required and to find out what goals we will be supporting you to achieve. By doing this, we are able to ensure that we are providing the highest quality of support and care possible to each individual person by tailoring each support plan and service requirements to meet each individual and specific needs. We work closely with participants, their families, support coordinators and the NDIA as well as with the Department of Child Safety, Youth and Women and any relevant stakeholders. We also provide accommodation to individuals accessing our services.

about: NeedyBee.com, is an e-commerce (B2B & B2C) venture in the kids and moms e-tailing space providing Head2Toe Dressing solutions for Kids . Founded in 2012 with a seed capital of Rs. 3 lacs by Founders Nidhi Banthia Mehta & Alop Mehta today, the organisation is growing at a rapid pace and is ambitiously aimed to have a valuation of over 200 crore in the next five years. Headquartered in Jaipur, this ‘Make in India’ aspiring brand specializes in kids’ accessories and apparel. The company deep- dives and diligently focusses on each miniscule detail of the fabric, ensuring that it is stylish yet comfortable and allergy free, non-scratchy on the child’s skin. All fabrics are pure cotton based and the brand focuses strongly on organic materials and handmade items . NeedyBee offers a vast array of products with over 5,000 unique designs including Accessories (Shoes, Socks, Hair Accessories, Jewelery, Sunglasses, Ties, Scarves, Totes & Purses, Stoles, Bag Hangars, Quirky Accessories, and Belts), Organic/cotton apparel, Beddings, Room & bath décor, Organic Plush Toys, Gift Sets, Family (matching) ensembles and Mom’s Corner (JaipurSe: bags, jewelry, bedding, home & kitchen soft furnishings). The company continuously adds more than 100 products each week to well match the changing styles and trends. NeedyBee offers its customers to shop uniquely by Themes like the Jungle Theme or the Sailor theme or Trains & Trucks theme or the Baptism & Christening Theme. At present, NeedyBee caters to national and international buyers. The company strongly believes in product quality and timely deliveries. Such positive techniques have efficiently empowered the company to witness more and more repeat customers on a regular basis and an exponential growth since they first started. For more information and press enquiries you can reach us at contact@needybee.com
specialties: Kids Store, Kids Accessories, Kids Clothing, Kids Footwear, e-tail, Baby & Kids Products, JaipurSe products for Moms, Fancy Carry All Bags for Mums, Yoga Mat Bags, and Jewelery

about: AgriBriefing is the leading global provider of agricultural commodity pricing benchmarks, analytics, and market data. We operate from offices in London, Île-de-France, Toulouse, and Toms River, New Jersey. The company is growing fast and is backed by Ares (a large listed asset manager) & mid-market private equity house Horizon Capital. AgriBriefing's brands include: ** Feedinfo News Service - a price reporting and intelligence agency for the animal feed and feed additives industry ** Agrimoney - a daily newswire covering the global trade in soft commodities ** Urner Barry's COMTELL - providing benchmark pricing analysis for the entire protein supply chain **Stratégie grains - business critical intelligence for the grainseed, oilseeds, animal feed, biofuels and malting barley sector **Obsono - analysis and forecasts for the protein industry covering more than 50 items ** Urner Barry's Foreign Trade Data - detailed information on each and every frozen, waterborne shipment of red meat and seafood entering the United States We provide proprietary data and intelligence on the estimated US$5tn global trade in agricultural commodities, food and biofuel - a dynamic and under-served market segment with a great growth trajectory. We are growing the largest pureplay independent agribusiness price reporting agency (PRA) and market data business globally.

name: GRANTED Center for Consulting
location: Belgrade, RS
about: Granted is a fundraising agency for non-profits. We support organisations to identify new donors that match their values, write effective project proposals, and evaluate their results. We can also deliver a tailor made training, if your organisation needs to develop in-house skills. We are Ljiljana Ubović and Mina Lazarević, two experienced fundraising consultants with prior experience in the non-profit sector. In 2016 we have decided to offer our services to non-profits, government agencies and social enterprises with a clear social mission. We work in Serbia, remotely and are happy to travel for project purposes. We work on projects ranging from multi-year evaluations to delivering one-day workshops. Don’t think your project is too small or too large, we are happy to work together. If you want to learn more about our references and prices, please contact us.
specialties: Fundraising, Evaluations, Research, Training, Independent Assessments, Policy Analysis, Proposal Writing, and Results Based Project Management
slogan: Fundraising, evaluations, social research, and training services for non-profits.

name: Xilam Animation
location: 57 boulevard de la Villette, Paris, France 75010, FR
about: A major player in animation, Xilam is an integrated studio founded in 1999 that creates, produces and distributes original programmes in more than 190 countries for both children and adult audiences. Xilam content is broadcast on television, and is also available on SVoD platforms including Netflix, Disney+, Amazon and NBC Universal, and ADVoD streaming platforms including YouTube and Facebook. With its creativity and capacity for innovation recognised worldwide, and editorial and commercial expertise at the cutting edge of its industry, Xilam is positioned as a key player in a fast-growing market. Each year, Xilam builds real successes and capitalises on its powerful historical brands including Oggy and the Cockroaches and Zig & Sharko, as well as new properties such as Oggy Oggy for a preschool audience, Moka, Mr. Magoo, and Academy Award® nominated adult feature film I Lost My Body. Xilam’s expanding and strong catalogue now consists of over 2,200 episodes and three feature films. In 2019, Xilam acquired Cube Creative, a studio providing the company with unique expertise in 3D and computer generated images. Xilam employs more than 500 individuals, including 400 artists, across its studios in Paris, Lyon, Angoulême and Ho Chi Minh in Vietnam.
specialties: animation

name: Eastern Communications
location: 316 Sen. Gil Puyat Ave. Salcedo Village, Telecom Plaza, Makati City, Metro Manila 1200, PH
about: Eastern Communications is the premier telecommunications company in the Philippines. Pioneering the first data center in the country, Eastern Communications has built a reputation for trail blazing paths for connectivity in this part of the Pacific. Its 140-year legacy conveys long-standing partnerships with industry players, government agencies, institutions, small- and medium-sized enterprises, and, today, even households. Eastern Communications further expands its infrastructure, linking clients to the global network and leveraging their performance with strong and reliable connections for uninterrupted service. Operating in strategic locations of Metro Manila, Baguio, Cavite, Laguna, Batangas, and Cebu, the company brings its portfolio of dependable and affordable internet, data, and voice products, and relevant business-centric managed services offerings to new horizons. Service excellence and customer satisfaction remain the company’s benchmarks in delivering its promise of high-grade, customized connections. The trusted business connectivity solutions provider stays on top of quality management standards by being the first and only major telecommunications company to secure the prestigious ISO 9001:2008 certification. Today, Eastern Communications sets out to bring competitive advantage and possibilities of the new age to its clients. The company emboldens its partners to embrace emerging technologies and open opportunities.
specialties: Internet, Leased Line Services, Business Voice Solutions, Broadband, IT Enabling Solutions, Data Center Services, Cloud Solutions, Cybersecurity Solutions, and Managed Services

name: Beech Creek Botanical Garden & Nature Preserve
location: 11929 Beech St NE, Alliance, Ohio 44601, US
about: Beech Creek Botanical Garden and Nature Preserve provides opportunities to bring children, families, and the community together for interaction with nature. We are a place that helps to improve mental health and physical well-being. A place that educates and inspires people to be good stewards of the environment. Beech Creek Gardens is an independent 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization. Our organization began in 1999 as a grass roots effort by a small group of individuals. Our founders had a passion for educating, especially our youth. They desired to teach people - about the important connection between plants and people. They had a vision to create a beautiful place that would help to improve one’s mental and physical well-being. To teach about plants, the environment, the importance of preserving green space and to inspire a love for nature therefore improving stewardship of our world. Our founders believe that creative, hands-on, engaging exhibits play a key role in the quality of learning. Therefore, we strive to use these criteria with every event, program and exhibit we create.
specialties: Not available
slogan: We provide opportunities for the community to interact with nature and educate people about the environment.

updates: [{"text":"Com muito orgulho, a LAVERSO anuncia mais um selo de performance e qualidade: o selo Google Partner. O selo Google Partner é concedido pelo Google para empresas e parceiros que possuem um alto nível de conhecimento e expertise em Google Ads. Ou seja, para receber esse selo, é necessário ter um histórico de desempenho de campanhas excepcional, além de contar com profissionais altamente capacitados para gerir as campanhas com eficiência. Agradecemos a todo o time que contribui diariamente para cada uma de nossas conquistas! Desta vez, especialmente para nosso time de Mídias Pagas. 🔥","time":"1w","title":"Laverso Assessoria em Marketing"},{"text":"Sabe o que faz um negócio quebrar? E se eu te falar que o que faz um negócio dar certo é exatamente o mesmo que faz ele quebrar? Sabe a diferença? O primeiro quebra pela falta, o segundo prospera pelo excesso… Vendas é o principal motivo do crescimento ou declínio de um negócio, e é sobre isso que vamos falar nesse post. LTV é a métrica que define quanto tempo em média o seu cliente consome dentro da sua empresa, produto ou serviço, simples assim, por isso que quanto maior for essa métrica, melhor. Visando esse aumento, temos algumas estratégias que podem dar muito certo, como: 1) Melhorar qualidade do produto e serviço. 2) Agregar experiência no consumo do mesmo, algo que chame atenção do seu público alvo e gere valor. 3) Praticar o overdelivery, ou seja, entregar mais do que é proposto. (Isso sempre da certo!) 4) Praticar o Upsell e Cross-sell, ou seja, vender produtos e serviços complementares de forma que consiga aumentar o ticket médio da compra. Essas são algumas das estratégias que, caso você aplique, COM CERTEZA vão fazer você vender mais e por mais tempo para o mesmo cliente. Aaaah, mas isso é complicado demais para fazer dar certo, muito trabalho… 3 pontos para isso: a) Por isso que chama “trabalho”. b) Se fosse fácil todas as empresas seriam grandes e lucrativas. c) Um CRM (ferramenta de gestão de clientes) pode te ajudar, e MUITO, na criação desse ecossistema dentro da sua empresa. Em resumo, você precisa (URGENTEMENTE) profissionalizar sua presença digital, comunicação com seus clientes e o pós venda. São essas atitudes que vão te fazer aumentar o seu LTV e fazerem você vender mais. Precisa de ajuda? A Laverso faz 💜 #laverso #ltv #vendas #marketing","time":"11mo","title":"Laverso Assessoria em Marketing"},{"text":"Isso definitivamente pode aumentar em 300% o seu faturamento. É impossível encher um balde sem fundo não é mesmo? Mas como assim? Pensa que você coloca água através de uma mangueira para encher um balde, só que esse balde está furado, o que acontece? Boa parte da água que entra, sai! E esse é o problema. Beleza, mas o que isso tem a ver? Você quer aumentar o faturamento do seu negócio, e para que isso aconteça, você precisa vender para mais pessoas. Então vamos supor que você comece a empresa agora e venda para 10 novos clientes no primeiro mês, e no segundo para mais 10 novos clientes. Temos 2 possíveis cenários a partir de agora: 1. Os seus primeiros 10 clientes não renovam com você e por isso param de usar seu produto ou serviço. 2. Seus clientes do mês passado continuam comprando e agora você possui 20 clientes ao invés de só 10. Isso é o LTV e sua importância. Mas como faço para que meus clientes continuem comprando em minha empresa? Existem muitas estratégias possíveis para que consigamos aumentar o tempo de vida útil do seu cliente consumindo em seu estabelecimento. Gostaria de um post que falasse sobre essas técnicas? #laverso","time":"11mo","title":"Laverso Assessoria em Marketing"},{"likes_count":1,"text":"A arte de vender (MUITO) pela internet. Você está dentro ou apenas assiste de camarote? Com o boom do tráfego pago aumentando, consideravelmente, as suas vendas, vamos sempre abrindo os olhos para outras ferramentas de marketing, como por exemplo o EMAIL MARKETING. Você já recebeu um email de alguma loja depois de pesquisar por roupa, tênis ou por um carro na internet? Já recebeu um email te oferecendo um cupom para voltar na sua loja querida e comprar outros produtos, agora com desconto? Esse é o famoso EMAIL MARKETING. A arte de fazer marketing através do email, e eu te juro, é incrível! É uma excelente ferramenta para reduzir o custo da comunicação da sua empresa, te colocando sempre no TOP OF MIND para o consumidor. É muito interessante também para divulgar campanhas específicas de promoções, pague 1 leve 2, ou para avisar que é só até semana que vem... Muito comumente utilizado também para presentear, com cupons, os aniversariantes da semana, enfim... Já entendeu a importância dessa estratégia de marketing né, acho que nem preciso te convencer que, definitivamente, você pode investir menos e vender mais com o email marketing. Agora me tira uma única duvida: Porque mesmo que você ainda não utiliza essa ferramenta para aumentar o faturamento da sua empresa? # #marketing #email #emailmarketing #vendas #estratégia","time":"11mo","title":"Laverso Assessoria em Marketing"},{"text":"Eles se tornaram a maior empresa do segmento por investir na \"Experiência do Cliente\". Você vai continuar sem fazer isso? Vai continuar brigando por preço, sem demonstrar um grande diferencial para com os concorrentes? Quanto custa um café na padaria do seu bairro? R$1,00 , R$2,00 ou R$3,00? A Starbucks cobra em média R$17,50 pelo café. Não se trata do produto servido, se trata da experiência proporcionada ao servir. 1. Copo bonito. 2. Seu nome personalizado. 3. Drink agradável aos olhos, com chantilly e muito mais. 4. Ambiente confortável. 5. Wi-fi, atendentes gentis, marketing olfativo... enfim. A Starbucks investe em experiência, branding, esse é o principal diferencial. Aposto que você já tomou café melhores do que o que está em questão. Mas aposto também que sempre que vai ao Starbucks posta uma foto do café com seu nome, né? Agora me conta: O que você poderia fazer para melhorar a experiência do seu cliente ao consumir seu produto ou serviço?","time":"11mo","title":"Laverso Assessoria em Marketing"},{"likes_count":2,"text":"Esse gatilho faz com que sua empresa venda muito mais!","time":"11mo","title":"Laverso Assessoria em Marketing"}]

updates: [{"text":"🌟 SEO can seem overwhelming, especially for new founders. So, let's dive into some lesser known, yet highly effective, steps to boost your website's visibility. Here are ten key tips to get you started: 1️⃣ Schema Markup: Enhance your website's search engine understanding by implementing structured data. It helps search engines grasp the context of your content, leading to better visibility in search results. 2️⃣ Image Optimization: Optimize your website's images by compressing them without compromising quality. Also, don't forget to add descriptive alt tags, allowing search engines to comprehend the visual elements on your site. 3️⃣ Voice Search Optimization: With the rise of voice assistants, it's crucial to optimize your content for voice search. Consider how people naturally phrase their queries and incorporate those conversational phrases into your content. 4️⃣ User Experience (UX): A seamless and intuitive user experience is paramount for SEO success. Ensure your website is easy to navigate, loads quickly, and provides valuable information that keeps visitors engaged. 5️⃣ Mobile Optimization: Mobile devices are increasingly used for online searches. Make sure your website is mobile-friendly, ensuring a smooth experience for users on smartphones and tablets. 6️⃣ Page Speed Optimization: Website speed matters! Improve your website's loading time by compressing images, minimizing code, and leveraging caching techniques. A fast-loading site improves user experience and SEO rankings. 7️⃣ High-Quality Content: Content is king! Craft compelling and relevant content that addresses your audience's pain points and provides valuable insights. Focus on quality, uniqueness, and user engagement. 8️⃣ Keyword Research: Understanding the keywords your target audience uses is crucial. Conduct thorough keyword research to identify relevant terms and incorporate them naturally into your content to boost search visibility. 9️⃣ Link Building: Build authoritative backlinks to your website to demonstrate credibility and trustworthiness. Seek opportunities to collaborate, guest post, or earn backlinks from reputable sources in your industry. 🔟 Analytics and Monitoring: Regularly monitor your website's performance using analytics tools. Analyze user behavior, track keyword rankings, and measure your SEO efforts to make data-driven decisions for continuous improvement. Implementing these lesser-known SEO practices will establish a solid foundation for your website's success. 💪 #SEOForSuccess #SchemaMarkup #ImageOptimization #VoiceSearchSEO #UXDesignMatters #MobileFriendlyWebsite #PageSpeedOptimization #QualityContentCreation #KeywordResearchTips #LinkBuildingStrategies #AnalyticsAndMonitoring","time":"1d","title":"Step2Growth"},{"text":"Challenges are an inevitable part of any startup journey. But fret not, our infographic unveils the top hurdles you may face along the way, preparing you for the uncertain waters of business. 💼💪 Check out more such insightful infographics at https://lnkd.in/d9tUkmm5 #MarketingChallenges #GettingFound #TargetMarket #USP #UniqueSolution #EffectiveSelling #MarketingTips #BusinessSuccess #Discoverability #UserFriendlyWebsite #SearchEngineOptimization #KnowYourAudience #StandOutFromCompetition #ValueForCustomers #CommunicateBenefits #ExpertInsights #StrategiesForSuccess #MarketingSolutions #DigitalMarketing #BusinessGrowth #SmallBusinessAdvice #Step2Growth","time":"5d","title":"Step2Growth"},{"text":"🔍📢 Big news for LinkedIn marketers! The platform recently updated its algorithm based on user feedback to tackle the issue of irrelevant and non-professional content flooding our feeds. @Jason Feifer from Entrepreneur spoke with the LinkedIn team about these updates. Here's what you need to know: ✅ Non-professional content and posts designed to game the system will no longer be rewarded in the same way. LinkedIn wants to bring back the professional touch and reduce the influx of Facebook-style content that emerged during the pandemic. ✅ LinkedIn now prioritizes content from your first-degree connections. Users consistently express that the most valuable content comes from people they know, so expect to see more updates from direct connections and users you follow in your feed. ✅ Expert knowledge and advice are in the spotlight. LinkedIn identifies your interests based on your profile info and activity. When members in your niche engage with your posts, it's a strong signal that you're sharing relevant and valuable material. Engaging comments and in-depth conversations also boost your post reach. ✅ LinkedIn wants to promote opinions and advice, not just repost. Share your unique insights and experiences rather than generic observations. 💡 Overall, LinkedIn aims to categorize content into relevant topics to show it to more interested users. Generic posts may receive less amplification while sharing your expert opinion can help LinkedIn understand your identity, profession, and who should see your posts. It's worth noting that LinkedIn's system is a work in progress, striving to penalize engagement bait and amplify relevant content. Filtering members into topical buckets could improve connections and exposure. While you might see less reach initially, LinkedIn's goal is to enhance relevance. LinkedIn has seen a significant increase in content shared and viewed, indicating positive trends. As they continue refining their approach, your strategy should align with their objectives. Stay tuned for more updates and adapt your LinkedIn marketing efforts accordingly. The panels were located next to a walkway within the premises, which posed a risk of hitting someone with a swinging door. How did we solve this problem? 💡 Solution 💡 - A mesh cage with a double sliding door mechanism. The reasons for this were: ✅ Clear four metre access when open = No trip hazards on the floor ✅ No top added to cage = Allows for ladders ✅ A double top rail mechanism for both doors = Prevent bowing ✅ Ground guides fitted = Prevent doors swinging outwards ✅ Whole mechanism bonded to the cable tray = Grounding Could AM Industries be the solution to your problem? name: Coastal MI-Box Moving & Storage
location: 136 Lafayette Rd, North Hampton, New Hampshire 03862, US
about: Coastal MI-BOX Moving and Portable Storage is the premier provider of portable equipment and quality moving and storage services serving the SeaCoast of Maine and New Hampshire. The MI-BOX representatives are available to find the most cost-effective storage solutions for your self-storage needs – as well as provide comprehensive moving services: The MI-BOX moving team is here to help with any size moves. The MI-BOX portable storage container is ideal for any moving occasion. Whether you are moving to another neighborhood, remodeling your home, or transporting items to an event or different location, the container has enough room to accommodate your needs. MI-BOX Storage isn’t just for homeowners trying to de-clutter or remodel their homes. The portable storage units are perfect for construction or restoration projects, businesses with extra storage needs, schools and festivals. The units are even easy to use for special events like concerts, trade shows and festivals. Available in three sizes – 8 feet, 16 feet and 20 feet – the company offers portable storage containers that are secure, weatherproof and safe. The containers sit at ground level, making it easier for you to load your belongings in the container without the need for ramps or special loading vehicles.
specialties: Moving, Storage, and Portable Storage
slogan: Move, Store & More with Mi-Box. Serving the Seacoast Region of New Hampshire and Maine.

name: Wildlife Enforcement Monitoring System (WEMS)
location: AIT Solutions, AIT, 58 Moo 9, km. 42 Paholyothin Road, Kloung Nueng, Khlong Luang, Pathumthani , Pathumthani 12120, TH
about: WEMS initiative was developed by United Nations University (UNU) in 2005, to address challenges in wildlife law enforcement information collection, compilation, and sharing process. WEMS database is designed to cater national government’s needs in managing information and reporting them and support them in accomplishing national targets and fulfilling international commitments under MEAs and for SDGs. WEMS is a web-based information system with GIS functionality able to identify trading routes and provide location analysis of illegal trading and poaching of wildlife species. The data entered is stored in the format of Interpol eco-message providing real time query based on computer analysis by relevant enforcement authorities; thereby providing a common information sharing platform between national enforcement agencies attending to wildlife crime within the country and with regional networks. WEMS initiative has two established regional centers: WEMS Asia at the Asian Institute of Technology via AIT Solutions to pilot project in Asia and WEMS Africa implemented through the Lusaka Agreement Task Force (LATF) with Congo-Brazzaville, Kenya, Tanzania ,Uganda, Liberia and Zambia.
specialties: conservation , wildlife, sustainable development , and innovative technologies
slogan: Not available

name: Freedom of Movement, Australia
location: The Unicorn Club- MHSOBA, Forrest Hill, South Yarra, Victoria 3141, AU
about: Welcome to Freedom of Movement! Yoga with a hint of fitness.. We have a small scale yoga school located off Chapel street, South Yarra. Our classes are based on the YogaFit style; a combination Hatha and Vinyasa yoga styles to meet the needs of our 21 century lifestyle. All levels are welcome, especially beginners and those who are yet to try yoga. Here at Freedom of Movement we pride ourselves on providing an accessible and modern version of yoga. Our yoga provides the perfect antidote to sedentary and stressful modern lifestyles or a relaxing compliment to more stressful physical activities. We believe everyone should do (or at least try) yoga, this is why we have to make our prices as affordable as possible. We want to provide you with quality classes and products at low prices. We also offer a number of select yoga and mobility products, including environmentally friendly yoga mats, massage balls & cotton yoga straps. From extensive research we were able to contact suppliers directly, keeping a close eye on quality, to provide affordable prices for you, our valued customers. FIRST CLASS SPECIAL: Like us on Facebook and your first class is only $10! Mission statement -To bring awareness to our body positions & alignment. -To empower the individual with the means to create a positive change, both mental & physical. -To reflect and prioritise our overall wellbeing. -To take the time for relaxation. -To live mindfully in the present. "Because we have not taken the time to 'catch up' with ourselves, we are living on the leftovers of where we have been or the preparations of where we are going"-Deborah Adele
specialties: Yoga, Posture, Wellness, Fitness, Mindfulness, and Relaxation
slogan: Not available

Una misión que es el punto de partida para la explotación minera de estos objetos celestes. La NASA - National Aeronautics and Space Administration acaba de anunciar la nueva fecha de lanzamiento de su misión al asteroide Psyche, un cuerpo celeste que contiene metales preciosos con un valor estimado en 10.000 billones, noventa veces el valor de toda la economía mundial. name: Coach Academy ACTP
location: Budapest, HU
about: Coach Academy is one of the key coach training providers on the Hungarian market with two ICF accredited training programs at ACSTH and ACTP levels. Founded in 2007 Coach Akadémia strongly contributed to the development of coaching in Hungary and our current Alumni of nearly 300 coaches represent a highly recognized professional community in business coaching with significant roles in the leadership of the ICF Hungarian chapter. The four founders and main trainers Dóra Hegedűs PCC, Balázs Kurucz ACC, Kriszta Madai PCC and Judit Soós PCC together with the program director Léda Turai MCC are dedicated to provide a learning space which enables multiple level learning both on the identity and competency level. Our trainers are all practicing professionals working internationally, contributing to the professional development of coaching and supervision through publications and conference presentations and engaging in an ongoing personal learning path.
specialties: coach, ACTP, credential, skills, business, ICF competencies, ICF Code of Ethics, learning, feedback, mentor coaching, supervision, PCC, leaders, fun, neuroscience, safety, group work, experience, trust, and HR

name: Knauf Insulation GmbH
location: Heraklithstraße 8, Simbach am Inn, Bayern 84359, DE
about: Knauf Insulation verfügt über eine einzigartig breite Produktpalette. Dämmlösungen aus Glas- und Steinwolle sowie Holzwolle-Produkte für den Hoch- und Industriebau und für industrielle Anwendungen bilden das Portfolio. Knauf Insulation ist der Dämmstoffspezialist der Knauf Unternehmensgruppe, einem der führenden Hersteller von Baustoffen, und erwirtschaftet weltweit einen jährlichen Umsatz von mehr als einer Milliarde Euro. Knauf Insulation beschäftigt ca. 5.000 Mitarbeiter in über 35 Ländern und verfügt über mehr als 40 Produktionsstätten weltweit. In Deutschland ist der Dämmstoffspezialist mit Produktionsstätten an den Standorten Simbach am Inn, St. Egidien und Bernburg vertreten. Der Unternehmenssitz ist Simbach am Inn.
specialties: Dämmstoffe, Mineralwolle, Glaswolle, Steinwolle, Holzwolle, Einblasdämmung, Brandschutz, Energieeffizienz, Hitzeschutz, and Schallschutz
updates: [{"text":"Wie Ihr sicher bereits aus den Medien erfahren habt, wurden durch #Unwetter in #Slowenien, Kroatien und Österreich Überflutungen verursacht und verheerende Schäden angerichtet. name: Oliver Scholars
location: 80 Maiden Lane, Suite 706, New York, New York 10038, US
about: Oliver Scholars prepares high-achieving Black and Latino students for success at the nation’s best independent schools and colleges. Oliver identifies talented New York City students and places them at top schools with robust financial aid. The Oliver experience includes up to ten years of one-on-one support, after-school and summer coursework, and pre-career training. Oliver Scholars, a nonprofit organization, is distinctive among access programs for its commitment to providing transition support for the whole family, developing students’ social-emotional skills, and instilling an ethos of giving back. Nearly 90 percent of Oliver alumni have attended U.S. News & World Report top 100 colleges, and over 30 percent have attended Ivy League institutions. Since its founding in 1984, Oliver Scholars has graduated over 1,100 students. By removing economic and social barriers to achievement, Oliver Scholars helps gifted, underserved students achieve their potential as next generation change-makers, thought-leaders and trailblazers. For more information, visit oliverscholars.org.
specialties: Education, Opportunity, Diversity, and Access
slogan: Unlocking opportunity for high-achieving Black and Latinx students in NYC.

name: Adelaide City Football Club
location: Fosters Rd, Oakden, South Australia 5086, AU
about: Known as the Zebras, Adelaide City is a football club based in Adelaide, South Australia. The club played in the National Soccer League (NSL) for 27 seasons. We now play in the South Australian National Premier League (NPL SA). City was founded and is primarily followed by people of Italian heritage, originally called Juventus from 1946 to 1966. In 1966 we became Adelaide Juventus, and in 1977 Adelaide City, when Frank Lister captained the team in the inaugural Phillips NSL competition. The club is one of the biggest across the NPL in Australia and arguably the most prominent in South Australia. Several past and present players, coaches, and administrators of the Black and White have been inducted into the Football South Australia Hall of Fame. Our impact also extends to the national stage. We have provided a pathway for several past and present Socceroos, Matildas, and a plethora of the best players to play in national competitions across Australia. Adelaide City also boasts a strong women's program. We pride ourselves on offering the best facilities, quality coaching, and dedicated volunteers for all of our junior and senior programs.

Max, 89, dedicated much of his life to Adelaide City Juventus from the first time he put on a Black and White shirt in the early 1950s. He was awarded Adelaide City player life membership and was a Football SA member for meritorious contribution. Born in Thebarton, South Australia, Max contributed to the game of football as a player, coach, manager and administrator. Max won four championship medals and four Federation Cup medals with Juventus and Birkalla Rovers plus two Ampol Cup medals with Juventus. He was awarded the Sir James Gosse medal for the best under 21 player in South Australia in 1951 before we went on trial with the Chelsea Football Club in England. Max played for Juventus, Birkalla Rovers, Cumberland United and Enfield Victoria. Max coached West Adelaide Hellas' juniors to three titles (1965 to 1967), was SA's state team manager (1971 to 1972), football manager for Adelaide City (1981 to 1982) and match day program editor for Adelaide City (1986 to 2003).","time":"9mo Edited","title":"Adelaide City Football Club"},{"comments_count":1,"likes_count":17,"text":"LET'S RECONNECT Adelaide City remains committed to entering the club on the men's national stage with a keen eye on the future of our women's arm. Mitsotakis underlined in his address that this change affects the affordability of real estate for Greeks. The current Greece Golden Visa property acquisition investment level is €250 000, which is one of the lowest amounts among Europe's most popular residency by investment programmes. The Greek government hopes that this adjustment will make Greece's real estate market more affordable to locals. There have been no announcements regarding geographical adjustments or property acquisition limitations. The precise date on which the adjustments will take effect will be announced soon. Contact our experts if you want to learn more about the Greek residency programme. #lioglobal #residency #investment #investorprogrammes #residencyprogramme #greecevisa #investorvisaprogramme #goldenvisa","time":"9mo","title":"LIO Global and LIO International Property"},{"likes_count":1,"text":"EB5 is back, and it's better than ever. In 1990, the United States introduced its EB-5 investor visa programme in an effort to stimulate the American economy through job creation and capital investment from overseas investors. The programme has been a major success, allowing immigrant investors from all over the world to pursue \"the American dream\" while also generating billions of dollars for the US economy. The initiative was temporarily halted in June 2021 after failing to receive unanimous authorisation in Congress. Many investors were placed in limbo as a result of this. However, President Biden re-authorised the programme to resume operations on March 15, 2022. He also signed the \"EB-5 Reform and Integrity Act,\" which adds new integrity safeguards to the programme. This was especially good news for investors whose funds had already been committed to an investment but who were unable to obtain Green Cards since the programme had been suspended. The new EB5 regulations will be in effect until September 2027. The current investment barrier is $1 050 000, although investors can apply with a lesser investment of $800 000 provided they invest in approved TEA projects (targeted employment areas). Contact our experts if you want to learn more about the EB-5 programme and whether it is the correct choice for you. #lioglobal #residency #investment #investorprogrammes #residencyprogramme #eb5 #investorvisaprogramme #us #unitedstates","time":"9mo","title":"LIO Global and LIO International Property"}]

about: La nostra azienda si propone come fornitore di materiale stampato per uso interno e per la comunicazione con una produzione che spazia dal biglietto da visita alla brochure aziendale, dal modulo fiscale al Flyer pubblicitario sempre con i medesimi impegno e cura, utilizzando diversi processi produttivi quali: stampa Offset (per alte tirature) stampa Digitale (per tirature ridotte) stampa Ecosolvent (per grande formato o materiali plastici) La nostra struttura snella, con reparto grafico interno, e la costante attenzione allo sviluppo tecnologico delle attrezzature utilizzate ci permettono di garantire qualità del prodotto e del servizio, rapidità e certezza nelle consegne. Fanno parte della nostra produzione: fogli carta da lettera, buste, cartelle fustellate, faldoni ad anelli personalizzati, biglietti augurali, inviti, prodotti multipagina (depliant, cataloghi, libri), pieghevoli anche con pieghe incrociate e formati ridotti come ad esempio foglietti illustrativi per il settore farmaceutico nel quale grazie all’elevato standard qualitativo della nostra produzione abbiamo sviluppato un’esperienza pluritrentennale. Inoltre siamo in grado di produrre internamente pvc stampato ad altissima qualità per etichette, interior desgin e decorazione automezzi con la possibilità di effetture sagomatura ad intaglio per decorazioni pre-spaziate.

name: Helen Doron English Polska
location: Kopernika 3, Tychy, śląskie 43-100, PL
about: Helen Doron is the international network of English language schools, present on 5 continents in 40 countries in the world. In 1200 schools we teach anually 175 000 children and teenagers on 20 different levels (from age of 3 months till 19 years). Throughout 35 years of our history 3 million graduates have left our doorsteps. We use an innovative method of "full immersion in language". We offer vast choice of teaching materials, both traditional and modern (augmented reality, mobile applications, YouTube videos, e-platform with educational games, and our own Helen Doron online radio). Our schools are run under a franchise model and our mission is to let your children communicate with ease with any other inhabitant of the globe. We are able to achieve this thanks to our highly qualified teachers. Helen Doron to międzynarodowa sieć szkół językowych, obecna na 5 kontynentach w 40 krajach świata. W 1200 szkołach uczymy rocznie 175 000 dzieci i młodzieży na 20 poziomach (od 3 mieś. do 19 lat). W ciągu 35 lat działalności nasze progi opuściło 3 miliony absolwentów. Nauczamy nowatorską metodą "pełnego zanurzenia w języku". Oferujemy bardzo bogaty wybór pomocy dydaktycznych tradycyjnych i nowoczesnych (rzeczywistość rozszerzona, aplikacje mobilne, filmy na YT, platforma multimedialna, czy nasze własne radio internetowe). Nasze szkoły działają na zasadach franczyzy. Ich niezbędnym elementem są nauczyciele języka angielskiego o najwyższych standardach nauczania. Naszą misją jest sprawienie, by Wasze dzieci bez problemu potrafiły porozumieć się z każdym mieszkańcem globu. Przyszłość brzmi perfect!

about: SECURITY DOOR CONTROLS manufactures electrified access control hardware and controllers worldwide. Since 1972 SDC products have been designed, engineered and built in America while most of our larger competitors manufacture overseas. SDC is the bridge from mechanical access control to electrified security systems. SDC offers premium, code-compliant products to allow users a seamless transition into electronic access control. With a robust toolbox of over 35,000 access and egress control components, SDC products form turnkey solutions to address almost any door opening imagined.

name: Thorek/Scott and Partners
location: 56 Temperance St, Suite 700, Toronto, Ontario M5H 3V5, CA
about: Exceptional investment management, real estate and financial services firms have been choosing us to recruit their next great leaders for over 40 years. We place investment, finance, and corporate leaders who exceed expectations and elevate culture – and then grow their teams in areas in which we are proven experts. Our process has been honed and tested over decades. Our dedicated clients trust us to get it right and not stop until the work is done. We don’t stop and we don’t compromise. At Thorek/Scott and Partners we realize that investing in people extends beyond our office doors. name: PDS Hamiltons Ltd

about: PDS Hamiltons Ltd is a graphic design and print company based in North-West Kent. We offer high quality bespoke service and provide complete design, print and marketing support. Our main services include the design and printing of corporate brochures and newsletters, catalogues, business cards and other business stationery, ID and security cards as well as a wide range of brand support and promotional services including pop-up exhibition stands, banners, signage and personalised workwear. In recent years we have also taken on the project management role for high volume jobs. We are focused on being a customer-led company and therefore, we can work with any other design and print requirements outside of those listed in order to ensure the highest possible quality service. Want to more? Call us on 01474 834444. You can also find us on Twitter @pdshamiltonsltd and by searching PDS Hamiltons on Facebook.

about: Durante más de siete décadas, TP Orthodontics, Inc. se ha asociado con ortodoncistas para lograr resultados óptimos para sus pacientes y sus prácticas. Ortodoncistas de todo el mundo eligen nuestras marcas debido a la alta calidad y rendimiento de estas. TPO es el principal proveedor de servicios y productos de ortodoncia, incluyendo una cartera exclusiva de aparatos estéticos con tecnología de igualación de color Personalized Color-Matching Technology®. Tanto los pacientes como los profesionales eligen brackets cerámicos ClearVu®, InVu®, Click-It® y PLUS (TM) para un tratamiento estético sin igual. En su sede mundial en La Porte, Indiana, TPO fabrica una amplia gama de productos y aparatos de ortodoncia personalizados para la distribución global. TPO cuenta con filiales en Europa, México, Australia, Sudáfrica y Asia. Visita www.tportho.com

about: De l'aperitivo au tiramisù, chez Pasticcio on se retrouve dans une joyeuse pagaille pour partager une cuisine traditionnelle italienne. Ici, on parle avec les mains et on rit fort, on partage et surtout on mange généreusement. Bruyante, joviale, joyeusement bordélique, traditionnelle ou urbano la cuisine italienne rassemble. Pas besoin d’être allé en Italie, pour qu’elle fasse fantasmer. Que ce soit le cinéma italien, le foot, la musique, la dolce vita, les vespa, la pizza ou la cuisson des pâtes, on a tous notre mot à dire sur l’Italie et la vision que l’on s’en fait!

about: Atuante no mercado de telecomunicação, a Alternativa Internet tem como objetivo oferecer produtos e serviços que apresentem as mais diversas soluções para clientes domésticos e corporativos. name: VSVW Advocaten

about: VSVW Advocaten is een gespecialiseerd advocatenkantoor. De advocaten en mediators hebben ieder hun eigen specialisme zoals arbeidsrecht, familierecht, strafrecht, asielrecht, huurrecht en psychiatrisch patiëntenrecht. Wij zijn betrokken advocaten en wij hebben plezier in ons vak. Wij zijn informeel en houden van korte lijnen. Persoonlijk en direct contact vinden wij belangrijk. VSVW Advocaten staat cliënten bij uit Bussum, Naarden, Hilversum, Huizen, Blaricum, Laren, Eemnes, Loosdrecht, Kortenhoef, Muiden, Weesp, maar ook uit Amsterdam, Almere, en Utrecht, Baarn, Soest en daarbuiten. Wij denken met u mee en u kunt van ons een eerlijk en helder advies verwachten. Onze advocaten zijn praktisch ingesteld en samen met u zorgen wij voor een passende oplossing voor uw probleem. Dat kan betekenen dat wij advies geven, een overeenkomst maken, overleg voeren met de wederpartij of dat wij de messen slijpen om een procedure te voeren. U kunt ook een beroep doen op een van onze mediators om het conflict op te lossen. Bij VSVW werken wij nauw met elkaar samen en wij delen onze kennis om u nog beter van dienst te kunnen zijn.

Register Here: https://lnkd.in/eJ6zPNaA","time":"2mo","title":"Venture Cooperative"},{"likes_count":5,"text":"How do investment goals and strategies differ among VCs, LPs, and founders? Last week at the Venture Cooperative, Geri Kirilova, David Arcara, Jeffrey Silverman, and Reena Jailwala hosted a discussion on investment goals and strategies. Some key points: 📈 Attributes correlated to fund outperformance may be counterintuitive: According to a study by DifferentFunds, factors like less AUM per partner, emerging managers, longer careers before VC, and Latinx/Women-led firms correlate with outperformance. 🔍 The debate on specialization vs diversification: there’s no clear answer. One point in favor of specialization: a study by Journal of Business Venturing found that specialization is useful for controlling risk and gaining access to networks, information, and deal flow from other venture investors. 🏛 VCs generally focus on either founders, markets, or products. In founders, VCs look for strengths in character, background, and alignment. In markets, they look for large ($5B+), growing markets with venture potential. Products should be sticky, scalable, and “10x better” than alternatives. Shoutout to Jerry Neumann, DifferentFunds, Harvard Business School, Cambridge Associates, Journal of Business Venturing, and National Bureau of Economic Research for resources on the topic that supported our discussion 🙏 Sign up for our next Public AMA on June 14, on the basics of venture capital portfolios: https://lnkd.in/eJ6zPNaA","time":"2mo","title":"Venture Cooperative"},{"likes_count":13,"text":"ICYMI, at the Venture Cooperative, Geri Kirilova, David Arcara, Jeffrey Silverman and Reena Jailwala hosted a Pipeline & Portfolio Review. A preview: 🤝 Laconia’s deal activity 2023: We have done 250+ intro meetings, with 8 companies reaching the due diligence stage. 🔍 Deal sourcing: 34% of opportunities come from cold sources, such as mentor meetings, events, and industry lists, while 66% come from warm sources, like other investors, the Venture Cooperative, founder referrals, etc. 🧾 Fund updates: We’ve made 8 investments out of Fund III so far in categories like devtools, caregiving, fintech, proptech, and retail tech, among others. For more detail on specific companies, lessons learned the hard way, and more, apply for cohort 5 of the Venture Cooperative here: https://lnkd.in/gpBfkCbQ","time":"2mo","title":"Venture Cooperative"},{"comments_count":1,"likes_count":17,"text":"Shoutout to Preeti Adhikary, Venture Fellow at the Venture Cooperative, on her work at The Great Nepali Diaspora. Congrats to the Nepal Venture Studio incubator's first cohort on their graduation! 🎉 Check it out below:👇","time":"2mo 2mo Edited","title":"Venture Cooperative"},{"likes_count":9,"text":"What goes into running a VC fund? Earlier this week, at the Venture Cooperative, Geri Kirilova, Jeffrey Silverman, David Arcara, and Reena Jailwala hosted a discussion on running a VC fund. Some key points: 🙋♀️ The role of fund-managers vary a lot; even though investing is a key part in their role, they are also responsible for operations & admin, fundraising & investor relations, marketing & community-building, investing & portfolio support, finance, accounting, & legal, and strategy and planning. 📉 According to the Venture Monitor by PitchBook Data, the fundraising momentum of 2021 has dried up by the end of the Q1 of 2023, leaving a meager $11.7 billion closed across 99 funds. 📈 Market Cycles: As the current market cycle ends and before we enter the next one, now is the time to understand how institutional capital allocation decisions are made and what their impact on the startup economy will be. Shout out to Stanford SPARQ, Illumen Capital, PitchBook Data, Nnamdi Iregbulem, and Sunita Patel for resources on the topic that supported our discussion 🙏","time":"2mo","title":"Venture Cooperative"},{"likes_count":72,"text":"“If they're able to build a strong team around them, that's one thing that will set them apart.” - Simeon Iheagwam, Founder and Managing Partner at NOEMIS Ventures At the Venture Cooperative, Simeon Iheagwam (NOEMIS Ventures) and Jerry Neumann (Neu Venture Capital) discussed due diligence for early stage companies. Simeon stresses the importance of having a cohesive and skilled team, with defined roles. Jerry agrees, with a caveat. Jerry looks for founders with experience in the industry: “I'm also looking for a background in the industry...I'm looking for people who actually know what they're doing.” For more insight on how investors think, sign up for our next Venture Cooperative cohort here: https://lnkd.in/gpBfkCbQ","time":"2mo","title":"Venture Cooperative"}]
slogan: The most transparent venture capital fellowship // A free program launched by Laconia

name: Italic Pig
location: 140 High Street, Holywood, Northern Ireland BT18 9HS, GB
about:
Italic Pig is a kickass indie game and animation development company based loosely in Northern Ireland. Our debut release - Schrödinger’s Cat and the Raiders of the Lost Quark (published by Team17 for Xbox, PS4 & Steam) - was nominated by the Writers' Guilds of both Great Britain and Ireland for Best Game Script 2015.
For the past eight years we’ve been focused mostly on creating and developing award-winning, narrative-driven video games across all platforms, and, with some of the most talented artists, animators and developers in the country, we’ve recently begun dipping our toes into the waters of animation and series development.
We’re doing our best to break the negative cycles that the entertainment industries are so famous for. We work a 4-day week to keep the creative energy tanks topped up. We do our best to employ an inclusive, diverse team with a well-balanced spread of voices, backstories and experience. Nobody’s perfect, but we really are trying to make this industry a better place to work.
specialties: narrative, 2D Animation, 3D Animation, VR, Northern Ireland, and Indie Games

name: Kambujaya
location: Phnom Penh, KH
about: Kambujaya is an award winning boutique lifestyle and property development firm aspiring to build design oriented and unique living spaces for the Cambodian market. We were created to meet the growing demands of the Cambodian middle class who are seeking natural greenery, higher quality, and well-designed living solutions that enrich the rhythms of everyday life while building homes that are beautiful, functional, and responsive to their environment. We believe design and architecture are powerful tools to uplift our daily lives. Each Kambujaya project is a result of deep understanding and introspection. When designing our buildings, we took cues from our culture, and context. We observed the current architectural landscape to see what’s been done before, what has or hasn’t been considered, and where we can go from here. Our ultimate goal is to enrich the lives of those living in a Kambujaya home because we recognize the influence that beautiful spaces have on people’s mental, physical and emotional wellbeing. It matters to us that our homes are not just a number on a street, but a sanctuary of space. This understanding informs our design philosophy which we apply to every Kambujaya project. Our inaugural project, KAMBUJAYA RESIDENCES, is a limited boutique collection of 15 linkhouses located at the outskirts of Phnom Penh City.
specialties: Boutique Development, Property Development, Sustainable Development, Real Estate Development, Construction Management, Project Development, Project Management, Residential Development, Branding, Marketing & Communications, Lifestyle Development, Green Infrastructure, and Nature & Greenery
slogan: Boutique lifestyle/property development firm aspiring to build design oriented and unique living spaces for Cambodia.

name: Rollstud Middle East Inc
location: Jafza Industries Street n250, Jabal Ali Industrial Second, Dubai, AE
about: Rollstud Middle East Inc is the manufacturing branch of Rollstud Ltd UK – manufacturer of Stud bolts, Hex Head bolts and Other Precision Machined Components. We have more than 40 years of experience in supplying fasteners to oil and gas projects globally and are happy to assist for any requirements of bolting products in ongoing project. Rollstud Middle East Inc, has 15,000 Square Feet manufacturing facility located at Jebel Ali Free zone, Dubai, United Arab Emirates operating according to ISO 9001, 14001 and 18001. We are proud to announce that we are the first in the region to be API 20 E & F approved bolting manufacturer. We manufacture stud bolts and other fasteners size range from ½” – 4 “ Imperial Diameter and M6-M90 Metric Diameter, we provide Materials Test Certification to EN 10204 (E) 3.1 Rollstud Dubai carry extensive stocks of B7, L7, B7M, L7M, 8.8 and Stainless Steel grades (Duplex/Super Duplex & SS316L), with the corresponding nuts, all of which can be rapidly manufactured into finished products to suit individual customer requirements. We also offer all major exotic alloy material like S32750/ S32760/ Alloy 20 /Alloy 925 / Alloy 625 / Gr. 660 / Alloy 400 / Alloy 20 and other grades. In addition, wide range of coatings can also be offered locally from Dubai, such as P.T.F.E – XYLAN, XYLAR, Everslik, Zinc, Cadmium, Phosphate, Electroless Nickel and Hot Dip Galvanizing.
specialties: Bolting, fasteners, oil & Gas, Manufacturing, APIbolting, and Studbolts

name: Fortay.ai
location: Toronto, Toronto, Ontario M6G 2W4, CA
about: Fortay.ai is a Team Success Platform that empowers leaders and managers to take action to build diverse healthy workplaces where everyone can thrive. We designed the platform for people-first organizations that value culture health, diversity, inclusion, and a growth mindset. Fortay's Culture Add Hiring and People Experience (PX) solutions can work together or separately to help organizations achieve business outcomes by delivering key insights to the right folks. Culture is at the core of an organization's health, growth, and ultimately success - for this reason, it's imperative for team success we start at hiring. Fortay's solution offerings support organizations with rapid growth, D&I, resiliency, digital transformation, retention prediction, culture alignment, and bias reduction. Fortay was rated Number 1 Startup to Watch in 2020 for Employee Experience by The Starr Conspiracy and has been featured in industry reports by Red Thread Research, Mercer, and Bersin by Deloitte. Key results? Higher performance, more innovation, stronger retention, inclusive, healthy workplaces, and happier people experiences. 🙌🏽 Fortay is proudly woman-owned and led. Learn more at https://fortay.co/
specialties: Employee Engagement, Employee Feedback, Employee Intelligence, People Analytics, Pulse Surveys, Continuous Feedback, Assessment, Recruiting, Hiring, Talent Acquisition, Machine Learning, Candidate Experience, AI, Employee Experience, Diversity Recruiting, Diversity and Inclusion, DIBs, AI for Recruiting, HR Tech, Culture Intelligence, Belonging, Team Culture, Culture Health, Resilience, D&I, and Leadership
updates: [{"likes_count":5,"text":"Juneteenth is next Monday, is your organization taking the right approach? Thank you, Janet M. Stovall, CDE, for this great share! 🎯 #Juneteenth2023 #Juneteenth #juneteenthcelebration #DEI #EDI #DEIB #Inclusion #DiversityandInclusion #Diversity #Leaders #InclusiveLeadership #Leadership #business","time":"1mo 1mo Edited","title":"Fortay.ai"},{"likes_count":11,"text":"It's no secret that being 'too busy' has become a common theme in our professional lives. However, constantly being on the move isn't a badge of honor - it's a ticket to burnout. We often find ourselves trapped in a \"busyness tunnel,\" missing out on high-priority work and personal life. Our challenge is to break free from this cycle and find a healthier balance. Is your workplace culture trapped in the busyness paradox? 🧐 💡 One key insight from the research of ideas42, it's nearly impossible for individuals to escape this busyness tunnel without structural changes at the organizational level. The root of work-life conflict, a potent cause of stress and contributor to poor health and a drop in productivity, lies in how workers experience busyness. 🎯 Intriguingly, at virtually every organization, everyone interviewed said that work-life balance is a core value. But the reality? Emails fly at all hours; work spills into nights, weekends, and even family celebrations. We're publicly wearing our busyness like a badge of honor, but behind the scenes, it's taking a toll. 🎯 Leaders are often among the worst offenders, undermining the work-life balance they preach through their own actions due to pressure. Solutions must address these workplace cultures trapped in a broader busyness paradox. 📣 So, here's a call to action: To prevent burnout and improve work-life stress, companies should consider sending regular social signals that working 24/7 is not expected or rewarded, building in deliberate slack time for getting big projects done, and making everyone’s workloads more transparent. ✅ Let's move away from glorifying busyness and towards celebrating balanced productivity. We are human beings, after all, not human doings! If your organization would like to assess culture health and burnout, reach out. We'd love to help you! 🙋🏻♀️ We'd love to hear your thoughts and experiences on this in the comments below! #WorkLifeBalance #Productivity #Work #Wellbeing #WorkplaceCulture #HustleCulture #People #PeopleExperience #EmployeeExperience #stress #Burnout #BurnoutPrevention #Health #leaders #leadership #PeopleFirst #Talent","time":"1mo","title":"Fortay.ai"},{"comments_count":1,"likes_count":7,"text":"Wishing everyone a happy & safe LGBTQ+ Pride Month! 🏳️🌈 We're sharing Out & Equal's helpful Pride Guide below. It was an honor to share our thoughts with The Guardian on this critical topic. Thank you! Inclusion is about everyday behavioral actions and the key to talent attraction and retention. \"For lasting impact, organizations must begin their journey toward inclusion by engaging their leaders and managers. Leveraging assessment tools and data is crucial to achieving the desired results that benefit everyone involved. According to Fortay.ai, an industry leader in fostering inclusive workplaces, intention alone is insufficient to build an inclusive culture. Companies must establish accountability for inclusion to become a corporate cultural reality that drives positive business outcomes. For the successful implementation of DEIB in a workplace, inclusive behavioral metrics derived from clear and measurable goals need to be in place – championed by CEOs and tracked on an ongoing basis. “Making inclusive behavioral metrics a part of a leader’s performance review embeds accountability, which should be viewed as a path to effective leadership and inspire personal and professional growth,” Fortay Co-founder Marlina Kinnersley expounds.\" If your organization is looking for help in creating a more inclusive workplace, developing inclusive leaders, or improving psychological safety to boost innovation for growth, let's chat!😁 #culture #inclusion #workplace #diversity #inclusiveLeadership #humancenteredleadership #leadership #leaders #leadershipDevelopment #inclusiveculture #FortayNews #innovation #psychologicalsafety","time":"2mo","title":"Fortay.ai"},{"likes_count":8,"text":"April is Celebrate Diversity Month, a month dedicated to appreciating and respecting the diversity surrounding us all. Creating an inclusive future of work requires EQUITY which results in greater well-being, safety, culture health, and organizational success! Now, let's ALL roll up our sleeves and get to #Equity work! name: Alshabaka Events & Tents
location: Manama , manama 54645, BH
about:
The company was found in the late 1980s of the last century by Saleh Bin Ali Alhayki. For over 30 years, Saleh Bin Ali Alhayki and his family have grown the business from a small party rental store to being one of the leading companies in the event management and tents industry in the Kingdom.

Today, Alshabaka Events & Tents is well-known in the Kingdom of Bahrain and other Gulf countries. All along, the company has supported large-scale events such as Formula 1, Asian Olympics in  Bahrain, Bahraini parliamentary elections, and many Royals’ weddings.

Proudly, we have been helping businesses and individuals for decades with all their event planning. Our professional team help find fast solutions, provide the latest rental products for events, parties, and weddings.

In addition, we are committed in taking steps and actions in our community by sponsoring social and charitable events all over the country. Indeed, as being part of this community it is our pleasure to always contribute and make our country a better place. 

Furthermore, currently, thanks to our founder and our team of great professionals, we have the capacity to host and organize massive events. Alshabaka organizes and plans events, weddings, conferences, exhibitions, elections campaigns, and any large gatherings from few hundreds to over 30 thousand people at one time, in the same place.  Follow us on Instagram for more ideas and to learn more about us.
specialties: Tents, Events, Weddings, Rentals, Parties, Stages, Event Planner, Catering, Sounds Systems, Selling of Tents, and Renting of Tents
slogan: Alshabaka is the leading events and tents company in the event management industry in the Kingdom of Bahrain.

name: Una palabra al día
location: C/ Castillejos, Barcelona, Barcelona, ES
about: ¡Hola! Mi nombre es Jorge y soy el fundador de «Una palabra al día». Este proyecto surgió en el año 2012 con el único fin de publicar una palabra al día recogida por el diccionario de la Real Academia Española de la lengua. Ese objetivo se cumplió durante varios años y esta es la web antigua donde podréis ver el resultado. Unos años después decidí evolucionar y convertir este lugar en algo mayor donde, no solo ofrecería a los visitantes una amplia base de conocimiento sobre el uso del castellano sino que, además, tendrían la oportunidad de explicarnos sus proyectos web para sí intentar desarrollarlos para ellos y que estos llegasen a un público deseado. Así surgió un modelo de negocio que ya lleva en funcionamiento varios años y con el que evolucionamos día tras día. Sin perder la esencia original de ofrecer información y consejo sobre el uso del castellano en la vida cotidiana, «Una palabra al día» revive de nuevo para centrarse más en sus servicios de desarrollo y gestión de redes sociales y, al mismo tiempo, mantiene elementos propios de la lengua y literatura castellana para no olvidarnos de cómo surgió y por qué aún seguimos operando. ¡Un fuerte abrazo!
specialties: educación, literatura, español, desarrollo web, web, android, ios, diseño, redacción, wordpress, woocommerce, html, and css
slogan: ¿Hablamos! | Desarrollamos tu proyecto web
