updates: [{"text":"عيد أضحى مبارك ✨ Eid Adha Mubarak #أشياء #طباعة_ثلاثية_الأبعاد #عيد_الأضحى #things #3dprinting #things3dprinting #EidAlAdha","time":"2w","title":"أشياء - Things"},{"likes_count":2,"text":"تأثير الطباعة ثلاثية الأبعاد على النشاط الصناعي الطباعة ثلاثية الأبعاد لديها القدرة على تغييرالنشاط الصناعي التقليدي من خلال تقديم طريقة أكثر كفاءة وفعالية من حيث التكلفة لإنتاج السلع. فيما يلي بعض الطرق التي تعمل بها الطباعة ثلاثية الأبعاد على تغيير النشاط الصناعي: 1. تقليل النفايات: تسمح الطباعة ثلاثية الأبعاد بإنتاج دقيق للأشياء، مما يقلل من كمية النفايات الناتجة مقارنة بأساليب التصنيع التقليدية. 2. الإنتاج حسب الطلب: تتيح الطباعة ثلاثية الأبعاد إمكانية الإنتاج حسب الطلب، مما يقلل الحاجة إلى المخزونات كبيرة والفترات الزمنية الطويلة. 3. الإنتاج المحلي: يمكن إجراء الطباعة ثلاثية الأبعاد محليًا، مما يقلل الحاجة إلى سلاسل التوريد العالمية والنقل. 4. حرية التصميم: تسمح الطباعة ثلاثية الأبعاد بإنشاء تصميمات معقدة كان من المستحيل تصنيعها في السابق باستخدام الأساليب التقليدية. ..................................................................................................... Impact of 3d Printing on the Manufacturing Industry 3D printing has the potential to disrupt the traditional manufacturing industry by offering a more efficient and cost-effective way of producing goods. Here are some of the ways 3D printing is changing the manufacturing industry: 1. Reduced Waste: 3D printing allows for the precise and accurate production of objects, reducing the amount of waste produced compared to traditional manufacturing methods. 2. On-Demand Production: 3D printing enables on-demand production, reducing the need for large inventories and long lead times. 3. Localized Production: 3D printing can be done locally, reducing the need for global supply chains and transportation. 4. Design Freedom: 3D printing allows for the creation of complex and intricate designs that were previously impossible to manufacture using traditional methods. ..................................................................................................... #3dprinting #things #things3dprinting #manufacturing #additivemanufacturing #أشياء #طباعة_ثلاثية_الأبعاد #تصنيع #applicationsof3dprinting","time":"2mo","title":"أشياء - Things"},{"text":"تطبيقات الطباعة ثلاثية الأبعاد للطباعة ثلاثية الأبعاد مجموعة واسعة من التطبيقات في مختلف الصناعات، بما في ذلك الطيران والسيارات والرعاية الصحية والسلع الاستهلاكية. وهنا بعض الأمثلة: 1. النمذجة الأولية: تسمح الطباعة ثلاثية الأبعاد بالنمذجة الأولية السريعة للمنتجات الجديدة، مما يقلل من وقت وتكلفة تطوير المنتج. 2. التخصيص: تتيح الطباعة ثلاثية الأبعاد إنتاج منتجات مخصصة، مثل الأطراف الصناعية، وزراعة الأسنان، والتي تتناسب مع الاحتياجات الفردية للمريض. 3. قطع الغيار: يمكن استخدام الطباعة ثلاثية الأبعاد لإنتاج قطع غيار للآلات والمعدات، مما يقلل الحاجة إلى المخزونات الكبيرة والمدة الزمنية الطويلة للتبديل. 4. الفن والتصميم: فتحت الطباعة ثلاثية الأبعاد إمكانيات جديدة للفنانين والمصممين، مما أتاح لهم إنشاء تصميمات معقدة كان من المستحيل إنتاجها في السابق. ....................................................................................................................... Applications of 3D Printing 3D printing has a wide range of applications in various industries, including aerospace, automotive, healthcare, and consumer goods. Here are some examples: 1. Prototyping: 3D printing allows for the rapid prototyping of new products, reducing the time and cost of product development. 2. Customization: 3D printing enables the production of customized products, such as prosthetics, and dental implants, that are tailored to the individual needs of the patient. 3. Spare Parts: 3D printing can be used to produce spare parts for machinery and equipment, reducing the need for large inventories and long lead times. 4. Art and Design: 3D printing has opened up new possibilities for artists and designers, allowing them to create intricate and complex designs that were previously impossible to produce. ........................................................................................................... #3dprinting #things #things3dprinting #manufacturing #additivemanufacturing #أشياء #طباعة_ثلاثية_الأبعاد #تصنيع #applicationsof3dprinting","time":"2mo","title":"أشياء - Things"},{"comments_count":3,"likes_count":1,"text":"الطباعة ثلاثية الأبعاد: مستقبل التصنيع الطباعة ثلاثية الأبعاد ، والمعروفة أيضًا باسم التصنيع الإضافي ، هي تقنية ثورية لديها القدرة على تغيير الطريقة التي ننتج بها السلع. تسمح الطباعة ثلاثية الأبعاد بإنشاء تصميمات معقدة كان من المستحيل تصنيعها في السابق باستخدام الطرق التقليدية. ما هي الطباعة ثلاثية الأبعاد؟ الطباعة ثلاثية الأبعاد هي عملية إنشاء أشياء ثلاثية الأبعاد من ملف رقمي. وهي تشمل على ترسيب مادة طبقة تلو الأخرى ، مثل البلاستيك أو المعدن ، لإنشاء جسم مادي. تبدأ العملية بإنشاء نموذج ثلاثي الأبعاد باستخدام برنامج تصميم بمساعدة الكمبيوتر (CAD). يتم بعد ذلك تقطيع النموذج إلى طبقات رقيقة، وتقوم الطابعة ثلاثية الأبعاد الجسم طبقة طبقة، باتباع التعليمات من الملف الرقمي. ............................................................................... 3D Printing: The Future of Manufacturing 3D printing, also known as additive manufacturing, is a revolutionary technology that has the potential to transform the way we produce goods. It allows for the creation of complex and intricate designs that were previously impossible to manufacture using traditional methods. What is 3D Printing? 3D printing is a process of creating three-dimensional objects from a digital file. It involves the layer-by-layer deposition of material, such as plastic, or metal, to create a physical object. The process begins with the creation of a 3D model using computer-aided design (CAD) software. The model is then sliced into thin layers, and the 3D printer builds the object layer by layer, following the instructions from the digital file. ................................................................. #technology #additivemanufacturing #3dprinting #manufacturing #things #things3dprinting #طباعة_ثلاثية_الأبعاد #أشياء","time":"2mo Edited","title":"أشياء - Things"},{"likes_count":2,"text":"تقبل الله طاعتكم وكل عام وأنتم بخير وعيد فطر سعيد متابعينا الأعزاء متابعين بالطباعة ثلاثية الأبعاد بحماس وان شاء الله بتسمعوا أخبار حلوة عننا قريبا #أشياء #طباعة_ثلاثية_الأبعاد #عيد_الفطر ..................................................................................... name: Sweet and Baker Insurance Brokers
location: 44 Second Street, San Francisco, CA 94105, US
about: Sweet & Baker is a full service San Francisco based insurance broker offering the sale and service of personal and commercial insurance products and group health & life benefits throughout the greater Bay Area. We were established in 1951 by Donald Sweet and Bruce Baker, both native San Franciscans. Since 1951, we have grown to become one of the largest independent insurance agencies in the Bay Area. Our growth has been based on our dedication to resourceful problem solving, quality insurance products, and superior client service. Our ability to represent a broad selection of over 100 insurance carriers assures that we can place the coverage you need. We appreciate your business, and if at any time you have a question or issue, please feel free to contact us.
specialties: Commercial Insurance, Personal Insurance, and Life & Health Insurance

Contact Monde Social to learn how we can help you create and execute a winning social media strategy 😁 NOW BOOKING FOR 2023! #socialmediamarketing #socialmedia #marketing #socialmediamanagement #socialmediastrategy","time":"6mo Edited","title":"Monde Social"},{"likes_count":3,"text":"6 effective strategies for creating content that converts 👇🏼 🍊Utilise current trends, popular culture, and events: Incorporating these elements into your content can make it more relevant and engaging for your audience, while also providing a fresh angle for new ideas. 🍊Keep your content easy to understand: Avoid jargon or complex language that may confuse your audience. Instead, use simple and clear language that is easy for anyone to understand. 🍊Include a call-to-action and persuasive language: Adding a clear and actionable call-to-action (CTA) to your content can encourage your audience to take the next step, whether it be signing up for a mailing list, downloading a resource, or making a purchase. Additionally, using persuasive language, such as \"power words,\" can help to boost conversions. 🍊Utilise social proof: Including social proof in your content, such as customer testimonials or case studies, can create a sense of FOMO (fear of missing out) among your audience and increase conversions. 🍊Focus on your strongest marketing channels: Instead of trying to be active on every social media platform, focus your efforts on one or two platforms where you know your audience is most active. 🍊Use analytics to track progress: Keep track of your analytics and conversions regularly to better understand what's working and what's not. This will help you identify areas of your strategy that need improvement and where you should focus your efforts to see the most returns. Want more helpful social tips for growing your brand on social media? Here are 5 reasons why you should be creating more Reels for your business: ☝🏼Increased visibility: Reels are prominently displayed on the Explore page, which means that they have the potential to be seen by a large audience. Additionally, when people engage with your reels, they may share them with their own followers, further increasing your reach. ☝🏼Improved engagement: Reels are a fun and interactive way to engage with your followers. They allow you to showcase your personality and behind-the-scenes content in a way that is both entertaining and informative. As a result, your followers may be more likely to comment, like, and share your reels. ☝🏼Increased brand awareness: Reels allow you to promote your brand and showcase your products or services in a creative and engaging way. It's important to note that creating engaging reels requires creativity, strategy and consistency. It is essential to understand your audience, tailor the content to their interest, and be consistent in terms of posting them. Need help creating engaging reel content for your brand? about: At ProAct, we strive to produce innovative, affordable and flexible prescription drug benefit solutions for the client by combining industry leading client service with the latest in PBM technology. And to us, those solutions go far beyond medications. We’re here to work with you personally, as a partner, to implement the right plan and help you make informed decisions that are best for your business, your bottom line and the health of your employees. Who is ProAct? ProAct is a fully integrated Pharmacy Benefit Management Company providing benefits since 1999. We are 100% employee owned, with over 3,000 employees nationwide who are dedicated to providing you with industry-leading “high-touch” customer support. We aim to serve midmarket sized employer that are often underserved. Why ProAct? From innovative cost containment programs to high-touch client and member services- our clients are covered under our care. We are employee owned, so there is never a worry that your plan will be bought or sold. Client Services ProAct has a team of customer support representatives that are there to answer your questions, 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. Our implementation team will work closely with your team to ensure that the transition will be seamless. Once on board, you will have direct access to our dedicated account management team, who will ensure that your plan meets the needs of your business and the needs of your members. Custom Trend Management When you work with ProAct, we work as your partner to ensure that you are getting the best plan and services for your money. We own our own state of the art mail order and specialty pharmacies, allowing us complete control over costs savings to your plan. We offer a variety of services to ensure that your costs stay low, including our Therapeutic Alternative Program, International Mail Order, quarterly reviews, and much more. Contact Us Sales@proactrx.com 1-888-254-3552

The program requires the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) to negotiate prices with drug manufacturers for some single-source medications covered under Medicare Part B and Part D. HHS is scheduled to release, on September 1, 2023, the first list of selected, qualifying medications, and to begin negotiations on October 1, 2023. In June 2023, Merck & Co. filed the first lawsuit against HHS challenging the constitutionality of the DPN program. The Ohio Chamber of Commerce, Bristol Myers Squibb, and Pharmaceutical Research and Manufacturers of America have also filed lawsuits challenging the constitutionality of the DPN program. The impact the DPN program will have in the commercial space is still unknown as prices on the selected single-source medications could remained unchanged or even possibly increase as drug manufacturers look to offset losses in revenue. name: Knust-SBD Pte Ltd
location: Jurong, Singapore, Singapore 629268, SG,9 Tuas Loop, Singapore, Tuas 637340, SG
about: Knust-SBD Pte Ltd’s parent company Schoeller-Bleckmann Oilfield Equipment (SBO AG) is a leading worldwide supplier of non magnetic steels and drill string components to the MWD, LWD and Directional Drilling industries. Our corporate office and main manufacturing facility is located in Ternitz, Austria. SBO has decades of experience in the manufacture of specialty steels and directional drilling tools and components. SBO has an outstanding reputation for the manufacture and supply of non magnetic MWD, LWD and drill string components which is based upon our continuous research and development of high strength non magnetic steels and our proven capabilities in precision machining. Our precision machining facilities are located in Ternitz Austria, Chesterfield UK, Houston Texas, Neuvo Leon Mexico, Binh Duong Vietnam as well as in Singapore when Knust SBO Far East was established in 2012 to meet our customers requirements for precision tools, components and laser overlay products in the Far East. With the acquisition of Darron Oil Tools in 2002, SBO expanded its product range to include the manufacture of drilling tools and offers a wide range of repair and maintenance services for oilfield equipment. In our continuing efforts to service the needs of our customers we have established a worldwide network of facilities capable of manufacturing, repairing and maintaining drilling tools. In addition to Knust-SBD’s facilities in Singapore other facilities are located in Aberdeen Scotland, Louisiana USA, Dubai UAE, Brazil, Nisku Canada, and Russia. In 2016 Knust SBO Far East Pte Ltd and SB Darron Pte Ltd were merged creating Knust-SBD Pte Ltd integrating our precision manufacturing and oilfield services capabilities in Singapore. SBO is committed to producing products that meet the highest industry and customer quality standards and as such all manufacturing facilities are certified to both API and ISO quality standards

name: The National Trust of Western Australia
location: 4 Havelock St, Perth, Western Australia 6005, AU
about:
The National Trust of Western Australia works to raise knowledge, awareness, understanding and commitment to Western Australia’s natural, Aboriginal and historic heritage. The Trust achieves this objective through the conservation and interpretation of heritage places it manages on behalf of the community and government of Western Australia, and through its education and learning programs.

The National Trust of Western Australia was established in Western Australia in 1959 by a group of concerned citizens who identified the need to promote heritage conservation. This group grew rapidly and included some of the most prominent citizens in the State. Some five years later an Act of Parliament was passed in the State Parliament which formally established the Trust as an independent community based organisation.
specialties: Heritage Services, Cultural Tourism, Heritage Conservation, and Community Engagement

The temporary exhibition centred on the discovery of a rare late 19th century man's jacket remarkably well-preserved and excavated during a 2020 archaeological excavation of the former Chinese cemetery in East Perth. Developed in collaboration with the Chung Wah Association Inc., the exhibition highlighted the early history of the Perth Chinese community. The exhibition and events around it provided numerous opportunities to further appreciate the significance of the archaeological discoveries, the rich heritage of the Chinese community and connections to the historic East Perth Cemeteries cared for by the National Trust. name: SandSpot
location: 7, Rue Duffour-Dubergier, Bordeaux, Nouvelle-Aquitaine 33000, FR
about:
La société SandSpot©  propose un nouveau type d'équipement sportif et culturel à disposition des habitants et de tous les acteurs de la vie sociale.

Né de la volonté d'améliorer le quotidien des habitants à partir d'un modèle humaniste ouvert à tous, SandSpot Village est un équipement structurant au service d'un urbanisme ayant pour objectif de connecter les habitants à leur territoire.

Véritables lieux de vie de taille variable (2 500 à 10 000m²) où le sport, l'art et la culture sont les catalyseurs d'une dynamique de vie.

SandSpot Village se définit par une haute intensité d'usage, une exemplarité environnementale et un impact socio-économique fort.

Projets en cours ⏳: SandSpot Village Bordeaux et SandSpot Village Marseille, ouvertures en 2025.

Sandspot c'est aussi des évènements originaux qui vous ressemblent, autour du sport, de l'art et de la culture ! Nous créons les évènements à vos côtés, de la conception à la réalisation, "Sandspot Events" donne une touche unique à vos projets !

SandSpot 🩴🏐
Sport, culture & art concept

name: California National University
location: 18520 Hawthorne Blvd, First Floor, Torrance, CA 90504, US
about: California National University (CNU) was founded in January 1993 in recognition of the need for working adults to meet contemporary challenges to re-think and re-tool. From the beginning it has been CNU's intent to provide quality degree programs in a flexible environment. This goal has been accomplished by adopting an innovative approach to traditional education; combining self-study with direct personal contact and technology. A unique aspect to CNU programs is the one-on-one instruction students receive from a distinguished national faculty. Although the University has taken advantage of advancements in technology to improve instruction, technology is regarded as an enhancement rather than a replacement for good teaching and relevant content. Students enjoy an educational climate that is typical of one found on a small traditional campus. This is made possible at a distance through a centralized Learning Network; emphasizing committed student service and open communication. CNU is one of the only universities that offers an accredited Bachelor and Master of Science in Engineering completely online! CNU is Accredited by the Accrediting Commission of the Distance Education and Training Council www.detc.org. Over nine programs to choose from including: - Bachelor of Science in Engineering - Bachelor of Quality Assurance Science - Bachelor of Computer Science - Bachelor of Business Administration - Master of Business Administration (MBA) - Master of Science in Engineering - Master of Engineering Management - Master of Human R - esources Management We also offer certification programs in: - Six SIgma Green and Black Belt - Human Resources Management
specialties: College of Engineering, College of Quality and Engineering Management, College of Business Administration, Six Sigma Green Belt Certification, Six Sigma Black Belt Certification, QAS 501 Six Sigma Green and Black Belt, and Human Resources (HR) Certification

name: Space Enterprise at Berkeley
location: Berkeley, California 94720, US
about: Co-founded in October 2016, Space Enterprise at Berkeley (SEB) is a student-run liquid-fuel rocket team dedicated to achieving spaceflight and developing rocket technologies at University of California, Berkeley.
specialties: Space Propulsion/ Rocketry, Space Technologies, Project Management, Interdisciplinary Integration, Engineering, Science, Business Development, Production, and Design
updates: [{"comments_count":2,"likes_count":75,"text":"With the help of our partner PANAM Engineers LTD and the ingenuity of our members, we have successfully hotfired our new vertical system, Eureka-2. The PANAM fittings and piping have stood up against the high-pressure and cryogenic temperatures of our liquid system, enabling us to be more rigorous in our design decisions and optimize functionality. We are excited for the future of this partnership and will share more details of our work together soon. Thank you to PANAM Engineers LTD, and as always, blue skies and bright stars!","time":"2mo","title":"Space Enterprise at Berkeley"},{"comments_count":3,"likes_count":100,"text":"WOW! On December 3rd, Space Enterprise at Berkeley successfully launched Eureka-1, UC Berkeley’s FIRST liquid bi-propellant rocket, becoming one of the select few collegiate teams in the world to accomplish such a monumental achievement. This comes at the conclusion of 3 years of development of our custom engineered propulsion system, avionics stack, simulation software, and aerostructure — all designed and validated in-house by Berkeley’s brightest engineers. Despite the successful launch, the vehicle was not recovered successfully. But we are not deterred — we see this as an exciting avenue to improve our methods and create an even better launch vehicle. We can’t wait to get to work next semester designing and validating our new system with ice-cold cryogenic flows, jaw dropping static fires, and heart stopping launches… so stay tuned! Finally, a few words of gratitude. Thanks to our incredibly hard working team for their time and dedication to this project. Thanks to the family, friends, and sponsors who have supported us every step of the way. Thanks to everyone who tuned in to our livestream and for making this community so exciting to be apart of. We owe unlimited amount of gratitude to the SEB alumni who started us on this journey. We wouldn’t be where we are today without them. As always, blue skies and bright stars 🚀","time":"8mo","title":"Space Enterprise at Berkeley"}]
slogan: Bringing Spaceflight to UC Berkeley

name: Hey Girl You Can

about: Hey Girl You Can is a global community of over 40,000 + women. We are founded on two guiding principles. That every interaction with HGYC leaves a woman feeling elevated, uplifted, inspired and believing a little bit more...that she can! And that our community is a platform to give a woman a space for her voice to be heard and honored. We are a community where women can find support, encouragement, friendship and be reminded how significant and valuable they really are.

In her podcast, Mystical Sisterhood, Maureen interviews intuitive, healers, and other courageous women on a path of joy and healing. She guides those who come to her, whether it be through individual coaching and/or the Mystical Sisterhood Membership, in the highest light. Through insightful questions, thought-provoking group work, and the building of community, Maureen envisions women being in unison with each other in a new way. But here's the truth: perfectionism isn't a flaw; it's a strength that can propel you to extraordinary heights. 🌟 In our latest blog post, written by HGYC member @introvertsmerge, we explore the path of redefining perfectionism, empowering you to harness its positive qualities while letting go of the self-imposed pressure to be perfect. It's time to celebrate your progress and embrace your unique journey. 💡 Learn how to channel your high standards into growth, collaboration, and self-compassion. Discover practical strategies to overcome self-criticism, find balance, and unleash your true potential as an unstoppable woman entrepreneur. ✨ You don't have to sacrifice your ambitions or compromise your standards. Instead, shift your perspective and learn to thrive in the face of imperfections. Embrace the lessons, celebrate your wins, and inspire others with your authentic journey. 🔗 Visit the link in our bio to dive into the transformative world of rethinking perfectionism. Let's unlock your true power together and create a life and business that exceeds your wildest dreams. #RethinkPerfectionism #EmbraceYourJourney #StrengthInImperfections #UnleashYourPower #WomenEntrepreneurs #AmbitiousWomen #CollaborationOverPerfection #GrowthMindset #SuccessMindset #BusinessInspiration #EmpoweredByImperfections #AmbitionInAction #DreamBig #OwnYourPower #SelfBelief #FearlessEntrepreneur #PersonalDevelopment #WomenSupportingWomen #ProgressOverPerfection #EntrepreneurialMindset #BelieveInYourself #MotivatedMinds #UnlockYourPotential #PerfectionistToPowerhouse #BlogPostAlert #heygirlyoucan #hgyc #levelup #leveluplounge @tarasvoiceig","time":"2w","title":"Hey Girl You Can"},{"text":"Meet HGYC member @sailynndoyle Sailynn Doyle is your FUN Business Coach! Sailynn started her entrepreneurial journey because she was desperate to have control over her time, money and flexibility after working 5 jobs in 7 years due to two layoffs and a short term contract job! She opened her first business in 2007 by purchasing a senior home care franchise in North Dartmouth, MA. After working 80+ hour weeks and being on-call 24/7 for 3 years, she drew the line in the sand and went on a mission to figure out how to Live More and Work Less! Within 2 years of implementing her unique system, she was making multiple six figures and working part time in her business! She achieved her ultimate goal to retire from her full time career by age 40 and then sold it all to start over in sunny South Florida! Nowadays Sailynn is fulfilling her passions of living life to its fullest while helping other women entrepreneurs do the same by sharing her unique system to say goodbye to burnout and hello to freedom inside her hybrid-style system designed to give you the support you'd expect from working with a coach, combined with the flexibility of a self-guided course. For more info about Sailynn, her courses, and free resources, head to her website https://lnkd.in/eZUABWeP #FunBusinessCoach #EntrepreneurJourney #TimeFreedom #FinancialFreedom #FlexibilityLifestyle #MultipleSixFigures #WorkLessLiveMore #RetireEarly #StartingOver #SouthFloridaLife #PassionateEntrepreneur #BurnoutSolution #HelloFreedom #HybridSystem #CoachingSupport #SelfGuidedCourse #WomenEntrepreneurs #BusinessMentor #SuccessStrategies #FreeResources #BusinessTips #OnlineCourses #InspiringJourney #EntrepreneurLifestyle #PassionPurposePosture @tarasvoiceig #heygirlyoucan #hgyc #levelup #leveluplounge #clubhouseapp","time":"2w","title":"Hey Girl You Can"},{"text":"Meet Hey Girl You Can Member @zoe_angelina Are you a parent struggling to find a babysitter? Or not just any babysitter, but the right sitter that meets your needs? A few local moms and I understand how you feel, which is why CareBird can help! CareBird is a caregiving platform that connects parents with trusting babysitters locally (pet care included). Zoe has you covered! Zoe and a few local moms noticed that many others were having difficulty finding trusting babysitters that fit their needs or if they could find any! We understand that finding a good babysitter is very hard and they typically get booked quickly. With a customized babysitting experience, CareBird can help you find your local babysitters. What CareBird has to offer: - Tailored babysitting experience helps parents find babysitters that have a list of services they can provide - Parents initiate conversation in order for babysitters to communicate with them - Babysitters must go through background checks - Book your babysitter in advance and it shows up on the CareBird calendar You can find more and connect with us here: https://www.carebird.co/ #babysitting #babysitter #nanny #mom #njmom #momboss #mompreneur #parents #parenting #parentadvice #community #support #supportlocal #womensupportingwomen #womeninbusiness #nj #summercamp #kids #children #heygirlcanyou #hgyc @tarasvoiceig #leveluplounge #WomenInNetworking #CommunityOfWomen #BabysittingAgency #SupportiveSisters #WorkingMoms #CareerWomen #Mompreneurs","time":"2w","title":"Hey Girl You Can"},{"text":"I recently saw a thread on how people dealt with competition in their businesses. I want to offer a different point of view. I don't believe I have competition. And I don't believe you do either. Here's how to competition-proof your business. #competition #entrepreneurship #buisnessdevelopment #speaker https://lnkd.in/ezjK4rmN","time":"3w","title":"Hey Girl You Can"},{"text":"The biggest mistake we see people make with networking is they show up once and gauge their success on that one event. People need to see you over and over and over again to build trust and a relationship. Would you refer someone to your inner circle you only met once? Networking like a pro is a simple learned skill. When you start incorporating these simple tips into your in person and virtual networking you will see results! name: Song Saa Private Island
location: Song Saa, Koh Rong Archipelago, Near Sihanoukville, KH
about: Welcome to a carefree paradise, an intimate escape in a far-flung archipelago. Crafted with love, inspired by our surroundings, Song Saa Private Island offers luxury, serenity and a deep connection with the environment. Created with sustainability in mind, Song Saa Private Island reflects the beauty of the Cambodian coastline. It’s a place that breathes in time with nature, built from local materials, by local hands, and infused with local art and soul. An evolved tropical getaway with a pristine private beach, spacious wooden villas, heavenly spa sanctuaries and a preserved coral reef, Song Saa Private Island lets you detach from the world and tune into simple luxuries. #TRUECAMBODIAN
specialties: hospitality , Food and Beverage, Sustainable development, Marine Conservation, and Water Sports

We are pleased to showcase our inspirations behind our sustainability practices and our commitment to improve wellbeing of the local communities and natural environment of the Koh Rong Archipelago. 🙏🏽 #HappyEarthDay2023","time":"3mo Edited 3mo","title":"Song Saa Private Island"},{"comments_count":6,"likes_count":59,"text":"What a great way to kick off 2023 ! 🎉 We are delighted to announce that Song Saa Private Island, Cambodia is a successful winner of HOTEL TRAVEL AWARDS 2022-23 prestigious awards. We have received the following awards: 𝐖𝐈𝐍𝐍𝐄𝐑: 𝐅𝐈𝐍𝐄𝐒𝐓 𝐋𝐔𝐗𝐔𝐑𝐘 𝐇𝐎𝐓𝐄𝐋 𝐂𝐀𝐌𝐁𝐎𝐃𝐈𝐀 𝐖𝐈𝐍𝐍𝐄𝐑: 𝐅𝐈𝐍𝐄𝐒𝐓 𝐋𝐔𝐗𝐔𝐑𝐘 𝐏𝐑𝐈𝐕𝐀𝐓𝐄 𝐈𝐒𝐋𝐀𝐍𝐃 𝐒𝐎𝐔𝐓𝐇-𝐄𝐀𝐒𝐓 𝐀𝐒𝐈𝐀 We'd like to extend our gratitude to everyone that has been a part of our milestone. 🙏🏽","time":"6mo","title":"Song Saa Private Island"},{"comments_count":1,"likes_count":22,"text":"At Song Saa, we give back – not just today but every day. From beach clean ups, waste management, children’s education, marine conservation, to community healthcare. We’ve been doing it all and will always continue to do so. We believe every single act of generosity will go a long way, and together we can make a huge difference. #GivingTuesday #TravelwithPurpose #SongSaaFoundation","time":"8mo","title":"Song Saa Private Island"},{"likes_count":48,"text":"Today the world comes together to celebrate #WorldTourismDay, thereby creating awareness of the impact of tourism and its importance on our societies under the theme “Rethinking Tourism” At Song Saa, we build with “sustainability” in mind and the importance of inclusive growth along side the local communities in which we work and live. Our “Pack for a Purpose” program highlights an immeasurable contribution to the learning capacity and academic well-being of the children of the Archipelago. We have also worked closely with Song Saa Foundation to provide villagers in rural areas a top class medical attention through our collaboration with International Medical Relief and a team of dedicated Cambodian medical practitioners. As the world has opened up, Song Saa also commits to preserve our unique and shared cultures and protecting the biodiversity and the ecosystems that sustain us. Happy World Tourism Day 2022 *Sustainability: defined by the UN as \"Fulfilling the needs of current generations without compromising the needs of future generations, while ensuring a balance between economic growth, environmental care and social well-being\"","time":"10mo","title":"Song Saa Private Island"},{"comments_count":1,"likes_count":24,"text":"The last few years have been extraordinarily challenging for Housekeepers to follow our hygiene protocols and ensure your island stay is safe and relaxing. To celebrate #NationalHousekeepersWeek, we would like to express our sincere gratitude to all the dedicated housekeeping team including the laundry and maintenance professionals who keep our facility running clean and efficient. You are our shining stars !!! 🌟✨💫","time":"10mo","title":"Song Saa Private Island"}]
slogan: Song Saa Private Island is a heaven of sustainable luxury nestled in the undiscovered beauty of Koh Rong Archipelago.

name: Alliance Community & Employment Services, Inc.
location: 7777 Davie Road Ext, Hollywood, Florida 33024, US
about: Alliance Community Employment Services works with individuals living with a wide range of mental, emotional and physical disabilities. Our goal is to provide individuals with disabilities the opportunity to secure and maintain employment. Through our many support systems, ACES can educate and expose individuals to lifetime success, both socially and economically. Your contribution will enable us to provide free job coaching, supported living, and in-home training to individuals with disabilities, all of which are much needed services.
specialties: technology, education, innovation, disability, employment, and services
slogan: We empower the individuals with disabilities and members of socially and economically disadvantaged communities.

name: GEREGRAS
location: Calle Juan Sebastian Elcano 4, 1ºE, Torrejón de Ardoz, Madrid 28850, ES
about: La Asociación Nacional de Gestores de Residuos de Aceites y Grasas Comestibles se constituye en el año 2007 por iniciativa de un grupo de empresarios del sector y con el objetivo fundamental de la protección, defensa y salvaguarda de los intereses profesionales, económicos y sociales de las empresas gestoras con planta de tratamiento a nivel nacional. La asociación constituida como entidad sin ánimo de lucro, tiene como principales fines: -Representar a los asociados ante cualquier organismo privado o público. -Prestar todo el apoyo necesario para el óptimo desarrollo de su actividad. -Buscar la calidad en la gestión de residuos de aceites y grasas comestibles, velando por el prestigio de la profesión, los gestores con planta de tratamiento y la trazabilidad del residuo. -Apoyar cualquier iniciativa privada o pública que tenga por objeto potenciar la gestión de residuos en el ámbito nacional y europeo. -Proteger a los asociados frente a cualquier forma de competencia ilícita o desleal. -Establecer acuerdos de colaboración con entidades asociativas del mismo ámbito sectorial y europeo en beneficio de los intereses de los asociados. -Conseguir que todos los asociados cumplan con la normativa vigente. Desde la fundación de GEREGRAS se han abierto canales de comunicación con los Ministerios implicados y administraciones locales y autonómicas, lo que permite gestionar eficientemente las demandas de sus asociados. La excelente acogida de nuestra agrupación empresarial se ha traducido en un crecimiento sostenido en el número de asociados. Convencidos de la importancia de mantener unido y organizado el sector de la recogida de los aceites y grasas comestibles, los gestores con planta de tratamiento de GEREGRAS invitamos a todos los profesionales a participar de nuestro proyecto asociativo.
specialties: Protección de intereses de asociados, Representación de asociados, Recogida y reciclado de aceites de cocina usados, and Interlocución con entidades públicas y privadas
updates: [{"likes_count":1,"text":"La mayoría de los europeos ve el cambio climático como una amenaza grave, según el último Eurobarómetro. Más de un tercio se siente personalmente expuesto a riesgos climáticos. El 84% cree que abordar el cambio climático es una prioridad para mejorar la salud pública y casi el 90% apoya reducir las emisiones y lograr la neutralidad climática para 2050. ¿Y tú? ¿Qué opinas?","time":"1w","title":"GEREGRAS"},{"likes_count":1,"text":"El aceite de cocina usado es un residuo contaminante que afecta especialmente al agua y a las canalizaciones, por lo que no se debe en ningún caso desechar por desagües o redes de alcantarillado. Además de ser perjudicial para el medio ambiente, puede acarrear graves sanciones. Si tienes un negocio y no sabes cómo deshacerte de tu aceite de cocina usado, contacta con nosotros. #aceitedecocinausado #aceiteusadodecocina #UCO #contaminacion #hosteleria","time":"2w","title":"GEREGRAS"},{"text":"Las grandes petroleras que operan en nuestro país, agrupadas en AOP - Asociación Española de Operadores de Productos Petrolíferos, vuelven a denunciar «la necesidad de poner fin a las prácticas fraudulentas que se producen en el mercado de distribución de combustibles líquidos», sobre todo «el fraude que lleva produciéndose, especialmente desde 2015, en materia de IVA, ocasionando no solo un problema de competencia desleal en el sector, sino también, un perjuicio a las arcas públicas y al consumidor final». #fraudecombustibles #combustibles","time":"3w","title":"GEREGRAS"},{"likes_count":1,"text":"Manifiesto ante las elecciones generales del 23-J por parte de la Plataforma para la Promoción de los Ecocombustibles: ● La Plataforma reclama a los partidos políticos que concurren a las elecciones generales una apuesta decidida por los ecocombustibles para descarbonizar la economía. ● La Plataforma recuerda la importancia de los ecocombustibles para mantener el empleo y la actividad económica de sus sectores. ● Se recuerda a los partidos políticos el papel de los ecocombustibles en la seguridad de suministro y en el avance hacia la independencia energética de España. #ecocombustibles #Elecciones2023 #23Julio #plataformaecocombustibles #Biocombustibles #AceitedeCocinaUsado #aceiteusadodecocina","time":"3w Edited","title":"GEREGRAS"},{"likes_count":1,"text":"¡¡¡Sólo un 4,2% del aceite consumido en los hogares españoles es depositado en los contenedores naranja!!! Eso significa que más del 90% del aceite usado de cocina que generamos en nuestras casas no se gestiona adecuadamente e incluso se sigue tirando por el desagüe, lo que es una autentica barbaridad para el medio ambiente, las infraestructuras urbanas... ¡¡El aceite usado de cocina al contenedor naranja, GRACIAS!! #aceiteusadodecocina #AceitedeCocinaUsado #reciclaraceite #MedioAmbiente #biodiésele #Biocombustibles #ecocombustibles","time":"1mo","title":"GEREGRAS"},{"likes_count":2,"text":"Las grandes petroleras firman una ola de acuerdos comerciales para blindar sus alternativas renovables al diésel. Repsol se ha asociado con compañías como XPO, Grupo Sesé o Grupo Serveto (camiones), Tragsa (maquinaria), Navantia (barcos) o Avanza y Alsa (autobuses). En el caso de Cepsa, el grueso de los acuerdos los ha sellado en el sector de tráfico aéreo, con aerolíneas como Iberia, Vueling, Air Nostrum, TUI o Wizz Air. El objetivo es lograr que los combustibles renovables, en permanente desarrollo, arraiguen en el día a día de las empresas de transporte. #combustiblesrenovables #diesel #biocombustibles #descarbonización","time":"1mo","title":"GEREGRAS"},{"likes_count":1,"text":"Los ecocombustibles son una oportunidad para potenciar la industria en nuestro país, especialmente en las zonas más afectadas por la despoblación, como es la España rural, así como disminuir significativamente la dependencia energética de España respecto a suministros exteriores. Su compatibilidad con las infraestructuras y los vehículos de combustión actuales (turismos, camiones y autobuses), aviones y buques, facilita una implantación rápida y eficaz para reducir las emisiones de forma inmediata. #descarbonizar #transporte #emisionesCO2 #combustible #ecocombustibles #Biocombustibles #biodiésel","time":"1mo","title":"GEREGRAS"},{"likes_count":7,"text":"El SAF (Sustainable Aviation Fuel o combustible de aviación sostenible) ✈️ producido a partir de materias primas renovables, como aceite de cocina usado entre otras, puede utilizarse como sustituto directo sin necesidad de modificar el motor y, en la actualidad, puede utilizarse en mezclas de hasta el 50%. #SAF #aviationsaf #UCO #AceitedeCocinaUsado #aceiteusadodecocina","time":"1mo","title":"GEREGRAS"},{"text":"La tan temida norma #euro7 podría finalmente no ver la luz, al menos en su versión actual. Ocho Estados miembros de la Unión Europea, entre ellos Francia e Italia, se han declarado contrarios a la introducción de la norma medioambiental Euro 7. Se unen así a los fabricantes europeos, con Volkswagen, Renault y Stellantis al frente, que la consideran poco realista, costosa, ineficaz y perjudicial para la industria. #MedioAmbiente #transporte #contaminacion #ecocombustibles #biodiésel #aceiteusadodecocina #AceitedeCocinaUsado","time":"2mo","title":"GEREGRAS"},{"likes_count":1,"text":"En los hogares de España se consumen casi 12 litros de aceite por persona al año, según datos del Ministerio de Agricultura, Pesca y Alimentación, pero a día de hoy es uno de los residuos con menor tasa de recuperación para su reciclaje. Parece ser que todavía nos cuesta mucho reciclar aceite de cocina usado en casa, cuando es uno de los residuos que más fácilmente se puede recoger para reciclar tras su uso. #AceitedeCocinaUsado #aceiteusadodecocina #reciclaraceite #reciclaje #uco #biodiésel #ecocombustibles #MedioAmbiente","time":"2mo","title":"GEREGRAS"}]

name: Croix-Rouge Compétence Normandie
location: Normandie, Normandie, FR,5, Rue du Gué de Gesnes, Alençon, Normandie 61000, FR,Chemin de la Bretèque, Bois-Guillaume, Normandie 76230, FR,15 rue Ampère, Mondeville, FR,178, Allée du Québec, Bois-Guillaume, Normandie 76230, FR
about: L’Institut Régional de Formation Sanitaire et Sociale - IRFSS Normandie Croix-Rouge est composé de 4 établissements sur les sites d’Alençon (61), Bois-Guillaume (76) et Mondeville (14). De la préparation concours à la formation professionnelle continue, la Croix-Rouge vous propose de vous former tout au long de la vie. Formations dans le secteur Sanitaire et Social : Infirmier (IDE), Aide-Soignant (AS), Auxiliaire de Puériculture (AP), Accompagnant Educatif et Social (AES), Assistant de Service Social (ASS), Technicien de l’Intervention Sociale et Familiale (TISF), Éducateur Spécialisé (ES), Moniteur Éducateur (ME), Brancardier mais aussi dans le secteur Santé et Sécurité au Travail : SST, PSC1, Gestes et Postures, Incendie.. Nous contacter : - Email irfss.normandie@croix-rouge.fr - Téléphone 02 33 31 67 00

updates: [{"likes_count":9,"text":"Over the past ten years, your support of our giving initiatives at Grant Victor Cares has made incredible things possible in Kenya, Africa. Each of the chosen villages started with so little. However, with your help, they have created respectable schools with sustainable support from the local government. Collectively, we've helped create better water storage, quicker access to medical supplies, and even improved sanitary conditions (toilet blocks). We're seeing many students advance from Primary to Secondary school, and your support has even helped provide scholarships for students to move on to higher education. The ATM industry has created friends in far-reaching parts of the world. Their lives, and ours, have been changed for the better. We are just a few months away from our annual Kenya trip and project. This year's efforts will focus on two new small villages. Our goal is to provide classrooms, water storage, desks, school supplies, solar lighting, and hope to the members of these villages. We will also support medical clinics in those areas by providing much-needed medical supplies. In addition to our contributions as a company, we greatly appreciate any financial support you can provide. Donations can be made on our website: https://lnkd.in/g2zPbnMg Or by contacting us directly at: info@grantvictorcares.org Additionally, an Amazon registry is available to purchase essentials that our team will deliver to children and families in Kenya during our service trip in September, 2023. https://lnkd.in/gt-3NJme Every penny collected will go straight to the villages. As a 501c3 organization, your donation will be tax deductible as well. Asante sana (thank you in Swahili) for your ongoing support!","time":"1d Edited","title":"Grant Victor"}]

name: Bell Outdoor, LLC

about:
Bell Outdoor, LLC is a privately-owned firm located on St. Simons Island, Georgia, specializing in Landscape Design/Build and Enhancement services along with a highly selective portfolio of Full-service Landscape Maintenance. We are passionate about creating and enhancing outdoor spaces that are comfortable, functional, and of the highest quality. Our team is dedicated to providing a seamless experience from beginning to end.

Our mission is to make every client’s dreams become a reality. By providing unrivaled quality and customer service, our team of highly skilled horticultural professionals will provide superior value to your home. Long term relationships are established and maintained through our attention to detail, direct communication, and our desire to exceed expectations.

“Quality work at the highest level does not come from one individual, but from the commitment of the entire team. Each must have a passion for what we do. I am fortunate to say our entire team has the inspiration and desire to produce the highest quality work. We strive to establish strong relationships with our customers each and every day. It is not luck that brought our members to join our team, rather, it is a mutual desire to be better than the best. Our focus on quality over quantity is one aspect that will never change. We love what we do and we value who we do it for. It is an honor to work with our team and motivate each other’s improvement in all that we do.”
- Faulkner Bell, President & Founder
specialties: Landscape Design, Horticultural Consultation, Landscape Design/Build/Install, Hardscapes, Water Features, Pool Design & Installation, Outdoor Kitchens & Living Spaces, Outdoor Furniture, Outdoor Firepits & Fireplaces, Residential Landscape Management, Carpentry, Fence Installation, Synthetic Turf Installation, Landscape Lighting, Pottery, Retaining Walls, Aggregate Surfaces, General Landscape Cleanup, Masonry, Arborist, Horticulturist, and ICPI Certified Installer

name: Malumax Photography
location: Gaverlandstraat, Beveren, Vlaanderen 9120, BE
about: Wij zijn Luc en Marleen, 2 mensen met een passie voor fotografie. Naast de klassieke foto's houden we ervan om eigenwijze foto's te maken en ondertussen veel plezier te hebben in hetgeen we doen. Zo hebben we alle ingrediënten om van onze zaak een succes te maken. Neem ook een kijkje op onze site : www.Malumax.be of spring even binnen in onze winkel waar we je met leuke foto-dingen kunnen helpen.
specialties: Bedrijfsfotografie, Bedrijfsevenementen, Huwelijksfotografie, Sportfotografie, Communiefotografie, and Luchtfotografie
updates: [{"likes_count":5,"text":"He Marleen, doen jullie enkel shoots 📸 in opdracht van iemand ? Nee hoor... af en toe hebben we een idee, soms zelfs een heel gek 🙃 idee, en dat maken we dan als vrij werk. Hiermee kunnen we wedstrijden meedoen, of tentoonstellingen doen, of zelfs een internationaal fotofestival zoals Lens op de mens in Pelt. Daarbij proberen we steeds met professionals te werken, maar geven we ook regelmatig starters een kans om hun beste beentje voor te zetten. Hier aan het werk, onze vaste make-up 💄 artiste die bij Eline (model van die dag) de make-up nog wat bijwerkte tijdens de shoot. Zalig om met hen te werken... we hebben dan ook heel veel plezier gehad in de studio, en er zijn mooie foto's uit gekomen. Trouwens voor wie het zich afvraagt... Eline haar ogen zijn effectief zo fel blauw... Er is niets aan geprutst, geen lenzen, geen photoshop, niets... puur natuur.... Heb je ook een gek idee waarvan je foto's wil ? Geef een gil, we werken het graag samen met jou uit. Luc De Cock, Marleen Verbruggen #studiofotografie #studio #StudioMalumax #fun #fotografie #Photography #vrijwerk","time":"1w","title":"Malumax Photography"},{"likes_count":1,"text":"Ruim 5 jaar ben ik lid van het businessnetwerk BNI. Veel tijd om te oefenen op de wekelijkse pitch dus. Gelukkig was hij herstelbaar, dus maar het aangename aan het nuttige koppelen en er een fotoshoot 📸 Malumax Photography-style van maken... Hieronder kan je het verslag vinden van \"Operatie 😷 beker\". Wij gek 😝 ? Nee helemaal niet ! name: Veggie Garden Franchise Co.
location: Gran Via de Les Corts Catalanes 602, Barcelona, Spain 08007, ES
about: ES: Veggie Garden Franchise Company invita a los inversores interesados a unirse con nosotros en este exitoso negocio. Eficiencia de costos, libre de carne. Un delicioso menú a base de vegetales, sin gastos en carne, con costos eficientes específicamente diseñados para la cocina vegana, dejando un mínimo desperdicio. Es una fórmula que pone a Veggie Garden en un nicho de mercado único, haciéndolo una gran oportunidad de negocio. Irresistiblemente saludable. ¡Veggie Garden es un éxito para una cena natural! Todos los días en nuestros restaurantes vemos como los propios sabores de la naturaleza toman el protagonismo y atraen a la clientela más amplia de veganos, vegetarianos y cualquier persona que busca innovar en sabor. Visibilidad y promoción. Estamos ubicados en áreas con muchos peatones, además nos beneficiamos de contar con una clientela muy conectada en nuestros canales digitales. Estamos activos en línea en Facebook, Instagram y blogs. Nuestros variados ingredientes, bebidas nutritivas, consejos de comida y las noticias del mundo de la comida saludable, son una fuente rica para el contenido online. ENG: The Veggie Garden Franchise Company invites interested investors to join us in our successful business venture. Meat-free cost-efficiency. A tasty and popular vegetable-based menu, no expenses wasted on meat, and cost-efficiency especially designed for the vegan kitchen, with minimum waste. It is a formula that puts our restaurants in a league of their own, making them great businesses. Irresistibly healthy. The Veggie Garden concept is a victory for natural dining! Every day in our restaurants we see how nature’s own rich flavours attract a broad clientele of both vegans, vegetarians, and anyone on a meat-free break. Visibility & promotion. We’re placed in dynamic urban centres. We’re active on social media. Our varied ingredients, our nutritious drink and food tips, and healthy dining news, are a rich source of content we provide audiences online.

name: RAK Communicatie BV

about: Een (zorg)-proces of workflow optimaliseren, een creatief development team leiden of bedrijf bouwen, zijn hoofdthema’s die als rode draad door mijn werkzame leven lopen. Afgelopen halfjaar heb ik (samen met mijn man) een pauze ingelast. We hebben ons losgeweekt van alle lopende afspraken en processen en bestuurlijk heb ik afstand gedaan van mijn taken als managing director bij Informed, plus mijn andere neven-activiteiten. Door te werken met creatief jong talent, development teams, medisch professionals en bestuurders binnen ziekenhuizen is mijn besluitvaardigheid sterk gegroeid. Maar ook na onze avontuurlijke zeilreis via Schotland en het Noorden is mijn behoefte aan een nieuw perspectief op mijn professionele toekomst is gebleven. Naast de actuele media en berichtgeving afgelopen jaren werd ook onderweg pijnlijk zichtbaar hoe heftig zowel het klimaat als de economische veranderingen impact hebben op een ieders leefomgeving en gezondheid.

name: DSC Unternehmensberatung und Software GmbH
location: Carl-Benz-Straße 16 a, Schriesheim , Baden-Württemberg 69198, DE,Schottenring 16, Börse, Wien, Wien 1010, AT,Schulstrasse 1, Landquart, Graubünden 7302, CH
about: DSC ist eine branchenspezifische Unternehmensberatung und gehört seit 30 Jahren zu den marktführenden SAP-IT-Dienstleistern im Bereich SAP for Utilities. Wir bieten Versorgungsunternehmen in der D-A-CH-Region technologische sowie organisatorische Beratungsleistungen, die Umsetzung gesetzlicher Vorgaben, vollumfängliches Projektmanagement und innovative Softwarelösungen zur Erweiterung des SAP-Standards. Mit unseren Softwarelösungen und Produktinnovationen forcieren wir den fortschreitenden Wandel in Richtung Digitalisierung. Unsere Schwerpunkte liegen dabei auf SAP S/4HANA, den SAP for Utilities-Komponenten, dem SAP Cloud-Portfolio und weiteren innovativen Themenbereichen. Zu unseren Kunden zählen sowohl kleine und mittelständische Stadtwerke als auch Konzerne. Über 2.000 Projekte haben wir bereits erfolgreich umgesetzt, und mehr als 800 Kundeninstallationen zeugen von der Qualität unserer Softwarelösungen und bestätigen uns darin, essenzieller Wertschöpfer für unsere Kunden zu sein. Wir verstehen unsere Leistung als eine Kombination aus Kundenorientierung, Kompetenz, Expertise, Agilität, Professionalität und der Fähigkeit, immer einen Schritt vorauszudenken. Unser Erfolg definiert sich über den Mehrwert, den wir für unsere Kunden schaffen und der zu deren Wertschöpfung beiträgt. Unser Ziel ist es, die SAP-IT-Umgebung für unsere Kunden im Bereich Utilities so effizient wie möglich zu gestalten. Uns verbindet eine enge Partnerschaft mit SAP SE. DSC ist langjähriger SAP Gold Partner im Utilities-Umfeld und ausgewählter Fokuspartner für den Bereich Energy der SAP Diamant-Initiative. Durch die Zusammenarbeit mit zahlreichen Partnern in einem etablierten Netzwerk können wir vielseitige, auch branchenübergreifende Projekte erfolgreich umsetzen. Die Herausforderungen unserer Kunden sowie die Qualität unserer Leistungen haben dabei für uns oberste Priorität – heute und in Zukunft. #DSCGmbh Imagetrailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lmX1sJtvLyM
specialties: SAP for Utilities, Digitalisierung, Unternehmensberatung, Versorgungswirtschaft, Softwarelösungen, SAP S/4HANA, SAP S/4HANA Utilities, SAP Sales Cloud, SAP Emarsys, SAP Service CLoud, SAP Multichannel Foundation for Utilities, SAP Implementation, S/4Migration, SAP Information Life Cycle Management, Add-On-Lösungen für den SAP Standard, Machine Learning, Robotic Process Automation, Smart Metering, Customer Experience, SAP Transformation, and Data Migration
updates: [{"likes_count":14,"text":"📢🎉 Es ist wieder soweit! #Savethedate 19. Oktober❗ 🚩Markiere dir den Termin in deinem Kalender: Das 11. DSC - Versorgerforum in Österreich ist bald da, und unsere Kollegen Martin Wagesreither und Marcus Christmann möchten euch persönlich einladen, dabei zu sein. 🗓️ 📖 Ein reichhaltiges Programm erwartet dich: fortschrittliche Technologien und zukunftsweisende Strategien innerhalb der Energiebranche. Doch was dieses Forum wirklich auszeichnet, ist die Gelegenheit, sich mit Gleichgesinnten, Fachexperten und Fachexpertinnen auszutauschen. Neue Kontakte zu knüpfen und bestehende Beziehungen zu vertiefen, ist seit Jahren eines unserer Highlights bei dieser Veranstaltung. 🎥 Siehe selbst, was dich erwartet, im Video! 🔗 Weitere Infos und Anmeldung: https://lnkd.in/ekXn7GUj #Energiewende #Innovation #transformation #S4hana #CX #Energiewirtschaft #Utilities #SAP","time":"4h Edited","title":"DSC Unternehmensberatung und Software GmbH"},{"comments_count":3,"likes_count":36,"text":"🤗 💥 Was war das für ein schönes Familienfest zu unserm 30-jährigen Jubiläum letzte Woche. Solche Ereignisse lassen sich nur sehr schwer beschreiben. Daher verzichten wir auf viele Worte und möchten versuchen, euch durch ein paar ausgewählte Fotos und persönliche Beiträge von Kolleginnen und Kollegen einen ganz kleinen Eindruck von unserem Event und von dem, was DSC als Unternehmen ausmacht, zu vermitteln. Wie man so schön sagt, machen die Gäste die Party. Danke an #BestPeopleForUtilities, ihr seid 💪🏻 großartig und unheimlich ⚡energiegeladen. 💥 🚀 Wir freuen uns gemeinsam mit euch auf eine weiterhin erfolgreiche Zukunft. 💚🌱 #DSCGmbH #SAP #Utilities","time":"1w","title":"DSC Unternehmensberatung und Software GmbH"},{"comments_count":21,"likes_count":55,"text":"🚀Der Countdown läuft💥⏱ #DSCGmbH – 30 Jahre Heute Nachmittag feiern wir mit der gesamten DSC-Familie unser 30-jähriges Jubiläum. Wir sagen DANKE zu all denen, die maßgeblich zu unserem Erfolg beigetragen haben: Unseren Kunden – ohne deren Wertschätzung und vertrauensvolle Zusammenarbeit wären wir heute nicht einer der führenden #SAP IT-Dienstleister für die Energiewirtschaft. Das Eventprogramm kann sich sehen lassen. 👍🏻 🤿 Morgen wird es mit den Deep-Dive-Workshops sicherlich auch noch mal sehr interessant. 💚💡 Wir sind gespannt, welche neuen Impulse ihr für unser DSC CX-Team insbesondere mit Blick auf die #SAP Sales- und Service Cloud V2 und SAP #Emarsys mitbringt. #CustomerExperience #DSCGmbH #Cloud","time":"1mo 1mo","title":"DSC Unternehmensberatung und Software GmbH"},{"likes_count":23,"text":"🔒🗂✔ Hohe Datenqualität – Erfolgsfaktor für die Zukunft Datenqualität als Erfolgsgrundlage für eine gelungene Transformation nach SAP S/4HANA. Datenqualität ist ein Faktor, der die gesamte Wertschöpfungskette eines Unternehmens beeinflusst. 👉🏻 Daher ist es wichtig, bestehende Prozesse zu prüfen und ggf. die Prozesseffizienz zu optimieren. Wertvolle Unterstützung können dabei innovative, automatisierte IT-Lösungen leisten. 🚩 Drei Themenfelder, die in Summe betrachtet, die Datenqualität in den Fokus rücken sollten: 🌍 Digitalisierung Die Digitalisierung schreitet unaufhaltsam voran. Überall werden (personenbezogene) Daten gesammelt und mit dem Ziel verarbeitet, den Bereichen Vertrieb, Marketing und Kundenservice eine möglichst umfassende Sicht auf den Kunden zu ermöglichen. Einen Mehrwert erhalten diese Bereiche hierbei nur, wenn sie sich auf die Korrektheit der Daten verlassen können. 🦋 SAP S/4HANA Transformation Gleichzeitig steht der Umstieg auf das neue SAP-System S/4HANA bevor. Auch hierbei ist eine hohe Datenqualität im Vorfeld der Datenmigration von elementarer Bedeutung für einen gelungenen Umstieg. Andernfalls ist die Gefahr groß, eine bestehende schlechte Datenqualität in das neue System zu überführen und die damit einhergehenden Probleme lediglich zu verlagern. 🔒 EU-DSGVO-Konformität Auch in Hinblick auf die Einhaltung der EU-DSGVO ist eine hohe Stammdatenqualität von elementarer Bedeutung. Beantragt z. B. ein Geschäftspartner die Löschung seiner persönlichen Daten, werden redundante Geschäftspartnerdaten bzw. Dubletten zu einem ernsten Problem. Der Stammdatensatz wird zwar gesperrt/gelöscht, die Dublette bleibt aber bestehen, sodass die Geschäftspartnerdaten weiterhin im System geführt werden. 💪🏻✔🔎👁🗨 Für jedes der beschriebenen Themenfelder bieten wir Ihnen bewährte Lösungen, die Ihre Datenqualität dauerhaft sicherstellen. 🤝🏻🙋🏻♂️🏆 Bereits mehr als 80 Kunden vertrauen auf unsere Lösungen und umfangreiche Expertise – seit 30 Jahren gehört die Gewährleistung von Datenqualität zu unseren Kernkompetenzen. Erfahren Sie mehr dazu unter: https://lnkd.in/dEtD8sdQ #DSCGmbH #Governance #Datenschutz #DSGVO #Digitalisierung #s4hana #SAP #transformation","time":"1mo","title":"DSC Unternehmensberatung und Software GmbH"},{"likes_count":22,"text":"Lets Go 💪🏻🌞🚀 der zweite Tag des SAP Value Proposition for Utilities sector beginnt. 🌱💚☁ Auch heute stehen wieder SAP-Lösungen wie z.B. die Industry Cloud als integraler Bestandteil der SAP-Strategie und des Produktportfolios für den Versorgungssektor im Fokus. Mexedia ON, the CXPaaS (Customer eXperience Platform as a Service) platform, offers companies a set of services, delivered in the cloud and through APIs. In September 2022, Mexedia Inc., the American subsidiary of the Group, closed the agreements to acquire U.S.-based companies Phonetime Inc. and Matchcom Telecommunications Inc.

about: Synergy is a visionary research company that provides evidence-based strategic inputs for better decision-making for business growth and digital transformation needs. - Synergy is in the unique space at the intersection of management consulting, tradigital market research and data analytics. - Our client-side, business experience and immersion processes coupled with our technical expertise allow us to emerge deeper insights from research - we have over 20 years of experience, working with the Philippines' Top 1,000 Corporations and some global Fortune 500 companies. - Aside from tradigital market research, we provide services to help companies navigate their digital transformation needs from data-fication, to digitation, digitalization and digital transformation services through persona analysis, customer journey mapping and emerging expectations, etc. - Synergy pioneers in thought-leadership conferences and seminars specifically touching on consumer insighting and storytelling to help brands/marketing professionals and decision-makers anticipate, create competitive edge and strive for excellence in the marketplace. - We specialize in brand equity-building and understanding; strategic management consulting and positioning; gap and opportunity-seeking; segmentation; building insights, spotting trends; emerging innovative ideas/concepts, and data analytics; to name a few.

about: Il Gruppo Avacos lavora nel settore delle aste e dei servizi e racchiude al suo interno tre società: Avacos, Parva Domus e Pado. Il Codice della Crisi e dell’Insolvenza impone una gestione tempestiva delle procedure concorsuali: inventario, perizia, liquidazione e vendita dei beni devono avvenire in un lasso temporale molto ridotto. Il Gruppo Avacos, da 15 anni, supporta i professionisti per rendere più efficace ed efficiente la liquidazione dell’attivo: dalla redazione dell’inventario, alla perizia dei beni, sino alla vendita mediante aste telematiche.

name: CSCEC Middle East
location: Al Sarayat Street, Al Thanyah Fifth, Dubai P.O. Box 63932, AE
about: CSCEC Middle East L.L.C. (hereinafter referred to as CSCME) is instituted as a major overseas operational enterprise of China State Construction Engineering Corporation Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as CSCHQ). CSCME is an established contractor that provides multi-disciplinary (i.e. Building, Infrastructure and MEP work) Engineering and Construction services in the UAE with headquarters in Dubai. CSCHQ was founded in 1957 and established in Beijing, China. In the year 2009, CSCHQ was officially listed in Shanghai Stock Exchange as having the largest IPO in the world. It was recognized as the No. 18 of the top 500 Global Enterprise by “Fortune” magazine in the year 2020. In July 2003, CSCME was awarded the Palm Jumeirah Garden Home Villas Project, an iconic housing project on the world famous Palm Jumeirah. In March, 2005, CSCME was formally established in Dubai, UAE. By the year 2008, CSCME ventured into other Emirates and established branches in Abu Dhabi, Sharjah, and Ras Al Khaimah. During this time, the company expanded and became a diversified contractor with its own Infrastructure and MEP divisions.
specialties: Engineering, Procurement, Construction, Building Projects, Infrastructure Projects, Steel Structure Projects, and MEP Projects

name: BeConstance
location: Marina, 19, Barcelona, Barcelona 08005, ES
about: Tienda de moda en Barcelona. Nuestra esencia reside en la constancia del individuo, en el esfuerzo y la realización personal que conlleva la consecucción de unos objetivos determinados en la vida. El éxito es nuestra visión. Partiendo de la base de que una de las cosas más constantes de este planeta es el corazón de una persona, tiramos de nuestro propio órgano para crear la marca y compartirla con el mundo. Constance Barcelona nace para gente ganadora que entiende el valor de lo exclusivo, sencillo y puro, y a la que le gusta sentirse diferente ante un mundo lleno de semejanzas.

name: Southwood Psychiatric Hospital
location: 2575 Boyce Plaza Rd, Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania 15241, US
about: Comprehensive Care for Children and Adolescents at Southwood Southwood Psychiatric hospital, located in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, is the area’s premiere provider of residential treatment services for children and adolescents who are struggling with psychiatric illnesses. At Southwood, we welcome young patients between the ages of 4 and 18 who require acute inpatient care, long-term residential treatment, community-based support, and educational services. Our compassionate, experienced mental health professionals are skilled at providing developmentally appropriate interventions for children and teens who have been diagnosed with a wide variety of conditions, including but not limited to the following: • Intellectual disabilities • Depression • Bipolar • Anxiety • Behavioral disorders • Aggression • Conduct disorder • Impulse control disorder • Oppositional Defiance • Self-harm • Sexually maladaptive behaviors • Developmental disabilities • Attention-deficit/hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) • Asperger’s syndrome • Autism Whatever a child’s mental, emotional, or behavioral needs may be, the vision at Southwood Psychiatric Hospital is to provide comprehensive, whole-child treatment based on the patient’s individual goals. We value close partnerships with families and loved ones, and seek to involve our patients’ support network in each step of the healing process. If you are interested in learning more about how Southwood Psychiatric Hospital can help an important child in your life, we hope that you will contact us at your earliest convenience. To learn more about the many options for treatment at Southwood, contact us at 866-245-7473.

name: Torf Corporation Sp. z o.o.
location: Fabryczna 11, Katy Wroclawskie, dolnoslaskie 55-080, PL
about: w czasach kiedy wszystko jest pozornie przydatne, najważniejsza umiejętnością okazuje się zdolność mądrego wybierania. to nie tylko kwestia decyzji podejmowanych w sklepie, ale całego stylu życia. My w to wierzymy. chcemy odczarować i przybliżyć świat kosmetyków. Chcemy rozmawiać o skórze, włosach i zębach - przy wsparciu specjalistów codziennie dowiadywać się czego potrzebują aby być zdrowe. chcemy aby to jak je traktujemy na co dzień było bezpieczne. kiedy szukamy skutecznych rozwiązań zawsze najpierw testujemy kilka możliwości, aby wybrać tę najlepszą. obiecujemy, że dzięki nam kosmetyki przestaną się marnować przyszłość to ograniczone zasoby, musimy być pewni, że korzystamy z aktualnych w przemyślany sposób. ktoś mógłby powiedzieć, że wygląd zewnętrzny nie jest najważniejszą rzeczą na świecie. Ale my uważamy, że to jak czujemy się każdego dnia, wpływa na całe nasze życie. satysfakcja to suma drobnych, ale przemyślanych decyzji. jesteśmy dumni kiedy decydujesz się zaufać nam w procesie troski o swoją skórę, włosy czy uzębienie. Jesteśmy Torf Corporation. Reprezentuje nas #tołpa, #ON i każda utalentowana osoba współtworząca nasz ekosystem.
specialties: manufacturing, cosmetics, face care, oral care, body care, hair care, personal care, and dermocosmetics

about: Varlık Yönetim sektöründe 2011 yılından bu yana BDDK kararı ile faaliyet izni alarak çalışmalarını sürdüren FİNAL VARLIK YÖNETİM, 01.08.2018 tarihi itibariyle yoluna BİRİKİM VARLIK YÖNETİM olarak devam etmektedir. BİRİKİM VARLIK YÖNETİM, uluslararası standartlarda kurumsal yönetim tecrübesi ile pazar lideri markalar yaratmak hedefiyle kurulan; bugün finans, eğitim, perakende ve gayrimenkul alanlarında önemli yatırımları bulunan Türkiye’nin en güçlü ve güvenilir kurumlarından biri olan Altınhas Holding grup şirketlerindendir. 2011 yılından bu yana sektörde olan BİRİKİM VARLIK YÖNETİM, bankalardan ya da finansal kuruluşlardan devraldığı ve yasal sahibi olduğu tahsili gecikmiş alacakları, karşılıklı güven ve işbirliği esasına dayalı çözüm odaklı bir zeminde ve uygun ödeme planıyla yeniden yapılandırarak tahsil eden bir finans kuruluşudur. Sektörde genç bir firma olmasına rağmen, kısa süre içerisinde pazar payında yükselen bir ivme kazanarak, sektörün öncü firmaları arasında yerini alan BİRİKİM VARLIK YÖNETİM; finans sektörünün verimli bir iş ortağı ve değer yaratan seçkin bir üyesi olarak çalışmalarına tüm hızıyla büyüyerek ve gelişerek devam etmektedir.
