name: Law Reform Commission of Ireland
location: Dublin, IE
about: Our mission is to keep the law under independent, objective and expert review, to make recommendations for law reform and to make current law accessible for all. We work to improve and simplify the law through both our law reform and access to legislation activities. Our law reform proposals are first developed in Consultation Papers. These examine the law and set out questions on possible changes to the law. We then invite submissions on possible changes to the law, consulting widely. Submissions received help to inform our final analysis and recommendations that are published in our Reports. Many of our proposals have led to changes in Irish law. We also make existing legislation more accessible through three resources: 1. The Legislation Directory, which tracks all amendments made to legislation. 2. Revised Acts, which are administrative consolidations of all post-2004 Acts (excluding the Finance Acts and the Social Welfare Consolidation Act 2005) and approximately 170 pre-2005 Acts. 3. The Classified List, which categorises and presents legislation by subject matter, to make it easier for users to find the law in a particular area.
specialties: Not available
updates: [{"comments_count":8,"likes_count":141,"text":"We have published a Consultation Paper on Third-Party Litigation Funding. Third-party litigation funding occurs when a third party, who is otherwise unconnected to a party to a legal dispute, funds the resolution of that dispute in return for a share of any monetary remedy obtained. Assigning a cause of action means selling the right to sue to another person or entity. The law in Ireland currently prohibits both the funding of legal cases by outside parties who do not have a legitimate and independent interest in the dispute, subject to certain exceptions, and the assignment of a “bare” cause of action. In light of the evolving legal and policy context for third-party funding, the Commission concluded that it was appropriate to publish a Consultation Paper setting out the current position in respect of the regulation of third-party funding and on the assignment of causes of action and to seek views on the matter. A core tension with third-party funding is the commodification of justice. Would legalising such funding promote this, or would it improve access to justice and improve equality of arms between parties to a dispute? Other questions considered in the Consultation Paper include: ⚖ Whether third-party funding could address an inconsistency in the law, whereby corporate entities can effectively engage in third-party funding under another name by issuing shares or transferring ownership of the company to fund its participation in dispute resolution; ⚖ Whether third-party funding might encourage the bringing of vexatious disputes; and ⚖ Whether third-party funding could increase legal costs and the price of insurance premiums. We welcome your views and comments on the Consultation Paper, by 3 November 2023. More details are available on the Law Reform Commission’s website, www.lawreform.ie .","time":"3w","title":"Law Reform Commission of Ireland"},{"likes_count":7,"text":"Tá ár nIntéirneacht Taighde Dlí Chothromais 2023 ag druidim chun deiridh. Tá sé mar aidhm againn éagsúlacht sa dlí a mhéadú trí dheiseanna a sholáthar do mhic léinn dlí a thagann ó chúlraí atá faoi mhíbhuntáiste socheacnamaíoch nó atá faoi mhíchumas. I gcomhpháirtíocht le hOifig an Ard-Aighne, Oifig an Stiúrthóra Ionchúiseamh Poiblí agus Oifig Phríomh-Aturnae an Stáit, leathnaíodh an intéirneacht i mbliana chun deiseanna foghlama agus líonraithe den scoth a chruthú. Fuaireamar tacaíocht ó Bharra na hÉireann, ó Dhlí-Chumann na hÉireann, ón tSeirbhís Chúirteanna, ó Thithe an Oireachtais agus ó Thacaíocht Íospartach sa Chúirt. Táimid tar éis súile na n-intéirneach a oscailt don raon leathan deiseanna atá ar fáil sa dlí, sa taighde agus sa tseirbhís phoiblí. Táimid tar éis cóitseáil agus meantóireacht a dhéanamh orthu maidir le conas teacht ar na deiseanna sin, rud a chríochnaigh ag imeacht gairmeacha. Áiríodh leis cur i láthair ó fhoireann Oifig an Stiúrthóra Ionchúiseamh Poiblí ar iarratais ar phoist agus ar agallaimh, agus ina dhiaidh sin bhí raon leathan cainteoirí a leag béim ar roghanna gairme éagsúla, go háirithe san earnáil phoiblí, chun inspioráid agus treoir a sholáthar do na hintéirnigh agus iad ag tosú ar a gcuid. gairmeacha. Táimid thar a bheith buíoch de Eleanor Leane, An Bord um Chúnamh Dlíthiúil; Gareth Noble, KOD Lyons; Katie Mannion, Comhairle Teifeach na hÉireann; Christopher Campbell, An Roinn Gnóthaí Eachtracha, agus Elaine Cahill, An Coimisiún um Iomaíocht agus Cosaint Tomhaltóirí (CCPC) as a gcuid ama agus a n-eagna a roinnt go fial. Chun deireadh chlár na bliana seo a chomóradh, labhair Maureen Noonan, intéirneach dlí ag an gCoimisiún um Athchóiriú an Dlí; an mBreitheamh Frank Clarke, Uachtarán an Choimisiúin um Athchóiriú an Dlí; Rossa Fanning SC, an tArd-Aighne; Catherine Pierse, Stiúrthóir Ionchúiseamh Poiblí; agus Maria Browne, Príomh-Aturnae an Stáit, a luaigh go léir luach an tionscnaimh do na hintéirnigh agus do na comhlachtaí a dhéanann óstáil orthu, agus ar an tábhacht a bhaineann le feabhas a chur ar rochtain ar dheiseanna do mhic léinn ó chúlraí tearcionadaithe. Dúirt Maureen Noonan: “Buaicphointe na hintéirneachta domsa ba ea léargas a fháil ar an earnáil phoiblí dhlíthiúil. Sílim gur deis annamh é seo do chéimí le déanaí agus is rud an-speisialta é intéirneacht den sórt sin a dhéanamh go sonrach do dhaoine ó chúlra chothromais. Tá naisc déanta agam a mbeidh thar a bheith luachmhar.” Labhair an tUachtarán Clarke ar thábhachtach breithiúnas a bheith againn atá ionadaíoch ar an tsochaí, agus ar an ngá atá le scéimeanna mar seo, mar gan éagsúlacht i ngairm an dlí ní féidir linn breithiúnas éagsúil a bheith againn. D’éirigh thar barr leis an gclár intéirneachta. Bhí dea-thoil agus dearfacht ag baint leis, agus tá súil againn go spreagfaidh sé na hintéirnigh chun an misean chothromais a chur chun cinn nuair a bheidh siad in ann é sin a dhéanamh. Míle buíochas do gach éinne a thacaigh linn san iarracht seo.","time":"1w","title":"Law Reform Commission of Ireland"},{"comments_count":5,"likes_count":114,"text":"Our 2023 Legal Research Access Internship is drawing to a close. Our aim is to increase diversity in law by providing opportunities for law students who come from socio-economically disadvantaged backgrounds or have disabilities. In partnership with the Office of the Attorney General, the Office of the DPP and the Chief State Solicitor's Office, the internship has expanded this year to create exceptional learning and networking opportunities across all of those organisations. We have been supported by The Bar of Ireland, Law Society of Ireland, Courts Service, Houses of the Oireachtas and Victim Support at Court (V-SAC). We have opened the interns’ eyes to the extensive array of opportunities available in law, in research and in public service. We have coached and mentored them on how to access those opportunities, culminating in a careers event yesterday. It included presentations by staff of the Office of the DPP on job applications and interviews, followed by a wide range of speakers who highlighted a variety of career options, particularly in the public sector, to provide inspiration and guidance for the interns as they start their careers. We are very grateful to Eleanor Leane, Legal Aid Board; Gareth Noble, KOD Lyons; Katie Mannion, Irish Refugee Council; Christopher Campbell, Department of Foreign Affairs, Ireland Affairs, and Elaine Cahill, Competition & Consumer Protection Commission (CCPC) for so generously sharing their time and wisdom. To mark the end of this year’s programme, the interns were addressed by Maureen Noonan, legal intern at the Law Reform Commission; by Mr Justice Frank Clarke, President of the Law Reform Commission; by Rossa Fanning SC, Attorney General; by Catherine Pierse, Director of Public Prosecutions; and by Maria Browne, Chief State Solicitor, who all remarked on the value of the initiative for both the interns and the bodies hosting them, and on the importance of improving access to opportunities for students from underrepresented backgrounds. Maureen Noonan said: “A highlight of the internship for me was getting an insight into the legal public sector. I think this is a rare opportunity for a recent graduate and making such an internship specifically for people from an access background is something which is very special and greatly appreciated. The connections I made are invaluable.” President Clarke spoke of the importance of a judiciary that is representative of society, and on the need for schemes like this one, because without diversity in the legal profession we cannot have a diverse judiciary. The internship programme has been a great success, not only in the stated aim of promoting diversity in law, but it has also been a triumph of interagency collaboration. It has had a ripple effect of goodwill and positivity, and we hope it will inspire the interns to themselves promote the access mission when they are in a position to do so. Thank you to all who have supported us in this endeavour.","time":"2w","title":"Law Reform Commission of Ireland"},{"likes_count":21,"text":"It is always great to see our recommendations implemented. In our 2010 Report on Personal Debt Management and Debt Enforcement, we recommended that permitting imprisonment of debtors for non-payment of civil debts should be abolished. Provision has been made for this in the Civil Debt (Procedures) Act 2015, which is due to be commenced shortly. The Act also makes provision for the attachment of earnings or deductions from social welfare payments, as appropriate, for the purpose of the enforcement of debts to which the legislation will apply. https://lnkd.in/eQQiGwiS","time":"2w","title":"Law Reform Commission of Ireland"},{"likes_count":8,"text":"Tá Páipéar Comhairliúcháin ar Mhaoiniú Dlíthíochta Tríú Páirtí foilsithe againn. Tarlaíonn maoiniú tríú páirtí nuair a mhaoiníonn eintiteas nach bhfuil baint aige nó aici le páirtí a bhfuil díospóid dlí aige nó aici, an costas a bhaineann leis an díospóid sin a réiteach thar ceann an pháirtí sin. Má réitítear an díospóid i bhfabhar an pháirtí maoinithe, aisíoctar méid a infheistíochta tosaigh don mhaoinitheoir agus faigheann sé luach saothair breise mar thoradh ar an infheistíocht sin. Saincheist ghaolmhar is ea shainiú cúiseanne chaingne: ciallaíonn an tearma sin díoladh ceart chun agartha le duine nó le heintiteas eile. Cuireann dlí na hÉireann cosc faoi láthair ar mhaoiniú cásanna dlí ó pháirtithe seachtracha nach bhfuil leas dlisteanach neamhspleách acu sa díospóid, faoi réir eisceachtaí áirithe, agus sannadh cúis chaingne “lom”. Tá an comhthéacs dlí agus beartais do mhaoiniú tríú páirtí tar éis teacht chun cinn. Mar thoradh air sin, tá léirscaoileadh déanta ag go leor tíortha ar a gcreat reachtúil agus rialála. Mar sin chríochnaigh an Coimisiún go raibh sé iomchuí Páipéar Comhairliúcháin a fhoilsiú ina leagfaí amach an seasamh cothrom le dáta maidir le reachtaíocht agus rialáil maoinithe tríú páirtí in Éirinn agus tuairimí a lorg ar an ábhar. Chríochnaigh an Comisiúin freisin gur cheart an cheist maidir le sannadh cúiseanne chaingne a chur san áireamh freisin. Teannas lárnach le maoiniú tríú páirtí is ea tráchtearra an cheartais. An gcuirfí é seo chun cinn trí mhaoiniú tríú páirtí a dhéanamh dleathach, nó an bhfeabhsódh sé rochtain ar cheartas agus an bhfeabhsódh sé comhionannas arm idir páirtithe i ndíospóid? I measc na gceisteanna eile a breithníodh sa Pháipéar Comhairliúcháin tá: ⚖ An bhféadfadh maoiniú tríú páirtí aghaidh a thabhairt ar neamhréireacht sa dlí, trína bhféadfaidh eintitis chorparáideacha gabháil go héifeachtach do mhaoiniú tríú páirtí faoi ainm eile, trí scaireanna a eisiúint nó trí úinéireacht na cuideachta a aistriú chun a rannpháirtíocht i réiteach díospóide a mhaoiniú; ⚖ An bhféadfadh maoiniú tríú páirtí spreagadh a thabhairt do dhíospóidí cráiteacha a thionscnamh; agus ⚖ An bhféadfadh maoiniú tríú páirtí costais dlí agus praghas préimheanna árachais a mhéadú. Fáiltímid roimh do thuairimí ar an bPáipéar Comhairliúcháin, roimh 3ú Samhain 2023. Tá tuilleadh sonraí ar fáil ar shuíomh Gréasáin an Choimisiúin um Athchóiriú an Dlí, www.lawreform.ie , agus tá aistriúchán Gaeilge ar fáil ag baint úsáide as feidhm ReachDeck an tsuímh Ghréasáin.","time":"3w","title":"Law Reform Commission of Ireland"},{"comments_count":2,"likes_count":67,"time":"3w"},{"likes_count":8,"text":"Táimid thar a bheith buíoch do Bharra na hÉireann as óstáil a dhéanamh ar ár n-intéirnigh ar maidin le haghaidh léargas tumtha ar ghairm an abhcóide, conas cáiliú mar abhcóide agus comhaltacht Denham. Chuir Sara Phelan SC, Cathaoirleach Chomhairle Bharra na hÉireann, in éineacht le Sean O'Sullivan agus Lewis Mooney BL fáilte roimh na hintéirnigh. Contact info@daemeter.org","time":"2mo","title":"Daemeter"},{"comments_count":1,"likes_count":70,"text":"Using Palm Fruit Traceability Data to Assess Deforestation and Conversion Free (DCF) Performance of FFB Suppliers: The brief attached describes a practical method Daemeter has developed in its work with palm oil companies since 2020 to help build sustainable palm oil supply chains. We are a Training Provider offering skills training in the fields of Construction, Business, Education, Agriculture, Energy and Water, Agriculture and Education. updates: [{"likes_count":7,"text":"🚀Endlich: ein zukunftsweisender Meilenstein im europäischen Mobilitätssektor 🌍🔌🚢 Das \"Fit for 55\"-Programm, präsentiert von der Europäischen Kommission, ist eine Mischung aus unterschiedlichen innovativen Gesetzesvorschlägen. Es zielt darauf ab, das EU-Energie- und Klimaschutzkonzept an die ambitionierten EU-Klimaziele anzupassen. Hier mal die 3 wichtigsten Punkt zum Thema E-Mobilität: 🌳Die Treibhausgasemission sollen bis 2023 um sage und schreibe 55% reduziert würden (gemessen an den Werten von 1990) 🚗Der Jungle aus fragmentierten Zahlungsverfahren, intrasparenten Kraftstoffpreisen wird endlich gelichtet! Die EU will eine Welt aus einfach zu bedienenden Ladestationen, einheitlichen Zahlungsverfahren und transparenten Kraftstoffpreisen pro kWh, kg, Minute oder Session schaffen. 🔋Kein Ladesäule in Sicht? Das soll sich ändern: Alle 60 km entlang des Ten-t eine 400 kWh Ladesäule und das bis 2026 😱 Diese frischen Regeln sind Teil des \"Fit for 55 in 2030\"-Reisekoffers und sie passen perfekt in unseren Plan, ein umfangreiches Netzwerk an Ladestationen auf halböffentlichen Standorten aufzubauen und engagierte Stakeholder zu verbinden. Bei Bidi Charge blicken wir mit Vorfreude auf diese Veränderungen und die sich daraus ergebenden Möglichkeiten für unsere Kunden und Partner. Aber was meint ihr dazu? This revolution transforms the auto industry, impacting energy and oil. ⚡️🚗 In 2022, over 10M electric cars were sold worldwide, with 35% growth expected this year to reach 14M sales. Market share jumps from 4% (2020) to 18% (2023). ⛽️ By 2025, electric vehicles will eliminate the need for at least 2.5 million barrels per day of oil, challenging the dominance of internal combustion engines. 🇨🇳 China leads with 60% of global sales, followed by Europe and the US. Ambitious policies will boost EV market share to 60% by 2030. 🔋💪 Battery production meets demand till 2030, and the trade is still dominated by China. 🛵🌱 Promising signs in India, Indonesia, and Thailand, with electric car sales tripling and doubling. Two- and three-wheelers drive sustainable mobility. 🔌⚡️ Join the electric revolution, reduce emissions, and drive towards a greener future! 💚 #ElectricVehicles #SustainableFuture #Bidicharge #Audi #Techstars","time":"2mo","title":"Bidi Charge"},{"likes_count":5,"time":"2mo Edited"},{"likes_count":5,"text":"Accelerating Europe's EV Revolution: The Power of EV Chargers ⚡️🚗 Europe is leading the global shift toward electric vehicles (EVs) and aims to achieve carbon neutrality by 2050. To make this vision a reality, Europe must prioritize the expansion of its EV charging infrastructure. With EU member countries already accounting for a significant share of global EV manufacturing and sales, Europe has a unique opportunity to become a global leader in the EV ecosystem. To meet the growing demand for EVs, Europe needs a robust charging network. According to McKinsey, the EU-27 will require at least 3.4 million public charging points by 2030. Currently, Europe has approximately 375,000 charging stations. This calls for substantial investments in grid upgrades and renewable energy capacity, estimated to cost over €240 billion by 2030. 💡 Creating an inclusive and accessible charging infrastructure is essential. Public charging points should be deployed in all neighborhoods, particularly to support apartment dwellers and those without home charging access. Affordable pricing models must be implemented to facilitate the transition to an all-electric Europe. Grid reinforcements are necessary to handle the increased electricity demand from millions of new EV chargers. Emphasizing distribution systems over centralized transmission will be key. Residential areas with slow AC chargers place less strain on the grid, while fast-charging parks at highway rest stops will require grid upgrades or backup storage solutions. 🔋 Ensuring renewable energy sources power EV charging is crucial to prevent increased carbon emissions. Adding sufficient renewable-energy capacity is vital as EV charging demand is expected to rise significantly. By 2030, passenger and commercial EVs alone could require 165 terawatt-hours of electricity, representing around 6% of the EU-27's total consumption. ⚡️ To navigate this infrastructure build-out, collaboration among stakeholders is vital. Charging-point operators, grid operators, auto manufacturers, policymakers, and financial institutions must work together. Strategic decisions on charger deployment, smart charging technologies, faster charging capabilities, streamlined approval processes, and balanced funding approaches will drive Europe's successful transition to an electric future. ⚡️ Europe has the opportunity to lead the mobility revolution. By investing in a comprehensive EV charging infrastructure and fostering collaboration, Europe can drive sustainable 🌿 transportation, reduce emissions, and create a thriving EV ecosystem.🌍 Here's a figure 📈 showing Kw of charging per EV (orange balls) in comparison with number of electric LDV per charging point (Blue bars) for selected few countries #EVs #ElectricVehicles #SustainableTransportation #CarbonNeutrality #RenewableEnergy #Infrastructure #bidicharge","time":"2mo Edited","title":"Bidi Charge"},{"likes_count":2,"text":"🚀 Germany Leading the Way to a Sustainable Electric Mobility Revolution! 🇩🇪⚡️ Thrilled to share the insights from the \"Electric Vehicle Index\" report by McKinsey! Germany has firmly established itself as a global front-runner in the electric vehicle market, propelling us towards a future of sustainable and electrified transportation. Let's dive into Germany's remarkable journey towards electric mobility: 1️⃣ Market Performance: Germany has secured an impressive second place in the global electric vehicle market performance category. With a remarkable surge in EV sales, fueled by robust government incentives and an expanding range of electric models, Germany is accelerating towards an electric future. The wheels of progress are turning, and Germany is driving ahead! 2️⃣ Charging Infrastructure: Germany has achieved remarkable scores in the charging infrastructure category, underscoring its commitment to developing an extensive and reliable network. With an ambitious goal of installing one million public and private charging points by 2030, Germany ensures convenient and accessible charging for EV drivers nationwide. The road to e-mobility is paved with charging stations! 3️⃣ Government Support: Kudos to Germany for its forward-thinking policies and incentives that have been instrumental in fostering electric vehicle adoption. Purchase subsidies, tax incentives, and exemptions from fees and restrictions have created an environment conducive to embracing electric mobility and reducing emissions. Germany's commitment to sustainability is driving change! 4️⃣ Industry Ecosystem: Germany's robust automotive industry and well-established supply chain have given it a competitive edge in the EV market. With major automakers and a skilled workforce at its helm, Germany is at the forefront of electric vehicle production and development. The future of mobility is being re-imagined right here! While Germany has achieved significant milestones, we acknowledge the challenges that lie ahead. Accelerating the deployment of charging infrastructure in all regions and addressing range anxiety concerns among consumers are key areas demanding attention. At Bidi Charge, we recognize the importance of overcoming these challenges and are actively contributing to their resolution. Through strategic partnerships with Audi and Techstars, Bidi Charge is spearheading the deployment of charging infrastructure across Germany. Our innovative solutions and cutting-edge technology ensure convenient and reliable access to charging stations in all regions. With continued government support and collaboration between industry stakeholders, we can sustain the remarkable growth of the EV market. Together, we can propel the transition to a cleaner, greener, and more sustainable future! 🌍💚 #BidiCharge #ElectricMobility #EVRevolution #SustainableFuture #GermanyLeadingTheWay","time":"2mo","title":"Bidi Charge"},{"comments_count":2,"likes_count":9,"text":"We are very excited to announce that we are going to be a part of the Techstars family! 🥳 We just got into a program with Techstars Berlin and AUDI AG Denkwerkstatt. Onwards and upwards for greener mobility. 🚀","time":"8mo","title":"Bidi Charge"}]

specialties: Not available
updates: [{"likes_count":8,"text":"We are thrilled to announce that Exakta will be exhibiting at ADIPEC 23, the most influential exhibition for energy industry professionals, held from 2nd to 5th October in Abu Dhabi, UAE. ADIPEC provides a unique opportunity for us to strengthen existing business partnerships and foster new collaborations. By sharing our insights and experiences and showcasing our cutting-edge pumping solutions we aim to contribute to the advancement of the energy industry as we collectively work towards a sustainable, decarbonized future. We look forward to seeing you at ADIPEC 23. Together, let's decarbonize faster and build a brighter future for the energy industry! #Exakta #SEKO #meteringpump #dosingpump #chemicalinjection #heavyindustry #processandsystems #ADIPEC23 #DecarbonisingFasterTogether #EnergyIndustry #Innovation #Collaboration #Sustainability #ADIPEC2023 #AbuDhabi #UAE","time":"2d","title":"Exakta"},{"likes_count":22,"text":"The 3C Triplex pump is designed to tackle high-pressure duties, making it a perfect fit for a wide range of industrial applications. Its ability to achieve special operating requirements allows our customers to build the ideal system tailored to their needs. With its distinctive design, 3C Triplex enables low-speed operation, reducing wear on moving parts and ensuring high reliability. At Exakta, we understand that every project is different. That's why we offer a variety of customization options, including a wide choice of wetted parts, leakage control and collection, baseplate structures, painting cycles, documentation, and certification. Hydrogen and hydrogen-based fuels are key pillars in the Net Zero Emissions Scenario, contributing significantly to reducing cumulative emissions. One of the most prevalent methods for hydrogen production is alkaline water electrolysis, which involves two electrodes operating in a liquid alkaline electrolyte solution containing potassium hydroxide (KOH) or sodium hydroxide (NaOH). The procedure allows for the separation of oxygen and hydrogen from water when a direct current is applied. In this process, Exakta’s Nexa Series pumps represent the solution designed to enhance efficiency, ensuring a precise and continuous dosage of potassium hydroxide, therefore maintaining the required conductive level of the solution. During this process, CO2 is captured before it enters the atmosphere and is then transported and stored in geological formations after separation from #naturalgas. The Oil and Gas industry is using new solutions to reduce its carbon #emissions, and this is exemplified by the initiative undertaken by Qatar Energy, of building new facilities for #CO2 sequestration and enhanced oil recovery (EOR). With water contained in the CO2-rich stream, a gas dehydration technology is required to remove water #vapor to mitigate the risk of pipeline corrosion. The key is based on TEG technology, which absorbs the water contained in the CO2-rich stream counter-currently, utilizing liquid triethylene glycol as its dehydrating agent to pull out water from a stream of CO2 flowing over it. A major benefit of using a TEG dehydration unit is the ability to recycle the drying fluid by removing #glycol from the gas stream for processing so that it can be purified and reused. Exakta has been appointed for the design and manufacture of several Nexa Series pumps with associated accessories and instrumentation to dose antifoam and PH control agents, needed in the TEG dehydration unit to manage the risk of #pipelinecorrosion and to obtain natural gas without impurities. updates: [{"text":"FAIT INUSITÉ – Saviez-vous que la langue est la partie du corps qui guérit le plus vite? 👅","time":"1d","title":"Clinique dentaire Remacle"},{"text":"Êtes-vous du genre à vous endormir à tout moment? 😴 Risquez-vous de vous endormir lors des situations suivantes? - Assis en train de lire - En regardant la télévision - Assis inactif dans un lieu public (théâtre, au cours d’une réunion, etc.) - Comme passager d’une voiture pendant une heure, sans arrêt - Allongé pour la sieste l’après-midi, si les circonstances le permettent - Assis en train de discuter avec quelqu’un - Assis tranquillement après un repas sans alcool - Au volant d’une voiture immobilisée pendant quelques minutes à un feu de circulation ou dans un embouteillage Si c’est le cas, vous souffrez peut-être d’apnée du sommeil. Parlez-en à votre médecin. Saviez-vous qu’avec une prescription de votre médecin, certains dentistes ont été formés pour vous offrir un traitement de l’apnée légère à modéré grâce à un appareil d’avancement mandibulaire? 😮 C’est le cas de Dre Remacle à notre clinique! 😍 Par ici pour prendre rendez-vous ➡️ https://lnkd.in/guu-gmw","time":"3d","title":"Clinique dentaire Remacle"},{"text":"🥳 Aujourd’hui nous tenons à souligner l’anniversaire de Sylvain! 🥳 Notre directeur finances franchit à son tour le cap des 40 ans! Contrôleur financier sérieux dans son travail, il est aussi un « party animal » à ses heures 😉 et ne part jamais tant que la fête n’est pas finie. Papa de deux beaux garçons, vous le trouverez à l’aréna pour leurs pratiques et parties de hockey toute la saison; assez normal puisqu’il est aussi le coach. Entraîneur très dévoué, il s’assure en plus de promouvoir l’image de l’équipe avec de super objets promotionnels au grand plaisir des joueurs et de leurs parents. 😍 Pour l’été, il sera soit dans sa piscine ou au terrain de baseball où une nouvelle saison débute… Bonne fête Sylvain! 🥳🎂🎈","time":"6d","title":"Clinique dentaire Remacle"},{"likes_count":1,"text":"❓ Connaissez-vous l’orthodontie sans broches avec gouttières transparentes de type Invisalign? ❓ Ces gouttières transparentes ont révolutionné l'orthodontie. 🤩 Ce système est non seulement presque invisible, mais il est également amovible, facilitant l’action de manger, boire et nettoyer ses dents. Sans compter que vous n’aurez qu’à enlever les gouttières lors de grands événements impliquant des photos! Le processus Invisalign utilise la technologie d'imagerie numérique 3D pour fournir le plan de mouvement des dents et donner une idée précise de ce à quoi ressembleront vos dents une fois le processus terminé. Le mouvement des dents se fait en portant une série de gouttières d'alignement presque transparentes qui sont changées tous les quelques jours ou semaines. Ce mouvement progressif des dents est important pour aider au remodelage osseux autour des dents lorsqu'elles se déplacent. Avoir des dents droites présente de nombreux avantages. Bien sûr, il y a l'avantage esthétique évident. 😁 Des dents droites vous permettent également de nettoyer toutes les surfaces de vos dents lors du brossage, de l'utilisation de la soie dentaire ou de la brossette interdentaire. La santé de vos gencives s'améliore généralement. De même, les dents droites ont tendance à mieux s’emboîter et ainsi réduire ou éliminer l’usure prématurée des dents, l’écaillage des dents de devant ou tout autre problème pouvant résulter d’une malocclusion. 😍 Vous aimeriez déterminer si Invisalign est une option pour aligner vos dents? Profitez dès maintenant de notre service gratuit d’évaluation et de consultation à distance en orthodontie. Faites parvenir vos photos et réservez une consultation virtuelle gratuite avec l’équipe dentaire MOV – Mon orthodontie virtuelle de Dre Isange Remacle, dentiste généraliste. Découvrez ainsi quelles sont les actions à entreprendre qui répondront le mieux à vos besoins et à vos attentes face à votre sourire. ** Il s’agit d’une consultation virtuelle pré-diagnostique. name: Evolutions Treatment Center
location: 2901 W Cypress Creek Rd, Fort Lauderdale, Florida 33309, US
about: Evolutions Treatment Center provides comprehensive treatment of addiction and co-occuring psychiatric disorders. We offer a luxurious setting combined with a world-class team of addiction treatment and behavioral health professionals. Treatment consists of a diverse blend of evidenced based and holistic methodology. Our program recognizes the connection of mind, body, and spirit, treating the full spectrum of addiction and it's underlying causes. All services are supervised by a licensed clinical psychologist and physicians board certified in psychiatry, addiction medicine, sleep, and other specialties. Our experienced, licensed, credentialed staff and independent specialists also include licensed clinical social workers, licensed mental health counselors, nurses, certified yoga instructors, certified trainers, and other specialty areas. At Evolutions Treatment Center we provide affordable luxury care in a warm nurturing environment; combined with cutting edge treatment and assessment. The only thing left to ask yourself is…Are you ready to Evolve?

name: MEXICO CITY RESTAURANT & LOUNGE
location: 2115 LARIMER ST, DENVER, Colorado 80205, US
about: For over 60 years, Mexico City Restaurant & Lounge has been a staple of the Ballpark neighborhood in Denver, CO. Famous for our fried tacos and welcoming atmosphere, we make authentic Mexican food people crave. Dave, Owner & Chef, and his wife, Candice, Owner & CEO, are the third generation to run the restaurant. Mexico City started as a bar founded by Dave’s grandparents, Willy and Esther Garcia. His father, Robert Muniz, made many improvements during the 20 years he was in charge. It’s survived many changes, including the pandemic. Mexico City has all the authenticity of an old-school Mexican restaurant with a timeless, modern feel. It’s where regulars congregate, and people run into each other — an epicenter of the neighborhood, bringing together family, friends, and co-workers. We were voted “Taco the town” by Westword and secured a spot in “The 100 restaurants we can’t live without” list. Mexico City Restaurant & Lounge is the go-to Mexican family restaurant for native Denverites, out-of-towners, and people coming home. You can explore our menu and history at http://ilovemexicocitytacos.com/

name: FHM Insurance Company
location: Orlando, FL, US
about: Founded in 1954, FHM Insurance Company is a long-standing workers’ comp carrier in the industry. FHM originally began as the Florida Hotel-Motel Self Insurer’s Fund eventually converting to a mutual insurer in 1996 as FHM Insurance Company. Since its conversion, FHM has significantly diversified, insuring employers in a wide variety of industries. FHM Insurance has also grown to write coverage in Alabama, Georgia, Kentucky, North Carolina, South Carolina, and Virginia. FHM is known for its history in the workers’ comp market, its disciplined underwriting practices, hands on risk management services and claims handling, and strong partnerships with independent agents. This is evidenced by the large percentage of policyholders who return year after year. Adding a new chapter to the company’s history, in 2020 FHM Insurance Company was acquired by LUBA Casualty Insurance Company providing an additional coverage option to its policyholders and agency partners. Together, FHM and LUBA share over a century of history, knowledge, and expertise in the workers’ comp industry. Together they promise competitive pricing, genuine dependability, and service that is second to none.
specialties: Workers'​ Compensation insurance, Workplace Safety Consultation, Fraud Prevention, Risk Management, Superior Claims Handling, FHMconnect, Safety Tools/Safety Training, Small Business Dividend Program, and Online Rating and Submission

name: Lo And Behold Productions Limited
location: Orange Studio, Old Paradise Yard, 20 Carlisle Lane, London, GB
about: “This is where the magic happens!” Lo And Behold; a London based agency that represents and champions creative talent. We believe that authentic personal style is at the heart of exceptional commercial and editorial work, which is why our roster of acclaimed photographers, filmmakers and illustrators have been hand picked for their distinctive approaches to image making. We tailor our involvement to the needs of each project, offering specialised production, art buying and project management services in-house and pride ourselves on our amiable, positive, and transparent relationships with artists and clients. Lo And Behold provide a range of production services, from editorial shoots to global campaigns, as well as exhibitions and events. Renowned for a particularly creative approach to sourcing unique elements such as locations and casting, as well as a flair for putting together like-minded teams to create on-set alchemy, an adaptability to work across a range of projects and rigorous budget management. Our incredibly comprehensive knowledge of London, having produced shoots there for 20+ years, is coupled with experience of shooting in various global territories. "Collaborating with Amy and her team is like being with good friends. Lo And Behold are creative problem solvers." Droga 5 (NYC). "With Lo And Behold, God is in the detail; tirelessly intuitive, inventive and resourceful.” StudioThomson.

name: Vintage Vibes
location: 2 Cheyne Street, Edinburgh, City of Edinburgh EH4 1JB, GB,79-89 Broomhouse Crescent, Edinburgh, City of Edinburgh EH11 3RH, GB
about: Edinburgh is the loneliest city in the UK for older people. Loneliness increases the likelihood of developing dementia by 64%. Vintage Vibes is an award-winning fresh approach to tackling loneliness and isolation in Scotland's capital. We're a local project helping local people. We put together people with shared interests, across generations, tackling loneliness by creating long-lasting friendships and groups. We're neighbourly; partnering with Edinburghers, charities and businesses across the city..... Get in touch : hello@vintagevibes.org.uk The official bit : Vintage Vibes is a charitable partnership between LifeCare Edinburgh and The Broomhouse Centre and Enterprises, supported by Big Lottery.
specialties: Loneliness, Charity, Befriending, Big Lottery, Fundraising, Elderly, and OAPs

name: Phuel Strategies
location: 77 W Madison St, Chicago, Illinois, US
about: Technology and marketing consulting firms continuously say they offer a superior product or service. However, most of these consulting firms offer services that are less than anything acceptable. From overcharging clients for products, to not living up to the promises that are given to the clients, to not meeting the demands of their customers, unacceptable services always seem to be offered to their clients. Phuel Strategies, your trustworthy technology and marketing consultants, was developed to steer clear of these practices and offer services to customers that are built on honesty and integrity. With that said, here are our promises to you: 1) You will work with a diligent and experienced technology and marketing consultant who wants to learn about your business and help your business grow and succeed for many years to come. 2) We will not sell you products. However, we will work as your advocate to obtain the best pricing for products, such as servers, desktops, laptops, wireless access points, switches, etc. 3) You will see our faces. We do not take the managed services/help desk approach that you are forced to call into a ‘support center’ to get help with your problem and then wait until a technician answers or calls you back. We take the approach of working as an advocate and being apart of your team. We want to celebrate your successes with you, and we can’t do that if we are trying to ‘nickel and dime’ you for everything. 4) You will receive services that are based on honesty! We want to help you succeed and grow your business; this can’t be done if we have other plans in mind. This honesty includes not charging you for travel times and minimum fees: your invoice will only reflect charges for the work performed. 5) Most importantly, I am just like you, a small business owner! We have the same goals in mind with succeeding in our business and that can’t be done without working together as a team!
specialties: marketing, social media, social media management, website design, technology support, search engine optimization, google adwords, bing ads, computer support, technology, pay per click advertising, and graphic design

name: CMI Réseau FIGURE
location: 9, rue Charles-Claude Chenou - TSA 51106, Reseau National d'Universités, Poitiers 86073 , FR
about: Avec plus de 100 CMI dans une trentaine d'Universités françaises, le réseau FIGURE (Formation à l’InGénierie par des Universités de REcherche) offre la possibilité de construire un cursus personnalisé permettant d’accéder au marché de l’emploi d’ingénieur spécialiste innovant. Dans un CMI, dès la 1ère année, projets et stages occupent une part importante de la formation. Un CMI est toujours adossé à un grand laboratoire de recherche et s’inscrit dans un partenariat fort entreprise-recherche. Un CMI est une formation en ingénierie en cinq ans avec au moins une mobilité internationale (stage/semestre d’études). Un CMI contient 20% d’enseignements supplémentaires par rapport à la licence et au master d’appui, avec une part importante d’activités de mise en situation. Le référentiel national du réseau définit et garantit l’équilibre des composantes de cette formation exigeante et motivante, inspirée des cursus des grandes universités internationales. Le CMI est un label national attribué aux diplômés de Master ayant réalisé un cursus de Licence et de Master renforcé pendant 5 ans, cohérent et exigeant, se caractérisant notamment par la recherche comme outil de formation dès le début du cursus. Les diplômés labellisés possèdent une vision systémique de leur domaine d’expertise, une capacité à concevoir et innover afin d’exercer des fonctions d’ingénieur spécialiste au sein de projets complexes dans des environnements professionnels interculturels. Les 28 Universités du réseau sont : Angers, Aix-Marseille, Avignon, Bordeaux, Brest, Lorient/Vannes, Cergy-Pontoise, Besançon, La Rochelle, Lille, Calais/Dunkerque, Metz/Nancy, Lyon, Le Mans, Montpellier, Nantes, Orléans, Paris-Nanterre, Paris II Panthéon-Assas, Paris 6, Pau, Poitiers, Reims, Rennes, Chambéry, Strasbourg, Toulouse , Valenciennes. L’admission en CMI est sélective, sur dossier et entretien de motivation via la plateforme nationale après-bac, dans la rubrique « Formations en ingénierie ».
specialties: Biotechnologie, Chimie, Economie-Finance, EEA, Environnement, Génie Civil, Géographie-Aménagement, Géosciences, Histoire, Info-Com, Informatique, Mathématiques-Informatique, Mathématiques Appliquées, Mécanique, Physique, Sciences et Génie des Matériaux, and Tourisme et Patrimoine
slogan: 29 Universités en réseau / 17 Spécialités en Ingénierie / + de 100 Formations

name: BALDI Drinks
location: Parque Industrial de Celeirós (2º Fase), Braga, Braga 4701-905, PT
about: A BALDI Drinks dedica-se à importação e comercialização exclusiva de bebidas, tendo como objetivo representar marcas de referência que ainda não estejam presentes no mercado nacional, produtos premium e diferenciadores, distribuídos em exclusivo e colocados apenas em casas de referência. A forma de atuar da BALDI Drinks caracteriza-se pelo modo personalizado do seu trabalho, constantemente focado no produto e no acompanhamento contínuo e próximo que presta aos seus clientes. O trabalho de proximidade e a atenção colocada nas marcas que distribui, são mais valias inquestionáveis que se refletem na total disponibilidade da empresa em dar apoio, nas mais diversas formas, aos seus revendedores. A empresa iniciou atividade com a importação exclusiva e divulgação em Portugal dos conceituados Champagnes Drappier, considerados dos melhores do mundo pela sua autenticidade e qualidade. Ao longo dos anos, a BALDI Drinks assumiu a representação de outras marcas, incluindo alguns vinhos nacionais de marca própria, da mais elevada qualidade, de modo a disponibilizar um portefólio abrangente, mas sempre único e distinto. A BALDI Drinks faz parte do Grupo José Pimenta Marques, um Grupo forte e consolidado, com uma considerável dimensão internacional (com empresas no Brasil, Espanha, França e China), o que nos permite ter todas as condições para a concretização de negócios sólidos e de longo prazo, com um forte potencial de rentabilidade para todos os nossos parceiros.
specialties: champagne, gin, Vinhos, Limoncello, Lambrusco, Crémant, Drappier, Gingerbeer Pimento, and Roby Marton Gin

updates: [{"text":"Рекомендую и автора и сам курс. Мы его проводили в очном формате, теперь есть возможность пройти онлайн. Авторский курс \"СИСТЕМНЫЙ КОУЧИНГ. ОРГАНИЗАЦИОННЫЕ РАССТАНОВКИ\" Это курс о том, как работать с группами, командами, подразделениями и целыми организациями. В качестве главного инструмента в этом курсе используется системная организационная расстановка, которая является наиболее эффективным инструментом для решения бизнес-проблем любого вида и уровня. 6 модулей, 6 групп практики, супервизия и сертификация. Старт - 22 июля 2023 года. Вебинары по субботам. Продолжительность курса - 11 недель Автор и ведущий - Олег Вайнберг Все подробности по ссылке: https://lnkd.in/eWXp9Ftm","time":"1mo","title":"OBS"},{"likes_count":1,"text":"25 апреля в 18-00 встречаемся на вебинаре \"Какие бывают стратегии?\" (https://lnkd.in/dqezDbnm) с Тимофеем Левицким. Как правило, у предпринимателей и топ-менеджеров нет сомнений в том, что компании нужна стратегия. Сомнения и вопросы начинаются тогда, когда нужно выбрать подходящий подход к стратегированию. Часто мы пытаемся применить инструменты классического стратегического планирования в ситуациях, которые вообще для этого не подходят. Например, на слишком быстро меняющихся рынках, в кризисных ситуациях. Или когда компания могла бы не строить стратегию в соответствии с поведением других игроков, а заставить всех играть по своим правилам. А какие бывают стратегии? Какие есть инструменты, чтобы разобраться в том, какая именно вам нужна стратегия? На какие главные вопросы вам нужно ответить, если вам нужна не стратегия, а другой документ, другой результат, другой вид замысла? name: East London Printmakers
location: 19 Warburton Road, London, Hackney E8 3RT, US
about: East London Printmakers is an independent, artist run studio based in London Fields. Our aim is to provide professional and affordable printmaking facilities for artists and designers and to create opportunities for them to discuss and exhibit their work. We offer Open Access for screen printing on paper and fabric, etching and relief and run a variety of courses and residency schemes. East London Printmakers supports thirty four key-holders, represents over 250 members and attracts over one thousand visitors annually. The group is run by a committee of volunteers elected by the members. Current committee members are: Chair: Richard Roberts Vice Chair: Steve Edwards Secretary: Eliza Southwood Treasurer: Martin Mossop Jamie Temple Wuon-Gean Ho Jackie Baxter Caroline Whitehead Louisa Jones Rory Brooke Non-committee roles: Studio coordinator: Susan Clarke Studio Technician: Helen Ashton Marketing coordinator: Marcroy Smith ELP welcome visitors to the studio during open access hours.
specialties: printmaking, etching, screenprinting, and linocut
slogan: Not available

about: Inovação, tecnologia e confiança. Estruturada sobre estes três pilares, a Immense oferece há 20 anos soluções para os mais exigentes Projetos de Escritórios Corporativos. São mobiliários projetados para atender as necessidades do mercado com design diferenciado, alta funcionalidade e opções de acabamento. A linha de produtos, composta por mesas para diretorias, sistemas operacionais, mesas plataforma, arquivamentos, painéis divisórios e cadeiras, atende rigorosamente às normas de ergonomia e é produzida com processos e materiais que respeitam o meio ambiente. A Immense também oferece suporte com consultores comerciais para a orientação e atendimento personalizado para cada projeto, acompanhando todo o processo até o pós-venda, visando a total satisfação e aproveitamento dos produtos.
specialties: Móveis corporativos

name: MPowered Entrepreneurship
location: 601 E University Avenue, Ann Arbor, MI 48109, US
about: Our mission is to expose students to entrepreneurship New ventures are a dime a dozen these days — if you live in a tiny strip of California. In the rest of the world, and here in Ann Arbor, engineers aren’t spinning their class projects into businesses and art students aren’t applying their designs to run their own clothing line. And that’s the problem. So the goal of MPowered is two-fold: one, to bring out the few courageous self-starters among us to begin their entrepreneurial journey, and two, to spread their bold passion to the rest of the U-M community. In short, we’re starting the fire.
specialties: Entrepreneurship, Education, and Project Management

name: Genetics & Applications
location: Ulica Zmaja od Bosne 8, Sarajevo, Federation of Bosnia and Herzegovina 71000, BA
about: Genetics and Applications (G&A) is the official journal of the Institute for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology, University of Sarajevo. It is envisaged as an international journal issued twice a year in print and online format, publishing peer-reviewed articles of novel and significant discoveries in the fields of basic and applied genetics. Special issues or supplements may also be produced from time to time upon agreement with the Editorial Board. Topics covered within Genetics and Applications (G&A) include: molecular genetics, cytogenetics, plant genetics, animal genetics, human genetics, medical genetics, population and evolutionary genetics, conservation genetics, genomics and functional genomics, genetic engineering and biotechnology, and bioinformatics. Authors are encouraged to submit complete, unpublished, original works that are not under review in any other journals. Acceptable papers are those that gather and disseminate fundamental knowledge in all areas of genetics.
specialties: molecular genetics, cytogenetics, plant genetics, animal genetics, human genetics, medical genetics, population and evolutionary genetics, conservation genetics, genomics and functional genomics, genetic engineering and biotechnology, and bioinformatics
headquarters: Sarajevo, Federation of Bosnia and Herzegovina

name: Geo Redundant

about: Geo Redundant is a team of experienced IT professionals who have come together to provide SMBs with the mobility, scalability, geo-redundancy, security and peace of mind previously available to only the enterprise market. Although SMBs have begun to understand more about cloud, they’re now faced with employing disjointed, perplexing bits and pieces of various services from different sources to get their IT into the cloud. Geo Redundant has solved SMBs’ problems by integrating and servicing everything from user authentication to archiving and everything in between, including remote desktops and applications, file sharing, archiving, compliance, conferencing, communications... all on an as-needed basis. Our team comes with specific SMB experience and we use Microsoft’s geo redundant global network of Microsoft-managed data centers available in Azure to integrate our customers’ existing IT into the cloud.

updates: [{"comments_count":1,"likes_count":20,"text":"Alain Milliat, ailleurs que chez nos commerçants favoris ? À la simple évocation de ce nom, dans l’esprit des consommateurs, le produit phare de la marque se dessine : de grandes bouteilles de nectar de fruit, au look élégant et épuré. Mais Alain Milliat a depuis développé des produits de la même veine : infusions glacées, citronnades, confitures… Le tout provenant d’une agriculture raisonnée et biologique. Alors, afin de promouvoir son savoir-faire et créer un sentiment d’attachement plus fort qu’à travers un réseau de revendeurs, la marque s’est installée dans notre pop-up au 38 rue des martyrs, dans le 9ème. Ici, vous rentrez dans une boutique au look épuré et simple, à l’image de leurs produits. Vous découvrirez des rangées de bouteilles et bocaux colorés qui font saliver et pourrez déguster un esquimau glacé, proposé exclusivement dans ce pop-up ! Pour plus d'information sur le pop-up, rendez-vous en commentaire. Et pour les visiter, rendez-vous au 📍38 rue des martyrs à Paris 🗓️ jusqu'au 17 Juillet ! #popupstore #boutique #paris #retail","time":"1mo","title":"Nestore"},{"comments_count":2,"likes_count":46,"text":"83 % des consommateurs pensent que l’avenir du shopping est hybride.🛒 Se lancer dans le commerce physique peut sembler démodé lorsque créer une boutique en ligne est accessible à tous et gratuit. Mais les influenceurs y voient aussi une véritable opportunité business pour lancer leur propre marque et ancrer dans le temps la relation avec leur communauté. 🚀 Du côté de Pauème, la marque de vêtement lancée en 2020 par l’influenceuse mode Pauline Torres, suivie par plus de 370k personnes, l’enjeu réside aussi dans sa capacité à se détacher de l’image emblématique de sa fondatrice. Variable n°2 : la répétition. 📣 Plus le consommateur est exposé à un message, plus il est susceptible de le mémoriser. Même principe pour le pop-up. Enfin, activer les bonnes variables c’est aussi être capable d’engager durablement. Alors on sort le grand jeu. ✨ Concept, événements en pop-up, expérience client, formation des vendeurs ou encore vitrine XXL, pour Apnée, l’attachement à la marque se crée par l’expérience proposée en magasin. name: Somato Publications
location: 651 N Broad St, Middletown, Delaware 19709, US
about: Somato Publications is an International Scientific and Scholastic Publisher that affiliates the Open Access Publications to make science widely available and benefit the scientific society by disseminating teaching and research on a global scale. Somato publishes scholarly articles subject to high-level peer review by eminent scientists. We follow ethical policies & standards to ensure high-quality scientific works and are freely accessible online. Somato Journals helps research scholars and other healthcare professionals to make new discoveries, improve their research strategies. OPEN ACCESS JOURNAL: Somato Publications is an open access publisher where the published articles are freely accessible to all the readers throughout the world without any subscription charges. Authors can retain the copyright of their work by licensing it under the Creative Commons Attribution License. Articles can be reused or redistributed by the authors without restriction unless the original work is correctly cited. PEER REVIEW: Somato Publications follow rapid double-blinded peer review process where author and reviewer details are maintained confidential. Once the article has been submitted to the journal, it will be assigned to an editorial board member for further peer review process. An editor will check whether the article submitted is within the scope of the journal and invite reviewers based on the area of expertise. Once the reviewer's comments are received it will be notified to the author to make necessary amendments. Post submission of the revised manuscript by authors will again be sent back to the reviewer to check the amendments, upon which the final decision for acceptance will be taken by the editor. PUBLICATIONS ETHICS: Articles published under Somato Publications follow COPE-Community of Publication Ethics. Authors, reviewers, and editors are instructed to follow publication ethics to maintain the journal integrity.
specialties: Scientific Publications, Open Access Journals, and Scholastic Publisher
slogan: Not available

name: Assisi Aid Projects
location: 251 Flinders Lane, Melbourne, Victoria 3000, AU
about: Assisi Aid Projects is an Australian international development organisation working to empower women in the Asia-Pacific who face barriers to social and economic participation. Assisi Aid Projects supports women as agents for economic and social resilience in their communities through strengthening women’s skills, knowledge and confidence; supporting women’s collectives; and addressing systemic barriers to gender equality. Our vision is a world in which all people have equal opportunity to determine and achieve their economic and social potential.
specialties: Women's empowerment, Children's tuition classes, Savings clubs, Livelihood skill training, Community-led development, International Development, and Gender equality
updates: [{"likes_count":9,"text":"Last month, Assisi’s CEO Jacqueline, and Project and Engagement Officer Issy, travelled to Ngawi in Indonesia to meet our partner, Dreamdelion. While there, they visited the Jajal Wae Sustainable Agrotourism Project and met women project participants, receiving training on tourism management. The women are also learning how to establish themselves as homestay owners for the Jajal Wae trips. Prior to the project, some of the women had no option but to leave their children and village, in search of city work, often in challenging and poorly paid jobs, such as maids or labourers. Participation in the project enables the women to earn an income in their villages, and stay with their families and community in Ngawi. The women also demonstrated their kokedama coconut pot crafting, and showed Jacqueline and Issy their polybag planting around the village. The pots and surplus produce are both sold for additional income, contributing to the group’s self-funded savings scheme. It was wonderful to meet the Dreamdelion team, and see first-hand the impact of the project in its early stages. We, at Assisi, are very excited to continue working in close partnership with Dreamdelion and expand economic empowerment for women in Ngawi.","time":"1d Edited","title":"Assisi Aid Projects"},{"likes_count":12,"text":"We are thrilled to announce our new partnership with Dreamdelion Indonesia, the implementing partner of a new short-term project, ‘Jajal Wae Sustainable Agro Tourism’. The project will run in Ngawi, a regency in East Java, Indonesia. There are few livelihood opportunities in the villages in the region, particularly for women, who face limited access to skills development and business networks due to cultural norms. The project aims to create social change for women who are vulnerable from physical, psychological, and economic violence. Adopting an approach of economic empowerment, the project establishes a formal eco-tourism management group and provides tourism training to women. Strengthening women’s economic resilience will in turn elevate their status, contributing to stronger, more equitable communities and economies. The project will directly engage approximately 70 participants, and indirectly benefit more than 500 community members.","time":"2mo","title":"Assisi Aid Projects"},{"comments_count":2,"likes_count":20,"text":"This month, Assisi’s CEO Dr Jacqueline Parisi and Program Manager, Cate Coleman travelled to Tamil Nadu in India to visit our partner, Integrated Development Trust. While there, they spoke to project staff and participants of the single women’s and children’s projects, and visited the projects. They were also able to celebrate the 49th anniversary of Sister Stella’s first visit to Australia – a visit which triggered the need and development of Assisi Aid Projects. ⁠ ⁠ Jacqueline and Cate were highly impressed by the work carried out by the project teams, and were moved by the stories the women in the communities shared with them. Speaking of the experience, Jacqueline says, “Through meeting the participants it was clear to us how the lives of the women and children have been truly changed through the projects – we were able to see first-hand the wonderful impact our projects are having. Thank you very much to all our supporters!”⁠ ⁠#AssisiAidProjects #DFAT #ANCP #womensrights #womensempowerment #genderequality","time":"4mo","title":"Assisi Aid Projects"},{"likes_count":10,"text":"We are delighted to announce the continuation of our partnership with the Federation of Business and Professional Women Nepal (BPW Nepal) as we work together to deliver our new ANCP-funded project in Jumla and Nuwakot, Nepal, ‘Advancing Women in Agroforestry Business Enterprises Post Covid-19’. ⁠ ⁠ Following the success of our short-term project, the new ANCP-funded project engages over 380 women in sustainable agriculture cooperatives, incorporating training in business planning, financial and digital literacy, e-marketing and promotion. ⁠ ⁠ In Nepal a range of factors, including gender norms and a high occurrence of early marriages, impact upon the capacity of women to enter the workforce and earn an income. A 2021 study by the Himalayan Climate Initiate and The Asia Foundation found that only 37% of Nepalese women were in work, and of those, only 9.5% were in the formal sector. Gendered barriers to employment have been further exacerbated by the Covid 19 pandemic, leading to the closure of many small women-owned businesses. ⁠ ⁠ This International Women’s Day, the Australian Ambassador to Nepal, Her Excellency Ms Felicity Volk, marked the occasion with a visit to our new ANCP-funded project which aims to address some of these barriers facing women in Nepal. Following her visit to Jumla, Ms Volk said \"Reached Jumla and spent time with a great group of #agrobusinesswomen in Patarashi. [Australian] supported training, technical support & new infrastructure has seen these entrepreneurs value-add & significantly increase earnings. More income = more kids in school.\" ⁠ ⁠ Australian Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade #ANCP #AssisiAidProjects⁠ ⁠ #genderequality #womensempowerment #iwd2023 #embraceequity","time":"4mo Edited","title":"Assisi Aid Projects"},{"likes_count":11,"text":"This week, Ms Prema is featured in our weekly impact story. Ms Prema is a 44-year-old woman from Alapakkam, where she runs her own small grocery shop in the village. She has two daughters who attend higher education, and she supports them with the income she earns from the shop. Ms Prema ran the business jointly with her husband, up until three years ago, when sadly her husband passed away. She was left in a difficult position where she was unable to manage the business and family. Thankfully, Ms Prema was able to receive a loan of assistance through our interest-free loan program. This enabled her to access the necessary resources to run the shop, and also to invest and grow the business. As a result, Ms Prema has increased her family's income and is now able to support her daughters as they complete their higher education. By donating, you will have a direct impact on the lives of women such as Ms Prema, contributing to economic stability. Visit the link in our bio to donate today!","time":"8mo Edited","title":"Assisi Aid Projects"},{"comments_count":1,"likes_count":17,"text":"Exciting news! We have officially released our Annual Report for the 2021-2022 period, showcasing an array of our accomplishments and progress from the last year! If you are a current supporter, or just curious about what we do, this report is the perfect opportunity to take a glimpse at Assisi’s Impact and our current programs. Click here to view the report! https://lnkd.in/gri4jMSd","time":"8mo Edited","title":"Assisi Aid Projects"},{"likes_count":11,"text":"From this week onwards, our socials will be showcasing a weekly impact story from our ‘When Every Woman Thrives – India’ project in Tamil Nadu. Mrs Divya is one of the project participants hailing from Endathur, a village in Tamil Nadu. She has been able to harness the benefits of the interest-free loan to start her own business selling tea with the support of her husband. These loans enable women to expand beyond subsistent activities, to income generating businesses. Strengthening localisation efforts in the realms of local enterprise for women presents the opportunity for participants to become agents of economic and social change in their communities.","time":"8mo","title":"Assisi Aid Projects"},{"likes_count":9,"text":"To celebrate the International Day of Rural Women, we’re introducing you to Mrs Mahatara, a rural woman participating in our “Advancing Women in Agroforestry Business Enterprise in the Wake of Pandemic” (AWABE) programme, running in Jumla, Nepal. This is what she had to say about the effect of the program on her life: “I have spent a lot of time on vegetable farming. When I received training in vegetable and fruit cultivation through the project... I did commercial farming and earned good income. Earlier, it was not enough to bring food from farming, but after cultivating commercial vegetables farming, my life has suddenly changed, and I have been able to teach my children for higher education in the capital. Now my son has also got a government job.” #InternationalDayOfRuralWomen #AssisiAidProjects #UN #UNICEF #Feminism #GenderEquality⁠ #DayOfTheGirl #GirlsRights #GirlsEducation","time":"9mo","title":"Assisi Aid Projects"},{"likes_count":5,"text":"Mrs Sowpakiyam, an active member in the parents group in Alappakkam village, has worked hard to increase her family's income. She was able to purchase new equipment with the help of a loan and as a result is getting more consistent and higher paying work. With the help of our partner, Integrated Development Trust, Assisi Aid Projects seeks to empower women through its projects in Tamil Nadu. Click the link here to learn more about Mrs Sowpakiyam's story ➡️ https://lnkd.in/gKR_yAYs","time":"12mo","title":"Assisi Aid Projects"}]

name: JVS Boston
location: 75 Federal Street, 3rd Floor, Boston, MA 02110, US
about: Jewish Vocational Service (JVS) was founded in 1938 during the Great Depression to assist Jewish immigrants and refugees struggling to enter the American workforce and support their families. Today, JVS is among the oldest and largest providers of adult education and workforce development services in Greater Boston, serving a diverse clientele representing over 90 nations, and speaking 50 languages, and helping people secure financial independence through educational and employment services. With over 80 years of demonstrated excellence in workforce development, JVS has a reputation for continuous innovation, building person-centered and performance-based models to improve outcomes and increase programmatic effectiveness. Last year, JVS empower 16,000 individuals, including immigrants, refugees, people with disabilities, and older workers, to build their skills, advance their education, and build meaningful careers. JVS partners with over 1,300 area employers to help fill vacancies and provide the education their employees need to ascend their career ladders.
specialties: job search assistance, career advancement, education and skills training, workforce development, job coaching, financial education, tax preparation, immigrant and refugee services, ESOL, Vocational ESOL, adult education, vocational training, recruitement, job fairs, and resume writing

name: Luke Fry Architecture & Interior Design
location: 1.01, 49-51 Wellington Street, St Kilda Vic 3182, MELBOURNE | MANSFIELD , Victoria 3182, AU,19 Highett St, Mansfield, Victoria 3722, AU
about: Luke Fry Architecture and Interior Design creates design-led properties that are refined, sophisticated, purposeful and relevant. Integral to our company values is the use of long-lasting materials such as brick, stone, concrete and timber that stand the test of time. We know it can take a village to achieve the best possible results and are committed to using only the very best professionals in their fields. Steered by Architect & Interior Designer Luke Fry, the company has longstanding relationships with specialist consultants and local councils and is committed to a delivering a smooth residential design and build process. Harnessing good design is a collaborative process and we work closely with all clients from conception to completion. Luke Fry Architecture & Interior Design was founded 8 years ago with the goal to design projects that foster a healthy, highly functional environment which creates a tailored experience that is connected to lifestyle. Enriching interaction rather than segregation is integral to the design approach. Based in Melbourne and Mansfield, our projects reach beyond the city limits to coastal, country, and alpine areas. We weight architecture and interiors equally to create holistic outcomes. A full service firm, we recognise the realities of everyday living and formulate interior identities that are highly-personalised, beautiful and easy to live with. Our expert team of interior designers and architects work closely to ensure all soft furnishings and decorative elements are in sync with the function, durability and aesthetic of the built in components. We champion products and pieces with integrity, longevity and the utmost style. We offer all-inclusive packages for loose furniture, lighting and art. Our connections to local makers and time-honoured relationships with leading brands and suppliers are invaluable resources when curating the pieces necessary for a unique and successful outcome.
specialties: Architecture, Interior Design, Design, Property Development, Styling, Tender Negotiation, Town Planning, Concept Design, Design Development, Working Drawings, Construction, Concept Design Development, Furniture procurement, Furniture selection, Feasibility, Award winner, and Award shortlist

updates: [{"likes_count":3,"text":"Erst wenn man JOBDISPO für die #produktionsplanung einsetzt, sieht man den Vorteil gegenüber Excel oder einer physischen Plantafel. Das folgende Beispiel zeigt dies sehr schön.","time":"2mo","title":"Quinx AG"},{"likes_count":7,"text":"Die meisten #Lohnfertiger und #Serienfertiger stehen unter enormen Preisdruck. Das spürt auch die Fertigung. Häufig muss ein Maschinenbediener mehrere Maschinen gleichzeitig bedienen. Es gilt, die #Produktivität zu maximieren. Häufig leiden dabei die Effizienz und die Qualität. Denn nicht selten führt hoher Leistungsdruck zu Fehlern und Leerläufen. Insbesondere bei wiederkehrenden Teilen muss der Mitarbeiter nicht nur darauf achten, die Teile schnell und präzise zu fertigen. Er muss auch das NC-Programm für künftige Aufträge optimieren. Vergisst er dann dieses Programm zu speichern, sind all seine Verbesserungen verloren. Quinx verhindert dies mit der #DNC als integrativer Bestandteil des #Fertigungsprozesses: Mit dem Start des Arbeitsganges werden ausschließlich die für diesen Arbeitsgang benötigten, aktuellen NC-Programme zu Verfügung gestellt, beziehungsweise auf die Maschine übertragen. Sobald der Arbeitsgang beendet wird, speichert die #DNC die verwendeten NC-Programme automatisch auf dem Server. Der Maschinenbediener muss nicht daran denken, sie zu sichern. Zudem löscht die DNC sie auf der Maschine. Die DNC stellt sicher, dass beim nächsten Mal nur die aktuellen und die verbesserten Programme verwendet werden. Sie vermeidet so kostspielige Fehler, die in der Hektik passieren können.","time":"3mo","title":"Quinx AG"},{"likes_count":3,"text":"Quinx ist als Aussteller am #SMM Kongress Unter anderem zeigen wir die neuste Version der QMIP (Quinx Manufacturing Information Platform).","time":"5mo","title":"Quinx AG"},{"likes_count":2,"text":"Auch uns treffen Sie ab Dienstag an der INNOTEQ in Bern! Über einen Besuch in der Halle 2.2 am Stand D11 würden wir uns sehr freuen. Lassen Sie sich zeigen, wie Quinx Daten aus einer CNC-Maschine holt und was Sie in Ihrem Unternehmen damit machen können!","time":"5mo","title":"Quinx AG"},{"likes_count":7,"text":"Der Mazak-Treiber von Quinx liest Maschinendaten über die bestehende Ethernet-Schnittstelle von Mazakmaschinen auch ohne MTConnect aus. Da MTConnect bei Mazak-Maschinen oft kostenpflichtig nachgerüstet werden muss, bedeutet dies eine enorme Kosteneinsparung. Die Daten stehen anderen Applikationen über die QMIP (Quinx Manufacturing Information Platform) zur Verfügung. Wobei QMIP die Daten standardmässig auf einem lokalen Sever speichert.#mazak #mde #industrie40","time":"8mo","title":"Quinx AG"},{"likes_count":1,"text":"Machine data collection on Brother Speedio R650X2 Unfortunately, Brother does not offer a OPC UA option for its Speedio R650X2 with cnc control C00. Therefore, Quinx AG has developed a client that extracts data from the C00 via the existing Ethernet interface. These data are then available to other applications on the QMIP (Quinx Manufacturing Platform) via a standard interface such as REST API. Of course, the MDC4000 machine data acquisition solution from Quinx also uses these data. The data itself are usually stored on a local customer server. The data typically informs about: Operation status Controller mode Parts count Spindle speed Spindle override (%) Feed rate Feed rate override (%) Active tool number Program name #Brother #R650X2 #Speedio #C00 #mdc #cncmachining","time":"11mo","title":"Quinx AG"}]
slogan: Quinx offers a quick, smart, modular and open factory framework - from machine data collection to business analytics.

updates: [{"likes_count":23,"text":"During this season, we take time to reflect upon the good things we have… like our customers, employees and partners. It’s the most wonderful time of the year, and our thoughts turn thankfully to the clients who have made our year memorable. It is in the spirit of Christmas that we say thank you and best wishes for the holidays. Besides commitment and respect, we value our partnership very much. Wishing you a prosperous Christmas this year. Thank you for choosing Osirius Group and for making 2022 a successful year. We wish you a Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year. Also, sincere thanks to all of our team members and partners for your commitment. We wish you and your families a heartwarming relaxing fantastic Christmas holiday. We appreciate your service to this company and look forward to working with you in the new year. May your holiday be warm, peaceful, and safe.","time":"7mo","title":"OSIRIUS GROUP LLC"},{"comments_count":11,"likes_count":47,"text":"The car of her dreams Today we announced an entirely new venture for the Osirius Group: we are getting into the car business. In the 12 years since Jocelyn and myself founded the Osirius Group we have built a reputation for our outstanding engineering and problem-solving work within the automotive industry. Our role, in support of the OEMs and suppliers, is mostly in the background and covers everything from body-in-white programs through to entire manufacturing systems. We are proud of the work we do for our customers and constantly strive to find new ways to improve the process of bringing a car from sketch to production at benchmark cost and quality levels. Our global team of over 200 employees have deep subject-matter expertise adding up to over 6,000 years of cumulative experience working in the industry. We are also enthusiasts and got into the automotive business because we love cars and wanted to work in the world’s most dynamic industry. So, when we started to see the emergence of ‘restomods’ we were naturally curious how this trend would evolve. Based on the last couple of years alone, it looks like the restomod industry is flourishing with new entrants and products launching weekly. However, with any new market sector, there will be winners and losers. And while creativity and innovation abound, the challenge of making cars – at any scale – remains extremely challenging, especially as the restomod companies are mostly small start-ups. Fueled by our passion for all things automotive and relishing a challenge, we decided to see if we could apply Osirius expertise into the restomod market…. hence the launch today of The Ghost Garage. We have set out with a mission for The Ghost Garage to bring OEM-levels of quality, cost and delivery to a market that is more associated with a hobby shop approach to making cars. And why chose the SJ-Series Jeep Grand Waggoneer as our first project? From a practical standpoint, this particular model has the size and construction that will suit a conversion to full BEV. It also happens to be the vehicle that motivated Jocelyn into a career in the design industry, love of adventure and has always been her dream Jeep to own. As hard-nosed and competitive as the auto industry is, we should never forget about the passion for cars that drives customers and automakers alike. We look forward to sharing our journey with The Ghost Garage and creating the next generation of dream cars. https://lnkd.in/gxxmB8EB","time":"10mo","title":"OSIRIUS GROUP LLC"}]
slogan: Value that carries itself all the way to your bottom line

How can we better control lighting in controlled environment agriculture to benefit producers, utility companies, and society-at-large? Watch the video to find out. #agriculture #society #environment #lightingcontrol #controlledenvironmentagriculture #greenhouse #gridresilience #science https://lnkd.in/eG8g4gfB","time":"6mo","title":"Candidus"},{"comments_count":1,"likes_count":14,"text":"In October, the commercial electric rate increased between 41% to 51% across the Northeastern United States, forcing growers to make difficult decisions to protect their greenhouse. With #indooragriculture growing at a record pace, dynamic energy management will play a bigger role in enabling growers to run a more resilient operation. https://lnkd.in/ezkswGvA","time":"7mo Edited","title":"Candidus"},{"likes_count":9,"text":"Interesting development in horticultural lighting: the DLC recently announced new minimum standards for LED fixtures to be included on their 'qualified product list'. This list is used widely by utilities to determine whether new or replacement lighting installations are eligible for rebates/incentives under various energy efficiency programs. The DLC has increased the minimum required efficacy of LED fixtures by 21% and they will start a surveillance testing program to assure that light fixtures truly perform as well as claimed. The latter is important, because it has been too easy for manufacturers to build a few fixtures with the highest possible efficacy, while mass-produced fixtures may not be quite as good. But most exciting from Candidus' perspective is that controllability of the fixtures is now a requirement as well. Controllability allows for the use of more advanced lighting control systems. Such control system can reduce electricity usage by another 20 to 30%. Having very efficient lights doesn't do a whole lot of good if the lights are controlled poorly. Interested in learning more about greenhouse supplemental lighting control? Contact us at info@candidus.us. #greenhouse #ledlighting #lightingcontrol #energyefficiency #electricity #utilities #efficacy https://lnkd.in/emXuA2ub","time":"7mo","title":"Candidus"},{"comments_count":1,"likes_count":6,"text":"Join us tomorrow as our CEO, Mikhail Hutton, will participate in The Understory's December showcase of #startups driving #sustainability. name: Tom Tom Festival
location: 100 W South ST, #1D, Charlottesville, VA 22902, US
about: Tom Tom champions entrepreneurship, creativity, and civic innovation in America’s small cities. Now in its 10th year, the festival brings together leaders from industry, government, and the arts for a week of inspiration and transformative connections in Charlottesville, Virginia. Tom Tom pairs thought-leadership with live concerts, parties, public art, and artisanal food. It all adds up to an unrivaled celebration of big ideas at work in the hometowns driving our country’s future. Since its launch in 2012, Tom Tom has grown into a national destination for visionaries and engaged citizens alike. In addition to its spring flagship Festival, which examines civic innovation across America, Tom Tom hosts multiple year-round initiatives. The spring event has grown from 6,700 attendees in 2012, to more than 16,000 attendees annually. Since inception, Tom Tom has channeled over $3.3 million to new ventures and nonprofits.

slogan: 10th Annual | Music. Art. Ideas | April 20 - 24, 2022

name: Bridge Capital Sweden AB
location: VÄSTMANNAGATAN 28, Stockholm, Sweden 11325, SE
about: THE CHALLENGE Many companies today are struggling to change their business models from a traditional sales model to a subscription based model, where recurring revenue and customer retention are more important. Customers are looking to pay for the products and services they actually use, expect increasing flexibility and tend to focus more on the solution delivered, than ownership of the assets needed. The challenge for the suppliers is how to change their business model, without having a major impact on cash-flow, balance sheet and the P&L. BUSINESS CONCEPT ”WE ACHIEVE THIS BY ESTABLISHING AND OPERATING INTEGRATED FINANCIAL SERVICES SOLUTIONS, MAINLY THROUGH JOINT VENTURES AND CAPTIVE FINANCE MODELS.” THE SOLUTION CHANGE BUSINESS MODEL Bridge Capital offers a solution to the challenges described above, allowing companies to change their business models, supply the customers with what they are requesting and furthermore without any negative effects on cash-flow, the balance sheet or the P&L. STRATEGIC CHANGE Our business models are initially solely based on strategic cooperation’s such as joint ventures or other high-level integrated partnerships. We believe this is the only way to succeed in such a key strategic change of a company’s business model. INTERNATIONAL PARTNERSHIPS The business models we offer are fully scalable in size, as well across most geographical markets. Our home market is Northern Europe, however through international partnerships we are able to roll-out our concepts across most of the Western hemisphere.
specialties: Not available
