about: Ready to be booked and balanced, not perpetually "booked and busy?” If you’re feeling marketing overwhelm and burnout from all that content creation (with little results to show for it), you’re not alone. You and your creative team are spread too thin to scale. The copywriters, ads and social media freelancers you’ve hired helped some, but you’re still not seeing much ROI. Lack of strategy and low conversions are slowing you down from achieving the impact and freedom you desire. You’re looking to master your message online and attract your perfect-fit clients. I’m here to help you market with strategy, systems, and soul, so you can SELL your high-earning offers to your dream customers. Here’s how we can help: ✅ Individual Coaching: Ready to sell your coaching program, high ticket service, or consulting offers more consistently, so you can expand your business and live more freely? You’ve gotten most of your clients through word of mouth, but now it’s time to level up with real systems and strategy. Our approach to 'systemizing your sales' uses our proprietary LOML Method™ — Leverage, Offer, Magnetize, Launch — that empowers women business owners to master their message, turn their stories into sales, and *predictably* grow their revenue with launches that land. I'll help you design a strategy you actually stick to over three 60-minute coaching sessions, along with a custom audit, templates and worksheets that provide a shortcut to selling online. ✅ Webinars & Workshops (Corporate): Want to equip your marketing team with the skills they need to combat rising customer acquisition costs? Knowing how to stand apart, connect and convert eyes into buys is growing more nuanced in today's competitive online landscape. Our trainings will give your marketing employees the tools to grow your inbound sales with personalized, psychology-driven marketing that lasts beyond the latest social media trend. Let's chat: https://kristen-noelle.as.me/discovery
specialties: Marketing Consulting, Content Strategy, Sales Funnels, Marketing Coaching, Content Creation, Marketing Training, Marketing Workshops, Copywriting, Conversions, Email Marketing, Sales Pages, and Paid Ads

about: Agenzia Futura è stata creata nel 1988 da Battista Recanati, svolgendo fin dall’inizio attività di intermediazione di prodotti e servizi nel settore assicurativo e finanziario. L’attuale dimensione di Agenzia Futura – 3 sedi, 20 collaboratori – è il frutto di un lavoro sempre corretto ed improntato alla soddisfazione del cliente, nonché di una costante formazione interna che ha portato allo sviluppo di competenze di alto profilo. Agenzia Futura ha superato nel 2016 la soglia dei 6.000 Clienti, con premi lordi nel ramo danni pari ad euro 7.287.000 e un gestito nel ramo vita di euro 16.749.000. Per darti le migliori garanzie, abbiamo scelto una Compagnia assicurativa solida ed affidabile come UnipolSai, secondo gruppo assicurativo nel mercato italiano e primo nel ramo Danni, che assicura 16 milioni di Clienti. Dal 2002 l’amministratore è Andrea Recanati, in azienda da 25 anni, vanta esperienze come Agente Generale e Promotore Finanziario.

about:
Venture 1 Consulting is a Microsoft Gold Partner whose sole aim is to deliver value to our global customer base in the form of cost-effective, innovative infrastructure technology solutions. We help businesses to scale quickly, improve agility, get more mobile and reduce the cost of IT ownership through the effective implementation of both cloud and on premise technologies. 

Our team of consultants, architects and technicians provide unrivalled experience in the strategy, design, implementation and support of solutions for our global customer base.

Our ever growing, loyal customer base sees us not just as competent technical experts but as strategic partners, helping them to realise their IT strategies and business visions. We act as trusted partners, enabling them to achieve more out of their existing IT as well as leveraging new technologies for innovative advantage over their competitors.  We pride ourselves on our high levels of customer loyalty.

We focus on the following core competencies:

•	End-User Computing (Office 365, Windows 10, VDI & DaaS, Enterprise Mobility)
•	Cloud Migration (Azure, AWS)
•	Infrastructure Transformation
•	Core Infrastructure and Networking
•	Security, Identity and Access
•	Business Continuity
•	Messaging and Collaboration

What is the DIGITAL DIVIDE? The digital divide is the unequal access to digital technology, including smartphones, tablets, laptops, and the internet. The digital divide creates a division and inequality around access to information and resources. In the Information Age in which information and communication technologies (ICTs) have eclipsed manufacturing technologies as the basis for world economies and social connectivity, people without access to the Internet and other ICTs are at a socio-economic disadvantage, for they are unable or less able to find and apply for jobs, shop and sell online, participate democratically, or research and learn. #sustainability #digitaldivide","time":"3mo","title":"Venture 1 Consulting Ltd."},{"likes_count":1,"text":"#consultancy #techhology #security #digitaltransformation","time":"3mo","title":"Venture 1 Consulting Ltd."},{"likes_count":2,"text":"Continuing with our 'Spotlight On' stories about a member of our team, this month it's the turn of Siva Sivasandrarajah. #dreamteam #msexpert #consultants","time":"3mo","title":"Venture 1 Consulting Ltd."}]

name: Enterprising IT Services Pty Ltd
location: Level 8, 65 York Street, SYDNEY, NSW 2000, AU
about: Enterprising IT Services was established in 2002 to help our clients achieve their objectives. Established by a group of IT Professionals who have worked together for many decades we have built upon our experience and continue to provide IT Services to Government Agencies. Our people created the opportunity to work together with others whose skills, experience and talents are known, respected and trusted, to deliver specialist ICT management and consulting services to predominantly NSW Government organisations and business clients. Our major strength is our ability to translate technical problems or issues into clear management issues. Senior Management may be frustrated by technologists who seem to fail to understand the business context in which they operate. IT Managers may be frustrated in their endeavours to resolve technical problems that require the support and commitment of Senior Management. Our people understand the whole situation. Enterprising IT Services assists clients to link strategy, people, processes, work practices and technology and quickly respond with clear and practical business advice to each client’s unique business issues. Within NSW, Enterprising IT Services assists Government Agencies through the required Central Agency processes to establish the strategy, goverance, management and resources required to undertake Information Management & Technology programs/projects. In addition, we have specialist expertise in general procurement.

name: De rode maan

about: Hier Olga. Ik hou van mogelijkheden zien en van nieuwe verbindingen leggen. Ben jij ergens vastgelopen en zoek je iemand met een andere kijk op dingen, neem dan contact met me op. Stress zorgt ervoor dat je je mogelijkheden vaak niet meer ziet. Drukke tijden, veel verantwoordelijkheden zorgen voor ruis op de lijn. Ruis zorgt ervoor dat je lijf niet meer verstaat wat je hoofd eigenlijk wilt zeggen, zodat je hoofd niet meer begrijpt wat je lijf eigenlijk bedoeld. Herkenbaar? Laten we samen de boel dan weer ontwarren. Kinesiologie is een energetische geneeswijze die met behulp van de spiertest achterhaalt waar in jouw lichaam blokkades op te heffen zijn als gevolg van stress met als doel je weer lekker in je vel te laten voelen.

updates: [{"likes_count":3,"time":"2w"},{"likes_count":3,"text":"Limpeza e Recuperação de Trocadores de Calor (Casco e tubo): O trocador de calor casco e tubo é uma peça essencial nos sistemas HVAC e processos industriais. Composto por tubos internos dentro de um invólucro (casco), permite a eficiente transferência de calor entre dois fluidos diferentes. Sua aplicação abrange desde o controle térmico do ar em ambientes no sistema HVAC até diversas operações industriais que exigem troca de calor. A popularidade desse tipo de trocador decorre de sua robustez, eficiência e versatilidade. A limpeza é essencial para o bom funcionamento e eficiência dos equipamentos. Métodos de Limpeza: • Limpeza química com produtos 100% orgânicos. • Limpeza mecânica com escova rotativa. • Sistemas automáticos de limpeza com retro lavagem. Recuperação dos Trocadores: • Reparos e substituições para evitar falhas e prolongar a vida útil. • Utilização de resinas de revestimento para recuperação do espelho. • Possibilidade de retubagem parcial ou total. Manutenção Regular: • Crucial para redução de custos operacionais. • Garante o desempenho eficiente dos equipamentos. Unidades Remotas para Limpeza: • Sistemas especializados com sondas controladas à distância • Inspeção por câmeras de monitoramento • Injeção de produtos químicos ou jatos de água de alta pressão - CIP • Eficiência na limpeza de áreas de difícil acesso. • Redução do tempo de parada e aumento da segurança dos operadores. Com o uso de sensores e tecnologias avançadas, é possível monitorar parâmetros como temperatura, pressão e vibração, identificando possíveis falhas antes que se tornem problemas maiores. Isso permite agir de forma proativa e evitar paradas inesperadas que podem afetar a produtividade e causar desconforto aos ocupantes. 💪📊 🔧 Já a manutenção preventiva consiste na realização periódica de inspeções, limpezas e ajustes no sistema HVAC. Essa abordagem busca evitar o desgaste excessivo e a deterioração dos componentes, prolongando a vida útil do equipamento. Além disso, a manutenção preventiva reduz o consumo de energia, pois um sistema limpo e bem regulado tende a operar de forma mais eficiente. 💡🔍 ⚙️ Por fim, temos a manutenção corretiva, que ocorre quando uma falha já ocorreu no sistema HVAC. Nesse caso, é necessário realizar reparos ou substituir componentes danificados para restabelecer o funcionamento adequado. No entanto, é importante ressaltar que a manutenção corretiva pode ser mais custosa, tanto em termos financeiros quanto em termos de tempo de inatividade do sistema. Por isso, é essencial investir em manutenções preditivas e preventivas para minimizar a ocorrência de falhas. 💸⏰ Lembre-se: a manutenção adequada do sistema HVAC não só garante um ambiente confortável, mas também traz benefícios financeiros significativos a longo prazo. Menos problemas técnicos, maior eficiência energética e maior vida útil dos equipamentos são apenas alguns dos retornos positivos. 💼💰 A Cold Service é uma empresa especializada na prestação desses serviços de manutenção preditiva, preventiva e corretiva no sistema de HVAC. name: moveretail
location: Finowstraße, Berlin, BE, DE
about: moveretail bietet dem Autohandel eine effiziente Bearbeitung von Kundenanfragen zum monatlichen Budget (Verfügungsrahmen), um hochqualitative Fahrzeugangebote aus dem gesamten verfügbaren Warenbestand erstellen zu können. DER FOKUS -> ermögliche dem Autohandel eine automatisierte Echtzeit-Berechnung von Angeboten bezüglich der reinen Fahrzeugrate – unter Einbezug aller im Fahrzeugbestand verfügbaren Fahrzeuge, sowie allen kommunizierten Kundenwünschen. Somit ist #moveretail ein effizientes Werkzeug für den Autohandel, um digitale oder auch analoge budgetbasierte Anfragen, unabhängig von der bisherigen fahrzeugtyp-bezogenen Einzelkalkulation, durchzuführen. Unsere Kunden sind Autohändler und Autohandelsgruppen mit Absatz von Fahrzeugen, Transportern oder Wohnmobilen, die nach neuen Absatzkanälen suchen, diese aber auch selbst aktiv einsetzen, steuern und kontrollieren können. Durch Automation der Abläufe und Einbindung in bestehende Systeme, wird eine klare Entlastung der Vertriebsmitarbeiter entstehen. Die Welt von #moveretail wurde für Sie gebaut, denn wir wollen Ihre Arbeit ein Stück einfacher machen.

name: Soultrackers Paranormal Investigations
location: ["Romney, WV 26757, US",null]
about: Soul-Trackers Paranormal Investigations (STPI) was founded in September of 2001 by a team of veteran paranormal investigators in Pitman, New Jersey. STPI founder Jonathan Williams was an experienced veteran of paranormal investigation before the organization was founded. He along with several of the core team investigated along with Paranormal Spiritual Investigations (PSI), South Jersey Ghost Research (SJGR), New Jersey Paranormal Research (NJPR), and now Soul-Trackers (STPI). In the 25 years of study, Soul-Trackers core team has conducted hundreds and almost thousands of investigations all over the World. Investigations include: - East State Penitentiary, Philadelphia, PA - Phila. Historical Society, Philadelphia, PA - The Alamo, San Antonio, TX - Mt. Osore, Osorezan, Japan - Fort Mott State Park , Pennsville, NJ - Burlington County Jail , Mount Holly, NJ - Gettysburg National Park, Gettysburg, PA - Private Hangar, Private Military Base -Over 400 Private Residences and Businesses Throughout NJ, PA, DE, WI, IA -Over 500 Private and Public Cemeteries Throughout NJ, PA, DE, NY, SC, MI
specialties: Investigator, Head Investigator, and Director
slogan: Our mission is to provide compassionate and respectful assistance to those who have experienced hauntings.

name: Cosmo Music

about:
ABOUT COSMO MUSIC:
Cosmo Music is one of the biggest and best musical instrument retail stores globally, providing sales, service, rentals, and lessons for all types of musical instruments in a one-of-a-kind, world class facility.

Learn more: https://cosmomusic.ca/pages/our-story.

We're not just a music store. In fact, we're much more than that. If you're looking to buy an instrument, rent some gear, improve your playing, get your instrument or gear back into top-working condition, help make your event a success, set-up the A/V for your organization, or even just a cool place to hang out and enjoy a coffee, we've got you covered.

A long history.
Established in 1968, over 50 years in the music business

You're with family.
Founded by Tom Hebert, family owned and operated

The single largest musical instrument store in North America.
60,150 sq ft store opened in May 2008

We know our stuff.
Over 200 employees including 23 repair technicians and 80+ highly qualified teachers

Unforgettable performances.
Home of the Cosmopolitan Music Hall venue

name: Sinergize
location: Curitiba, PR, BR
about: Atuamos na capacitação, fortalecimento e engajamento do TERCEIRO SETOR , através da COMUNICAÇÃO, AUDIOVISUAL e VIVÊNCIAS GAMIFICADAS.
specialties: TERCEIRO SETOR, VIVÊNCIAS, IMERSÃO, AUDIOVISUAL, REDES SOCIAIS, GAMIFICAÇÃO, VOLUNTARIADO, and VOLUNTARIADOCORPORATIVO
updates: [{"likes_count":5,"text":"A música é uma linguagem universal: Independentemente de origem, gênero ou situação social, ela tem o poder de unir, inspirar e criar conexões profundas entre as pessoas. Em projetos sociais, a música serve como uma ferramenta poderosa para promover a inclusão e a diversidade, permitindo que jovens de diferentes origens compartilhem suas histórias e expressões de uma maneira única. Tivemos a oportunidade de realizar a cobertura audiovisual para o Instituto Playing for Change aqui em Curitiba , no evento que comemorava o Dia Mundial do Rock no Hard Rock café. O simbolismo da oportunidade de acesso de aqueles jovens estarem ali, subir no palco e tocarem a música que eles escolheram foram os pontos principais nesse evento Ver todos aqueles olhinhos brilhando de alegria so por estarem ali fazem todo o processo valer a pena, e foi o que tentamos registrar em algumas fotos Juntos, podemos construir uma sinfonia de mudança que ressoará por toda a sociedade. 🤝🎼 #Música #TransformaçãoSocial #Juventude #Inclusão #ProjetosSociais #Inspiração","time":"4d","title":"Sinergize"},{"likes_count":5,"text":"🌟 Valorize seu crescimento profissional: invista em sua capacitação contínua! 📚 💪🏼 Em um mundo em constante evolução, onde as demandas e as tecnologias mudam rapidamente, é essencial que estejamos sempre preparados para enfrentar os desafios que surgem em nossa carreira. A aceleração que estamos participando no Instituto Legado de Empreendedorismo Social têm sido maravilhosa em vários aspectos. Além de todo o conhecimento compartilhado, a rede de apoio, atenção e as metodologias têm sido singulares para a fixação de todo o conteúdo. Investir em seu desenvolvimento contínuo é como plantar sementes que crescerão e fortalecerão suas habilidades e competências. Além disso, a capacitação constante traz consigo uma série de benefícios que vão além do âmbito profissional. Bora que têm muita estrada ainda pela frente! ✌🏼 #DesenvolvimentoPessoal #CapacitaçãoContínua #Aprendizado #CrescimentoProfissional #Adaptação #Sucesso","time":"1w","title":"Sinergize"},{"likes_count":7,"text":"🎭 A Importância do Teatro na Formação do Indivíduo e no Mercado de Trabalho🎭 Desenvolvimento pessoal é um processo contínuo principalmente para quem atua no Terceiro Setor. A Lays Emanuella Gasperin, cofundadora da Sinergize, teve a oportunidade de continuar seu sonho participando de uma oficina de 24h no Projeto Palco Escola, em Curitiba Paraná. Tanto se fala sobre o desenvolvimento das \"Soft skills\" e nada melhor do que o teatro para realizar esse movimento. Comunicação, criatividade, liderança, trabalho em equipe e principalmente o que buscamos desenvolver em nossas ações, a EMPATIA. Gratidão Projeto Palco Escola pela oportunidade, agora temos uma atriz na nossa equipe! 😂 #teatro #terceirosetor #osc #ong #voluntariado #voluntario #softskills","time":"2w","title":"Sinergize"},{"likes_count":21,"text":"Que momento lindo 💙🧩 Hoje tivemos a honra de facilitar uma vivência com os instrutores/colaboradores da Elo Apoio Social e Ambiental Foi um momento de muita troca, conexão e descontração. Uai pode isso? É claro! 😉 Acreditamos que uma facilitação desenvolvida de maneira ativa e divertida é muito mais efetivada, afirmando os propósitos antes, durante e depois do evento. Gratidão pela entrega de todos vocês. Novidades em breve! #ong #osc #terceirosetor #voluntario #voluntariado #vivencias #gamificação #irmesão","time":"3w","title":"Sinergize"},{"likes_count":4,"text":"A fotografia tem o poder de capturar momentos, contar histórias e despertar emoções. É uma linguagem universal que transcende barreiras e nos permite enxergar além do que está diante de nós. Quando aplicada ao contexto do tênis, a fotografia se torna uma ferramenta valiosa para promover a inclusão e quebrar estereótipos. O tênis é um esporte apaixonante e inspirador, que promove valores como resiliência, trabalho em equipe e superação pessoal. Infelizmente, nem sempre a inclusão é uma realidade plena nesse ambiente. É por isso que a fotografia desempenha um papel fundamental: ela nos permite destacar a diversidade e promover a igualdade dentro das quadras. Ao capturar imagens que retratam jogadores de diferentes origens, gêneros, idades e habilidades, estamos enviando uma mensagem poderosa de que o tênis é um esporte para todos. Ao compartilhar essas fotografias em plataformas como o LinkedIn, estamos promovendo a conscientização e encorajando outros a se engajarem na construção de um ambiente inclusivo. #fotografia #esg #voluntariado #voluntariadocorporativo","time":"1mo","title":"Sinergize"},{"likes_count":2,"text":"🎬🌍 A importância do audiovisual na aplicação de programas sociais 🌍🎬 Em um mundo cada vez mais visual e conectado, o uso dessa forma de comunicação tem se revelado uma ferramenta valiosa para criar impacto e promover transformações positivas em nossas comunidades. 💡 O audiovisual, por meio de vídeos, documentários, campanhas e outros formatos, tem o poder de emocionar, inspirar e engajar pessoas em torno de causas sociais. Ao contar histórias reais, capturando imagens marcantes e transmitindo mensagens poderosas, ele nos permite enxergar de perto as necessidades e desafios enfrentados por diferentes grupos e indivíduos. Em parceria com a @japaraná , realizamos o registro do programa Tech.JA . Clique para conferir um pouco mais do que foi esse momento! 💛 #audiovisual #programassociais #transformaçãosocial #impactopositivo #inclusão #igualdade","time":"1mo","title":"Sinergize"},{"likes_count":9,"text":"Hoje foi dia de reunião da Rede do Terceiro Setor na @fiepr . 💛 A pauta de hoje foi estratégica para a compreensão do perfil da rede, conhecer algumas iniciativas e oportunidades para o Terceiro Setor. E para rechear todo esse momento, tivemos uma apresentação sobre as ODS e a agenda 2030 e como todos esses conceitos estão integrados com as ações e objetivos de todos ali presentes. \" Nenhum sucesso é alcançado isoladamente. A atuação em rede é a chave para o crescimento e prosperidade\" #osc #ong #terceirosetor #filantropia #voluntario #voluntariado","time":"1mo","title":"Sinergize"},{"likes_count":4,"text":"🌍 A importância da inclusão no esporte 🏆 Quando falamos de inclusão no esporte, estamos falando sobre dar a todos, independentemente de sua origem, gênero, habilidades físicas ou deficiências, a chance de participar e desfrutar dos benefícios que a prática esportiva oferece. O esporte tem o poder de transcender diferenças, capacitando indivíduos e comunidades, e promovendo a diversidade como uma força coletiva. Tivemos a oportunidade de cobrir o evento realizado pela Universidade Livre do Esporte - Circuito Inclusivo de Tênis, e que momento incrível de se presenciar. Temos a responsabilidade de criar um ambiente inclusivo no esporte, tanto nos níveis amadores quanto nos profissionais. Isso significa fornecer acesso igualitário a instalações esportivas, oferecer treinamento adequado para profissionais envolvidos, adaptar e ajustar as regras do jogo quando necessário e promover a conscientização sobre a importância da inclusão. #esporte #tenis #fotografia #esg #voluntariado #voluntariadocorporativo","time":"1mo","title":"Sinergize"},{"likes_count":4,"text":"A saúde mental é um tema cada vez mais importante e presente na sociedade. Diversos estudos já comprovaram a eficácia da arte no tratamento de doenças relacionadas à saúde mental. A arte é uma forma de expressão que permite que as pessoas se conectem com suas emoções e sentimentos de uma maneira única e pessoal. Quando utilizada no tratamento da saúde mental, pode ajudar a liberar emoções reprimidas, diminuir a ansiedade e a depressão, além de promover uma sensação de bem-estar geral. Nesse novo quadro que estamos gravando, \" Voluntários por um dia \", buscamos retratar esses sentimentos, as histórias que não são contadas, o que acontece na prática de uma organização! Bora acompanhar conosco? 💛 Projeto Inclusive nas Artes #gamificacao #vivencia #esg #voluntariado #voluntariadocorporativo","time":"1mo","title":"Sinergize"},{"likes_count":5,"text":"Os adolescentes estão passando por um momento de intensas mudanças em suas vidas, e muitas vezes podem se sentir inseguros ou confusos em relação aos seus sentimentos. Por isso, é fundamental que eles tenham um ambiente seguro e acolhedor onde possam falar sobre o que estão passando, sem medo de serem julgados ou rejeitados. Uma linguagem simples, direta e verdadeira envolvidos em um processo divertido torna a troca de conhecimento e histórias muito mais fluida. Por isso cada momento que desenvolvemos com/para os adolescentes é muito especial, aprendemos muito e saímos todas as vezes transformados <3 Projeto Criar1 #gamificacao #vivencia #esg #voluntariado #voluntariadocorporativo","time":"2mo","title":"Sinergize"}]
slogan: Conectamos e empoderamos pessoas, iniciativas e empresas para impactar positivamente a sociedade

name: August Rose Health Center
location: 7477 Baltimore Annapolis Blvd, Glen Burnie, Maryland 21061, us
about:
Established in 2018, August Rose Health Center (ARHC) is a private, for-profit mental health and wellness organization. We are licensed in the State of Maryland and accredited by CARF (Commission on Accreditation of Rehabilitation Facilities). We provide mental health services, including Psychiatric Rehabilitation, to children over the age of 5, adolescents, and adults. Our services promote emotional well-being, recovery, and community inclusion.

We are committed to improving access to high-quality behavioral health services for all people in Maryland through the use of evidence-based practices and culturally responsive service delivery. We believe that all people should have access to quality behavioral healthcare. We are an organization that is founded on the values of empathy, compassion, cultural humility, respectfulness, and dignity in all interactions with the persons we serve, their families, our staff members, community partners, healthcare professionals, and other stakeholders at every level of our organization.
specialties: psychiatric rehabilitation, mental health, and counseling services
updates: [{"likes_count":1,"text":"Join us at the August Rose Health Center's Mental Health and Wellness Community Event! Discover a world of free resources and gain invaluable education on the 8 dimensions of wellness. Don't miss this opportunity to enhance your mental well-being and connect with your community. Come and be a part of our transformative event, where we'll empower you to cultivate a balanced and fulfilling life. Mark your calendars now for 8/20/2023, a day of inspiration, growth, and support. Admission is free, so bring your friends and family along for an unforgettable experience. Together, let's embrace wellness and embark on a journey toward a healthier mind, body, and soul. Hope to See you there!! #mentalhealth #community #wellness #anniversarycelebration","time":"1mo","title":"August Rose Health Center"},{"comments_count":1,"text":"Breaking the stigma, one conversation at a time! Proud to be one of the sponsors of the 2023 GOAT Youth Mental Health Expo! #mentalhealth #mentalhealthmatters #mentalhealthawarenessmonth2023","time":"2mo 2mo","title":"August Rose Health Center"},{"time":"3mo"},{"likes_count":1,"text":"🔹The Power of Connection: How Spending Time with Loved Ones Benefits Mental Health. 🔹Spending time with loved ones can be a powerful form of self-care for mental health. Social support is essential for our well-being, and spending quality time with family and friends can help reduce feelings of isolation and loneliness. 🔹When we connect with others, our brains release oxytocin, which is sometimes referred to as the \"love hormone.\" This hormone is associated with positive social interactions and can promote feelings of trust, bonding, and well-being. 🔹Spending time with loved ones can take many forms, such as having a coffee date, going for a walk, watching a movie, or playing a board game together. It's about finding activities that allow you to connect and enjoy each other's company. 🔹In addition to providing social support, spending time with loved ones can also help us gain perspective on our problems and find new solutions to challenges. Friends and family members can provide a different viewpoint and offer valuable advice and support. 🔹So if you're feeling stressed or overwhelmed, consider reaching out to a loved one and making plans to spend time together. It can be a simple but effective way to boost your mood and promote overall mental health. . . . . #PhysicalHealth #StressReduction #CommunityConnection #PurposeInLife #MeaningfulRelationships #StrongSupportSystem #SocialActivities #SelfCare #HealthyHabits #LifeSatisfaction #PersonalGrowth #CommunicationSkills #ActiveListening #PositiveThinking #Happiness #WellnessJourney #HealthyLifestyle","time":"3mo","title":"August Rose Health Center"},{"likes_count":3,"text":"🔹The Power of Connection: How Spending Time with Loved Ones Benefits Mental Health. 🔹Spending time with loved ones can be a powerful form of self-care for mental health. Social support is essential for our well-being, and spending quality time with family and friends can help reduce feelings of isolation and loneliness. 🔹When we connect with others, our brains release oxytocin, which is sometimes referred to as the \"love hormone.\" This hormone is associated with positive social interactions and can promote feelings of trust, bonding, and well-being. 🔹Spending time with loved ones can take many forms, such as having a coffee date, going for a walk, watching a movie, or playing a board game together. It's about finding activities that allow you to connect and enjoy each other's company. 🔹In addition to providing social support, spending time with loved ones can also help us gain perspective on our problems and find new solutions to challenges. Friends and family members can provide a different viewpoint and offer valuable advice and support. 🔹So if you're feeling stressed or overwhelmed, consider reaching out to a loved one and making plans to spend time together. It can be a simple but effective way to boost your mood and promote overall mental health. . . . . #PhysicalHealth #StressReduction #CommunityConnection #PurposeInLife #MeaningfulRelationships #StrongSupportSystem #SocialActivities #SelfCare #HealthyHabits #LifeSatisfaction #PersonalGrowth #CommunicationSkills #ActiveListening #PositiveThinking #Happiness #WellnessJourney #HealthyLifestyle","time":"3mo","title":"August Rose Health Center"},{"likes_count":1,"text":"🔹Mental health therapy can be highly beneficial for children who may be experiencing emotional or behavioral challenges. Here are some of the key benefits: ✔️Improved emotional well-being: Mental health therapy can help children to understand and manage their emotions better, which can lead to a more positive outlook on life. They can learn how to cope with difficult feelings, reduce anxiety, and develop healthier ways of expressing themselves. ✔️Better behavior: Therapy can help children to understand the impact of their behavior on others and develop positive coping strategies. This can help to improve relationships with family, peers, and teachers and decrease the likelihood of disruptive or harmful behavior. ✔️Increased self-awareness: Therapy can help children to become more self-aware, which can lead to better decision-making and problem-solving skills. Children can learn to identify their strengths and weaknesses and develop a more positive self-image. Improved academic performance: Children who receive mental health therapy may experience improved academic performance as a result of increased emotional regulation and better behavior. They may also be better equipped to deal with stress and anxiety related to schoolwork. ✔️Enhanced social skills: Mental health therapy can help children to develop better social skills, such as communication, empathy, and conflict resolution. This can improve their relationships with peers and family members and lead to a more positive social environment. . . #mentalhealthformen #mentalhealth #depressionandanxiety #depressionsupport #mentalhealthawareness #mentalhealthquotes #mentalhealthrecovery #mentalhealthsupport #mentalhealthadvocate #mentalhealthblogger #selflove #selflovequotes #selfcare #selfreminder #behappy #motivationalquotes #anxietyrelief #anxietyfighter #anxietyhelp","time":"3mo","title":"August Rose Health Center"},{"likes_count":1,"text":"🔹Linking Nutrition and Mental Health: The Impact of Processed Foods, Refined Carbohydrates, and Added Sugars. 🔹Research has shown that diets high in processed foods, refined carbohydrates, and added sugars can have negative effects on mental health. A study published in the journal Public Health Nutrition found that people who ate a diet high in processed foods, refined carbohydrates, and sugar had a higher risk of depression and anxiety than those who ate a healthier diet. 🔹One reason for this link may be that these types of foods can cause spikes in blood sugar, which can lead to fluctuations in mood and energy levels. These foods may also contribute to inflammation in the body, which has been linked to an increased risk of depression and other mental health disorders. 🔹In addition, diets high in processed foods, refined carbohydrates, and added sugars may be low in essential nutrients, such as omega-3 fatty acids, B vitamins, and magnesium, which are important for mental health. For example, studies have shown that low levels of omega-3 fatty acids are associated with an increased risk of depression and other mental health disorders. 🔹On the other hand, diets that are high in fruits, vegetables, whole grains, lean proteins, and healthy fats provide essential nutrients that are important for mental health. These foods can help stabilize blood sugar, reduce inflammation, and provide the nutrients needed for optimal brain function. 🔹While it can be difficult to completely avoid processed foods, refined carbohydrates, and added sugars, it is important to be mindful of their impact on mental health and to strive for a balanced diet that includes a variety of nutrient-rich foods. . . . . #AugustRoseHealthCenter #mentalhealth #mentalhealthawareness #selfcare #Marylandmentalhealth #selflove #PsychiatricRehabilitation #emotionalwellbeing #mentalillness #psychology #wellbeing #mentalhealthmatters #mentalhealthsupport #mentalhealthwarrior #mentalhealthtips #mentalhealthjourney #Marylandmentalhealthprovider #Marylandmentalhealthservices #Marylandcenter","time":"3mo","title":"August Rose Health Center"},{"likes_count":1,"time":"3mo","title":"August Rose Health Center"},{"text":"🔹Anxiety is a normal human emotion that helps us respond to stress or danger. 🔹Excessive or chronic anxiety, however, can interfere with daily life and may indicate an anxiety disorder. Common types include generalized anxiety disorder, social anxiety disorder, panic disorder, and phobias. 🔹Symptoms may include excessive worry, restlessness, irritability, difficulty concentrating, muscle tension, and sleep disturbances. Treatment options include therapy, medication, and lifestyle changes. Self-care strategies like relaxation techniques, exercise, and stress management can also help manage anxiety. Remember, anxiety disorders are treatable, and seeking professional help is important for managing symptoms. . . . . #mentalillness #healing #mentalhealth #recovery #AugustRoseHealthCenter #mentalhealth #mentalhealthmatters #suicideprevention #healingfromtrauma #depression #selfcare #toxicparents #trauma #psychology #recoveryispossible #childhoodtrauma #therapist #therapy #suicidesupport #healingjourney #toxicrelationships #selflove","time":"3mo","title":"August Rose Health Center"},{"text":"🔹Mindful meditation is a form of meditation that involves paying non-judgmental attention to the present moment. It can be a powerful tool for promoting mental health and well-being. Here are some tips on incorporating mindful meditation into your self-care routine: ✔️Find a quiet space: Choose a calm and quiet space where you can sit comfortably or lie down without distractions. ✔️Focus on your breath: Close your eyes and bring your attention to your breath. Notice the sensation of the breath as it enters and leaves your body. You can place your hand on your chest or belly to feel the rise and fall with each breath. ✔️Stay present: As you focus on your breath, let go of any thoughts or worries that arise. Simply acknowledge them without judgment and bring your attention back to your breath. ✔️Engage your senses: Notice the sounds, smells, tastes, and sensations around you without judgment. Engage your senses fully in the present moment. Cultivate kindness: Practice self-compassion and kindness towards yourself and others. ✔️Offer yourself kind and loving thoughts during the meditation. ✔️Start small: If you're new to meditation, start with just a few minutes of mindful meditation each day and gradually increase the duration over time. ✔️Make it a habit: Consistency is key. Try to incorporate mindful meditation into your daily routine, whether it's in the morning, during a break, or before bedtime. ✔️Seek guidance: If you're new to mindful meditation, you can use guided meditation apps or online resources to help you get started. There are many apps and websites that offer guided meditation sessions specifically designed for mental health and well-being. . . . . #mentalhealth #mentalhealthawareness #selfcare #selflove #anxiety #love #mentalhealthmatters #depression #motivation #health #wellness #mindfulness #healing #fitness #life #loveyourself #therapy #inspiration #happiness #mindset #positivity #positivevibes #quotes #meditation #mentalillness #psychology #wellbeing #recovery #instagood #happy","time":"3mo","title":"August Rose Health Center"}]

updates: [{"text":"No último dia 06 de junho saiu o índice fipe zap + do mês de maio e Itapema/SC segue se destacando entre as cidades com maior valorização imobiliária do Brasil. Nós fizemos uma breve análise das valorizações dos últimos quatro anos comparando as cidades do litoral norte de Santa Catarina e a cidade do Rio de Janeiro e olhem o comportamento: Balneário Camboriú se destaca com maior valor do m² do país, porém é Itapema que lidera o ranking quando falamos de ganho de capital e valorização. Enquanto a valorização em Itapema ultrapassou os 90% nos últimos quatro anos, Balneário Camboriú valorizou 71,53%, Itajaí 66,36% e o Rio não passou de 5%, isso indica um comportamento expressivo do mercado imobiliário no litoral norte de Santa Catarina, em especial em Itapema, e o quanto os investimentos na transformação arquitetônica da cidade tem surtido efeito. A média de valorização imobiliária de 22,58%/ano em Itapema se deve a muitos motivos: - Itapema tem uma localização privilegiada, está ao lado de cidades com inúmeras atrações turísticas, está entre os dois maiores aeroportos de SC (Navegantes e Florianópolis) e tem fácil acesso a BR-101, que liga SC ao PR e ao RS. - Transformação arquitetônica, com a verticalização, o investimento em imóveis de luxo e o investimento público/privado na infraestrutura dos bairros mais afastados da costa. - Distribuição de água potável e tratamento eficiente de esgoto que atingiu o índice de 90%, enquanto a média brasileira é de 53%, o que contribui para maior a balneabilidade das praias. - A gestão municipal também vem se destacando nos últimos anos com grandes avanços na educação, saúde, planejamento, meio ambiente e segurança. Itapema está entre as cidades mais seguras do país. Fato é que a transformação da cidade tem contribuído para todo esse avanço e cada vez mais investimentos estão sendo realizados para que esses índices continuem crescendo, para melhorar a qualidade de vida dos moradores e ter mais atrativos para os turistas.","time":"1mo","title":"Atto Litoral Imóveis"}]
slogan: Viva este lugar!

Give us a call and we'll help turn your ideas into reality...one stone at a time! 724-965-8142 #WorldChocolateDay #outdoorlivingideas #Fireplace #harmonyhardscape #smores","time":"2w Edited","title":"Harmony Hardscape"},{"likes_count":7,"text":"Harmony Hardscape & Landscape Supply July 2023 Blog Laying a Paver Patio/Sidewalk for a Stunning Hardscape Addition 🏡⚒ Adding a paver sidewalk or patio to your outdoor space can transform it into a beautiful and functional area for relaxation. Whether you're a seasoned DIY enthusiast or a beginner, this article will provide you with instructions to successfully lay pavers. Create a stunning hardscape addition that will elevate the aesthetics and value of your outdoor space. Step 1: Planning and Design Start by envisioning the layout and purpose of your paver sidewalk or patio. Consider factors such as size, shape, and pattern, taking into account the existing landscape and architectural features. Create a detailed plan and calculate the quantity of pavers and base materials required for your project. Step 2: Site Preparation Prepare the area by clearing the space of any vegetation, rocks, or debris. Excavate the soil to the appropriate depth, allowing room for the base materials and paver thickness. Ensure proper slope and drainage to prevent water accumulation. Step 3: Base Installation Create a sturdy foundation by adding a base layer of crushed stone or gravel. Compact the base using a plate compactor or hand tamper to provide stability and prevent settling. Ensure the base is level and slopes away from structures for proper water runoff. Step 4: Edge Restraints Install edge restraints along the perimeter of your paver sidewalk or patio. This could be done using plastic or metal edging, concrete curbs, or other suitable materials. Edge restraints will help maintain the integrity and prevent the pavers from shifting over time. Step 5: Paver Installation Start laying the pavers from one corner, following the design pattern or layout you have planned. Use a rubber mallet to ensure each paver is level and properly seated. Maintain consistent joint spacing using spacers or your preferred method. Cut pavers as needed using a wet saw or paver splitter to fit around curves or edges. Step 6: Polymeric Sand Application After the pavers are installed, spread a layer of polymeric sand over the surface. Sweep the material into the joints, ensuring they are filled completely. Compact the sand with a plate compactor and use a water mist to activate the polymers in polymeric sand, creating a secure bond between the pavers. Step 7: Finishing Touches Clean the surface of the pavers, removing any excess sand or debris. Use a broom or leaf blower to sweep the area thoroughly. Apply a sealer, based on the paver company's recommendation, to enhance the color and protect the pavers from stains, UV rays, and weather damage. Allow the sealer to dry according to the manufacturer's instructions. By following these instructions, you can successfully lay a paver sidewalk or patio that will enhance the beauty and functionality of your outdoor space. Give us a call @ 724-965-8142 ☎️ and we'll help you on your journey to create a lasting outdoor space!","time":"2w Edited","title":"Harmony Hardscape"},{"likes_count":5,"text":"🇺🇸 💥 🎆 Happy Independence Day from all of us at Harmony Hardscape!","time":"2w","title":"Harmony Hardscape"},{"likes_count":6,"text":"🎇🇺🇸 Happy 4th of July! updates: [{"likes_count":2,"text":"A APR - Análise Preliminar de Riscos, é uma análise feita para prevenir a saúde e segurança do trabalhador através da antecipação e reconhecimento dos riscos ocupacionais existentes. Seu objetivo é identificar os eventos perigosos, com suas causas e consequências, estabelecendo medidas de controle adequadas. É uma metodologia de antecipação no controle de riscos, realizada geralmente na fase de elaboração de projetos. A metodologia da APR pode ser empregada em projetos na fase inicial, com a finalidade de se antecipar aos possíveis riscos vindouros e decorrentes, ou pode também ser empregada em revisões gerais de segurança em projetos já existentes. Via de regra, acidentes são evitáveis. E mesmo os que ocorrem por alguma imprevisibilidade podem ser melhor gerenciados quando a empresa tem uma área voltada eficientemente para a Segurança do Trabalho. Você que é empreendedor, gestor ou líder, entre agora mesmo em contato conosco e saiba como a SigmaCT Engenharia pode colaborar para a elaboração de uma boa APR e, consequentemente, para o aumento da segurança no ambiente laboral. #apr #análisepreliminarderisco #segurançadotrabalho👷 #sesmtbrasil #cipa #empreendedorismo #sigmact #maceió #alagoas","time":"2w","title":"SigmaCT Engenharia"},{"likes_count":2,"text":"Alguns de nossos serviços para a sua empresa. Entre 2012 e 2022, 25.492 mil trabalhadores morreram em decorrência de acidentes de trabalho no Brasil, de acordo com dados do Observatório de Segurança e Saúde no Trabalho - SmartLab, desenvolvido pelo Ministério Público do Trabalho (MPT). Foram registradas mais de 6 milhões de Comunicações de Acidentes de Trabalho (CAT). O Movimento Abril Verde é uma iniciativa que busca conscientizar a população sobre a importância da saúde e segurança no trabalho. O movimento surgiu como uma forma de lembrar o Dia Mundial em Memória às Vítimas de Acidentes e Doenças Relacionadas ao Trabalho, que é celebrado no dia 28 de abril. #abrilverde #movimentoabrilverde #sst #segurançadotrabalho #prevenção #sigmact #maceió #alagoas","time":"2mo","title":"SigmaCT Engenharia"},{"text":"Acabamos de atualizar nossa Page. about: Alpine Glass has been serving residents in Mesa County since 1994, providing the best windows and doors to ensure the satisfaction of every property owner. The team has experience with both residential and commercial installation. The company is working to “Bring Your Ideas to Life,” making it easy to create a dream home by working with the custom installation team. The commercial and residential crews boast more than 125 years of combined years of experience. A complete range of services is available for new window installation and replacement, including energy efficient windows, fiberglass windows, vinyl windows, aluminum windows, wood windows, and more. Additionally, door installation and replacement services are offered, such as sliding doors, patio doors, and entry doors for both interior and exterior installation. Other services offered by Alpine Glass include mirror and shower glass installation, as well as a full line Glazing Contractor on staff. In addition to standard products and installation, the Alpine Glass team can help with unique shaped windows and doors. The staff has unmatched experience in the industry and has worked hard to build long-standing relationships with the top industry vendors. Their dedication to quality has made them the premier choice for both builders and residential customers. At Alpine Glass, the team of professionals is dedicated to offering clients the highest quality products, combined with the best service and fair pricing. The goal is to offer products and services to fit any budget or timeline and will help clients get the most value for your money. For more information about the services and products that are offered, visit the Alpine Glass showroom at 573 W Crete Cir Unit 201 Grand Junction, CO 81505. An installer can also visit your property to finalize the installation plan.

name: Alpha Phi Omega - Iota Phi
location: 1 Shields Ave, Davis, CA 95616, US
about: Alpha Phi Omega is a co-ed collegiate community service fraternity that strives to develop three cardinal principles: Leadership, Friendship, and Service. The Iota Phi chapter at UC Davis is among the largest in the nation, with members serving more than 10,000 hours in the Davis community each year. Leadership: Alpha Phi Omega develops the leadership skills of its members through shared leadership. Our members have the opportunity to serve as a chapter officer or to plan and execute any number of volunteer projects and social programs, as well as have the chance to participate in a variety of leadership development programs sponsored by Alpha Phi Omega. These programs consist of both online and in-person workshops and are presented by trained volunteer staff, to improve leadership skills for work within APO and in their professional lives. Friendship: The surest way to have a friend, is to be a friend. Service: The Iota Phi chapter of Alpha Phi Omega annually performs over 10,000 hours of service to Davis and the surrounding areas, working with schools, food banks, and community leaders. Iota Phi Chapter - A History by Ashish A. Bhatt: http://www.iotaphi.org/wik/images/2/29/IotaPhiChapterAHistory.pdf Contact Us: President: president@iotaphi.org Service Vice-Presidents: service@iotaphi.org Membership Vice-Presidents: membership@iotaphi.org Fellowship Vice-Presidents: fellowship@iotaphi.org Finance Vice-Presidents: finance@iotaphi.org Pledge Masters: pledgeparents@iotaphi.org Recording Secretaries: recsecs@iotaphi.org Corresponding Secretaries: corsecs@iotaphi.org Outreach Secretaries: outreachsecs@iotaphi.org Historians: historians@iotaphi.org Sergeant At Arms: saas@iotaphi.org Webmasters: webmaster@iotaphi.org Advisors: advisors@iotaphi.org
specialties: Leadership, Friendship, and Service

updates: [{"likes_count":1,"text":"Did you know that 90% of Instagram users follow a business? A link: Easy access to your website or a Linktree with various pages related to your brand. 4. A description: In just a few words, tell users what your brand is all about. This could be your mission statement or your latest product feature. 5. Calls-to-action: Consider adding a “Shop Now” or “Contact Us” button in order for users to be directed to your products and services. #shortformcontent #shortformvideo #shortform #instagram #bio #optimization #contentcreation #contentstrategy #contentmarketing","time":"3d Edited","title":"Short Form Content Corp."},{"text":"What is measured is improved. To determine how your short form videos are doing, you need to determine which social media metrics you will track. Here are some simple metrics you may want to consider when analyzing your short form videos. Engagements: All interactions, including shares, likes, and comments. Social ROI: Insight into whether your investment in your social media marketing results in an increase or decrease in customers, sales, brand awareness, and customer loyalty. Impressions: The number of times content is displayed on someone’s feed. But in order for you to create successful short form videos that lead to successful content marketing campaigns, let us offer this one piece of advice...You must create a framework. Check out a framework we’ve created for you! https://lnkd.in/gimiATxK #shortformcontent #shortformvideo #shortform #contentcreation #contentstrategy #contentmarketing #marketingcampaign #contentcalendar #consistency #structure #socialmediacalendar","time":"1w","title":"Short Form Content Corp."},{"likes_count":1,"text":"Wondering when to post your content to different social media platforms? Here is what HubSpot has found: Instagram: Mid to late evening and mid to late afternoon, specifically from 6 PM to 9 PM, 12 PM to 3 PM, and 3 PM to 6 PM. The best day for Instagram is Saturdays. YouTube: 6 PM and 9 PM, 3 PM to 6 PM, and noon to 3 PM. Fridays and Saturdays are the best days to post. TikTok: 6 PM to 9 PM, 3 PM to 6 PM, and noon to 3 PM. For B2B brands, Saturdays and Thursdays are the best days to post; for B2C, it’s Saturdays and Sundays. #shortformcontent #shortformvideo #shortform #contentcreation #contentstrategy #contentmarketing #posting #scheduling #contentcalendar","time":"2w","title":"Short Form Content Corp."},{"text":"What’s the future of social media? As a short-form video content creator, it’s important for you to understand where social media is going. HubSpot’s 2023 Consumer Trends Report found that 24% of consumers between the ages of 18-54 search for brands using social media instead of a search engine. And when looking at Gen Z consumers, this number jumps to 36%. What does this mean for you? Your short form content could be more discoverable than content found within Google Maps and Google Search. Why? Young adults tend to favor visual-forward content when it comes to discovery. So, you never know, your next behind-the-scenes short of your business could lead to more people than you think discovering their new favorite business. #shortformcontent #shortformvideo #shortform #socialmedia #searchengines #visualforward #discovery #contentcreation #contentstrategy #contentmarketing","time":"2w Edited","title":"Short Form Content Corp."},{"text":"A word of advice from the Short Form Content Team: It’s always about the audience. How are your competitors using short form video content? #shortformcontent #shortformvideo #shortform #contentcreation #contentstrategy #contentmarketing #competition #competitiveadvantages #competitiveanalysis #contentmarketing","time":"3w","title":"Short Form Content Corp."},{"text":"What the Short Form Content Team wishes every creator would know: Consistency is your key to success. We provide professional consultancy services for both public and private sectors in the fast emerging MENA region for all aspects of transport planning & management, intelligent transportation systems, traffic engineering and research. name: The Australasian Corrosion Association
location: 30a Jessie St, Preston, Victoria 3072, AU
about:
The ACA is a not-for-profit, membership Association which disseminates information on corrosion and its prevention or control by providing training, seminars, conferences, publications and other activities.

Vision
Corrosion is managed sustainably and cost effectively to ensure the health and safety of the community and protection of the environment.

Mission

Assisting society to manage the impact of corrosion on asset durability.
specialties: Education, Training and Certification, Membership, Networking, Advocacy, Publications, Events, Conferences, Corrosion, Protective Coatings, and Asset Management

name: Washington Capital Management (DC)

about: Washington Capital Management is a boutique political strategy and public affairs consulting firm. We also provide aggressive, proactive political advising, business development, fundraising services and political branding to a broad and diverse base of clients. We have unique relationships with philanthropic and political contributors and knowledge of what drives seasoned donors to contribute to organizations, campaigns and candidates. This is coupled with an enormous network of influential staff, political operatives and elected officials with whom we work and consistently communicate. Our approach is to identify and utilize commonalities of interest and to foster those interests with clients who are interested in seeing and seizing opportunity. Washington Capital Management works with each client to develop a strategy and plan of action tailored to their unique requirements and assets. Our goal is to bring parties together to build strategic alliances, produce events, raise high-dollar investments and mutually benefit from symbiotic relationships.

name: FIT Focus
location: Haringvliet 76, Rotterdam, South Holland 3011 TG, NL
about: Expertise op het gebied van ERP software. Met ERP software stroomlijn je al je bedrijfsprocessen met één totaaloplossing. Wij geloven in de mogelijkheden van de procesmatige vaardigheden van onze consultants. Bij ons kun je terecht voor professionals die terug kunnen vallen op onze eigen expertise en ervaring met (het implementeren en optimaliseren van) ERP software. Wij kunnen je assisteren rondom de implementatie, optimalisatie of ondersteunen bij de operationele inzet. Een ERP implementatie vergt veel van jouw organisatie. Onze financials met ERP software ervaring kunnen je op verschillende aspecten bijstaan. Het succesvol implementeren van een nieuw systeem valt of staat met een goede basis. Het opstellen van een informatieplan, het creëren van draagvlak, het inzichtelijk krijgen van de processen en het opstellen van een programma van eisen. Dat is niet niks. En als de basis eenmaal staat en de software is live dan staat het ontsluiten van informatie centraal. Een projectmanager of Reporting Specialist kan hierin uitkomst bieden. De financiële administratie blijft een continu proces. Vanuit ons label FIT Focus kunnen wij zorgen voor een betaalbare tijdelijke oplossing; het inzetten van slimme young professionals zodat de huidige medewerkers voldoende tijd vrij kunnen maken om deel te nemen aan het project. Of je zet onze professionals in als projectmedewerker die een belangrijke bijdrage kunnen leveren aan de implementatiewerkzaamheden zelf.
specialties: Not available

name: i4SEE TECH GmbH
location: Zinzendorfgasse 5, Graz, Styria 8010, AT
about: We created Augmented Intelligence for wind to allow experts to optimise large fleets of wind turbines with minimum effort. Our software uses available operational data to detect and diagnose faults and deliver actionable recommendations. We have captured the domain expertise of a team of industry experts and embedded this knowledge into fully automated analytics algorithms. This enables us to regularly check the health status of entire wind turbine portfolios, independent of turbine type or fleet size. We support our clients in developing new, digital processes to ensure that the resulting advisory information is converted into field actions, crossing the gap between data analytics and asset management. As a result, we achieve significant improvements in fleet performance, increased availability and reduced operating costs.
specialties: renewable energy, predictive maintenance, digitalization, software, condition monitoring, wind energy, wind turbines, wind analytics, data analytics, renewables, augmented intelligence, digital strategy, ai, predictive analytics, reliability, SCADA data, data science, machine learning, failuredata, and solar analytics

name: The Coral Triangle Initiative on Coral Reefs, Fisheries, and Food Security (CTI-CFF)
location: Jl. A.A. Maramis Kayuwatu, Kairagi II, Manado, North Sulawesi 95254, ID
about: The Coral Triangle Initiative on Coral Reefs, Fisheries, and Food Security (CTI-CFF) is a multilateral partnership of six countries working together to sustain extraordinary marine and coastal resources by addressing crucial issues such as food security, climate change and marine biodiversity. It is the first multilateral cooperation of its kind, one that focuses on food security through sustainable management of marine natural resources taking into consideration climate change impacts. The CTI-CFF is formed in 2009 and members include the governments of Indonesia, Malaysia, Papua New Guinea, Philippines, Solomon Islands and Timor-Leste (the ‘CT6’) representing the custodians of the Coral Triangle area. They adopted the CTI Regional Plan of Action (CTI RPOA) which is a strategic action plan with five goals: (1) designation of effectively managed seascapes; (2) application of an ecosystem approach to fisheries management; (3) establishment of a fully functional marine protected area system; (4) strengthening climate change adaptation and resilience; and (5) improving the status of threatened marine species.
specialties: Food Security, Multilateral Parnership, Marine Conservation, Marine Protected Area, Ecosystem Approach to Fisheries Management, Seascapes, Climate Change Adaptation, Threatened Species, Women Leaders' Forum, and Coral reefs
updates: [{"likes_count":14,"text":"We are excited to present the latest edition of the CTI-CFF Newsletter! This newsletter aims to keep you informed about the latest updates, achievements, and initiatives of the Coral Triangle Initiative on Coral Reefs, Fisheries, and Food Security. In this edition, you will find exclusive articles featuring groundbreaking research on marine conservation, insights from local communities, success stories of sustainable fisheries management, and updates on our collaborative efforts with partner organizations. Stay up to date with the CTI-CFF's ongoing projects, upcoming events, and key milestones in our mission to preserve the extraordinary biodiversity of the Coral Triangle and ensure the livelihoods of coastal communities. To read more about newsletter please click here: https://bit.ly/3LZCAYE","time":"1mo","title":"The Coral Triangle Initiative on Coral Reefs, Fisheries, and Food Security (CTI-CFF)"},{"comments_count":4,"likes_count":148,"time":"1mo Edited"}]
slogan: Working together to sustain extraordinary marine and coastal resources by addressing crucial issues.

specialties: IPM, hardware, consulting services, organic practices, fertilizers, frequency, plant science, permanent crops, and CEA
updates: [{"likes_count":3,"text":"#water #waterconservation #weloveourteam","time":"4mo","title":"UpTerra"},{"likes_count":4,"text":"#fridayfeeling #structuredwater #cornfarmer #ILfarmbureau Making It Rain Every Day in Illinois!!! All farmers welcome! Wed, March 22 2023. 12:00 PM. Elks Lodge. 205 E 2nd St. Beardstown, IL 62618. Join us for lunch, 30 mins, Open Q&A, $1200 Give a way! upterra.co Call us at 707-UPTERRA or show up at the door","time":"4mo","title":"UpTerra"},{"likes_count":7,"text":"You're a farmer who feeds the world. You've tried using technology before and it's helped a little here and there but it's never really made a HUGE impact! Imagine having access to technology that helps you grow more food with less. Fewer inputs, less costs, less chemicals and faster results than ever before. This means feeding more people for less money and doing it in an environmentally friendly way. UpTerra is a company that provides farmers with scalable technology solutions so that they can feed the world more efficiently and effectively than ever before. We have developed a holistic farming solution which works WITH nature instead of against it. This product MORE than pays for itself in one cutting...(and it remains on the pivot for the next crop). So what does it do? Upterra's technology changes the molecular properties of water and its constituent elements to improve water retention in your soil and hydration in your crops. What happens when the flow of water is impeded through dams, straight pipes, and pumps? Water loses energy. Modern day water systems impede the natural flow of water (e.g. dams) straight pipes and pumps de-energize water. Our biomimicry technologies are designed to simulate the natural processes and movements of water flowing out of a fresh mountain spring. Water revitalization promotes remarkable qualities such as reduced surface tension and increased bioavailability, allowing water, nutrients, and other inputs to be delivered to your crops more effectively. #technology #water #regenerativeagriculture #riseupterra #biomimicry #agtech #agtechnology #farms #farming","time":"10mo","title":"UpTerra"}]

name: Shamrock
location: 8, Route de la Jonelière, Nantes, Pays de la Loire 44300, FR
about: Créée en 1999, Shamrock est une association de loi 1901 ayant pour but de promouvoir la musique sous toutes ses formes auprès des étudiants d'Audencia et des Nantais, à plus large échelle. Forte de sa longue existence, Shamrock travaille en étroite collaboration avec la ville de Nantes et ses acteurs culturels afin de promouvoir de jeunes talents et d'attirer des artistes confirmés. Cette petite équipe de 20 passionnés organise ainsi chaque année, depuis plus de 15 ans, le festival solidaire Réso'Nantes (anciennement Élan Rock) et son tremplin. L'évènement est l'occasion de réunir un public hétérogène autour d'une passion commune pour la musique et de soutenir une association caritative. Grâce à la générosité de son public et de ses artistes, Réso'Nantes a déjà pu aider des organismes tels que SOS Racisme, Les Restaurants du Cœur et Cheer Up!. La transmission d'expérience est également au cœur de ce festival car artistes de renom et musiciens prometteurs se succèdent sur la scène des Réso'Nantes. L'association propose également des concerts plus réguliers sur les scènes nantaises. En outre, Shamrock créée et édite le journal mensuel d'Audencia à destination de ses étudiants.
specialties: Journalisme, Organisation d'évènements musicaux, and Musique

name: Rwanda Extractive Industry Workers Union
location: KIGALI, GASABO 250, RW
about: REWU is a Rwandan Extractive industry Workers Union, which is organizing all workers in Mining, Quarry Companies and cooperatives in Rwanda since 2014 and has a sounding experience in social dialogue with mine and quarry companies owners as well as to organize, mobilize and sensitize their employees. This sector employs around 120,000 workers. Rwanda Extractive Industry Workers Union (REWU) is affiliated to CESTRAR (Central de Syndicats des Travailleurs au Rwanda) and National Commission of Human Rights (NCHR) at national level, to the COSOC – GL ”coalition des organisations de la societe civile luttant contre l’exploitation illegale des ressources naturelles dans la Region des Grand Lacs” (COSOC-GL), it is also an affiliate at international level to the IndustriALL Global Union, and to the Building Wood Workers International Union (BWI); REWU is a key partner of Ministry of public services and labor (MIFOTRA), Rwanda mines, petroleum and gas board (RMB), Provinces and Districts in local government; Rwanda Mining Association (RMA) and Rwanda Quarry Association (RQA) as employers professional organizations in mining sector. REWU was published in Rwanda Official Gazette No. 49 Bis of 08/12/2014. On one hand, REWU acts as a channel through which workers or union members pass their ideas, problems and aspirations related to work in order to improve their well-being and on the another hand it has a duty of working with members, community and leaders at all levels to combat any form of child abuse and domestic violence. 2. There are 4 reasons why REWU was established 2. 1. Making Advocacy for Labour Rights, safety and health at working place When mining and quarry was becoming one of the most lucrative activities in our country, the number of workers in the country increased significantly, while a big number of them was deprived from their rights to remuneration because they were considered not productive, informal employees without contracts nor social security
specialties: Legal, Mining, Advocacy, and Education

READ MORE: https://lnkd.in/dXn3Ux9s","time":"1w","title":"Rwanda Extractive Industry Workers Union"},{"text":"Visit to Cyendajuru CP Club by World Vision Eastern Africa & Philippine Sponsorship Team: On July 26, 2023, the World Vision-Eastern Africa & Philippine Sponsorship Team visited the Child Protection Club of Cyendajuru Primary School in the Simbi sector, Huye district, in the Southern Province of Rwanda. The club was established as part of an ongoing partnership project between World Vision Rwanda and the Rwanda Extractive Industry Workers Union (REWU). Its main objective is to put an end to child labor and sexual abuse as well as promote the Children’s rights through advocacy and other child centered programs. During the visit, children demonstrated to the visitors their daily activities in the Child Protection Club. The day went smoothly, and the guests were satisfied and enjoyed the performances of the children. They showcased their talents in various arts, including dance, song, poetry, and sketch. The visitors also were impressed with their ability to answer the questions asked.","time":"1w","title":"Rwanda Extractive Industry Workers Union"},{"likes_count":2,"text":"On 6th July, 2023, at the office of Rwanda Extractive Industry Workers Union, a technical meeting was held to develop guidelines for ECD in the working place within the Rwanda mining sector. The meeting was attended by representatives from RMB, NCDA, UNICEF Rwanda and REWU.","time":"1mo","title":"Rwanda Extractive Industry Workers Union"},{"likes_count":1,"text":"In partnership with World Vision #Rwanda, Rwanda Extractive Industry Workers Union, and the local administration, a workshop on family law was organized today in the Kansi sector of Gisagara District. The workshop was intended for the CNF Committee at both the district and sectoral levels. Participants from the Kigembe, Mugomba, and Kansi sectors, which collectively make up AP UMURAVA, attended the workshop. World Vision USA","time":"1mo","title":"Rwanda Extractive Industry Workers Union"},{"text":"On 30th June, 2023, Rwanda Extractive Industry Workers Union participated in an annual advocacy meeting on rights for access to health services and malaria prevention and control interventions for benefits of hard to reach groups. REWU’s presentation was centered on the role of casual workers in preventing malaria, especially by cleaning their workplaces, removing water holes and bushes at their workplaces, so mosquitoes lose their hiding places. The event was organized by #ASSOFERWA in collaboration with RBC and The Global Fund","time":"1mo","title":"Rwanda Extractive Industry Workers Union"},{"text":"Let's celebrate Rwanda's transformation and inspiring resilience! 🇷","time":"1mo","title":"Rwanda Extractive Industry Workers Union"},{"text":"On June 22, 2023, @RewuRwanda joined the National Commission for Human Rights @HumanRightsRW in training volunteers for the Observatory of the Child's Rights in @GakenkeDistrict. In this workshop, @RewuRwanda gave a presentation on Child labour","time":"1mo","title":"Rwanda Extractive Industry Workers Union"},{"text":"Good News! On Friday, June 16th, a collective bargaining agreement (CBA) was signed between the REWU Trade Union and Eurotrade International (ETI) Ltd with the aim of increasing mineral production and improving employee social welfare. This increased remunerations and bonuses, as well as setted a minimum living wage for employees' company. Both parties conducted negotiations in good faith from February 2023 and closed on this 16th June 2023 by signing a CBA. The Collective Bargaining Agreement (CBA) was signed by the General Manager of ETI Ltd, the subcontractor Bajeneza Eugene, the Secretary General of REWU, and the Labor Inspector of Rulindo District.","time":"1mo","title":"Rwanda Extractive Industry Workers Union"},{"text":"On Friday, 16th June, 2023, World Vision #Rwanda in partnership with REWU and government agencies joined children, parents, and schools to celebrate the Day of the African Child. In today's society, technology is increasingly essential in daily life, and it is crucial to ensure that children are not left behind or exposed to harm or exploitation through digital facilities. #digital #society #opportunity #environment","time":"1mo","title":"Rwanda Extractive Industry Workers Union"}]

name: ÇAKIT MUHENDISLIK
location: istanbul, istanbul 34100, TR
about: Established in 1995, the Company provides services in the design, the manufacturing and erection controlling of steel constructions at home and abroad with its specialized, experienced and competent staff in line with the technological and scientific advancements. To this end, it also diligently provides consultancy and advisory services incorporating the chemical, mechanical, ultrasound and radiographic checks during the process starting with the procurement of materials, especially at the stage of workshop fabrications, up to the site work stage, from designing stage to turn-key delivery. In all static and dynamic modeling and calculations, computer software programs being capable of making analysis and design with real three dimensional and finite elements recognized by the world engineering and updated periodically are used. For solution of complex and special engineering problems, professional consultancy services are obtained from the esteemed lecturers of the universities. Technical staff members are provided on-job training periodically in order to follow up the agenda and to provide a state of the art engineering service. Every kind of steel construction, single and multi storey industrial buildings, high buildings, aircraft hangars, towers and railway-highway bridges and suspended bridges are included in our main field of activity.

name: The Mompreneur CEO
location: Bridgetown, St. Michael, BB
about: The Mompreneur CEO was founded in 2020 by Dionne Greaves. The Mompreneur CEO is the flagship company that is home to The Mompreneur CEO Show. The company was built around the belief that women should not have to choose their career over family life or vice versa but they should have the power to create their own income options so that they can live the life they want, on their own terms. The Mompreneur CEO provides Business Coaching, Mentorship, Training, and Public Speaking and highlights the trailblazing success stories, achievements, and outstanding vernaculars of female entrepreneurs across the globe. The mission of The Mompreneur CEO is to help every woman show up boldly, authentically, and fiercely in the world so they can confidently navigate motherhood and entrepreneurship. For further information or to request bookings for services please send an email to info@dionnegreaves.com.
specialties: Business Coaching, Empowerment Speaking, Mentorship, and Training & Facilitation
slogan: Empowering women to regain time freedom, create their own income options, and live boldly, fiercely, and radically.

name: AppMag.it

about: Tutti gli imprenditori oggi hanno bisogno di una o più app per la propria attività, anche se non tutti se ne sono già resi conto.
