name: Alpha Scuderia | F1 in Schools 🏁
location: Criciúma, Santa Catarina, BR
about: F1 In Schools Tournamet participant. Season 2020/21. 2021/22
specialties: Empreendedorismo, Tecnologias, Cidadania, Metodologia Ativa, Branding, and Aerodinâmica
updates: [{"likes_count":2,"text":"📝O marketing tem como objetivo descobrir quem é o seu cliente, conhecer melhor o seu público-alvo e criar estratégias, a fim de chamar sua atenção e conquistá-lo. Existem muitos aspectos envolvidos pelo marketing, e alguns conceitos centrais definem-o de forma clara e simples. Eles estão interligados numa relação causal direta, que tem como princípio a base da construção da própria fundamentação teórica do marketing. 📌A necessidade está relacionada ao entendimento das necessidades humanas: necessidades físicas básicas, sociais e individuais de conhecimento e auto-realização. Os desejos expressam uma continuidade, pois são as necessidades humanas moldadas pela cultura e pelas características individuais; são mutáveis e se modificam conforme as transformações ocorridas na sociedade. Os desejos se tornam demandas quando as pessoas, com seus desejos infinitos, percebem que possuem recursos limitados. Sendo assim, elas desejam produtos que proporcionem o máximo de satisfação possível em troca de seu dinheiro. 🔎Assim, o marketing entra em jogo para suprir as carências dos clientes, analisando e produzindo produtos que sejam úteis, despertando o desejo de compra e aumentando a demanda pelo produto ou serviço. 🖇️Necessidades, demandas e desejos humanos sugerem que existem produtos disponíveis para atendê-los. Um produto é qualquer coisa que possa ser oferecida a um mercado para satisfazer parcialmente uma necessidade ou desejo. 🔁A relação entre produtor e comprador é chamada de troca, que é o ato de se obter um objeto desejado oferecendo algo como retorno. Assim, como unidade de medida das trocas, há um outro conceito do marketing: as transações; que é composta de uma troca de valores entre duas partes. Podemos incluir nessa modalidade as transações do tipo monetária e de cunho ideológico. O conceito de transações leva ao conceito de mercado. Um mercado é o grupo de compradores reais e potenciais de um produto, podendo ser físico ou virtual.","time":"3w","title":"Alpha Scuderia | F1 in Schools 🏁"},{"likes_count":3,"text":"💜Hey Alphas! 🖇️Na gestão de projetos, existem dois tipos de metodologias: clássicas e ágeis. Durante a gestão de um projeto, existem muitas informações e etapas que serão percorridas, que podem variar de acordo com as finalidades e metas idealizadas. Por isso, existem inúmeras metodologias de projeto, entretanto é comum agrupá-las em três: tradicional, ágil e híbrida. 🎯Tradicional: Também chamadas de clássicas ou preditivas, essas metodologias priorizam o controle e planejamento do projeto. Dessa forma, procuram trazer um escopo detalhado no início do projeto, cronograma definido e meios mais seguros, estipulados e conhecidos. Tudo é delimitado de modo detalhado e a longo prazo, concluindo-se que há um objetivo pontual a ser alcançado. ⏰Ágil: São aquelas que priorizam uma visão mais ampla do projeto, tendo um foco maior no valor da entrega do que no planejamento em si. Diferentemente da metodologia tradicional, a ágil ou adaptativa traz uma alta capacidade de adaptação e, partindo da ideia de que o mercado está muito suscetível a mudanças, não segue uma mesma proposta por muito tempo. A ideia é que o projeto seja estruturado ao longo de sua execução; em objetivos definidos por ciclos, de 2 a 6 semanas, para que se possa ter entregas mais rápidas e pontuais. ⚖️Híbrida: As metodologias híbridas, como o próprio nome indica, são a união de métodos tradicionais e ágeis, equilibrando os dois extremos. A proposta é que haja um detalhamento um pouco maior do projeto, mas que este seja aberto a reavaliações constantes, para manter uma resposta rápida e eficaz.","time":"3w","title":"Alpha Scuderia | F1 in Schools 🏁"},{"likes_count":13,"text":"💜Hey Alphas! 📌Como já foi apresentado na postagem sobre a história da competição F1 In Schools, nessa competição estudantil é necessário construir uma escuderia, que divide-se em áreas, sendo que uma delas é o empreendimento. No torneio, essa área engloba desde a identidade da equipe até buscas por patrocínio, por exemplo. 💡A escuderia é tratada como uma marca, por isso é necessário desenvolver a marca e a identidade, destacando elementos visuais e explicações de cores, nome, design… 👥A parte de marketing envolve a escolha de uma estratégia eficiente, tendo em vista os objetivos da equipe, e trabalhando com análise e monitoramento de resultados. Ainda, realizam-se ações para alcançar os públicos-alvo. 📲Em mídias digitais, a equipe traça um plano de uso de plataformas, disseminação de conteúdos e estudos diversos relacionados ao público e as metas. É evidente o quanto a mídia atravessou vários estágios de desenvolvimento, e hoje, o meio digital está cada vez mais ocupando espaço. 👩🏻💼O patrocínio é trabalhado por meio da relação entre as empresas com a escuderia. A partir da definição de cotas, benefícios e conversas com empreendedores sobre a competição da F1 In Schools, mostramos aos interessados a importância de apoiar um projeto como o nosso e o impacto que terá para o futuro profissional. ♻️A sustentabilidade também é uma das áreas avaliadas no empreendimento da equipe, visto que é necessário pensar nas gerações futuras e em construir um compromisso com o meio ambiente. Incorporando práticas sustentáveis ao longo da temporada, a equipe contribui para a realização de muitos dos ODS e pratica a sustentabilidade econômica, social e ambiental.","time":"3w","title":"Alpha Scuderia | F1 in Schools 🏁"},{"likes_count":6,"text":"💜Hey Alphas! 👩💻O Marketing Digital, que mudou a maneira como as empresas utilizam a tecnologia, surgiu com a popularização da Internet por volta da década de 1990. No início — período que ficou conhecido como Web 1.0 —, existiam poucos sites e eles eram muito diferentes do que são hoje: as pessoas apenas visitavam as páginas, sem nenhuma interação. 🔎Em 1998 foi lançado o buscador que mudou a história da Internet: o Google. Ainda, o surgimento das enciclopédias virtuais, dos blogs e das redes sociais, mais tarde, fez com que os usuários deixassem de consumir passivamente as informações e começassem a ter a possibilidade de produzir os próprios conteúdos e trocar experiências com outras pessoas. 🛜Dessa forma, as grandes marcas perceberam que gerar conteúdo na Internet era uma ótima estratégia de branding e começaram a desenvolver o Inbound Marketing, que consiste em atrair os clientes até a empresa. 🌐Esse gigantesco aumento do tráfego de pessoas no ambiente digital obrigou as marcas a também migrarem para a Internet. Mas, aos poucos, as empresas notaram que o grande alcance da rede não era a única vantagem do Marketing Digital. #marketing #digital #branding #empresas #redessociais #marketingdigital","time":"3w","title":"Alpha Scuderia | F1 in Schools 🏁"},{"likes_count":6,"text":"💜Hey Alphas! 📌A produtividade é vital para o sucesso em qualquer área, já que garante maior eficiência na realização das tarefas e faz com que as demandas sejam entregues com qualidade, em maior quantidade e em menor tempo. Para que a produtividade seja eficaz, há quatro fatores determinantes que sustentam esse processo: gestão de sonhos, gestão de tempo, gestão de conhecimento e gestão de energia. 🖊Gestão de sonhos: É o gerenciamento dos objetivos, ou seja, aquilo que motiva a produtividade, caracterizada pela clareza para onde vai, objetivo em cada tarefa e razão da produtividade. Esse pilar traz mais motivação, um foco central e a sensação de fazer a “certa” produtividade. ⏱Gestão de tempo: É a responsável por gerenciar o tempo em que se produz, organizando e controlando a duração de cada tarefa. Sem uma gestão de tempo ideal, muitos problemas surgem, como o excesso de tarefas e a sensação de falta de tempo. 🧠Gestão de conhecimento: Conjunto de técnicas que ampliam a capacidade de produção. Nos dias de hoje, recebemos muitas informações a todo o momento, por isso é fundamental manter a estratégia e diminuir os efeitos negativos que o excesso de informações trazem. 🔋Gestão de energia: Muitas vezes, a energia física, mental e emocional, são desgastadas ao longo dos dias. Esse pilar tem como função manter os usuários ativos e saudáveis durante a produção, cuidando da saúde como um todo. ✅Administrando e monitorando todos os quatro pilares simultaneamente, a produtividade é maximizada e muitos benefícios são atingidos. #produtividade #sucesso #qualidade #monitoramento #gestão","time":"1mo","title":"Alpha Scuderia | F1 in Schools 🏁"},{"likes_count":7,"text":"💜Hey Alphas! 📌É fundamental aprender a fazer um bom planejamento financeiro, controlando as finanças e organizando-se. Isso porque realizar uma boa administração do seu dinheiro traz inúmeras vantagens, como: redução de gastos desnecessários, conquista de bens e diminuição das dívidas. 💵Na F1 In Schools, um bom planejamento financeiro é essencial, já que os estudantes precisam controlar o que recebem de patrocínio, e, principalmente, não gastar desnecessariamente. Algumas etapas para desenvolver um bom planejamento financeiro são: ⏰Ter uma previsibilidade de receita e das despesas mensais: essas informações entregam o quanto você ganhou e o quanto gastou em um determinado intervalo de tempo; é essencial para perceber se há gastos desnecessários na sua vida financeira e organizar-se melhor. ⚖️Faça um orçamento de todas as contas: organizar os gastos fixos e variáveis e definir o quanto você pretende desembolsar traz a possibilidade de avaliar se a sua renda é suficiente ou se é necessário recorrer a estratégias para aumentá-la. 📎Defina metas e poupe seu dinheiro: Definir o que você deseja adquirir em um determinado intervalo de tempo e economizar para realizar esses objetivos é um passo muito importante, pois traz motivação e organização. ✅A partir de dicas como essas, um bom planejamento financeiro pode ser elaborado. Através dele, é possível controlar e equilibrar o dinheiro de um empreendimento, traçar metas a longo e curto prazo e atingir os objetivos por meio de decisões estratégicas. #planejamento #organizacao #finanças #empreendedorismo","time":"2mo","title":"Alpha Scuderia | F1 in Schools 🏁"},{"likes_count":8,"text":"💜Hey Alphas! 🌿A preservação do meio ambiente é fundamental, afinal, é nele onde estão os recursos naturais necessários para a nossa sobrevivência. Por meio da sustentabilidade, que consiste em atender às necessidades das gerações atuais sem comprometer as gerações futuras, é possível garantir o desenvolvimento da sociedade. 📌Na F1 In Schools, é muito importante aplicar o conceito de sustentabilidade nas práticas da equipe, sendo elas ações de grande impacto ou os mínimos detalhes. É avaliada a definição de estratégias e atividades que levam em consideração fatores econômicos, ambientais e sociais, com base na sustentabilidade. ✅Isso envolve pensar em soluções inovadoras durante todo o processo que possam ajudar o meio ambiente e reduzir o impacto ambiental. Algumas práticas, por exemplo, envolvem a construção dos carros de corrida e processos de produção, práticas sustentáveis na comunidade local e um estande que utilize técnicas, materiais e princípios sustentáveis. #sustentabilidade #sustentavel #inovacao #competicao #robotica","time":"2mo","title":"Alpha Scuderia | F1 in Schools 🏁"},{"likes_count":5,"text":"💜Hey Alphas! 📲Mídia digital é todo conteúdo baseado na tecnologia digital, por exemplo blogs, redes sociais e sites. A internet possui um amplo espaço, e por conta disso, as mídias digitais ganham quatro diferentes aplicações: paga, conquistada, própria e compartilhada. 💰Mídia paga: Relacionada ao investimento de uma marca em anúncios digitais, a mídia paga é a transmissão de conteúdo de forma paga a fim de atingir o público alvo. Além de alcançar uma maior quantidade de pessoas em comparação às publicações orgânicas - sem investimento direto - e impulsionar conteúdos, também aumenta o engajamento, proporciona mais visibilidade à marca e ganho de seguidores. 🗣Mídia conquistada ou espontânea: A mídia conquistada corresponde aos conteúdos publicados de forma orgânica por outros perfis. É aquela que fundamenta o esforço em mídia própria, marketing e qualidade do serviço, aumentando então a credibilidade e trazendo uma reputação sólida à marca. A assessoria de imprensa é uma ótima colaboradora, por exemplo. 🧠Mídia própria: É a base das demais mídias, pois envolve todo o conteúdo produzido próprio da empresa, sendo autoral, original e relevante. Com esse tipo de mídia é possível criar conteúdo de valor, o que contribui de forma diversificada para o relacionamento com o cliente, e feito de forma correta, não ofusca o produto da empresa. 👥Mídia compartilhada: Sendo considerada qualquer conteúdo replicado no meio digital, essa mídia ocorre quando plataformas de terceiros, com o canal tecnicamente aberto tanto para a marca quanto para o consumidor, fazem referência à empresa. ✅Apesar de serem diferentes entre si, quando bem organizadas em um plano de marketing e no desenvolvimento de cada estratégia, geram inúmeros benefícios para uma marca: reputação digital, fidelização de clientes e possibilidade de análise de dados, por exemplo.","time":"2mo","title":"Alpha Scuderia | F1 in Schools 🏁"},{"likes_count":10,"text":"💜 Hey Alphas! 📌 Muitos dos que nos seguem conhecem a competição da F1 in Schools. Porém, ao mesmo tempo, poucas pessoas conhecem a história desse torneio. Acompanhe conosco a história por trás dele! 📚 A primeira temporada da história da competição aconteceu em 1999, na Inglaterra. A competição só foi ter uma etapa mundial em 2004, com a primeira campeã mundial de F1 in Schools sendo a equipe Turbo, dos Estados Unidos. 🌎 Em 2014, a competição chegou no Brasil pela primeira vez, graças a ONG Projetando o Futuro. Cinco anos depois, em 2019, a competição foi acolhida pela rede Sesi/Senai e passou a fazer parte do Torneio Sesi de Robótica, a maior competição de robótica do Brasil. 🇧🇷 Esse ano, o nacional vai acontecer dos dias 15 a 18 de março, no estádio Mané Garrincha, em Brasília. Gostou do conteúdo? Segue a gente pra ver mais! #f1inschools #competition #competição #história #history #sesisenai","time":"5mo","title":"Alpha Scuderia | F1 in Schools 🏁"},{"likes_count":6,"text":"Hey Alphas! 💜 📌 Você que tem um negócio deve se perguntar se deve ou não criar uma plataforma digital para divulgação. Talvez você pense que seja desnecessário, ou simplesmente acredita que há maneiras melhores de fazer marketing. Por isso, viemos aqui provar a você a importância de usar o Marketing de Conteúdo na sua empresa! 💡 Primeiramente, o Marketing de Conteúdo trabalha com o Inbound Marketing, ou seja, a estratégia de atrair o público para sua empresa através do seu próprio interesse, ao invés de se lançar aos olhos da clientela como é no caso do Outbound Marketing. 🥇 O grande valor do Marketing de Conteúdo vem da valorização da sua marca aos olhos do público. Você deixa de ser aquela empresa que o cliente viu na TV, e se torna uma influenciadora em sua vida. ❗ É claro que a plataforma que você vai usar deve se adequar ao público que você pretende atingir. Não adianta querer atingir pessoas mais velhas no Twitter, afinal a rede social é muito mais utilizada por jovens e adultos. 💜 Mas nós esperamos que você tenha se interessado pela metodologia do Marketing de Conteúdo. Se gostou do conteúdo, curte e segue a gente pra mais! #marketing #digital #estratégia #anuncios #inboundmarketing #outboundmarketing #contentmarketing #contentcreation #criacaodeconteudo #criatividade","time":"6mo","title":"Alpha Scuderia | F1 in Schools 🏁"}]
slogan: Au au

about: We're America's largest broadline manufacturer of commercial Foodservice Equipment, serving this market since 1947. name: The eComm Consultancy Group
location: Mansfield, Nottinghamshire NG18, GB
about: Founded in early 2019, The eComm Consultancy Group was established with one goal in mind, to support the growth of digital retailers. Whether you are at the start of your digital journey or looking to take your business to the next level, we're here to help. With over a decade of experience managing, leading and supporting digital retailers, we're well versed in all things digital; delivering growth and profitability, and supporting long-term sustainability in a variety of retail business. From a brand new start-up, to £200m+ high street retailers, The eComm Consultancy Group can support you in all things ecommerce. Including: ✔ - digital transformation and growth strategy ✔ - increasing profitability and operational efficiency ✔ - analytics and data insight ✔ - PPC, digital marketing and SEO ✔ - large scale marketplace trading (Amazon and eBay) ✔ - UX/UI and conversion rate optimisation ✔ - merchandising, search and navigation ✔ - development, optimisation and re-platforming project management ✔ - customer service and fulfilment strategy ✔ - defining digital team structure, roles, recruitment and training ✔ - agency/3rd party sourcing and management As data-driven ecommerce experts, we understand that your investment has to work for you and this is how we build our relationships; with a clear (and measurable) plan to achieve your business goals. Contact us today to find out how we can add value to your business, and for your customers.

name: Origina
location: Burton Court, Burton Hall Rd, Sandyford Business Park, Sandyford, County Dublin D18 Y2T8, IE,25 Old Broad Street, Tower 42, London, England EC2N 1HN, GB,8400 Belleview Dr, Ste 115, Plano, Texas 75024, US,20 Martin Pl, L10, Sydney, New South Wales 2000, AU
about:
Origina is the world's leading independent third-party software maintenance and support provider for IBM software. Our vision is to change the software world, and our mission is to deliver outstanding software maintenance services that champion customer rights and unlock value, by a passionate team of experts.

Origina provides the next generation of software support by extending the lifecycle of the software, protecting the security and stability of the software, and enhancing the functionality and performance of the software.

Customers that switch from IBM to Origina for software support and maintenance realize fixed-cost savings that reach up to 50 percent annually. Our software maintenance strategy further maximizes the value of IBM software by extending its longevity and removing the need for forced upgrades.

Our independent Global IBM® Experts provide dedicated support for more than 800 IBM products licensed under the Passport Advantage program. Customers enjoy 24x7x365 customer support tied to a binding Service Level Agreement (SLA) which delivers response times as quickly as 30 minutes from when an issue is raised.

IBM products supported by Origina include: MQ Series, Db2, WebSphere, Tivolo, FileNet, Cognos, Rational Team Concert, OpenPages, SPSS, Sterling Order Management, Business Process Manager, and Z Mainframe, plus many more. Origina also supports products which were divested to HCL Technologies or other companies, such as Domino/Lotus.

Discover the value in switching to a third-party support provider like Origina here: https://bit.ly/2Jv9jZo

name: The Behavioral Wellness Center at Girard
location: 801 W. Girard Ave, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania 19122, US
about: The Behavioral Wellness Center at Girard is a Philadelphia Drug & Alcohol Treatment Center offering both inpatient and outpatient Psychiatric and Substance Abuse counseling and treatments. The Behavioral Wellness Center at Girard (formerly North Philadelphia Health Systems – Girard Medical Center) has always been at the forefront of innovation in the provision of treatment services for individuals with substance use and mental health challenges and a willing partner to the City of Philadelphia in serving City residents. The Center’s role in the health and wellness of the citizens of Philadelphia has been and continues to be critical, particularly given its location and easy access to much needed services in the surrounding communities. We provide effective, evidence-based Behavioral Health services and partner with participants in their wellness journey. Our services include: - Substance Use Disorder Services - Inpatient Psychiatric Services - Outpatient Drug & Alcohol Treatment Services We deliver these services in a manner that is spiritually and culturally sensitive, and responsive to community needs. Let us help you through your recovery journey.

name: Colorado School of Mines
location: 1500 Illinois St, Golden, CO 80401, US
about:
Colorado School of Mines is a public research university devoted to engineering and applied science. It has the highest admissions standards of any public university in Colorado and among the highest of any public university in the U.S.

Mines has distinguished itself by developing a curriculum and research program geared towards responsible stewardship of the earth and its resources. In addition to strong education and research programs in traditional fields of science and engineering, Mines is one of a very few institutions in the world having broad expertise in resource exploration, extraction, production and utilization. As such, Mines occupies a unique position among the world's institutions of higher education.

Since its founding in 1874, the translation of the school's mission into educational programs has been influenced by the needs of society. Those needs are now focused more clearly than ever before. The world faces a crisis in balancing resource availability with environmental protection and Mines and its programs are central to the solution.

Mines offers all the advantages of a world-class research institution with a size that allows for personal attention.
specialties: engineering, mathematics, earth, energy, environment, Economics, Geology, Physics, Technology, Research, Education, science, and Computer Science

These field sessions give students the opportunity to take what they learn in the classroom and apply it to real-world challenges while learning practical techniques and skills. Watch this Mines Minute to learn more: https://lnkd.in/gU83dRVz","time":"1w","title":"Colorado School of Mines"},{"time":"2w Edited"},{"comments_count":4,"likes_count":166,"text":"During this year's BattleBots competition, which pits the best fighting robots from around the world against each other in the ring, one Oredigger got the chance to work with a team and put his robotics knowledge to the test. Alec Mallinger (far right in first image) is a sophomore at Mines who joined Denver-based BattleBots team Copperhead for this latest season. Since becoming passionate about robotics at age 12 after watching BattleBots on TV, Alec has built 15 robots, started a high school robotics club, joined the Mines robotics club and participated in multiple competitions. He shared his passion by creating a YouTube channel, which caught the attention of Copperhead team captain Luke Quintal. Alec was then invited to help prepare the team's bot for combat, and with his help Copperhead made it to the competition semifinals for the first time in the team's history. Alec says his experience with combat robotics will boost his education and career, as it's given him plenty of hands-on robotics experience and a notable resume builder. What's next for Alec? He plans to complete his degree in Mechanical Engineering at Mines with a focus on aerospace and pursue a career in the aerospace industry. #Battlebots #combatrobotics #robotics #STEMeducation #coloradoschoolofmines","time":"2w","title":"Colorado School of Mines"},{"comments_count":2,"likes_count":162,"text":"Get a look inside the first field session for Mines’ first interdisciplinary undergraduate program, Quantitative Biosciences and Engineering!","time":"3w","title":"Colorado School of Mines"},{"comments_count":21,"likes_count":565,"text":"Mines' vice president for research and technology transfer Dr. Walter Copan testified in Washington D.C. today on behalf of the proposed Mining Schools Act, which would provide much-needed support to students in mining and mineral fields.","time":"3w","title":"Colorado School of Mines"},{"comments_count":4,"likes_count":130,"text":"Have an engineering challenge and want to see how Mines students can tackle it? Submit a project to Mines Capstone Design! Capstone Design is currently recruiting engaging, real-world engineering design projects from our community and encourage your project ideas that may suit the skill sets of Mines students in Mechanical, Electrical, Civil and Environmental, and Design Engineering. As a client, you will benefit from 900 person hours from a multi-disciplinary student team of seniors working on your design challenge over the course of two full semesters. Learn More and Submit a Project Idea Here https://lnkd.in/gyizqnk Questions? Contact our Stakeholder Relations Manager at LeahFitzgerald@Mines.edu","time":"1mo","title":"Colorado School of Mines"},{"comments_count":4,"likes_count":191,"text":"The Summer Multicultural Engineering (SUMMET) program is underway at Mines! Each summer, juniors and seniors from underrepresented populations are invited to the Mines campus to participate in a week of coursework, hands-on projects, industry tours and social events to help get them excited about STEM. This session was particularly special, as we welcomed our first international program participants from Mexico! Learn more about SUMMET here: https://lnkd.in/g4eSZ9Ws","time":"1mo","title":"Colorado School of Mines"},{"comments_count":12,"likes_count":680,"text":"The Oredigger spirit is running strong over at NASA - National Aeronautics and Space Administration thanks to these incredible Mines alumni! Pictured here are Naomi Plouse ’22, Matthew Hahn ’14 MS ’15, Jenna Hanson ’21 and Dillon Anderson ’22 at the NASA Neutral Buoyancy Lab in Houston, Texas. Naomi, Jenna and Matt work in mission control during EVAs, or spacewalks, and train astronauts to perform those spacewalks. Dillon works as a PLUTO (Plug-in port utilization officer) managing the IT on board spacecrafts, and is the lead for some commercial crew missions going to and from the ISS. Recently, Matt and Naomi got to try out some spacesuits for themselves -- under water -- to learn how to better instruct astronauts in the buoyancy lab. Naomi’s next project? Upgrade the Alpha Magnetic Spectrometer (AMS) on the outside of the ISS. The instrument searches for antimatter, dark matter and missing matter and performs measurements of cosmic rays’ composition and flux to help us better understand the universe. Keep up the great work, Naomi, Jenna, Matt and Dillon! #NASA Colorado School of Mines Alumni #johnsonspacecenter #coloradoschoolofmines #ISS #space #stemcareers #helluvaengineer","time":"1mo","title":"Colorado School of Mines"}]
slogan: Mines is a public university dedicated to educating and inspiring the next generation of scientists & engineers.

name: Heylo SAS
location: Douala, Littoral 237, CM
about: Heylo est une plateforme web et mobile née de la nécessité d'encadrer et de sécuriser l'auto-stop afin d'en faire une véritable alternative au transport en commun. En d'autres mots, grâce à la plateforme, nous mettons en relation les conducteurs et les passagers voyageant dans la même direction afin qu'ils entreprennent le déplacement en toute confiance et en toute sérénité; c’est ce que l’on appelle communément covoiturage. Fini l'Incertitude de l'attente. Les rendez-vous sont pris d'avance. Dorénavant, plus besoin d'attendre en bordure de route sans savoir quand le prochain personnel vous offrira une place. Avec Heylo tout est organisé d'avance. Vous choisissez avec qui vous voyagez, votre point de rencontre et l'heure à laquelle vous décollez. Adieu l’insécurité! Nous avons fait de la sécurité notre cheval de bataille! Tout le monde sur Heylo est identifié. Nous savons qui voyage, avec qui il voyage, quand et d'où ils partent. Désormais, entreprenez votre voyage sereinement et faites de nouvelles rencontres. Trêve d’impunité! Vous avez le pouvoir Avec Heylo vous avez la possibilité de donner votre avis et noter les personnes avec qui vous avez voyagé. Le but étant de forcer les uns et les autres à adopter de bons comportements autant au niveau du relationnel que de la qualité de la conduite. Au-delà du covoiturage, Heylo est une communauté dont le but est de faire de VOYAGER une expérience agréable, enrichissante et sécurisante. Grâce à Heylo voyager au Cameroun ne sera plus jamais pareil! Rejoignez-nous dès maintenant ! Via le Web : Heylo.cm Via l’application : http://bit.ly/HeyloApp
specialties: voyage, transport, covoiturage, and autostop
slogan: Le plaisir de la route ensemble

updates: [{"likes_count":1,"text":"👉🏻Tem um filho ou filha estudando no ensino fundamental/médio? Nós estamos buscando mães para fazerem parte do nosso programa de mães embaixadoras. Pratique elas e veja os avanços no comportamento de seu filho. #pensebem #aulasdereforço #aulaparticular #enem #dicasdeestudo","time":"3w","title":"PenseBem Aulas Particulares"},{"text":"O time de professores da PenseBem já ajudou estudantes a conseguirem vários resultados exitosos🤩. A PenseBem conta com uma equipe de professores prontos para ajudar os alunos a conquistarem as melhores notas possíveis! Não perca tempo e ajude seu filho a ficar numa boa😀! Entre em contato com nosso comercial e conheça mais sobre nossos pacotes de aulas particulares. #pensebem #aulasdereforço #aulaparticular #enem #dicasdeestudo","time":"1mo","title":"PenseBem Aulas Particulares"},{"text":"👀🤚Estabelecer rotinas e limites adequados para seu filho é importante para promover uma estrutura saudável em seu dia a dia. Aqui estão algumas dicas para ajudá-lo nesse processo: 🔔Consistência: Seja consistente ao estabelecer rotinas e limites. Isso significa aplicar as regras de maneira regular e previsível. 🔔Comunique-se de forma clara: Explique as regras e expectativas de maneira clara e compreensível para seu filho. 🔔Envolva seu filho no processo: Converse com seu filho sobre as regras e rotinas. Inclua-o na definição de algumas regras, permitindo que ele participe do processo de tomada de decisão. 🔔Seja um exemplo: Lembre-se de que as crianças aprendem muito observando os adultos ao seu redor. 🔔Negociação e flexibilidade: À medida que seu filho cresce, você pode permitir alguma flexibilidade dentro das regras estabelecidas. 🔔Reforço positivo: Reconheça e recompense o comportamento positivo do seu filho quando ele seguir as regras e cumprir a rotina estabelecida. 🔔Esteja aberto ao diálogo: Esteja aberto a conversas e discussões com seu filho sobre as regras e limites estabelecidos. Lembre-se de que, embora seja importante estabelecer rotinas e limites, também é essencial equilibrar isso com momentos de flexibilidade e compreensão.♥ #pensebem #aulasdereforço #aulaparticular #enem #dicasdeestudo","time":"1mo","title":"PenseBem Aulas Particulares"},{"text":"📚A avaliação do ENCCEJA permite aos estudantes se certificarem no Ensino Médio, independentemente de não terem tido a chance de concluí-lo anteriormente. A PENSEBEM oferece aulas de reforço que ajudam o aluno a se preparar e obter o certificado de Ensino Médio. Neste ano as provas serão no dia 27 de agosto. O exame é estruturado com questões de diversas disciplinas, como Língua Portuguesa, Matemática, História e Ciências da Natureza. Não perca tempo e conclua seus estudos! Entre em contato com o comercial da PenseBem e saiba mais sobre como podemos te ajudar! #pensebem #aulasdereforço #aulaparticular #enem #dicasdeestudo","time":"1mo","title":"PenseBem Aulas Particulares"}]
slogan: Aulas Particulares presenciais, em sua residência, onlines ou em nosso curso.

Apply today or share this post with your network.","time":"1w","title":"Raw Revel"},{"likes_count":6,"text":"Regenerative Agriculture and Its Relationship with Sustainable Fashion Regenerative agriculture is a type of farming that focuses on restoring degraded soils, increasing biodiversity, and enhancing ecosystem services. It is based on ecological principles and practices that mimic nature and promote its regeneration. Regenerative agriculture has many benefits for the environment, such as sequestering carbon, reducing greenhouse gas emissions, improving water quality, and supporting wildlife habitats. One of the industries that can benefit from regenerative agriculture is fashion. Fashion is one of the most polluting and wasteful industries in the world, consuming large amounts of water, energy, and chemicals, and producing huge amounts of textile waste and emissions. According to the United Nations, the fashion industry is responsible for 10% of global carbon emissions, 20% of global wastewater, and 85% of textiles that end up in landfills or incinerators every year. Regenerative fashion is a term that refers to clothing and accessories that are made from fibers and materials that are grown or sourced through regenerative agriculture. This means that the production of these fibers and materials does not harm the environment, but rather enhances it. Some examples of regenerative fibers and materials are organic cotton, hemp, linen, wool, silk, alpaca, cashmere, and leather. Regenerative fashion aims to create a circular economy for the fashion industry, where nothing is wasted and everything is reused or recycled. It also aims to support the livelihoods and well-being of the farmers and workers who produce the fibers and materials, as well as the communities and cultures they belong to. Regenerative fashion is not only about making clothes that are good for the planet, but also good for the people. Regenerative agriculture and regenerative fashion are part of a larger movement to transform our relationship with nature and each other. They offer a vision of a more sustainable, ethical, and beautiful future for the fashion industry and the world.","time":"2w","title":"Raw Revel"},{"likes_count":4,"text":"FASHION FACTS SERIES - Fact 03 Fashion might seem a small player in this emergency on Climate Change - This statement could not be further from the truth. As climate change accelerates droughts in many parts of the world, valuable drinking water and water needed for growing food crops is being used to produce clothes that somebody in the Western world may wear (on average) five times before throwing them away.","time":"2w","title":"Raw Revel"},{"likes_count":6,"text":"FASHION FACTS SERIES - Fact 02 Fashion might seem a small player in this emergency on Climate Change - This statement could not be further from the truth. Twenty per cent of industrial water pollution is due to garment manufacturing and dyeing, and the fashion sector is the second largest consumer of water globally.","time":"2w","title":"Raw Revel"},{"likes_count":5,"text":"FASHION FACTS SERIES - Fact 01 Fashion might seem a small player in this emergency on Climate Change - This statement could not be further from the truth. As per the British Fashion Council, Circular Fashion Ecosystem Report, September 2021 - Two-thirds of our clothes are made from synthetics derived from fossil fuels, and the industry is responsible for 5 per cent of global Greenhouse Gases emissions.","time":"2w","title":"Raw Revel"}]

name: The McDonald Group, Inc.
location: P.O. Box 730, Arlington Heights, IL 60006, US
about:
Thank you.  Do visit us: www.McDonaldGroupInc.com.

For 50 years we have been partnering with manufacturers and dealers to improve market share, profitability,  absorption rate and customer retention. 

Walter J. McDonald's latest book, "Achieving Excellence in Dealer/Distributor Performance," is now on Amazon.com, receiving praise from business leaders in North America, Europe and The Far East. 

If you sell and service machinery in the heavy construction equipment, forklift, fire apparatus, heavy duty truck, forestry equipment, utility, municipal and environmental, farm power and compact construction equipment industries, you are in our wheelhouse.

Our primary strengths are in 
* Marketing and business strategies for equipment manufacturers and dealer organizations.
* OEM field sales and dealer operations management training for district sales managers.
* Dealer management training for equipment sales managers, parts and service operations, rental and used equipment mangers, aftermarket marketing and customer service and retention.
* Dealer selling skills training and development.
* End user customer satisfaction assessments to determine competitive awareness and comparisons.

Our highly-qualified senior professional staff maintains a broad portfolio of resources and capabilities. Our industry-specific problem-solving experiences cover a broad spectrum of distribution management challenges both for manufacturers and dealers.  

Common client issues include:
Where should we take our dealer business and how?
How do we gain market share and still improve dealer absorption rate?
What are the key leverage points to improve  aftermarket operations and profitability?
How can we best apply and implement best industry practices and high-profit performance benchmarks? 
How do we make our machinery and aftermarket sales personnel more effective and competitive?
How should we best negotiate the challenges and opportunities of dealer consolidations?

specialties: Not available
updates: [{"text":"AS OPERATION Brock caused recent cross-Channel delays, business group Logistics UK is urging government to find a longer-term solution to protect the UK’s supply chain. “While Operation Brock can help the flow of traffic during peak periods, it disrupts the flow of vehicles and goods, to and from the Continent and does not take into account the needs of drivers with no food or access to hygiene facilities,” said Logistics’ Nichola Mallon, who stressed: “Our members need a long-term solution to crossing the UK’s borders, rather than the ‘on again, off again’ Brock scheme.” 𝐒𝐓𝐎𝐑𝐘 : https://ow.ly/ZOiV50PvWrg #transportnews","time":"7h","title":"Transport News"},{"likes_count":7,"text":"📣 IMPORTANT ANNOUNCEMENT 📣 Road Transport Expo (RTX) has announced it will be back next year at NAEC Stoneleigh from 4-6 June. about: Somos una empresa comercializadora de pescados y mariscos frescos con más de 100 años en el sector gracias a nuestra tradición familiar. updates: [{"likes_count":4,"text":"COLLECTE DE PRODUITS D’HYGIÈNE ET DE BEAUTÉ ! A partir du 15 mai jusqu’au 17 juin, La Boutique New Age, située au 38 rue du Poteau à Paris accueille une collecte de produits d’hygiène, de soin et de beauté au profit de l’association Protection Civile Paris Seine. L’association redistribuera les produits collectés aux personnes sans-abris lors de maraudes ou dans les foyers d’accueil. The resource person for the program was Dr. Kaushik Dutta who is a renowned Systems Thinker and has a rich and vast industry and consulting experience with corporate, government, and international agencies. His sessions focused on various topics, including solving wicked problems, systems thinking, the viable systems model, and consulting in the digital world. The FDP featured sessions on the following topics: Session 1: Solving Wicked Problems: Understanding the characteristics of wicked problems and developing effective problem-solving approaches. Session 2: Systems Thinking: Exploring the concept of systems thinking and its application in the consulting process. Session 4: Consulting in the Digital World: Examining the impact of digitalization on consulting practices and exploring digital tools and strategies. The resource person provided valuable insights, shared case studies, and conducted interactive sessions to facilitate learning and knowledge exchange. name: Katie Woods Therapy
location: Lymm, Warrington wa13, GB,Tarporley Road, Stretton, Warrington, England WA4 4, GB
about: Having experienced trauma first hand when I was 14 years old, I understand the importance of having the right help and support through the difficult times and so this is where my passion lies. If you are considering therapy please take a moment… Talking about painful and difficult subjects can be daunting and uncomfortable. It takes courage and strength to share this. It is my role to offer you a safe and supportive space, taking time to build trust and honesty between us. I work from the Person-Centred Approach which means no advice will be given and I won’t push or pull you in any direction. We will go at the your pace. I believe and trust that you will go wherever you need to. Empathy is very important to me. I acknowledge that everyone is different and I strive to understand each individual. I feel privileged to be invited into your life, let me stand in your shoes and appreciate your world. The therapeutic relationship between you and myself is key. To have someone who you are able to relate to is extremely valuable. I also work creatively, using Person-Centred Expressive Art Therapy. This can be beneficial in allowing us to freely express our feelings when we don't have the words to explain. Art therapy is your choice and can be used for whole or part sessions. This can be discussed in more detail depending on your preference. Therapy helps. It is your space be true and open, to try and understand what and why you are feeling this way. This in turn can help to restore your calmness. I believe the Person-Centred approach is the best tool to rebuild trust in yourself, and allow you to ultimately become your true self.
specialties: Anxiety, Depression, Loss and Grief, Loneliness, Low Self Esteem, Trauma, Anger, Chronic Pain, Life Changes, Personal Development, and Suicidal Thoughts
slogan: I am a fully qualified and compassionate Person-Centred Counsellor. Experienced in working with young people and adults.

name: Hailsham Creative
location: Hayreed Lane, Wilmington, Polegate, East Sussex BN266RR, GB
about: A design company that likes to bring out the creative side in its clients. We work WITH (not for) clients, collaborating and helping them to maybe see things another way - and there's nearly always another way!` We like the variety and energy we get working with small, medium and large businesses. We love to work with people that are equally as enthusiastic and committed as we are to doing things the right way, or a different way. We definitely work best with people that we like. We live and work in the middle of the Sussex countryside with a dog called Megan, who very much enjoys covering herself with fox poo for some reason (what's that all about?), two cats - one of whom is currently recovering from a skiing injury and the other is a reincarnation of Orson Wells. We are very old. Ancient in fact. Over 50. That is old, believe me, for graphic designers. Usually, designers of our vintage have inhaled so much Spray Mount and Magic Marker fumes, that brain and lungs have turned to a kind of grey sludge and congealed in our turn ups. We seem to have got away with it though and we're still creating. Creating what? Logos, branding, brochures, beautiful print work, magazine layouts, advertisements, exhibition displays, leaflets, posters, t-shirts, business cards, web sites, videos, music, painting, you name it! Seriously, you name it! That's one of the few good things about being old - you name it and we've probably done it already at some time. We even know what the internet is… …sort of!
specialties: Branding, identity, print, brochures, stationery, marketing, magazine design, packaging, and illustration
slogan: Branding, artwork, print or website creation, we'll give you the look you need without giving you kittens

name: CollectiveCM Ltd

about: Independent professional Property Surveyors based in Kent. All our professionals have vast experience within the construction industry coming through both practical and managerial routes to form a professional and consistently progressive team with a collective and sustained experience history of over 60 years. Our management team, engaged consultants and appointed personnel come with all the relevant qualifications for sector requirements and provide practical and collaborative construction management solutions, so all our clients can be sure of excellent and professional input at all times. ✅ CIOB - Chartered Institute of Building ✅ CABE – Chartered Association of Building Engineers ✅ RICS - Royal Institution of Chartered Surveyors ✅ ICWCI - Institute of Clerks of Works and Construction Inspectorate We bring a proactive approach to the property surveying process; Professionalism, client satisfaction and value for money are the core drivers of our company ethos. We are totally dedicated to understanding, responding to and achieving our clients' aims, aspirations, obligations and goals. about: Trends empowers our clients with technology-enabled business services allowing them to transcend. Our skilled and highly-qualified team enable businesses by providing a full service and support system – from strategic consulting and planning, seamless deployment, installation and implementation, effective maintenance, and dedicated after-sales support. Topping the Philippine ICT industry for more than 25 years and catering to different organizations across industries, we prioritize customer satisfaction by delivering only the best and most effective services. Please read this Privacy Statement carefully to understand how we treat Personal Data. We will only collect, use and disclose your personal information with your knowledge and consent; we will take on a global and systematic approach to cross-border privacy law enforcement. about: Après avoir investi dans le digital, investissez dans l’optimisation de vos espaces de travail. Nous proposons donc de créer, en partenariat avec vos équipes, des espaces de travail cohérents et ajustés, grâce à l’identification claire de votre organisation, des méthodes de travail, des objectifs et des valeurs de votre société. Placer vos collaborateurs au cœur de la réflexion permet de donner du sens à l’agencement de vos espaces professionnels. Etre bien au travail décuple la créativité et la performance individuelle offrant une vraie valeur ajoutée pour la productivité globale de l’entreprise. Sur la base du space planning, il est possible d'attendre d'un agencement réussi : • Cohérence avec les valeurs et la stratégie de votre société • Réflexion autour du quotidien de vos équipes, créant un réel confort pour travailler • Création d'une dynamique, qui renforce le sentiment d'appartenance à l'entreprise Pour toute information complémentaire, contactez-nous sur contact@latelierdesconcepts.com

On continue ce mercredi avec Jean De Lathouwer !","time":"6mo","title":"OMA Médiation"},{"comments_count":1,"likes_count":3,"text":"Visite d‘un groupe de disciples algériens pour une #formation de base à la #médiation, toute cette semaine, avec l’équipe d’OMA Médiation ASBL. Le groupe est piloté par Monsieur Boubeker Belacel, notaire, médiateur assermenté depuis près de 10 ans, formateur. Depuis toutes ces années, fort de puissantes valeurs, ils militent pour la paix. Il a décidé de coorganiser avec l’équipe d’OMA, centre international de formation et de médiation à Bruxelles, une formation avec des amis notaires et avocats algériens. Plus nous nous comprenons et nous travaillons à la paix en nous, plus nous serons en paix avec les autres. Cette formation nous permet entre autres de partager nos expériences belges et algériennes et de mieux comprendre les racines du conflit, d’adopter une juste communication avec les autres. Avant d’entrer dans le vif du sujet et de se mettre au travail, rien de tel qu’une visite au plus célèbre des Bruxellois, Manneken Pis et de faire connaissance avec le folklore typique de Bruxelles !","time":"6mo","title":"OMA Médiation"},{"comments_count":1,"likes_count":5,"time":"7mo"},{"likes_count":1,"text":"Formation continue OMA Médiation OMAmediation à l'éthique de la médiation (avec Stephen Bensimon et Thierry Lagneaux) les 22 et 23 mars 2023. Détails et inscription : https://lnkd.in/eq3v2hhz La question des principes éthiques et déontologiques de la médiation est cruciale à plusieurs points de vue. Elle permet d’abord à l’analyste de distinguer la médiation de l’ensemble des autres modes de régulation des conflits et d’identifier les enjeux philosophiques et politiques qui lui sont spécifiques. Elle donne ensuite l’occasion aux médiateurs de se différencier de tous les autres « faiseurs de paix » et de montrer la spécificité et donc l’utilité de leur action. Elle permet surtout de les unir autour d’un certain nombre de valeurs dont le partage crée les conditions de la construction d’un être ensemble et, au bout du compte, d’une structuration professionnelle. name: Southdown Gun Club & Activity Centre
location: Southdown, Muntham Farm, Findon, West Sussex BN14 0RQ, GB
about: Southdown Gun Club is located in West Sussex just north of Findon, in the middle of the beautiful South Downs National Park. Established in 1984 the clay pigeon shooting ground celebrated 30 years of shooting four years ago and having won the Nations Favourite Shooting Ground for the last four years, as voted for by the readers of Clay Shooting Magazine. It is now one of the largest shooting centres in the UK. We are members of the Clay Pigeon Shooting Association CPSA and are accredited with the sought after Premier Ground Status. We have a fully stocked Gun Shop and are open for practice shooting and tuition Wednesday to Saturday every week with registered competitions most Sundays. Membership is not essential and everyone is welcome, but being a member of one of the best shooting grounds does have its advantages, which include valuable practice round discounts, free rounds and other special offers..
specialties: clay pigeon shooting, corporate entertainment, archery, axe throwing, air gun experience, shooting, meeting room hire, charity events, staff reward days, client entertainment, Christmas parties, and shooting competitions

name: First Class Mortgage - Maple Grove, MN
location: 12906 63rd Ave N, Maple Grove, Minnesota 55369, US
about: Making the decision to purchase a new home, a second home, or refinance your existing home isn't always easy. There's a lot to consider. At First Class Mortgage we can help ensure that you get maximum financing flexibility with the most competitive rates and terms. Why First Class? Recognizing that mortgage transactions are becoming increasingly complicated, a dedicated group of lending professionals created a company that simplifies the process while First Class Mortgage is committed to offering our customers a faster, less frustrating and less expensive mortgage experience. Our team uses our 120 years of combined knowledge, professional experience, and vast industry contacts to ensure we offer every customer the best product possible. Our focus is on people, with the understanding that each borrower has a different set of financial circumstances requiring a unique customized mortgage. At First Class Mortgage, we know that client satisfaction is the essence of a successful business. We are committed to understanding the financial needs of our customers, offering exceptional service, bringing ideal products and doing it all in a timely matter. name: Kiran Consulting Group
location: 4204 Jutland Dr # C, San Diego, California 92117-3665, US
about: Kiran Consulting Group (KCG) is a specialty consulting firm serving leaders in the industries of hospitality and tourism. Through unique simulation strategies, we help clients manage their large numbers of visitors, whether that be through line-management, exhibition flow and ticketing services. Using data-centric analysis, KCG redefines the differences between known and unknown, random and predictable, controllable and uncontrollable. In doing so, we drive dramatic improvements in our clients’ ability to meet their customers’ highest expectations. Since 1990, KCG has been called upon by operators of the world’s leading travel and tourist destinations to help solve their most challenging people-flow problems. Using KCG principles, we have developed predictive analytic solutions for arrival forecasting and labor scheduling for retail operations worldwide. As a social business, KCG works to better our cultural communities by working for investment, rather than purely profit. KCG’s work has allowed for industry leaders in culture and tourism to create unforgettable experiences for their guests, by managing all their visitor-related issues. From streamlining ticketing operations to controlling people flow through tight exhibition spaces, KCG works hard to create the right visitor experience for your needs. KCG has been an expert consultant for every major tourism industry since 1990, managing visitor flow through observation decks, fine art museums and UNESCO world heritage sites. Interested in finding out more about our services? Please feel free to reach out to us via email, LinkedIn, or by filling out our online form on our website.
specialties: data analytics, simulation, forecasting, visitor flow optimization, visitor experience, timed ticketing, crowd management, sustainable tourism, ride design, museums, observation decks, ticketing optimization, scheduling, efficiency, VIP lines, elevator optimization, UNESCO world heritage, ticket pricing, theme parks, and queue management
slogan: Improving People Flow through Data Analytics

What We Do... Our team of application and design engineers at Casso-Solar Technologies works closely with our customers to ensure a head start towards success. We listen to your requirements and concerns. Casso-Solar Technologies offers consulting services to evaluate your goals, developing a plan for both process and equipment, using our extensive testing laboratory to complete the project. Coupled with our design and fabrication capabilities with our partners, Casso-Solar Technologies offers the complete solution to give our customers an edge over their competitors. How To Get Started... Casso-Solar Technologies website will provide introductory information to a variety of technologies. Our Sales and Applications Engineers stand ready to assist you. Please contact us, or click on Inquiries to obtain a quote or submit an inquiry. For immediate results, please call: 845-354-2010 or email sales@cassosolartechnologies.com.
specialties: Engineering and Design, Heat Processing, Glass Processing, Technical Support, Laminating, Paint and Powder Finishing, Textiles, Metals, Plastic, Film, Automotive Glass, Architectural Glass, Ballistic Glass, Appliance Glass, Aircraft Glass, Process Design, and Ovens

name: PigCHAMP
location: PigCHAMP, 1531 Airport Road, Suite 101, Ames, Iowa 50010, US
about: With customers in more than 40+ countries, PigCHAMP Knowledge Software is the most widely used swine production management software in the world. The PigCHAMP line of products is an integrated and innovative suite of powerful management tools for the swine industry. Used worldwide by producers, veterinarians, and management consultants, it is the leader in swine data collection, management and interpretation that gives you the clearest vision of your operation available today. Along with PigCHAMP products, the company offers: Support - PigCHAMP continues to make improvements to our customer service and education. If you have questions, there are a number of features that can be used to help you find the answers you want. Benchmarking - PigCHAMP is pleased to provide pork producers with new benchmarking information that is designed to help you compare your operation's performance with a range of industry averages. Training - At PigCHAMP, we understand that learning a software program can be challenging. Because of this, we created a variety of ways for you to learn how to use our program, no matter your level of experience.
specialties: Leading Swine Data Collectoin and Management and Interpretation Software

name: UAB Honors College
location: 1401 University Blvd, Birmingham, Alabama, US
about: An honors education at many universities is one-size-fits all. Not so at UAB. With almost 2,000 undergraduate students, the UAB Honors College offers two curricular options: Personalized Path and Specialized Programs. Students in the Personalized Path work with an advisor to create their own trajectory that includes honors seminars, core, and elective courses aligned with their unique interests and goals. The Specialized Programs offer structured curricula for interdisciplinary arts and sciences, science and technology, or global and community leadership. Whichever honors curriculum our students pursue, they benefit from a close-knit community and endless opportunities. The Honors College is dedicated to innovative courses, hands-on experience, service learning, and — most importantly — the individuality and diversity of our brilliant students.
specialties: Not available
updates: [{"likes_count":1,"text":"Did you know that UAB was one of the first seven institutions selected to participate in the Gulf Scholars Program (GSP)? Announced in October 2020 as a pilot program from the National Academies’ Gulf Research Program, the UAB GSP aims to prepare undergraduates to address pressing environmental, health, energy and infrastructure challenges in the Gulf of Mexico region. It is also a funded partnership housed in the UAB Honors College in collaboration with the UAB School of Engineering and UAB School of Public Health. We're so proud of the first cohort of honors students who were selected to conduct research focused on challenges facing the Gulf Coast region in the US: 🔥 Olivia Blanton (pictured) 🔥 Jaiden Hatch 🔥 Grace Williams 🔥 Sonoka Deguchi Read the full story at https://buff.ly/45ccQ3h. #UABHonors #SetYourWorldOnFire","time":"1d","title":"UAB Honors College"},{"likes_count":9,"text":"There are two weeks until the New Student Experience retreat, so we're throwing it back to the Student Leadership retreat! During this retreat, students learned more about their roles and responsibilities as Honors Ambassadors, Student Mentor and Retreat Team (SMART) Leaders, and members of the Honors College Leadership Council (HCLC). They participated in different team-building activities that included themed debates, crafty experiments, and a scavenger hunt. We can't wait to see what they will accomplish in the fall! #UABHonors #SetYourWorldOnFire","time":"5d","title":"UAB Honors College"},{"likes_count":2,"text":"Help us congratulate our own Wajiha Mekki for being selected for the prestigious Johnson & Johnson internship! Competitively selected after five rounds of interviews and out of hundreds of applicants, Mekki will work alongside the Janssen Pharmaceutical Company of Johnson & Johnson in the Medical Affairs department. Read the full story at https://buff.ly/3QiqOwc! #UABHonors #SetYourWorldOnFire","time":"1w","title":"UAB Honors College"},{"likes_count":12,"text":"Did you know that 53 honors students were selected as the 2023 UAB Honors College Delegation to present research at the National Conference on Undergraduate Research (NCUR)? Honors students were among more than 3,500 students from various institutions of higher education across the nation to present original research. Their topics included Parkinson's Disease, burnout, work-family conflict, Cardiac Fibroblast, ovarian cancer, circadian rhythm, gender identity, hypertension, chemotherapeutic drugs, humanity, and eating disorders. Honors students, Anantha Korrapati and Sumedha Bobba, won an award from the SENS Research Foundation for their research presentations at NCUR. Their selection as recipients speaks to the outstanding quality of their undergraduate research! Read the full story at https://buff.ly/451cdtl. #UABHonors #SetYourWorldOnFire","time":"2w","title":"UAB Honors College"},{"comments_count":1,"likes_count":12,"text":"We’re overjoyed to announce our very own Emma Terry was named 1st Runner-Up in the 2023 Miss Alabama Competition! Affectionately known as \"Miss UAB,\" Emma received many accolades during the competition including: 🏆 Community Service finalist for the \"Stomping Out ALS One Step at a Time\" initiative ⛳️ Golf Tournament winner along with her golf team, Bryant Turner and Arc Realty 👗 Evening Gown Preliminary winner Scroll through the photos to find out what Emma had to say about her experience in the competition and support from the UAB community! Keep blazing new trails, Emma! #UABHonors #SetYourWorldOnFire","time":"2w","title":"UAB Honors College"},{"likes_count":23,"text":"Help us congratulate recent honors graduate, Arushi Kotru, for being selected for the prestigious Critical Language Scholarship Program! She will spend eight weeks this summer in Jaipur, India to study reading, writing and speaking Hindi. The Critical Language Scholarship, a program of the United States Department of State, is a unique and prestigious study abroad program that emphasizes cultural immersion through the placement of American students enrolled in U.S. colleges and universities into diverse overseas environments. After she finishes her summer in India, Kotru will begin her stint at the National Institutes of Health as a part of the Intramural Research Training Program. Kotru plans to soon apply to medical school and eventually begin a medical scientist training program, where she will earn her dual M.D./Ph.D. and go on to become a physician-scientist. Read the full story at https://buff.ly/3O00NPs! #UABHonors #SetYourWorldOnFire","time":"3w","title":"UAB Honors College"},{"likes_count":6,"text":"#ThrowbackThursday to when we collaborated with the Alabama Holocaust Education Center (AHEC) to make paper daffodils for the 2023 Daffodil Campaign! This event helped to commemorate the 80th anniversary of the Warsaw Ghetto Uprising. This campaign was part of a community-wide effort geared to educate people about the 1943 Warsaw Ghetto uprising. Students and staff enjoyed special presentations from Zoe Weil (Director of Education Engagement at AHEC and Honors alumna) and Linda Lucas, Ph.D. (former provost of UAB). They both shared their experiences and the importance of this special initiative. #UABHonors #SetYourWorldOnFire","time":"3w","title":"UAB Honors College"},{"likes_count":19,"text":"We're happy to announce that Tyler Zhou placed first in our annual Honors College Art Contest! Zhou's winning design will be displayed on promotional material for the 2023 Honors College New Student Experience retreat. As the recipient, he received the Honors College Dean's Scholarship Award. Zhou is a rising senior majoring in industrial distribution with a concentration in medical equipment and supplies distribution. Through an accelerated bachelor’s/master’s (ABM) program, he is also pursuing a master's in business administration. Read the full story at https://buff.ly/43ksurO. #UABHonors #SetYourWorldOnFire","time":"4w","title":"UAB Honors College"},{"likes_count":7,"text":"🥼 #ThrowbackThursday to our “Insider Tips for Success in Medical School” panel! Three honors alumni who recently completed their fourth year of medical school hosted a panel discussion to share their insights and perspectives with students who were selected to attend medical school this summer. The panel consisted of: 🩺 Tim McWilliams, M.D. 🩺 Kelly Chandler, M.D. 🩺 Ryan Wong, M.D. The panelists are all graduates from the class of 2019, and they are currently working in their residencies. We appreciate our alumni for always answering the call to help our students! 💚 #UABHonors #SetYourWorldOnFire","time":"1mo","title":"UAB Honors College"},{"likes_count":4,"text":"Happy Fourth of July, Honors Blazers! 🇺🇸 Have fun, and stay safe today! #UABHonors #SetYourWorldOnFire","time":"1mo","title":"UAB Honors College"}]

name: The Optical Society (OSA)
location: 2010 Massachusetts Ave, NW, Washington, DC 20036, US
about: The Optical Society (OSA) is now Optica! Dedicated to promoting the generation, application, archiving and dissemination of knowledge in optics and photonics worldwide. name: Districam Licores
location: Poligono Industrial Saprelorca, Avenida Río Guadalquivir - Parcela S3, Lorca, Murcia 30800, ES
about: La empresa, creada en 1999 y dirigida por los hermanos Luis Miguel y Facundo Chuecos, nace con el objetivo de dar respuesta a la creciente demanda en el sector de la distribución de licores y vinos, alimentación, así como cualquier producto necesario para el hostelero. Además, somos especialistas en la realización de todo tipo de cestas de Navidad y regalos de empresa, realizándose totalmente a medida. Desde nuestros inicios, una atención cercana y servicio eficaz nos han diferenciado. Nuestro lema corporativo es: “Cero Problemas” y es que nuestro principal cometido es ofrecer un servicio de calidad, que ofrezca soluciones rápidas y puntuales a los clientes. En Districam sabemos lo importante que es que los productos lleguen a nuestros clientes a tiempo y en perfectas condiciones, su negocio depende de ello y por lo tanto el nuestro también. Es por ello que la puntualidad y la rápida respuesta son nuestra máxima prioridad y nuestros clientes saben que con nosotros pueden estar tranquilos, ya que le damos lo que quiere, cómo lo quiere y cuando lo quiere. Esforzándonos cada vez más por ofrecer soluciones que hagan la vida de nuestros clientes más sencilla, y en ello la tecnología es nuestra mejor aliada. Por eso contamos con sistema propio de pedidos, con stocks actualizados y una plataforma que conecta al cliente con nosotros en todo momento. Cuidando los detalles y creyendo firmemente que el negocio de nuestros clientes, es también el nuestro, hemos conseguido que más de 10.000 clientes confíen en nosotros, alcanzando una facturación superior a 41 millones de euros y convirtiéndonos así en la distribuidora de referencia del sureste peninsular.
specialties: Vinos, Licores, Alimentación, Drogueria, and Menaje y Vajilla
updates: [{"likes_count":4,"text":"✨ Descubre la elegancia y pasión del vino Juana La Loca Edición Mujer ✨ En Districam, nos encanta poder presentarte un vino extraordinario, cargado de historia y expresión única: ¡Juana La Loca Edición Mujer! 👩❤️ Cada botella representa la esencia de la pasión y la elegancia 🍇 Recuerda que por cada venta de una botella de este vino, donaremos 3€ a la asociación AVIDA que apoya a las mujeres que han sufrido violencia de género. ¡Únete a la experiencia de Juana La Loca y descubre la magia que encierra cada botella! 💫🍷 #juanalaloca #vino #avida #mujer #murcia #districam #regiondemurcia","time":"3d","title":"Districam Licores"},{"likes_count":8,"text":"¿Sabéis que Districam asistió al evento de Hostelor! name: CESCO.
location: No.1, 42th Alley, Heydarkhani St. Resalat Highway, Tehran, Tehran, IR
about: The Country’s Exploration Services Company (CESCO) was established in 1975 to support the activities of mining and exploration industries of the state. Since its founding, it has been an important activist in the field of geological and exploration studies. Prior to 1994, the company’s activities were mainly focused on studying on geology, geophysics and geochemistry, core drilling and drilling exploratory tunnel. But since 1994, it has begun other activities such as mine preparation, mine blast, road construction, excavation, and mine extraction. Nowadays, the company is one of the biggest companies in exploration and earth moving operations as well as construction projects in Iran.
specialties: Mining, Exploratory Drilling, Blasting, and Mining Exploitation
slogan: Not available
