name: Domotica Control
location: Willem de Zwijgerlaan 25, Oegstgeest, NL,Langegracht 70, Leiden, South Holland, NL
about: Domotica Control specializes in the automation of houses and offices. You can contact us for domotics issues in the areas of lighting, climate control, security and audio. We would like to advise you to realize all your wishes. After your wishes are clear, we help you with the installation of the different systems so that you can use it immediately. We are happy to assist you in maintaining the systems. You will receive a single point of contact for your (technical) questions and wishes. With this we provide updates, adjustments in the systems and a 48-hour emergency guarantee. Fibaro The basic system for the automation of lighting and climate control is Fibaro. Experience has shown that this is a stable, scalable and easy to maintain system at low costs. Audio Sonos is the most complete system for your streaming audio. The Sonos wireless system brings audio to any room via wireless HiFi speakers and audio components or your existing stereo system. Security Domotica Control is the official dealer of the Verisure Alarm system. This system is the only system that is linked to a control room that can directly alert the emergency services. You can easily operate all systems with your smartphone.
specialties: Domotica, Verlichting, Klimaat, Audio, and beveiliging
slogan: It's time for Smart Living

name: Consitu AB
location: Trefasgatan 3, Västerås, Västmanland 721 30, SE,Stockholm, Stockholm 1160, SE
about: Consitu är ett konsultbolag som verkar i Mälardalsregionen. Vi startade år 2010 i Västerås och består idag av en grupp konsulter med bred kompetens uppbyggd på den erfarenhet som många uppdrag hos olika kunder givit oss. Vi strävar efter att omgivningen skall känna närhet i samarbetet med oss, både som företag och som individer. Vi vill vara enkla att arbeta med och söker långsiktighet i våra relationer med såväl medarbetare som kunder och samarbetspartners. Viktigt för oss är också att alla medarbetare känner sig delaktiga i företaget och vår utveckling. Våra ledstjärnor är: - Sunda värderingar - Kompetens - Delaktighet - Engagemang - Långsiktighet
specialties: Projektledning, Verksamhetsutveckling, Systemutveckling, Förändringsledning, Teknisk Projektledning, and Testledning
updates: [{"likes_count":19,"text":"☀️ Glad sommar från Consitu! ☀️ Nu är sommaren här och vi hoppas att du har grillen redo, solkrämen i väskan och iskaffet i handen för att njuta av en fantastisk semester. Samtidigt vill vi påminna om att vi finns här när hösten närmar sig. Om ni behöver extra resurser och kloka huvuden för att ta er igenom höstens utmaningar, tveka inte att höra av dig till oss! Så njut av soliga dagar och varva ner ordentligt. När du är redo att sätta fart igen, kom ihåg att Consitu bara är ett samtal eller mejl bort. Vi ser fram emot att kicka igång hösten tillsammans med er!","time":"3w","title":"Consitu AB"},{"likes_count":17,"text":"✉️ Så skriver du ett bra out-of-office inför semestern ✉️ Semestern närmar sig och det är dags att koppla av och glömma jobbet för en stund. För att verkligen kunna släppa taget om mejlkorgen är det bra att slå på ett out-of-office eller autosvar, på mejlen. Sandra Trankell på Stockholms Skrivbyrå AB berättar: – Oavsett vilken bransch du tillhör eller vilken roll du har, kan ett autosvar göra gott. Det visar att du tänkt på personen som hör av sig till dig så att de inte lämnas i ovisshet. Vi får ta emot en hel del autosvar i semestertider, så att skriva ett som sticker ut lite i mängden kan vara en härlig överraskning! Vi frågade Sandra om hennes bästa tips för att skriva tydliga (och härliga) autosvar. Här är resultatet! 👉 Börja mejlet med ett tack! Att inleda med att tacka personen som hört av sig ger ett trevligt intryck. 👉 Våga bjuda på dig själv! När du beskriver varför du är borta, har du chansen att bjuda på något mer personligt. Kanske ska du skriva att du är på bilsemester? Eller i Spanien och äter tapas? Lägg det på den nivå du själv är bekväm med, förstås. 👉 Var tydlig! Förutom att meddela när du är tillbaka kan du beskriva vad personen ska göra för att komma vidare. Kan den kontakta en kollega till dig, skicka ett sms eller vänta tills du är tillbaka? Kom ihåg att inte hänvisa till sms eller telefon, om du inte vill ta emot samtal under semestern. 👉 Avsluta med något härligt eller intressant! Förutom att skriva glad sommar kan du kanske skicka med ett inspirerande tips eller bild, eller varför inte en rad om vad ditt företag erbjuder. Annars ett poddtips för slappa stunder i hängmattan? Söker du nya utmaningar, eller önskar du förstärka ditt team inför hösten? Kontakta oss så pratar vi mer. Mejlar du oss under semestern får du ett härligt out-of-office i retur 😎","time":"4w","title":"Consitu AB"},{"comments_count":2,"likes_count":49,"text":"🚲 Den 17:e juni kl. 04:20 börjar Team Consitu med Vänner 2023 års tur runt Vättern! Till årets upplaga har vi skaffat team-kläder (snygga!) och utökat med några extra ryttare ur nätverket. Vi har formulerat målen kring upplevelsen – vi ska ha kul och hjälpas åt – och räknar med att det ska ta oss i mål i god tid till en välförtjänt middag i Vadstena, där vi kommer att bo hos svärmor till Staffan Svärd, Margareta Stiernspetz 🏚 Film och bilder till det här inlägget är från förra helgens genrep runt Siljan och Orsa-sjön. Vi börjar få bra kläm på drag och växlingar och hade en härlig resa i vackra Dalarna. Kul också att vi, en stor del av sträckan, fick sällskap av urstarka Anders Lindberg, Thore Sekkenes, Petrik Ziebeil, liksom ett gäng från Mälarenergi AB. Tack för trevligt sällskap och gott samarbete! Consitu håller tummarna för sitt team nästa helg. Stort lycka till och ha riktigt kul! Björn Offerman, Staffan Svärd, Jon Breivold, Magnus Engdahl, Oscar Eklundh, Magnus Lindman och Carl Åstrand. Saknar du cykelkompisar? Eller har du resursbehov inom projektledning, verksamhetsutveckling eller systemutveckling? ➡ skriv ett meddelande till Staffan eller Björn 😉","time":"1mo","title":"Consitu AB"},{"likes_count":8,"text":"Tiden går fort när man har roligt! - 13år av att göra det man vill är inte illa:)","time":"1mo 2mo","title":"Consitu AB"},{"comments_count":17,"likes_count":48,"time":"1mo"},{"comments_count":17,"likes_count":48,"text":"☀ Välkommen Joel Sandberg! ☀ Vi är glada över att få välkomna Joel Sandberg till vårt team på Consitu i Västerås. Joel är projektledare och han har en gedigen samling kompetenser i sin verktygslåda. Han har en maskiningenjörsexamen som bas och sedan tidigare i sin karriär är han specialiserad inom energifrågor. Han har även lång erfarenhet som konsult inom projektledning, utredning, projektering, upphandling, och konstruktion. Joels talanger sträcker sig även utanför arbetslivet. När han inte kommer att leda projekt hos oss, kan vi hitta Joel på surfbrädan som vågsurfare. Joel börjar hos oss efter semestern, och tills dess önskar vi honom all lycka bland vågorna! 🏄 Ser du ett behov av någon som Joel i ditt team? Eller är du själv intresserad av att bli en del av ett konsultbolag med många möjligheter? Då är du varmt välkommen att höra av dig till oss.","time":"1mo","title":"Consitu AB"},{"comments_count":1,"likes_count":50,"text":"👇 Hur startade resan med Consitu? Det har vi frågat Peter Jansson, vd för moderbolaget Consitu AB. – För 13 år sen, i juni 2010, startade Claes Brisby Consitu och jag fick chansen att komma med som delägare några månader senare. Jag hade i över tio år jobbat tillsammans med Claes i andra konsultbolag så vi kände varandra väl. Sedan dess har vi kört på. Peter hade en personlig ambition om att jobba för internationella bolag men kände också att det hade varit spännande att testa på entreprenörskap. När Claes frågade om han ville vara med och bygga upp vad som är Consitu idag, var det en möjlighet att få göra både och. Viktigt var också att ha kul när vi arbetar! – Vi har lyckats behålla vår entreprenörsanda och valt att samarbeta med kunder som delar våra värderingar. Vi tror på långsiktiga relationer med våra medarbetare, samarbetspartners och kunder, och det är viktigt för oss att man ska känna att ens arbete är utvecklande och meningsfullt. Peter berättar att en nyckel till att förverkliga Consitus värderingar är dynamiken mellan medarbetarna. Han menar på att bolagets storlek också spelar stor roll för kulturen. – Vårt fokus har inte varit snabb tillväxt. Vi vill i första hand kunna erbjuda våra medarbetare en tajt gemenskap och en kollektiv syn på saker och ting där vi hjälps åt. Och där medarbetare får vara med och påverka sin egen och företagets utveckling. Det är även viktigt för att kunna leverera kvalitet till våra kunder. 🙌 Vill du också vara en del av ett konsultbolag som tror på hållbarhet, kompetens och engagemang? Tveka inte att höra av dig till oss. Låt oss fortsätta skapa bra saker tillsammans!","time":"2mo","title":"Consitu AB"},{"comments_count":2,"likes_count":57,"text":"Med stolthet kan vi meddela att tre av våra kollegor, Daniel Lag - PMP®, Marie Brattström och Björn Offerman har klarat PMI PMP-provet och nu är certifierade projektledare! Grattis! 🏅 Så här skriver Daniel om certifieringen i ett inlägg här på Linkedin: “PMP-certifieringen är en av de mest eftertraktade och respekterade certifieringarna inom projektledning, och det har varit en utmaning att uppnå den. Men jag är stolt över att jag har visat mina färdigheter och kunskaper inom projektledning och därmed uppfyllt de höga standarderna som krävs för certifieringen.” Marie beskriver i ett inlägg att de inledande samtalen med bland annat Daniel och Björn har inneburit många givande diskussioner och lärdomar och att hon ser fram emot att nu få använda sina nya färdigheter och kunskaper. På Consitu är vi måna om att utvecklas – både som bolag och på individnivå, för att våra kollegor ska känna sig stimulerade och för att vi ska kunna förbättra våra leveranser till kund. 👏 Grattis till våra duktiga kollegor och stort lycka till i era uppdrag!","time":"3mo","title":"Consitu AB"},{"comments_count":12,"likes_count":93,"text":"👇 Hur är det egentligen att kombinera livet som vd och konsult? Det berättar vår Staffan Svärd, vd på Consitu i Västerås, som precis har gått in i ett nytt spännande uppdrag på Hitachi Energy. 👉 Vad är det bästa med att kombinera rollen som vd med att vara konsult? Det som är givande i konsultuppdragen är, förutom att hjälpa kunden, variationen i arbetsinnehåll och att möta nya människor och verksamheter. Att parallellt ansvara för Consitu Västerås ger mig det bästa av två världar. Jag har fantastiska medarbetare och det är otroligt kul att driva vår utveckling som individer och organisation tillsammans. Utbytet mellan de två rollerna hjälper mig mycket. Helhetsansvaret för Consitu Västerås ger mig större förståelse för organisatoriska förutsättningar i uppdragen, och även chefers. Den operativa erfarenheten i konsultuppdragen skapar närhet och gemenskap med mina kollegor på Consitu. Utöver att det är kul, utvecklande och bidrar till vår affär! 👉 Finns det likheter mellan dina olika roller som du kan dra nytta av i ditt arbete? Gemensamt för de båda är vikten av att kommunicera, etablera relationer och säkerställa att vi jobbar med rätt grejer. Att ”verkningsgraden” är bra. Det är viktigt att vara lyhörd, kombinera långsiktighet och strategisk analys med riktning i vardagen och att steg för steg röra sig i riktning mot de mål som satts upp. 👉 Vad är mest spännande med Hitachi Energy? Det mest spännande är teknikinnehållet och att Hitachi Energy är en riktig världsspelare. Och framförallt hur deras produkter och applikationer bidrar till framtidens hållbara energiförsörjning. Hållbarhet är något vi på Consitu värnar om och genom att hjälpa de större spelarna på marknaden får vi vara med och bidra till den globala omställningen. 🙌 Vi önskar Staffan lycka till i det nya uppdraget!","time":"3mo Edited","title":"Consitu AB"},{"likes_count":42,"text":"🍴Den 28:e mars fick teamet i Västerås chansen att testa på sina matlagningsfärdigheter på EAT Matstudio. Innan vi begav oss till matstudion hade vi ett lyckat månadsmöte där bland annat Stockholms Skrivbyrå AB gav oss en miniföreläsning om sociala medier och skrivande. 🍜 Menyn bestod av bland annat en het miso-ramen, ravioli med ricotta och tryffel, och dulche de leche-mousse i hasselnötskupol. 🎯 Vi hade en härlig matlagningskväll där vi fick lära oss hur olika smaker fungerar ihop. Men det var inte allt, efter matlagningspasset väntade även flipper, dart, fotboll- och karatespel. Vi tackar Consitus trivsel-general i Västerås Mikael Strandman som planerade kvällen. Även stort tack till Dennis Yen på EAT Matstudio som handledde oss under kvällen.","time":"3mo","title":"Consitu AB"}]
slogan: Rätt konsult på rätt plats

name: Mauro Silva Advogados Associados
location: SRTVN 702 Bloco P Ed. Brasília Rádio Center, Sobreloja 46, Brasília, Federal District 70719-900, BR
about: Tecnologia e tributos são o nosso negócio. Somos o 1º escritório de advocacia no Brasil especializado em crimes cibernéticos. Na parte cibernética, nossos serviços abrangem uma ampla gama de soluções jurídicas para enfrentar os desafios complexos e em constante evolução do mundo digital. Contamos com uma equipe de advogados especializados e experientes, prontos para oferecer suporte jurídico especializado em crimes cibernéticos. Ajudamos nossos clientes desde a análise de operações suspeitas, até a elaboração e acompanhamento da notícia crime perante as autoridades competentes, atuando como assistente de acusação para garantir o resultado favorável da peça acusatória.
specialties: Tributos e Previdência, Cível, Penal, Tax Recovery, Compliance Corporativo, Litigation, Consultoria, Legal Services, Internacional, Tecnologia, Direito Cibernético, Investigações, Instituições Financeiras, Ransomware, Malware, and Fraudes Bancárias
slogan: Resolvendo problemas e criando oportunidades

Même s'il n'y a pas eu de recrutement directement via nosmo, il a trouvé de la valeur dans nos services. En effet, notre mission ne s'arrête pas au recrutement. Nous sommes là pour accompagner nos clients et les aider à chasser les candidats. Simon a réussi à recruter grâce à son propre sourcing, preuve de notre succès. Voici son retour sur son expérience avec Nosmo : 🔹 \"𝑅𝑒𝑐𝑟𝑢𝑡𝑒𝑚𝑒𝑛𝑡 𝑒́𝑞𝑢𝑖𝑝𝑒 𝑠𝑎𝑙𝑒𝑠 -> 𝐺𝑟𝑜𝑠 𝑒𝑛𝑗𝑒𝑢 𝑐𝑎𝑟 𝑖𝑙 𝑠'𝑎𝑔𝑖𝑠𝑠𝑎𝑖𝑡 𝑑𝑒 𝑙𝑎 𝑐𝑟𝑒́𝑎𝑡𝑖𝑜𝑛 𝑑𝑒 𝑙𝑎 𝑐𝑜𝑟𝑒 𝑡𝑒𝑎𝑚 𝑠𝑎𝑙𝑒𝑠. 15 𝑐𝑎𝑛𝑑𝑖𝑑𝑎𝑡𝑠 𝑟𝑒𝑛𝑐𝑜𝑛𝑡𝑟𝑒́𝑠, 𝑑𝑜𝑛𝑡 90% 𝑞𝑢𝑎𝑙𝑖𝑓𝑖𝑒́𝑠. 𝐺𝑟𝑎𝑛𝑑𝑒 𝑟𝑒́𝑎𝑐𝑡𝑖𝑣𝑖𝑡𝑒́ 𝑒𝑡 𝑎𝑑𝑎𝑝𝑡𝑎𝑏𝑖𝑙𝑖𝑡𝑒́ 𝑎̀ 𝑛𝑜𝑠 𝑑𝑒𝑚𝑎𝑛𝑑𝑒𝑠 𝑝𝑎𝑟𝑓𝑜𝑖𝑠 𝑐𝑜𝑚𝑝𝑙𝑖𝑞𝑢𝑒́𝑒𝑠 :)\" Un grand merci à Simon pour ses paroles 🙂 Nous sommes ravis d'avoir pu répondre à tes attentes et on se réjouit de continuer à travailler avec toi et Lempire à l'avenir ! Si, comme Simon, tu cherches à renforcer ton équipe commerciale, n’hésite pas à contacter Alexy 🤝 #trustfolio #témoignage #clients","time":"2mo","title":"Nosmo"},{"comments_count":2,"likes_count":17,"text":"Comme lors d'une partie de karaoke 🎤, la cohésion d'équipe peut faire toute la différence dans la réussite d'une entreprise. 🤝 Imaginez une équipe où chacun vibre au même rythme, où les idées fusent, et où l'entraide est au cœur de toutes les actions. 👥 Chez nous, l'importance des liens forts et des moments de convivialité ne se limite pas aux heures de travail. Et voici comment nous cultivons cette cohésion (bon rien de sorcier, vous vous en doutez) : 🌟 Les afters works : que ce soit autour d'un verre après une journée bien remplie ou lors de sorties d’équipe. 🚀 Des activités externes : on organise des activités externes, comme des team-building, des sorties sportives ou des événements divertissant. 🍽️ Les déjeuners mensuels : chaque mois, on se retrouve autour d'un déjeuner d’équipe pour échanger, discuter de sujets variés. Ces moments partagés créent une véritable complicité et un esprit d'équipe solide. 💡 Au-delà de ces moments privilégiés, la cohésion d'équipe chez Nosmo se traduit par une entraide constante, une communication ouverte et un esprit collaboratif. Chacun est encouragé à partager ses idées, à apporter sa contribution et à se soutenir mutuellement. 📣 On croit en l'importance de créer un environnement où chacun se sent à sa place, respecté et soutenu. Alors oui ça fait très bullshit, mais promis c’est la vérité","time":"2mo","title":"Nosmo"},{"comments_count":1,"likes_count":6,"text":"📢 Sondage Nous avons besoin de ton aide 🙏 Nous sommes en train de rédiger un article pour notre futur blog ! Notre objectif est de comprendre les raisons pour lesquelles les candidats décident de mettre fin à un processus de recrutement. Si tu as d'autres idées, fais-le nous savoir dans les commentaires ! Tu pourras nous aider à comprendre comment rendre le processus de recrutement plus facile et plus agréable pour tout le monde ! Si tu travailles dans la vente ou la relation client et que tu as moins de 30 ans, contactes Pauline pour en parler directement avec elle #recrutement #candidats #processus #sondage #Nosmo","time":"2mo","title":"Nosmo"},{"comments_count":8,"likes_count":108,"text":"L’équipe au grand complet ! 🤩 Arthur habite à Rennes, Alexis nous accompagne 1 à 2 jours par semaine et chacun s'organise comme il le veut pour le télétravail, mais on trouve toujours des moments dans la semaine pour se rassembler. Très souvent autour d’un 𝗕𝗢𝗡 repas. Et cette fois-ci, on a opté pour la cuisine libanaise (on vous recommande) ! 🍽️","time":"3mo","title":"Nosmo"},{"comments_count":2,"likes_count":13,"text":"Toi aussi tu as déjà attendu des jours / semaines un retour du recruteur après un entretien ? Voire parfois tu n’en as jamais eu ? Ça nous est tous déjà arrivé. Et tous les jours, malgré nos efforts, ça arrive à nos candidats. Mais tu peux diminuer les chances de te retrouver à nouveau dans cette situation en suivant les prochaines étapes. 𝗖𝗼𝗺𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗳𝗮𝗶𝗿𝗲 𝗽𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗲́𝘃𝗶𝘁𝗲𝗿 𝗱𝗲 𝘀𝗲 𝗿𝗲𝘁𝗿𝗼𝘂𝘃𝗲𝗿 𝗱𝗮𝗻𝘀 𝗰𝗲𝘁𝘁𝗲 𝘀𝗶𝘁𝘂𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 ? ✅ En posant la question à la fin de l’entretien. Si le recruteur n’a donné ni de date de retour ni de moyen de le communiquer, alors prends ton courage à deux mains et pose la question suivante : “𝑄𝑢𝑎𝑛𝑑 𝑒𝑠𝑡-𝑐𝑒 𝑞𝑢𝑒 𝑣𝑜𝑢𝑠 𝑝𝑜𝑢𝑟𝑟𝑒𝑧 𝑚𝑒 𝑓𝑎𝑖𝑟𝑒 𝑢𝑛 𝑟𝑒𝑡𝑜𝑢𝑟 ?” ✅ Si j’étais toi, je demanderais aussi les coordonnées du recruteur (tel et mail) pour pouvoir le recontacter plus facilement. Ensuite, si à la dite date, tu n’as pas de retour ; ou si cela fait une semaine depuis ton dernier échange, voici ce que je te propose : 1️⃣ Mail à la personne en charge de te faire un retour pour lui rappeler que tu es intéressé à continuer dans le processus de recrutement 2️⃣ Tu peux appeler dans la foulée pour essayer de l’avoir directement au tel, 3️⃣ Ensuite je te conseille de tenter d’appeler / faire des sms jusqu’à la fin de la 2ème semaine sans retour 4️⃣ Enfin, un dernier mail 2 semaines après le dernier contact pour renouveler ta motivation et dire que tu te tiens à dispo, Si tu n’as toujours pas eu de retour, alors la réponse est à 99% un no go et il faut passer à autre chose, même si c’est frustrant. C’est simplement une entreprise qui n’a pas le courage de te dire pourquoi c’est non. #entretien #candidature #recrutement","time":"3mo","title":"Nosmo"},{"comments_count":3,"likes_count":12,"text":"Si tu veux réussir dans le domaine de la vente, la prospection téléphonique (cold calling) est une compétence essentielle à maîtriser 🥊 Cependant, pour les juniors, cela peut sembler intimidant et décourageant Alors voici les quelques conseils que l’on applique chez nosmo, pour réussir le démarrage de son cold-calling : . 1️⃣ Prépare un script et entraîne-toi à le réciter de manière fluide et naturelle. Cela t’aidera à garder le fil de la conversation et à t’assurer que tu abordes tous les points importants de ta négociation. . 2️⃣ Prépare des réponses aux objections courantes : il est (fort) probable que tu rencontres des objections pendant tes appels. Il faut pouvoir les anticiper et donc préparer des réponses solides pour convaincre tes interlocuteurs. . 3️⃣ Sois confiant : le succès de ton appel dépendra en grande partie de ton état d'esprit. Sois positif et confiant dans ton approche. Ta voix doit être calme, claire et rassurante. . 4️⃣ Écoute attentivement : écoute les besoins et les préoccupations de ton prospect. Pose des questions ouvertes pour mieux comprendre ses besoins et ses objectifs. Cela t'aidera à personnaliser ta proposition et à mieux répondre à ses besoins. . 5️⃣ Suis le processus : ne te précipite pas. Derrière chaque “non” peut se cacher un “oui”, si un “non” revient, c’est que ton interlocuteur n’a pas compris quel était son intérêt à échanger avec toi. Rassure-le, traite l’objection, et attend. . 6️⃣ Gère correctement les silences, c’est important de laisser ton interlocuteur réfléchir et comprendre ton appel. Se précipiter, c’est perdre l’interlocuteur. . 7️⃣ Reste concentré sur ton prospect : c’est de lui dont tu dois parler, pas de ce que tu veux lui vendre. Il faut savoir être persévérant, tu risques de faire face à de nombreux refus pendant tes appels, mais il ne faut pas se décourager ! La persévérance c’est la clé du succès en cold calling. Continue à appeler et à essayer jusqu'à ce que tu trouves des clients potentiels intéressés. #coldcall #commerciaux #recrutement","time":"3mo","title":"Nosmo"}]

name: آژانس تبلیغاتی سیبل
location: iran-tehran, tehran, tehran, tehran 000000, IR
about: آژانس تبلیغاتی سیبل 17سال پیش با هدف کمک به شرکتها و سازمانها در زمینه های طراحی چاپ و تبلیغات ، طراحی سایت تشکیل شد . 2 سال بعد شرکت یک واحد تامین و تجهیز وسایل کامپیوتری و شبکه نیز به خود اضافه نمود که این واحد بیشتر از یکسال نتوانست دوام بیاورد . و در سال 1390 تا 1392 به فعالیت خود در زمینه های طراحی ، چاپ و تبلیغات ، طراحی سایت و ثبت دامنه ؛ تبلیغات محیطی و مترو تهران خود ادامه داد. در سال 1392 یک سایت و مجموعه به خود اضافه نمود با نام چاپخانه اینترنتی پاس چاپ که با شروع طرح آسمان آبی زمین پاک شهرداری تهران شروع به کار نمود. هدف از تشکیل پاس چاپ ارجاع امور اینترنتی چاپی و همچنین پشتیبانی های کلی شرکت سیبل به پاس چاپ و هدفمند کردن ، پس گیری جایگاه چاپ از دیگر رقبا تشکیل گردید. در سال 1398 با شروع سال جدید اولین فروشگاه اینترنتی شرکت ؛ در زمینه فروش لوازم ساختمانی و بهداشتی شروع به کار نمود. در سال 1399 فروشگاه اینترنتی سرزمین رزا راه اندازی شد. در سال 1400 سامانه سایت اوریجین کار خود را آغاز نمود.

updates: [{"time":"1w 1w","title":"Catherine Ruff Consulting"},{"text":"We are thrilled to share that two of our clients have successfully advanced to the second round of MacKenzie Scott's $250 million open call for donations. Their dedication and impact have set them apart from a pool of 6,353 nonprofits, showcasing their tremendous work and potential. We wish them the best of luck in this unique opportunity to further their mission! 🎉👏 #philanthropy #nonprofit #impact","time":"1w","title":"Catherine Ruff Consulting"},{"likes_count":2,"text":"I'm excited to announce that one of the projects we've been working on for our client was selected among only 13 awardees across the nation by the Department of Health & Human Services! Our client was granted a significant $800,000 in total funding, which will be allocated over the next five years. This recognition comes from the Linking Action for Unmet Needs in Children’s Health (Project LAUNCH) grant program, which was responsible for awarding $10.3 million out of a total $31.5 million. Project LAUNCH is an initiative that works to promote the holistic wellness of young children - from their social and emotional development, to their cognitive, physical, and behavioral growth. This award will provide local communities and tribes with resources to share and innovate early childhood mental health practices and services. It's a great feeling knowing that our effort will have a direct impact on preparing young children to thrive in school and beyond. This accomplishment is a testament to our commitment to supporting organizations that make real, tangible changes in their communities. #ProjectLAUNCH #grantwriting #communityimpact #mentalhealth","time":"3w Edited","title":"Catherine Ruff Consulting"},{"time":"1mo 1mo Edited","title":"Catherine Ruff Consulting"},{"time":"5mo 5mo","title":"Catherine Ruff Consulting"},{"likes_count":1,"time":"6mo 6mo Edited","title":"Catherine Ruff Consulting"},{"time":"6mo 6mo","title":"Catherine Ruff Consulting"},{"time":"6mo 6mo","title":"Catherine Ruff Consulting"},{"time":"7mo 7mo","title":"Catherine Ruff Consulting"},{"time":"7mo 7mo","title":"Catherine Ruff Consulting"}]

During our recent 3-day retreat for OUTSaskatoon, we asked participants to step forward and lead short practices for well-being throughout the day…and they did not disappoint! Members of this team shared: 🌿 smudges throughout the retreat 🌿 energizing stretches 🌿 a matchstick energizer 🌿 engaging with nature & forest sounds 🌿 round dancing! 🌿 and more We love when retreaters share their wisdom of how they foster well-being. #team #indigenous #wellbeingatwork","time":"9mo","title":"Cedar + Sage Development Strategies"},{"likes_count":1,"text":"What is a Manifesto for Well-being at Work? 🌿 It’s a series of simple, powerful agreements we make about how we work together, how we foster our personal wellness at work, and how we support each other’s well-being as a team. We were excited to facilitate the co-creation of a well-being manifesto for OUTSaskatoon at their recent 3-day corporate retreat! Building a manifesto like this is important, but it isn’t as easy as it sounds — it means naming the elephants in the room, being honest about what we need to change, and committing to doing things differently at work. If you're ready for a new approach to workplace well-being, let’s talk about what creating a Manifesto can do for your team: https://lnkd.in/gG44AU3M 🌿 #wellbeingatwork #team","time":"9mo","title":"Cedar + Sage Development Strategies"},{"likes_count":5,"text":"Today's #ClientShoutout goes to OUTSaskatoon — whose team we worked with on a recent organizational retreat. OUTSaskatoon does incredibly important work providing support services, youth housing, education, and research services for Saskatoon’s 2SLGBTQ community. Their staff + board joined us for a 3-day retreat in Waskesiu that focused on building connection, reflecting on work-life balance, and co-creating agreements for organizational well-being. We are so grateful to the leadership, Board of Directors, and staff for your trust and engagement with the hard process of digging into what well-being means when you work in the non-profit world. #wellbeingatwork #retreat","time":"9mo","title":"Cedar + Sage Development Strategies"}]

name: Yorkshire Packaging Systems
location: Prince Of Wales Works, Armytage Road, Brighouse, West Yorkshire HD6 1QF, GB
about: YPS - The Wrapping Specialists - BRC certified At Yorkshire Packaging Systems we have been supplying shrink and stretch wrapping systems, packaging machinery and flexible films for over 4 decades - since 1977 in fact. In this time we have acquired a wealth of experience and industry knowledge, allowing us to develop a true understanding of our customers' needs and expectations. Our philosophy is to make it as easy as possible to deal with us. specialties: Live Insurance Benefit Verification, Determination of Viability of Insurance, Pre Admission Assessment, Collection of Deductible/Out of Pocket and Cash Pay Monies, Consultation for Internal Admissions Processes and Department Set Up, and Consultation for Hiring and Training of Internal Admissions Staffing
updates: [{"time":"3w 3w","title":"Admissions Alliance, Inc."},{"text":"#traumaworkworks","time":"1mo","title":"Admissions Alliance, Inc."},{"time":"1mo","title":"Admissions Alliance, Inc."},{"text":"#traumaworkworks","time":"1mo","title":"Admissions Alliance, Inc."},{"text":"Children exhibit and array of behaviors everyday. Some we adore. Some not so much. Frequent misbehaviors can lead to the labeling of a child that stays with them. This labeling often occurs beginning in day care or kindergarten and can follow this child for the rest of their academic career. How often do you suppose kids get these labels from caregivers or teachers without a lot of investigation being done? Teachers rarely have the ability to do a deep dive on each child to ascertain their background because they are already overwhelmed. How often is a child diagnosed with ADD or ADHD and put on meds but the meds don’t really help because trauma at home is the problem? Mass produced education doesn’t shield the children from the trauma because it’s designed to cram them with knowledge and not create a safe space. Add to it the pitfalls of being in school and the traumas that can come from bullying and other social constructs it may be more than the child can bear and they simply drift. This is more common than we realize and it is heartbreaking. There is no easy fix but if we took a breath and asked some pertinent questions maybe not every child needs meds as an over correction. Maybe instead we love them as a village and dive a little deeper and help them do the work to get back on track and find their safe space. #traumaworkworks","time":"1mo","title":"Admissions Alliance, Inc."},{"text":"#traumaworkworks","time":"1mo","title":"Admissions Alliance, Inc."},{"text":"Trauma bonds are very real. They manifest and present themselves as maladapted behaviors that societally we accept as just how relationships are sometimes. Describing the relationship as really intense, hyper sexual, filled with arguing and making up constantly, mistrust of each other, Codependence etc are hallmarks of a trauma bond and not authentic connection. If we are in pain regularly in a relationship maybe we need to reassess what we want or how we give amd receive love. Sometimes folks describe a relationship as “boring” and not having any spark or intensity. Maybe instead they have met someone that can provide them a healthy attachment that they simply don’t know how to receive. Knowing the differences between a trauma bond and healthy attachment can save us a tremendous amount of heartache and help us seek those attachments that fulfill and not further damage us. #traumaworkworks","time":"1mo","title":"Admissions Alliance, Inc."},{"time":"1mo 1mo","title":"Admissions Alliance, Inc."},{"text":"#traumaworkworks","time":"2mo","title":"Admissions Alliance, Inc."},{"time":"2mo","title":"Admissions Alliance, Inc."}]
slogan: Professional Admissions Solutions for the Treatment Industry. https://admissionsalliance.com/

name: University Settlement
location: ["4800 Broadway Ave., United States, Cleveland, Ohio 44127, US",null]
about: University Settlement is a neighborhood center that provides social services to residents of the Broadway/Slavic Village neighborhood in southeast Cleveland. We offer the individuals and families we serve resources by which they can learn, grow, and thrive by focusing on removing barriers to help overcome poverty, thus empowering citizens in Slavic Village to maximize their potential. We do this by protecting children, advancing literacy, providing nutritious meals, strengthening families and serving the elderly. This mission is guided by the following principles: •Excellence in all aspects of our work •Serving our clients with respect and dignity •A customer-centric orientation to our programs and services •Having our “feet in the street” to encourage authentic community engagement and on-going community dialogue •Aligning our programs and services to address current and pressing community needs and being nimble so as to be able to adjust our offerings in line with evolving community needs •Building our visibility in the community to be as accessible as possible to those we strive to partner with and serve •Operating with a collaborative spirit

updates: [{"likes_count":1,"text":"Fun Fact Friday! Here is a tidbit of information on the process for our semi-farmed branzino. Semi-closed farming systems look much like conventional pens from above. But under the water, they have an opaque, impermeable outer barrier that surrounds the fish net. Waste and uneaten food cannot flow into the surrounding water, instead gathering at the bottom of the enclosure where it is collected, brought ashore, and treated. To replace the normal high flow of water through the net, clean, cold water is continuously pumped through the enclosure from deep below the surface. Oxygen is added to the water providing perfect conditions for the farmed fish to thrive. #fishwholesale #fishwholesaler #fishwholesalers #fishwholesalerny #fishwholesalernj #seabass #branzino #semifarmed #fish #semifarmingprocess #fishingnet #seasstarfoods #BergenCounty #NewJersey","time":"1w","title":"SEAS STAR FOOD USA, INC"},{"text":"Have you tried our semi-farmed branzino? name: Carsten Banse
location: Moocksgang 5, Hannover, Niedersachsen 30169, DE
about: Bevor die Wellen über Dir zusammenschlagen, solltest Du das Surfen gelernt haben! Ja, das weiß jeder - und dennoch: Viele warten entschieden zu lang! Unser Business ist es, dass Du in Deinem Business die Welle reiten kannst. Dass Du Selbstbestimmt-Gelassen-Handeln kannst! Wir kombinieren in einzigartiger Weise Coaching mit dem Surfen. In Frankreich. Am Atlantik. Wann bist Du endlich dabei!? Schreib jetzt hier eine DM für mehr Information!
specialties: Coaching, Leadership, Lifecoaching, Businesscoaching, Persönlichkeitsentwicklung, Psychodrama, Prozess- und Embodimentfokussierte Psychologie, Online-Coaching, Coaching kombiniert mit Wellenreiten, Surfing, Achtsamkeit, and Mindfullness
updates: [{"likes_count":4,"text":"::: 𝗗𝘂 𝗺𝘂𝘀𝘀𝘁 𝗡𝗜𝗖𝗛𝗧 𝘀𝘂𝗿𝗳𝗲𝗻 𝗸𝗼̈𝗻𝗻𝗲𝗻! ::: Du kennst das sicher auch: Am liebsten immer und überall sicher auftreten können, sich erst zeigen, wenn Du Dinge schon beherrscht. Interessant wird es allerdings erst, wenn Du diese Komfortzone verlässt. Dich aktiv und bewusst in Situationen begibst, wo Du noch gar nichts beherrscht. Dann lernst Du Dich selbst noch einmal neu kennen, erlebst, wie es ist, in Unsicherheit bestehen zu lernen. Das kannst Du als #Unternehmer / #UnternehmerIn oder als #Führungskraft in unserem Camp erfahren. Das ganze Interview mit mir gibt es auf dem YouTube Kanal von Business-Talk am Kudamm: https://lnkd.in/e_iaRk6u #coaching #unternehmer #unternehmerin #führungskraft #surfing #komfortzone","time":"2w","title":"Carsten Banse"},{"likes_count":1,"text":"::: 𝗔𝘂𝗰𝗵 𝗻𝗮𝗰𝗵 𝗱𝗲𝗺 𝗦𝗼𝗺𝗺𝗲𝗿 𝗲𝗻𝘁𝘀𝗽𝗮𝗻𝗻𝘁 𝗯𝗹𝗲𝗶𝗯𝗲𝗻 ::: Es gibt ja immer diese Vorhaben, vor dem Sommer ähnlich wie nach Sylvester: \"Ab dem 01.01.XXXX werde ich...!\" \"Nach dem Sommer nehme ich mir vor, wirklich entspannter zu sein mit bestimmten Situationen und Menschen!\" Hat es jemals einfach so funktioniert? Bei mir nicht. Bei Dir sicherlich auch nicht. Was aber funktioniert, ist, sich strukturiert und mit Begleitung sich selbst zu stellen. Sich zu reflektieren und tatsächlich auch zu trainieren. Habe ich gestern erst wieder selbst bei meinem (neuen) Sport, #wingtsun, gemerkt. Von allein und ohne Training kann ich gar nichts. Wenn Du mit mir zusammen an Deiner Entspannung arbeiten möchtest, klick mal hier https://lnkd.in/eHYQyfFQ oder auf den Link in der Slide. Kostenfrei, kein doppelter Boden, einfach mal so! Warum? Weil wir unbedingt mehr gelassene und entspannte Menschen auf dieser Welt brauchen! Meine Meinung. #menschen #gelassenheit #unternehmer #führung #leadership #mindset #achtsamkeit","time":"1mo","title":"Carsten Banse"},{"likes_count":2,"text":"::: 𝗕𝗶𝘀𝘁 𝗗𝘂 𝗯𝗲𝗿𝗲𝗶𝘁 𝗹𝗼𝘀𝘇𝘂𝗴𝗲𝗵𝗲𝗻 𝗼𝗱𝗲𝗿 𝗱𝗼𝗰𝗵 𝗲𝗵𝗲𝗿 𝗧𝗲𝗮𝗺 \"𝗟𝗶𝗲𝗯𝗲𝗿 𝗻𝗶𝗰𝗵𝘁!?\" ::: Wenn Du in Unsicherheiten - und davon haben wir schon immer genug gehabt und auch aktuell ausreichend genug in der Welt - bestehen willst, brauchst Du den Mut, loszugehen. Nicht unvorbereitet, nicht untrainiert, nicht unüberlegt. Aber losgehen. Nur so kannst Du Deine Welle reiten. Indem Du mit der Unsicherheit arbeitest, die in DIR aufkommt. Sonst bleibst Du, beim Surfen wird das ganz offensichtlich, am Strand sitzen. Da kannst Du aber lange warten, ob Dich mal irgendwann irgendjemand mit Deinem Brett ins Wasser trägt. Und das ist im Leben, im Beruf, beim Führen und auch beim Leiten Deines Unternehmens immer das Gleiche. Welches Team willst Du sein? Losgehen? oder Lieber nicht! #coaching #mut #change #leadership #führungskraft #surfing #gesundheit","time":"1mo","title":"Carsten Banse"},{"likes_count":3,"text":"::: 𝗩𝗼𝗺 𝗞𝗿𝗮𝗻𝗸𝗲𝗻𝗽𝗳𝗹𝗲𝗴𝗲𝗿 𝘇𝘂𝗺 𝗠𝗮𝗻𝗮𝗴𝗲𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁-𝗖𝗼𝗮𝗰𝗵 ::: Wie ich in Unsicherheit bestehen lernte! Es gibt - hier und auch auf anderen Plattformen - so viele Leute, die Dir erzählen wollen, wie es geht. Das allein ist m.E. an sich schon ein fragwürdiger Ansatz. Denn dabei wirst Du als Individuum leicht übersehen in Deiner Situation. Nicht jedes System funktioniert gleich! So auch nicht wir Menschen. Dazu kommt häufig noch, dass jene den Weg selbst noch gar nicht gegangen sind, den sie anderen \"beibringen\" wollen. Das ist die zweite Fragwürdigkeit. Was ich jedenfalls Dir versprechen kann: Ich war einmal Krankenpfleger, ich hatte, nachdem ich mich 1998 nebenberuflich und dann 2000 komplett in die Freiberuflichkeit begeben habe, hart mit dem Thema Sicherheit, beziehungsweise, Unsicherheit zu kämpfen. Von regelmäßigen Geldeingängen als Angestellter im öffentlichen Dienst in die Achterbahn der Freiberuflichkeit. Was habe ich gemacht? Ich bin anfangs zu einer Kollegin gegangen und habe das Thema Unsicherheit durchgearbeitet. Heute bin ich Coach für Manager, UnternehmerInnen, Führungskräfte und kläre Konflikte in großen Konzernen oder familiengeführten Unternehmen. Was war noch alles nötig, um Unsicherheit auszuhalten? Sehr, sehr viele Weiterbildungen, Investitionen in mich und unser Unternehmen, Weitermachen und Kreativität entwickeln gerade dann, wenn es ausweglos erschien. Surfen! Beziehungsarbeit in alle denkbaren Richtungen. Vor allem in meine Familie. Kontinuierlich in Reflexions-Kreisen mit anderen zu sein, sich Mentoren suchen, die schon dort sind, wo ich noch hinwollte oder noch hinwill! Immer wieder neue Dinge wagen, um nicht bequem zu werden. Disziplin. Bei www.ease-in-wave.de triffst Du auf Menschen in meinem Team, die alle ähnliche Wege hinter sich haben. #coaching #surfen #unternehmer #führungskräfte #veränderung","time":"1mo","title":"Carsten Banse"},{"likes_count":2,"text":"::: 𝗨𝗻𝗱, 𝘄𝗶𝗲 𝗶𝘀𝘁 𝗱𝗮𝘀 𝗦𝗲𝘁𝘁𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘀𝗼!? ::: Natürlich super! Sagt unsere Hündin Karla, die im ersten Camp dieses Jahr ihren Freischwimmer gemacht und sich darüber gefreut hat, die Standup-Paddler an unserem Coaching-Haus am Fluss zu verbellen! Natürlich super! Haben aber auch unsere Teilnehmenden gesagt. Sie haben, neben dem Feedback zum Setting, aber auch etwas zu uns gesagt. Und natürlich sind Aussagen zum Essen, der Location, den Coaches und \"Wo schlafe ich da überhaupt!?\" wichtig, wenn Du Dich auf eine solche Reise begibst. Alle Testimonials findest Du auf unserer Homepage www.ease-in-wave.de / Schau doch einmal vorbei! Wir freuen uns auf Deinen Besuch! Ach, by the way: Seit diesem Jahr ist im Setting auch Anke Jacobs, Surferin und Präventivmedizinerin fest mit im Team. Sie ist medizinisch und psychotherapeutisch breit aufgestellt und supportet Dich ebenfalls! Carsten und das Ease-in-wave-Team! #coaching #surfing #retreat #führungskraft #leadership #achtsamkeit #burnout","time":"1mo","title":"Carsten Banse"},{"likes_count":1,"text":"::: 𝗔̈𝗻𝗱𝗲𝗿𝗲 𝗗𝗲𝗶𝗻𝗲 𝗣𝗲𝗿𝘀𝗽𝗲𝗸𝘁𝗶𝘃𝗲𝗻! ::: Du kennst das bestimmt aus dem Alltag. Wenn Du beispielsweise eine Straße auf und wieder abgehst, zeigt sich bei bewusster Betrachtung so viel Neues. Wenn Du von oben auf Deine Arbeits-oder Lebens-Situation schaust (Dafür gibt es Coaching-Tools), sieht vieles ganz anders aus. Vor allen Dingen erkennst Du mit diesem Perspektivwechsel auch schneller Lösungswege. Auf dem Foto hier, was unser Teilnehmer Michael (Danke!) gemacht hat, ist es viel einfacher, Zusammenhänge der Landschaft zu erkennen, die sich beim Spaziergang am Fluss so nicht erschließen. Vor allen Dingen kannst Du auf diesem Bild ganz direkt unseren Surfsport UND unsere Villa erkennen! Aber das ist ein ganz anderes Thema😉! In jedem Fall bietet Dir unser Camp die Möglichkeit, durch das Surfen und im Coaching neue Perspektiven einnehmen zu können! Hilfreiche Perspektiven. Die Dir vorhandene Unsicherheiten nehmen und ermöglichen, Deine Welle zu reiten, sprich, Deinen Weg zu gehen! Sie sind dramatisch mit Deinem Führungs- und UnternehmerInnen-Alltag verknüpft. Jeden Tag wirst Du in der Firma mit Situationen und Verhaltensweisen anderer Menschen konfrontiert. Nun bedeutet \"Annehmen, was ist!\" nicht, sich alles gefallen zu lassen! Vielmehr geht es jetzt darum, nach innen zu gehen und sich selbst zu beobachten. Zu schauen, wie Du diese Situationen und Verhaltensweisen bewertest, beurteilst. Mit dem Ziel, eine Handlung abzuleiten, die idealerweise sogar von Freude begleitet ist. Genauso ist es am Meer. Du kannst die Bedingungen der Wellen beim Surfen nicht beeinflussen. Was Du aber machen kannst, ist, sie so anzunehmen, wie sie eben jetzt gerade sind und dann mit Freude ins Tun kommen! Den Link für mehr Informationen findest Du in den Kommentaren! P.S.: Der Hut ist absolute Pflicht für mich als potenzielle Rothaut! #Leadership #surfing #retreat #mindset #achtsamkeit #führung #persönlichkeitsentwicklung #unternehmertum","time":"1mo Edited","title":"Carsten Banse"}]
slogan: Ease in Wave - COACHING® / In Unsicherheit bestehen lernen - Damit Du DEINE Welle reiten kannst! Coaching & Surfcamp

about: Faculty of Engineering (ENG) at the Chiang Mai University creates and shares interdisciplinary knowledge about complex engineering systems through initiatives in education, research, and industry partnerships. name: Law Office of Jacquelyn M Bruno
location: 401 N Michigan Ave, Suite 1200, Chicago, Illinois 60611, US
about: Estate Planning, Probate, and Guardianship attorney focused on personalized service with transparent fees. We strive to create lasting relationships and become your resource for years to come. I thoroughly enjoy these interconnected areas of law. It gives me the opportunity to connect with clients on a personal level, learn their ambitions, protect their families, and help them when life seems to be in chaos. My unified understanding of the entire process helps me serve my clients better. My goal is to make Estate Planning accessible to all. I work with my client’s busy schedules and provide fair, competitive fees. I am dedicated to helping my clients plan for the future, protect their hard earned money, and provide for their loved ones. Making decisions about who will care for you, your children, and your property is a daunting task. My mission is to ease this burden on you and streamline the process as much as possible. Estate Planning, Guardianship, and Probate are inherently personal matters. As such, it is important to me that my relationship with my clients is more than just a few emails. Developing long lasting relationships helps me and my clients stay on top of their needs over time. These connections facilitate comfortable conversations when talking about changes in their family structures, assets, future wishes, and the law. Ultimately, I strive to be a trusted resource for years to come.
specialties: Estate Planning, Probate, and Guardianship
slogan: Making Estate Planning accessible with personalized service and transparent fees.

about: Workspace.com is a software product built specifically for professional services teams inside software product companies. name: Frama (UK) Ltd

about: Businesses are becoming increasingly aware of the advantages of introducing digital technology into the workplace to automate many office workflows and processes. It is our mission to help guide businesses through the digital transformation process to increase efficiencies and productivity rates as well as provide information mobility throughout an organisation. Frama is noted for its consultative approach and ability to meet the customer’s requirement by working with our customer to select the correct solutions and products ensuring we meet the customer’s needs. This is what makes Frama one of the most trusted partners for business in this sector. Frama has the ability to work with businesses and organisations of all sizes and has the flexibility and speed to meet requirements from multi-site requirements, bespoke solutions and specifically secure and efficient packages for home workers. In todays world the risks of cyber-crime and compliance must also be considered and many legacy workflows leave organisations open to cyber fraud and non-compliance. Automation usually follows on from the introduction of lower-level digital transformation. These might include digitising priority business processes such as HR, marketing, sales and finance. It may include ensuring email communication is secure using a unique and easy to use encryption service or the introduction of e-signature software or putting in place a basic managed print services (MPS) strategy. One of the main pillars of our approach is to ensure that any automation that is proposed is not only efficient but secure.
specialties: Franking Machines, Shredders, Folder Inserters, X-Ray scanners, Mailroom tracking software, Registered email, Managed Print Services, Digital Mailroom, Letter Openers, Encryption, E-Signature, Email security, and GDPR

Autoriteit: deel jouw kennis over jouw branche. Is er een belangrijke verandering gaande? Heb je tips over een bepaald onderwerp? Deel deze met jouw netwerk. Schrijf een social post met enkele tips. Om een ander te overtuigen kun je bijvoorbeeld een e-book, checklist of een proefabonnement weggeven. De ontvanger zal sneller geneigd zijn jou hier iets voor terug te geven. Afinal, nós somos uma das maiores empresas de reparos eletrônicos industriais do mundo, com enorme credibilidade no mercado e que está sempre se inovando, em busca do melhor e mais completo atendimento e serviço ao nosso cliente. Entre no link da bio e fale já com a nossa equipe comercial! #eletronica #reparo #engenhariaeletrica #manutençãoindustrial #servomotors #servodrive #automationengineering #industrial #servo #indústria40 #automation #tecnologia #cenariotecnologico #flateck #indústria #modulosdecpu #recondicionados","time":"2mo","title":"Flateck Eletrônica Industrial"},{"likes_count":6,"text":"Os inversores de frequência são dispositivos elétricos/eletrônicos, cuja função é proporcionar um controle mais avançado nos motores. Esse aparelho é uns dos mais utilizados nas indústrias e apresenta muitos benefícios, tanto ao motor como para a aplicação. Afinal, os inversores convertem o sinal senoidal da rede elétrica em um sinal modulado por largura de pulso (PWM), possibilitando assim a variação da velocidade através da frequência no motor. Sabendo da importância do bom estado desse equipamento, a Flateck conta com uma equipe técnica e laboratórios especialmente preparados para realizar todo tipo de reparo em inversores de frequência. about: WHO IS ORCHID SOFTWARE SOLUTIONS INC.? Orchid Software Solutions (OSS) was born through the merger of Carib Business Computing and M.W. Consulting Inc. and represents the fusion of two well-established businesses in the software services sector with more than 35 years of experience in providing solutions. This wealth of experience and a cadre of highly-skilled and qualified professionals makes OSS perfectly positioned to provide Sage ERP (Enterprise Resource Planning- ACCPAC) software and other services at a level unsurpassed in the Caribbean. Orchid Software Solutions is an internationally recognized Business Partner of Sage Software of North America, offering computerized Accounting and Business Solutions through a team of professionals who won internationally acclaimed Sage Awards in 2010, 2011, and 2012. Orchid Software Solutions brings a competitive advantage which translates into significant savings for clients in a highly competitive market. Our mix of Accounting and Information Technology skills is a definite advantage that makes OSS one of very few companies in the Caribbean, capable of delivering complete and integrated Accounting and I.T business solutions. We have a qualified professional accountant on board to complement and bring integrity to the services we offer. At present, Orchid Software Solutions provides consulting services and solutions to clients in eight Caribbean territories and are poised to extend the benefits to others in Central and South America.

name: Casa Francelina - Alojamento Local
location: Beco Mendes Bártolo, Pobral, Pousaflores, Ansiao, Leiria 3240-607, PT
about: A Casa Francelina é uma casa situada no lugar do Pobral, freguesia de Pousaflores, concelho de Ansião, no Distrito de Leiria. No centro de Portugal, a Casa Francelina situa-se a 2km da Serra do Anjo da Guarda, em Pousaflores. Achamos que o topo da Serra, onde se pode encontrar o Moinho, o Miradouro e a Capela do Anjo da Guarda, é o ex-libris desta aldeia, e quem aqui vem, não deve deixar de fazer uma rejuvenescedora caminhada até este topo com vistas panorâmicas. Convidamo-lo a vir passar uns dias a esta casa e desfrutar de um local humilde mas que nos marca desde o primeiro momento. Pelo cheiro que deixa na pele, pelo brilho do sol que ilumina o rosto e a alma, pela tranquilidade e encontro com a natureza no seu estado mais puro.
specialties: Alojamento Local, Serra, Trilhos, Natureza, and Caminhadas

about: Ktech Manufacturing was formed in 2006 to address a need for precision machined components in a specific sector – electronic instrumentation. Although we began serving a very specific niche market, Ktech has successfully grown to provide components to a diverse client group including oil and gas, alternative energy, transportation, marine and many other industries. Ktech specializes in precision CNC machining, milling and turning, of small to medium sized components. We machine parts for many different industries from a variety of materials including steel, stainless steel, aluminum, titanium, and plastic. Located in the Campbell Heights Business Park in South Surrey, we are conveniently located close to both the city of Vancouver and the Pacific US / Canadian border crossing.

name: Evolve Communities
location: Sydney, AU
about: Home of the 7 Steps to Reconciliation & Allyship™. Build a stronger, more inclusive business and Lead as a confident Ally As Australia's trusted authority for Indigenous Cultural Awareness Training and Ally Accreditation, we deliver ► Engaging, thought-provoking and shame-free education ► Authentic cultural knowledge provided by an Aboriginal Elder and our team of Indigenous facilitators ► Practical actions for Allies drawn from decades of lived-experience from our Community Engagement specialist ► Something for every team size and budget from our accessible 45-minute online course, to deep-dive workshops and professional Accreditation Programs. Nungamanladi! – that’s ‘hello’ in Bardi language. We’re Evolve Communities. Diversity, inclusion and a sense of belonging are crucial. Whether you need to attract and retain more Indigenous staff, or work more effectively with Indigenous stakeholders or suppliers, Cultural Awareness Training can bring a wealth of benefits. Who are we? Led by Bardi Elder Aunty Munya Andrews and Training and Facilitation expert Carla Rogers, Evolve Communities is a majority Indigenous-owned business and Australia's trusted provider of Cultural Awareness Training and Allyship Accreditation. Indigenous Australians account for just 3% of Australia's population. For Reconciliation to happen, we all need to get involved. That's why both Indigenous and non-Indigenous Australians design our programs and make up our team. Leading practical Reconciliation by example and demonstrating the values we hope to inspire is important to us. It’s one of the many ways we do things differently. We've helped thousands of individuals and hundreds of organisations including: Cancer Council NSW, Edith Cowan University, BUPA, Woolworths and the Department of Prime Minister and Cabinet – to name a few. Our goal is to inspire ten million Allies to create a kinder, more inclusive Australia. Get started with our 7 Steps to Reconciliation & Allyship™
specialties: cultural awareness training, Reconciliation, Ally Accreditation, Indigenous Cultural Protocols, Community Engagement, Diversity and Inclusion, Leadership, Inclusive Leadership Training, Facilitation, HR Training, Reconciliation Action Plan, and Coaching
updates: [{"comments_count":2,"likes_count":9,"text":"Congratulations Courtney Bohan and welcome to our community of Accredited Allies 🙌🏾 Together we can create a kinder, more inclusive Australia 🖤 💛 ❤️ #AccreditedAlly #InclusiveLeadership #PracticalReconciliation #DiversityAndInclusion","time":"4d 4d Edited","title":"Evolve Communities"},{"comments_count":1,"likes_count":14,"text":"Good morning Allies! Aunty Munya Andrews and Carla Rogers are about to jump into a live interview on Disrupt Radio hosted by Lisbeth Gorr (Libbi Gorr) and Adam Ferrier (Thinkerbell). Stream it live at 7:45am AEST or catch the Enterprise Breakfast playback later. #livenow Evolve Communities https://www.disrupt.radio/","time":"4d","title":"Evolve Communities"},{"likes_count":15,"text":"What are the Seven Steps to Reconciliation and Allyship™? Our tried-and-tested framework underpins all of our programs for a reason - it works. Developed by Aboriginal Elder Aunty Munya Andrews and non-Indigenous Community Engagement specialist Carla Rogers, it is drawn from decades of lived experience and authentic cultural knowledge. These Seven Steps are guaranteed to develop cultural competency, ignite your Reconciliation Action Plan, inspire Allyship and build a stronger, more inclusive organisation. 👣 Step 1: Reconciliation - why it's important to your organisation 👣 Step 2: Diversity, Identity & Stereo-types - what it means to be Indigenous 👣 Step 3: Our Shared History - how it impacts us today 👣 Step 4: Communication & Unconscious Bias - how to improve relationships 👣 Step 5: Kinship & Sorry Business - lessons about belonging and implications in the workplace 👣 Step 6: Privilege - the role of privilege in creating and closing the gap 👣 Step 7: Allyship - the so what? Discover the practical actions everyone can take to create a kinder, more inclusive Australia Get started today with our 7 Steps Online Course - on our platform or your LMS. #CulturalAwarenessTraining #AllyTraining #PracticalReconciliation #7Steps #ReconciliationActionPlan #DiversityEquityInclusion","time":"5d","title":"Evolve Communities"},{"likes_count":2,"text":"We're #hiring a new Indigenous Workshop Facilitator in New South Wales. Apply today or share this post with your network.","time":"6d","title":"Evolve Communities"},{"comments_count":6,"likes_count":31,"time":"1w"},{"comments_count":1,"likes_count":14,"text":"Are you of Aboriginal or Torres Strait Islander Descent? Do you enjoy sharing your culture with others? Would you like to create a kinder, more inclusive Australia? We are currently seeking Indigenous Facilitators to join our team. Message any member of our team, including Carla Rogers or Aunty Munya Andrews, if you would like to learn more. #jobalert #culturalawareness #allytraining #facilitator","time":"1w","title":"Evolve Communities"},{"comments_count":1,"likes_count":89,"text":"What is considered respectful when referring to Indigenous peoples? It's important to remember that terms like Australia and Aboriginal are colonial, not Indigenous. In other words, they are names that have been given by colonisers and not the names that First Nations people have traditionally used to refer to themselves. Generally, Indigenous people prefer to use their own names, like Bardi, Gadigal or Bundjalung, and to speak their own language. It is accepted that Australia is now an English-speaking country and so, if colonial terms must be used, most prefer Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander peoples, Indigenous Australians, First Peoples, First Nations or First Australians. Note the use of capital letters and remember, not all Indigenous people feel the same way or have the same preferences. Listen to the language used by the people you are with and, if you are ever unsure, just ask! #AskAunty #CulturalProtocols #CulturalAwareness #DiversityEquityInclusion #PracticalReconciliation","time":"1w","title":"Evolve Communities"},{"likes_count":5,"text":"Have you ever wished the floor would open up and swallow you? One of the things we teach in our Ally training, is that mistakes will happen. But when they happen, what do you do? Sounds like a question for Ask An Ally! Carla Rogers is a Churchill Fellow, award winning learning designer and community engagement specialist. Despite being non-Indigenous, she has dedicated her career to supporting First Nations people and communities. As Co-Author of Practical Reconciliation and Co-Director of Evolve Communities with Aunty Munya Andrews, her life's purpose is to inspire more Allies to join her to create a kinder, more inclusive Australia. #AskAnAlly #AllyTraining #AccreditedAlly #PracticalReconciliation","time":"2w","title":"Evolve Communities"},{"comments_count":2,"likes_count":26,"text":"😳 Do you feel a bit awkward about Acknowledging Country? 😱 Are you worried you might be getting it wrong? 🤔 Is it better to do a clumsy Acknowledgment than none at all? Sounds like a question for Ask An Ally! Carla Rogers is a Churchill Fellow, award winning learning designer and community engagement specialist. Despite being non-Indigenous, she has dedicated her career to supporting First Nations people and communities. As Co-Author of Practical Reconciliation and Co-Director of Evolve Communities with Aunty Munya Andrews, her life's purpose is to inspire more Allies to join her to create a kinder, more inclusive Australia. #AskAnAlly #AcknowledgeCountry #CulturalAwarenessTraining #AllyTraining #PracticalReconciliation","time":"2w","title":"Evolve Communities"},{"likes_count":10,"text":"Too deadly Heinemann Asia Pacific Pte Ltd 🙌🏾 Thanks for celebrating NAIDOC Week with us - together we can create a kinder, more inclusive Australia 🖤 💛 ❤️ #naidoc2023 #forourelders #PracticalReconciliation","time":"2w 2w","title":"Evolve Communities"}]

Besonders!!","time":"4mo 4mo Edited","title":"Opposition Studios"},{"comments_count":4,"likes_count":36,"time":"4mo Edited"},{"comments_count":3,"likes_count":9,"text":"Alles schön neu und ein perfektes Umfeld für eine imposante Präsentation einer starken #Eigenmarke - rund 70.000 #Abonnenten und mehr als 10.7 Millionen Aufrufe hat Thomann, Europas größtes Musikhaus, für seine Guitarrenmarke #HarleyBenton inzwischen mit dem eigenen Channel bei #youtube generiert. Dafür unser fettes Kompliment. Und wir freuen uns mit, weil wir die Inhalte fast schon als Fans produzieren dürfen. Jetzt ist das erste #Video aus dem neuen Studio gepostet - übrigens mit extrem vielen Zugriffen aus den USA. From Bonn to the world. Schaut rein. It' only Rock'n'roll. Unser Studio A in der Tapetenfabrik in #Bonn haben wir zusammen mit unserem Partner Thomann und Community-Manager Benedikt gezielt weiterentwickelt. Neue Wände, neue Decke, neuer Boden, Technik und Licht optimal gestaltet. Minimalistisch und inspiriert von den 60ern - eine richtige Wohnzimmer-Atmosphäre für Bene und seine Community. Seid gespannt auf die anderen Blickwinkel - auch die Heavy-Fans werden es merken :-) Was wichtig ist bei der Gestaltung eines Studios? Der Raum sollte in hohem Tempo flexibel gestaltbar sein, Technik und Licht müssen unkompliziert steuerbar für die jeweiligen Wünsche des Kunden sein und - ganz wichtig - die Protagonisten sollten sich sofort wohlfühlen, um professionell drehen zu können. Bei Thomann und Harley Benton ganz easy - Musik ist ein mega Lebensgefühl. Danke für Eure Unterstützung beim Umbau Nico Driesch, Jonas Corzilius, Julia Niclaus und Felix Heinzelmann. Bestes Team! #videos #videoproduktion #musik #contentcreators #content #studio #chanelmanagement #contentmanagement #team #community","time":"4mo Edited","title":"Opposition Studios"},{"comments_count":5,"likes_count":17,"time":"5mo Edited"},{"comments_count":4,"likes_count":36,"time":"7mo Edited"},{"likes_count":29,"time":"7mo Edited"},{"likes_count":7,"text":"Heute ist der Internationale Tag der Menschen mit #Behinderungen. name: HM ACCOUNTING LTD.
location: 3111 Allan Landing SW, Edmonton, AB T6W 2R7, CA
about:
Regardless of how organized you may be, there still may be times that you miss important figures that can drastically change your finances. To have the security of knowing that your finances are all in order, you may want to hire an accountant from HM Accounting. Our team in Edmonton, AB, can help you keep track of everything so that you can relax a little easier.

We offer many services so that our clients can enjoy peace of mind when it comes to their money management. Whether you need help with payroll or bookkeeping, we're happy to assist. Look to us when you're in need of:

•Business accounting
•Tax preparation
•Real estate accounting
•Business advisory services

If you're unsure of how to handle your finances efficiently, trust the stress and work to a professional accountant. At the office of HM Accounting, we can offer you the services you need for a fraction of the cost. We'll do our best to get you back a sizable return and help you manage your money. Give us a call today. We proudly serve Edmonton and the surrounding areas.
specialties: Bookkeeping, Accounting, Business Advisory, and Tax
slogan: Experience You Can Trust

name: Eco Nubia
location: Bigeh Island, Aswan, Aswan, EG
about: ECO Nubia is the new accomplishment of ECO Group. A place where guests can enjoy a unique experience with both Nature & History, in an Authentic and Genuine environment. It's our first Ecolodge of many to come soon, based on the concept of using old local community houses to be converted into Natural luxuries ecolodges, where both guests and local community can enjoy the Sustainable tourism experience. Location and houses are picked really carefully in order to provide the experience we promise, and allows you to "Release Your Inner Peace" while enjoying Nature & a unique Heritage. Our location is on Bigeh island: it is one of 3 islands located between the 2 Dams of Aswan governorate: The Aswan Dam and The High Dam, and also the nearest island to Philae temple. Because of its remoteness and lack of utilities & services, the island’s citizens left their homes on the islands since 40 years and now living in villages and cities around it. Still, they do have a dream of going back to their island and bringing its heritage back to life. We aim to help original inhabitants of the island to rebuild their houses, using the same old techniques of Nubian Architecture, in parallel to develop a complete utilities network and infrastructure (Water – Sewage – Electricity) in an eco-friendly way to protect the island’s natural heritage. As for job creation, we aim to add the island to the Egyptian ecotourism map, and introduce this unique type of tourism in the whole area around it, with all related services such as: lodging in Nubian houses, revive authentic Nubian food recipes and drinks, community center for local and visitors’ events, Nubian handcrafts preservation.
specialties: Authentic Nubian Food, Eco-friendly rooms, Sandy Beach on the Nile, Multi Purpose Hall, Nubian Heritage, Eco-friendly Solutiuons, and Panoramic View of Philae Temple
updates: [{"likes_count":5,"text":"We are relaunching our Heritage restaurant (Solaih Nubian Restaurant) for the new winter season. Looking forward to hosting you soon at Solaih! #restaurant #heritage #nubia #ecotourism #aswan #food","time":"11mo","title":"Eco Nubia"},{"likes_count":6,"text":"We help local communities to discover their own natural and cultural heritage treasures... Put them into action using sustainable tourism practices in order to gain financial and psychological benefits. #sustainable #tourism #ecotourism #econubia","time":"11mo","title":"Eco Nubia"}]
slogan: We help local communities discover their own Natural & Cultural Heritage treasures… Put it in action using ecoTourism

name: Anabel Veloso Flamenco Company
location: Calle Muro de los Navarros , 33, 1, Sevilla, Sevilla 41003, ES
about: Anabel Veloso Flamenco Dance Company was set up in 2009, backed by the Residence Agreement with the Auditorium Theatre in Roquetas de Mar and the compelling ambition of a talented director who had been touring internationally and awarded twice for her premiere coreography. Anabel stands at the head of the Company with Alberto Ruiz, both previous dancers at Cristina Hoyos orders for the Andalusian Dance Company, 2012 is the year of the national recognition of the Company with the award “Almeria Joven” in the category on best international promotion by the Andalusian Youth Institute, obtained for their many international performances, including the Bunkamura theatre in Tokyo or the Joyce Theatre in New York City. Up until today the Company has produced 6 big shows that have toured around Spain and several countries and keep performing with the latest show: The 80's generation: grandsons from the 27's generation.
specialties: Flamenco show, dance, child dance theatre y flamenco learning
slogan: Not available

name: Hola Spanish Lessons
location: St John's Hill, London, London SW11 2QP, GB
about: Hola Spanish Lessons is a Spanish tutor’s network led by Elizabeth Colina, its founder. I started Hola Spanish Lessons because of my passion for languages and learning. I believe in the power of education and in taking on new challenges to broaden, not just personal knowledge, but the ability to think and analyse the world. We are a small team of native, qualified and experienced Spanish and Latin American tutors that are passionate about teaching our language and sharing aspects of our culture with others. Due to our own experiences as students learning English, we know and understand the difficulties learning a new language presents; that’s why we offer Spanish courses taught from a student perspective, but with the knowledge and expertise of a professional. We truly believe that it is vital to provide innovative, interactive and lively lessons. Therefore, we have incorporated a variety of teaching methods to make the process of learning fun and effective. Our aim is to make everyone feel enthusiastic and passionate about learning Spanish. Our teaching style is engaging as we follow a communicative approach to the language. Students are immersed in Spanish from day one in a supportive, welcoming, and friendly atmosphere, that will make them feel confident enough to start speaking Spanish from the first lesson. Our courses follow the Common European Framework of Reference for Languages. I take great pride in the work we do at Hola Spanish Lessons. We are selective in recruiting our tutors and treat them well, providing all the support they need. Our commitment to Client service is absolute: we take the time to understand each students’ needs. Clients often comment on our responsiveness and professionalism. We are dedicated to providing the best customer service of any tuition agency in the UK.
specialties: General Spanish, , General Spanish for Children , Spanish for Busisness, Spanish for Holidays, and Children Academy Tuition
slogan: We provide Spanish Courses for all levels and different backgrounds, we offer adaptability and flexibility.

name: Planta

about:
👉🏻 Strategy advertising agency 👈🏻

Somos Planta, tenemos el proposito de construir marcas y consumidores más conscientes. 
Nuestra raíz es digital nomad. 

Tu marca, tus productos, tus servicios son parte de esta transformación social y económica porque cuando entendemos que nuestro mundo también tiene un Deadline, todo es posible. 

#WeArePlanta

♻️#Sustentable
💪🏻#PerspectivaDeGenero
😏 #DigitalNomad
specialties: Not available
updates: [{"likes_count":10,"text":"#WeArePlanta","time":"1y 1y Edited","title":"Planta"},{"likes_count":14,"text":"Sabemos que en estas fechas es muy fácil caer en el Rainbow washing, la tendencia en la que las marcas se suben al mes del orgullo, durante lo que dura junio. Ejemplos fáciles de identificar son los logos de las empresas que durante junio cambian sus colores por los de la bandera de la comunidad, o cuando aprovechan para lanzar una colección de productos edición Pride. ¿Pero qué pasa con el resto del año? ¿Existe un real compromiso con la comunidad LGTBIQ+ o son solo estrategias comerciales? No se trata de cambiar tu logo, sino de mantener actitudes coherentes de manera sostenida. Se necesitan políticas empresariales diversas e inclusivas: desde el proceso de selección, hasta capacitaciones internas al equipo para fomentar la inclusión consciente en toda la empresa. Es necesaria la representación de la comunidad LGTBIQ+ en la Publicidad, sin estereotipos y ejerciendo roles en la maternidad y paternidad. Se necesita apoyo sostenido a la comunidad durante todo el año, dentro y fuera de la institución. Puedes empezar haciendo un diagnóstico sobre la situación de la comunidad LGTBIQ+ en tu empresa para crear un plan de trabajo para garantizar sus derechos . #weareplanta","time":"3w","title":"Planta"},{"comments_count":1,"likes_count":15,"text":"El festival de Antigua nos invitó a Guatemala y demostramos que podemos tomar acción desde nuestras sillas de oficina y desde las butacas de los escenarios. Esto fue lo que pasó: 🌱Desde las butacas, todo el mundo empezó a reducir su huella de carbono digital con 3 clics en su bandeja de entrada. 🌱Reflexionamos sobre la urgencia de tomar acción en América Latina y El Caribe, siendo la única región del mundo en la que los partos de niñas menores de 14 años siguen aumentando. 🌱Más de 1000 personas visualizaron nuestro spot “Niñas, no madres” sin tener que luchar con algoritmos que banean este tipo de contenido en estas regiones. La oportunidad está en seguir tomando acción desde nuestras sillas de trabajo. ¿Empezamos? #weareplanta","time":"1mo","title":"Planta"},{"likes_count":12,"text":"En Planta y en Crayola Alternative sabemos que el Día de la Tierra no se celebra, se toma acción. Por ello creamos el encuentro Aprovechar es mi pasión, junto a la activista Charlotte de No Seas Waste, una acción que empezó por un confesionario de los alimentos que más se echan a perder en el refrigerador. Después, creamos una herramienta que nos será útil para controlar esos alimentos olvidados: unos preciosos imanes para colocar en el refrigerador. Así, los imanes nos permiten tomar consciencia sobre qué alimentos tenemos actualmente en el refri y qué podemos cocinar con ellos. Porque podemos empezar a tomar acción desde nuestros platos. #weareplanta","time":"1mo Edited","title":"Planta"},{"likes_count":18,"text":"¿Qué podemos hacer como agencias creativas y productoras en cuanto al #reciclaje? La respuesta es mucho, y la acción debería empezar por implementar en toda la industria el hábito de contratar a una empresa o cooperativa de gestión de residuos en films y eventos. En el Día del Reciclaje, en Planta reivindicamos ir más lejos con la propuesta de soluciones para reducir residuos desde la creación de las ideas hasta la postproducción de las mismas. Descárgate aquí nuestras guía producción de films y eventos sustentables → weareplanta.com/guias/ #DíaDelReciclaje #WearePlanta","time":"2mo","title":"Planta"},{"likes_count":16,"text":"Estuvimos en el Brand 100 en Chile y estas son 3 cosas que aprendimos después de miles de reuniones, conversaciones con marketers y presentaciones: 1. El proyecto de Ley Anti-Greenwashing de Chile refleja el nuevo paradigma al que las marcas deberán adaptarse: la comunicación y acciones de marketing deberán ser veraces, verificables y precisas. 2. Presentamos Menos Charla y Más Acción para retar a los y las tomadores de decisión a que tomen la creatividad y la estrategia desde perspectivas de sustentabilidad y género. 3. Todo eso cambia el juego de las normas de las agencias creativas: las miradas sustentables y sociales formarán parte de cualquier acción de marketing o campaña creativa del futuro. #weareplanta","time":"2mo","title":"Planta"},{"likes_count":11,"text":"El #DíaMundialDeLaTierra debería ser cada día, y puedes no solo tomar consciencia, también tomar acción desde tu silla. ¿Sabías qué es el llamado digital trash?🗑️ Se trata de todos aquellos desperdicios digitales que consumen energía cada día desde la nube, sumando a las emisiones mundiales de CO2. Todo es empezar; con estos 3 pasos empezarás a reducir tu huella de carbono digital.","time":"2mo Edited","title":"Planta"},{"likes_count":16,"text":"Como #EmpresaB, cuando decimos que vamos más allá de los beneficios económicos, significa que centramos nuestras acciones por y para las personas y el planeta. name: Argumentatio
location: Maipú 699 Piso 2, San Telmo, Ciudad Autónoma de Buenos Aires C1006ACG, AR
about:
ARGUMENTATIO es un centro de capacitación pensado y creado por lingüistas para enseñar a aprovechar los recursos y técnicas del lenguaje. Desde hace más de 4 años enseñamos a emplear la lengua como un instrumento.

Somos el único instituto en Argentina que está dirigido e integrado por profesionales de la lengua de reconocido nivel académico y amplia trayectoria en la investigación y la enseñanza. Esto no sólo marca una gran diferencia en el contenido, el material, el método, la seriedad y la pedagogía de las clases; sino que le garantiza a usted aprender con los que saben.

Todos los integrantes somos lingüistas e investigadores egresados de la Universidad de Buenos Aires y se especializan en el análisis del discurso.

A diferencia de otros cursos dictados por personas que no se especializan ni generalmente saben sobre la lengua,, nuestros cursos y asesoramiento no sólo enseña de qué manera expresarse ( lo cual no sirve de mucho si no se tiene un buen contenido para decir), sino qué decir y cómo razonar argumentos convincentes y persuasivos en diferentes situaciones.
Por lo tanto, nuestros cursos están dirigidos a todas aquellas personas que deseen utilizar el lenguaje cómo una herramienta para lograr los fines que buscan, sean estos cuales fueren. Los cursos proveen una técnica que cada uno puede aplicar en su profesión o quehacer y en su vida cotidiana.
specialties: Oratoria, Retórica y Argumentación, Comunicación, Asesoría, Imagen Pública, oratoria, Comunicación estratégica, comunicacionefectiva, discurso, and comunicacioninstitucional
headquarters: San Telmo, Ciudad Autónoma de Buenos Aires
slogan: COMUNICACIÓN ESTRATÉGICA - ORATORIA, RETÓRICA Y ARGUMENTACIÓN POR LINGÜÍSTAS DE LA UNIVERSIDAD DE BUENOS AIRES

name: Frosio Contract & arredi
location: Via Papa Giovanni XXIII 36/a, Sant'Omobono Terme, Bergamo 24038, IT
about:
Frosio nasce nel 1984 in una terra dove la lavorazione del legno costituisce una pratica che ha radici
profonde e che ancora oggi rappresenta una delle principali attività produttive.
Nel corso degli anni FROSIO, in virtù del know‐how e delle capacità produttive acquisite, ha iniziato ad
operare in settori diversi proponendosi come fornitore di fiducia per:
‐ grandi aziende costruttrici di mobili e di complementi per la casa fornendo parti, gruppi assemblati
o mobili finiti;
‐ grandi realtà distributive realizzando prodotti finiti a disegno o co‐progettati;
_ general contractor
_ studi d'architettura.
_ hotel , residence , ville .
La Mission aziendale è oggi la continua ricerca di nuovi partner per diverse applicazioni con l’intento di
differenziare ed ampliare il proprio portafoglio clienti ricercando in ambiti e settori per i quali siano di
primaria importanza qualità e garanzia di tempi e metodi.
Per far fronte alle sempre maggiori richieste del mercato e per soddisfare un crescente bisogno di
collaborazione diretta tra fornitore e cliente, Frosio si pone oggi come “fornitore di sistema” mettendo a
disposizione la propria struttura organizzativo‐produttiva per fornire non solo lavorazioni ma anche un
servizio completo di gestione. Un servizio che vada dall’approvvigionamento delle materie prime alla
consegna in imballi definiti passando per qualsiasi processo di finitura o verniciatura e comprendendo
eventuali fasi di montaggio.

name: Bakker Brothers
location: Oostelijke Randweg 12, Noord-Scharwoude, NH 1723 LH, NL
about:
Bakker Brothers is specialized in the breeding, production and marketing of vegetable seeds. More than 95% of its sales is into export markets, with a special focus on Europe, Middle East and Africa.
 
The head offices are based in Noord-Scharwoude in the Netherlands. Bakker Brothers main breeding stations are in the Netherlands as well as in South Africa and Jordan. Production is done all over the world, depending on the most suitable production area.

Bakker Brothers is famous for its focus on bean varieties, but is also breeding and marketing vegetable crops like: tomato, pepper, eggplant, onion, carrot, pumpkin, cucumber and squash.This very wide range of products, with varieties for all kinds of climatic conditions, makes Bakker Brothers not only a serious and reliable partner, but also an interesting partner for customers who require the latest developments in breeding to meet their quality standards. Apart from breeding new varieties and hybrids, Bakker Brothers also produces all the generic varieties on our own stock seed, to ensure the highest quality and purity of these varieties.
specialties: Vegetable Seeds

name: Saiduddin & Co.
location: 1st & 2nd Floor, 8th Commercial Street, Jami Commercial, Phase VII, DHA, Karachi, Sindh, PK
about:
Saiduddin & Co. established in 1956 is one of the leading laws firms in Pakistan with offices in Karachi and Lahore.

The firm has represented and continues to represent various industries to help them nurture, innovate and prosper. For the last seven decades, we have built a reputation to think ahead and bring out of the box, one window solutions to our clients’ most multifaceted legal, taxation and commercial challenges.

At Saiduddin & Co., our mission is to transform and improve experience of clients dealing with lawyers. We believe in exceeding expectations by solving problems and creating value in unexpected ways. We treat our clients’ business as our business. We actively promote our clients and look for ways to grow their businesses and improve their lives. We encourage our clients and our lawyers to reach beyond what is comfortable and usual, in order to see and achieve what is possible.

With insight and dedication to creative collaboration, we coordinate with each other to achieve better, smarter and more efficient results for our clients.

The corporate and tax practice of the firm is strongly complimented by a Litigation division which is well experienced in representing foreign and local clients in Litigation, Arbitration and Mediation proceedings.

During these unprecedented and uncertain times, we are determined to help our clients embrace change and instill in them confidence to grow in the ever evolving markets by keeping on top of ever-more complicated regulatory compliances.

To do this, we have created an environment where the brightest minds flourish in company of highly competent individuals who have wealth of experience and who share our vision to become Pakistan’s best “one window” law firm which delivers consistent services across our platform of practices and sectors in all matters we undertake.
specialties: Personal and Corporate Taxation, Tax, Corporate and Commercial Advisory, Private Equity including Startups, Mergers & Acquisitions, Capital Markets, Competition Law, Projects & Infrastructure, Intellectual Property, Financial Institutions, Dispute Resolution and Corporate, Tax and Constitutional Litigation
