name: BL TAC
location: Brisbane, AU
about: We are a company with one primary focus: to supply a wide range of outdoor equipment to anyone from the hobbyist to the professional. With this in mind, we work tirelessly behind the scenes to find and develop equipment for you to get the job done. We have also focused on producing designs that make our military and law enforcement customers proud to do their job in the form of merchandise like apparel, flags, patches etc. However, just like with training, once goals are achieved, new goals must be set and progress must be made. THE NEXT STEP BL TAC is always looking to the future of outdoor equipment. The development team has new ideas, and an insatiable hunger to build, grow and conquer. We always have a number of our own designs and new developments in the works to supply you with the most up to date equipment and technology surrounding the outdoor equipment environment. BL TAC is more than just a name. Our original name, Bearded Lion, came from the saying “to beard the lion in his den” meaning “to confront or challenge someone on their own ground”. We always try to put our customers’ wishes first and because of that we have satisfied customers all over Australia and the world and are thrilled to be a part of the outdoor equipment industry. The interests of our customers are always the top priority for us, so we hope you will enjoy our products as much as we enjoy making them available to you.

updates: [{"likes_count":5,"text":"Vuoi entrare a far parte di un TEAM TECNICO specializzato nella PROGETTAZIONE E GESTIONE DI SISTEMI DI VIDEOSORVEGLIANZA? Per la nostra Business Unit Beeup cerchiamo un PROJECT MANAGER. Vai all’annuncio oppure condividi se conosci qualcuno interessato! https://lnkd.in/dFkR_KUZ","time":"5d Edited","title":"Calzavara"},{"comments_count":1,"likes_count":100,"text":"Dear Friends, even Calzavara has experienced significant impact from the severe weather event that struck the entire Friuli region between the night of July 24th and July 25th. Strong gusts of wind, exceptional hail, and falling trees caused extensive damage to our infrastructure, including buildings, machinery, and materials. Additionally, we experienced a power outage that lasted for over 24 hours. The calamity has also affected numerous families throughout the area, resulting in serious damage to their homes and cars. However, in line with the Friulian tradition of resilience and determination, we are proud to inform you that we have not lost heart. Both businesses and families promptly initiated the process of repairing the damages, and almost everyone has returned to normalcy. At Calzavara, we are well on our way to fully restoring our operations. Renowned writer, mountaineer, and wooden sculptor, Mauro Corona, depicted the Friulians and their fighting spirit as follows: «The Friulian is like the Leaning Tower of Pisa; it bends but does not collapse. It is difficult to bring down a Friulian. Wars, hardships, earthquakes, floods, landslides, and harsh winters have been attempted, but to no avail; the Friulian refuses to surrender. Physically vulnerable like everyone else, but morally unyielding. Morally, the Friulian is made of cast iron [...]. A hard worker, yet an irreducible enjoyer of life, the Friulian savors every free moment. They cherish good company and a good glass, an indefatigable conversationalist in the tavern, yet when it's time to work, they transform into diligent workers, silent and focused. The Friulian values friendship, and generosity is their hallmark. They are altruistic to the point of sacrifice, always at the forefront when needed. Reliable and generous, the Friulian is a true friend [...]. Unfortunately, the Friulian lacks a sense of moderation, especially in pride. One phrase captures it all: \"Fasìn di bessói\" (we do it ourselves), they say. This self-reliance has earned them respect from the world and a solid reputation, but it has also led them into unnecessary struggles they could have avoided. Nevertheless, the Friulian is not afraid of hard work; in fact, the more they accomplish, the more they boast. They are strong with a gentle heart. In the face of tragic misfortunes, they remain stoic, holding back tears as if crying were a weakness for the faint-hearted. They love their homeland (the Friûl) like no other, firmly believing, and here pride shines again, that it is the most beautiful, noble, strong, honest, and unique homeland in the world. The Friulians are extraordinary people, possessing a noble and proud spirit, accompanied by an almost innocent sense of pride. This immense pride is not off-putting, but rather something to admire».","time":"1w Edited","title":"Calzavara"},{"likes_count":11,"text":"Throughout the past year, various charitable activities were carried out, including the distribution of the Calzavara Calendar during the Christmas period. The 2023 edition of the Calendar supported the non-profit organization \"Friuli Mandi Nepal Namasté\" and their initiative called \"Un ponte tra di noi\" (A Bridge Among Us), which has actively engaged in aid and development projects in Nepal following the earthquake occurred in 2015. We are delighted to announce the successful conclusion of the fundraising campaign, which received generous participation and resulted in a total of €4,390 being raised. https://lnkd.in/dtXUVEiM","time":"1mo","title":"Calzavara"},{"likes_count":20,"text":"It's time to take stock for the 24th #Telethon charity relay, which saw over 540 teams on the track on Saturday, December 3rd, and Sunday, December 4th, 2022. The donation count officially closed with the delivery of a €47,800 mega-check signed by a team of 18 companies, including Calzavara. While waiting for the next edition, we thank all the Friulian companies we collaborated with to achieve this positive result. https://lnkd.in/dYXHVd7N","time":"1mo Edited","title":"Calzavara"},{"likes_count":30,"text":"Flooding, Calzavara 's support for Emilia-Romagna: the long-awaited day for the reconstruction works, after the damages caused by the flood on May 16th and 17th in Emilia-Romagna, has finally arrived. Today, General Francesco Paolo Figliuolo met with representatives of local institutions, mayors, and provincial presidents in Bologna: he will lead the commission structure that will manage the damages caused by the flood and plan the works and financing to initiate the reconstruction efforts. We are very proud to have promptly and affectionately responded to the flood catastrophe, establishing a dedicated bank account and inviting all collaborators and employees to join in providing support to the affected populations. The fundraising campaign saw generous participation from everyone, reaching a total of €8,905. https://lnkd.in/d42ksEMb","time":"1mo Edited","title":"Calzavara"},{"comments_count":3,"likes_count":81,"text":"Mobile stations, commonly referred to as COWs (#CellOnWheels), are temporary cellular towers designed to extend cellular coverage in specific areas. They are particularly useful in tourist resort locations or at special events where a large number of people gather, such as concerts, festivals, or fairs. Mobile stations can be easily positioned and removed. When the event or tourist season concludes, the COWs are disassembled and relocated to other areas that temporarily require additional cellular coverage. Our #Mobitower https://lnkd.in/dDfDN3N2 is a COW with a telescopic tower measuring 24 meters in height. It is an exceptional structure that can be installed in just 3 hours and can accommodate 5 sqm of antenna surface area even for extended periods, thanks to its retractable legs with counterweights. The footprint, in working position, does not exceed 77 sqm. Civil works and foundations are not necessary. Discover our range of #COWs: https://lnkd.in/ezB5mdZq #Calzavara #ReinventingCellTowers","time":"2mo Edited","title":"Calzavara"},{"likes_count":37,"text":"Massimo Calzavara spoke at the conference titled \"The Evolution of Regulation in Sustainability Reporting,\" organized by the \"Gruppo Giovani Imprenditori di Confindustria Udine\" (Young Entrepreneurs Group of Confindustria Udine). The conference highlighted how sustainability has become a top priority on the corporate agenda, and governments and organizations worldwide are introducing regulations aimed at promoting greater accountability and transparency in this field. The importance of effective regulation in sustainability reporting lies in the need for a standardized approach to measure, disclose, and assess the Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) performance of companies. In addition to fulfilling compliance obligations, companies can capitalize on regulations to enhance their ESG performance by adopting sustainable policies and practices that generate long-term value. Numerous companies, including Calzavara, have already recognized the strategic importance of sustainability and have integrated it into their corporate DNA. Regulation is just the first step towards real change. #Calzavara #Sustainability #ESGreporting","time":"2mo Edited","title":"Calzavara"},{"likes_count":41,"text":"Thank you to all the friends, clients, and partners who joined us at TowerXchange #TXMeetupEurope. name: ITS Agroalimentare Teramo
location: Via A. De Benedictis, 1, Parco della Scienza, Teramo, Abruzzo 64100, IT
about: L’ITS Agroalimentare di Teramo è un polo d’eccellenza impegnato nella formazione post diploma, parte integrante della Rete Nazionale degli Istituti Tecnici Superiori riconosciuti dal MIUR, della Rete Agri ITS e del Sistema ITS Abruzzo. L’Abruzzo e in particolare il territorio della provincia di Teramo hanno una naturale vocazione all’agricoltura di qualità, alla coltivazione cerealicola e l’allevamento di viti e olivi che rappresentano da sempre i settori di maggiore importanza, confermato anche dai numerosi riconoscimenti di qualità (1 DOCG, 14 DOP/DOC e 12 IGP/IGT), ottenuti a livello europeo oltre ai numerosi Presidi SlowFood riconosciuti (18). La necessità di ricostruire e valorizzare le radici culturali del comparto agroalimentare abruzzese con le sue produzioni autoctone, e di rilanciare un metodo di produzione sostenibile e rispettoso dell’ambientale, vede nell’ITS Agroalimentare di Teramo un valido attore capace di formare le figure professionali fondamentali perché questo lungo ma indispensabile processo di trasformazione possa attuarsi. Il percorso didattico proposto è espressione diretta di una nuova strategia che unisce istruzione, formazione e lavoro venendo incontro alle richieste delle imprese di nuove figure dalle elevate competenze tecniche, attraverso un’offerta formativa altamente qualificata e professionalizzante.
specialties: Made In Italy, Marketing Agroalimentare , Agroalimentare, and Food Industry Education
updates: [{"comments_count":1,"likes_count":9,"time":"3w"},{"likes_count":5,"text":"Questa mattina una delegazione degli studenti del corso di \"Tecnico Superiore per la valorizzazione Digital e Green delle produzioni agroalimentari\" ha partecipato alla finale del concorso Ecotrophelia Italia 2023, presso il Centro Congressi Di Eataly a Roma. I nostri ragazzi hanno presentato alla giuria, composta da esperti del mondo delle Istituzioni, della nutrizione, della ricerca e dell’impresa, il prototipo di prodotto agroalimentare eco-sotenibile e circolare che hanno ideato grazie alla guida della docente Elena Del Toro: 𝗣𝗮𝗻𝗦𝗶𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗻𝗼 - 𝘜𝘯 𝘱𝘦𝘯𝘴𝘪𝘦𝘳𝘰 𝘴𝘧𝘪𝘻𝘪𝘰𝘴𝘰 𝘱𝘦𝘳 𝘤𝘰𝘮𝘣𝘢𝘵𝘵𝘦𝘳𝘦 𝘭𝘰 𝘴𝘱𝘳𝘦𝘤𝘰. Sfortunatamente per noi, il concorso è stato vinto dagli studenti della Scuola di Agraria e Medicina Veterinaria dell’Università degli studi di Padova, ma ne siamo usciti comunque vincitori. Ideare e realizzare un prodotto agroalimentare innovativo ed ecosostenibile da zero, elaborare un business plan per un ipotetico lancio del prodotto con annesso piano di marketing e comunicazione, elaborare il packaging e infine presentare il tutto a una giuria di esperti del settore agroalimentare che ha valutato positivamente il progetto, beh! Anche questa è una grade vittoria! #ecotrophelia #ecotropheliaitalia2023 #agrifood #agrifoodtech #innovazione #itsteramo #itsagroalimentare #its #marketing #packaging #itsacademy","time":"1mo Edited","title":"ITS Agroalimentare Teramo"},{"likes_count":6,"text":"Per il secondo anno consecutivo gli studenti del corso di si specializzazione come \"Tecnico Superiore per la valorizzazione Digital e Green delle produzioni agroalimentari\" hanno partecipato al concorso Ecotrophelia Italia 2023. Una competizione organizzata da Federalimentare e rivolta agli studenti iscritti alle facoltà universitarie e agli ITS Academy italiani legati al settore alimentare, che ha come obiettivo l’ideazione e la realizzazione di un prototipo di prodotto alimentare industriale sostenibile ed eco-innovativo. In questa nuova edizione è stato presentato un prototipo di prodotto agroalimentare più maturo: PanSierino - Un pensiero sfizioso per combattere lo spreco Una mini cake a base di pane raffermo, siero di latte e cacao equosolidale per contrastare lo spreco alimentare, riducendo la produzione di rifiuti (food waste) attraverso la valorizzazione delle eccedenze di pane invenduto e la promozione di riuso e riciclo dei sottoprodotti (food losses) della filiera lattiero-casearia. La fase finale del concorso e la premiazione si terranno lunedì 12 giugno a Roma presso il Centro Congressi Di Eataly 🤞 #ecotrophelia #ecotropheliaitalia2023 #agrifood #agrifoodtech #innovazione #itsteramo #itsagroalimentare #itsacademy #equosolidale #foodwaste","time":"1mo","title":"ITS Agroalimentare Teramo"},{"likes_count":4,"text":"Lo scorso lunedì 5 giugno 2023 gli studenti dell'ITS Academy Sistema Agroalimentare Teramo insieme al docente Antonio Pensa sono stati nell'azienda zootecnica \"Cooperativa La Villa\" a Villa San Sebastiano, Tagliacozzo (AQ), un'azienda che coniuga tradizione ed innovazione tecnologica assicurando sia un elevato benessere agli animali che alleva che un'alta qualità dei propri prodotti, per continuare la collaborazione tesa alla realizzazione dell'App FACTOR-I.A. L'idea è nata nell'ambito del progetto ITS 4.0, edizione 2023, un laboratorio di formazione e innovazione che fa collaborare gli studenti ITS e le imprese sui temi del 4.0. In particolare l'App FACTOR-I.A., che si sta realizzando, utilizzando l'intelligenza artificiale e la realtà aumentata, darà la possibilità ai visitatori di entrare nell'azienda e di scoprire una realtà estremamente rispettosa degli animali e dell'ambiente. #itsteramo #its4punto0 #itsagroalimentare #ai #innovazione #tecnologia #formazione","time":"1mo","title":"ITS Agroalimentare Teramo"},{"likes_count":4,"text":"Ieri i nostri studenti del biennio 2022-2024 del corso di \"Tecnico Superiore per la valorizzazione Digitale e Green delle produzioni agroalimentari\" hanno svolto una lezione direttamente in campo presso il Frantoio Tini di Castilenti (TE). Insieme a Roberta Di Luigi, Carmine e Vincenzo Tini gli allievi hanno avuto modo di verificare le competenze acquisite durante il modulo formativo sulla filiera olivicola-olearia e scoprire cosa rende il Frantoio Tini un'eccellenza pluripremiata nella produzione di olio extravergine di oliva. E per finire una degustazione di un'inconsueto ma estremamente piacevole abbinamento: gelato+olio evo aromatizzato al limone! #itsacademy #itsteramo #itsagroalimentare #agrits #agroalimentare #openday #orientamento #postdiploma #its #olioevo #degustazioneolio #innovazione","time":"2mo","title":"ITS Agroalimentare Teramo"},{"likes_count":3,"text":"Questa mattina si è tenuto un Open Day presso la nostra sede destinato agli allievi degli Istituti Paritari \"Guglielmo Cameli\" di Teramo. L'incontro è stato un'occasione per illustrare il Sistema ITS Academy quale opportunità formativa post diploma, alternativa al percorso universitario. Nello specifico è stato presentato il nostro corso di specializzazione come \"Tecnico Superiore per la valorizzazione Digital e Green delle produzioni agroalimentari\" in partenza il prossimo autunno. Al termine della presentazione è stato organizzato un laboratorio esperienziale di degustazione dell'olio condotto dal docente Luigi Giordano. #itsacademy #itsteramo #itsagroalimentare #agrits #agroalimentare #openday #orientamento #postdiploma #its #olioevo #degustazioneolio","time":"2mo","title":"ITS Agroalimentare Teramo"},{"comments_count":1,"likes_count":2,"time":"2mo Edited"},{"comments_count":1,"likes_count":3,"text":"Continuano le attività di orientamento post-diploma. Oggi il nostro Simone D'Ottavio accoglierà gli studenti dell'IIS Arrigo Serpieri di Castel di Sangro (AQ), presso il nostro stand informativo durante le Giornate Agrotecniche 4.0. Con la sua energia e simpatia illustrerà ai diplomandi la nostra offerta formativa e le possibilità di crescita professionale offerte dai corsi di specializzazione. #ITSteramo #ITSAcademy #ITSAgroalimentare #orientamento #postdiploma #formazione #agroalimentare #madeinitaly","time":"2mo","title":"ITS Agroalimentare Teramo"},{"likes_count":2,"text":"Prosegue il tour alla scoperta dell'agrifood abruzzese. Questa mattina gli studenti del corso di specializzazione in Tecnico Superiore per la valorizzazione Digital e Green delle produzioni agroalimentari hanno fatto visita al Mulino a pietra Passalaqua di Campli (TE) per una lezione di laboratorio direttamente sul campo come parte del modulo formativo sulle filiere cerealicole. Accompagnati dalla docente Simonetta Ulisse hanno affondato le mani nelle farine artigianali macinate a pietra e ottenute esclusivamente da grani coltivati presso l’azienda stessa sulle colline circostanti. Sotto la supervisione di Luigi Passalacqua hanno macinato, confezionato ed etichettato alcune differenti tipologie di grano, scoprendone le varie peculiarità e le differenze che li contraddistinguono. Al termine dell’attività di trasformazione è stata allestita una piccola degustazione di prodotti da forno, realizzati con le farine del Mulino stesso, e grazie alle indicazioni del sig. Luigi hanno imparato a riconoscere al palato le complesse differenze tra le varie farine di grano e di mais. #itsteramo #itsagroalimentare #itsacademy #laboratorio #agrifood #grano #farina #mulinoapietra","time":"2mo","title":"ITS Agroalimentare Teramo"},{"likes_count":7,"text":"L'Abruzzo sulla vetta del mondo dei liquori grazie all'Amaro Gran Sasso della Paesani Liquori di Montorio al Vomano (TE) che ha ricevuto la Medaglia d’oro al Concorso \"World Liqueur Awards 2023” (una sezione del World Drinks Awards), per la categoria Bitter. Il World Liqueur Awards è un prestigioso concorso globale che premia i migliori liquori da tutto il mondo. Questo evento annuale prevede un rigoroso processo di degustazione che identifica, onora e promuove i liquori più eccezionali provenienti da tutto il mondo. La categoria degli amari è stata inserita solo dal 2019 e durante le precedenti edizioni sono state premiate distillerie pluricentenarie del Nord Italia e giovani liquorifici calabresi. A differenza delle altre categorie, infatti, a contendersi il premio si sono sfidate esclusivamente etichette italiane. Dopo i premi per il vino e per la birra artigianale, l'Abruzzo conquista premi anche per i liquori, sono tutti riconoscimenti che confermano l'impegno e la passione per creare prodotti di ottima qualità sempre più apprezzati in un contesto internazionale. #liqueur #award #gransasso #paesani #madeinitaly #abruzzo","time":"2mo","title":"ITS Agroalimentare Teramo"}]

name: DownUnder wear
location: 's-Gravenpolder, Zeeland 4431EL, NL
about: Onderneming ontstaan vanuit een studieopdracht, bestaande uit vier ondernemende studenten. Onze producten dienen als funding voor een innovatieve bijdrage die wij willen leveren. Een project waarbij mosselschelpen na de consumptie worden hergebruikt tot een nieuwe grondstof. Een merk met een écht verhaal.
specialties: Not available
updates: [{"time":"3mo 3mo","title":"DownUnder wear"},{"comments_count":1,"likes_count":16,"text":"Gisteravond zijn wij met het team van DownUnder uitgenodigd door Maurice Van Den Hemel om aanwezig te zijn bij het 15 jarige jubileum feest van Gewoon lekker leven. Allereerst willen wij Maurice ontzettend bedank voor de uitnodiging van deze zeer inspirerende en toffe avond. Hetgeen wat ons verteld is heeft ons zeker aan het denken gezet. De woorden van spreker Ray Klaassens klinken nog door ons hoofd. \"Je bent wat je doet\", daar kunnen wij ons allen van team DownUnder in vinden. Met ons vieren staan wij aan het roer van deze uitdaging. Vier verschillende mensen, vier verschillende meningen, dat creëert soms frictie. Het onderwerp van Ray om jezelf op momenten dat het nodig is weg te cijferen voor een ander (of in ons geval, het belang van de onderneming) komt bij ons geregeld voor. Hoe mooi is het dan om over dit onderwerp een oud commando te horen spreken. Deze avond heeft voor ons nog eens laten zien hoe belangrijk de persoonlijke band is wanneer je samen in het ondernemersavontuur zit. Gewoon lekker leven willen wij binnen het team allemaal, dit klinkt van zelfsprekend maar is diepgaander dan je in eerste instantie zou denken... Een mooie avond op een bijzonder plek in de Magdalenakerk!","time":"3mo","title":"DownUnder wear"},{"comments_count":2,"likes_count":41,"time":"4mo"},{"comments_count":2,"likes_count":41,"text":"Malen, malen en nog eens… Malen! Het is weer tijd voor een update. Voor Justin en Daan was de minor een ruime maand geleden afgelopen. Sindsdien is het aan Sem en Roy om het reilen en zeilen in de onderneming te verantwoorden. Op het moment zijn wij druk bezig om vorderingen te maken met het onderzoek naar mosselgruis. (Niet op de hoogte van het mosselgruisproject? Kom er meer over te weten: https://downundershop.nl/) Na het vele uitzoekwerk en de benodigde connecties is het nu de taak om mosselen te malen… Dit voor het gruis uiteraard. Voordat wij deze mosselen kunnen vermalen, zijn er wel mosselen nodig. Hiervoor hebben wij ook eerst onderzoek gedaan, want er zijn vele soorten mosselen. Denk bijvoorbeeld aan de bodem- en hangcultuur mosselen maar er zijn ook verschillende vangstgebieden. Met welke mossel wij te maken hebben is dan ook van belang voor het onderzoek. We hebben zelf gelukkig niet kilo’s aan mosselen moeten eten om aan de schelpen te komen, dan hadden wij deze dagelijks moeten eten om tot gewenste hoeveel schelpen te moeten komen. Wij zijn bij de Oesterij en de Viskêête binnengestapt of het mogelijk was om wat mosselschelpen op te sparen. Door hun gulle daad hadden wij wat kilo’s om mee aan de slag te gaan. Het eerste werk aan de partij schelpen was het schoonmaken, aangezien er nog restproducten tussen de schelpen zitten, zoals groenten. Deze willen wij juist niet hebben. Door het testen van verschillende manieren van schoonmaken, hebben wij de eerste interessante bevindingen al gedaan. Hierna is het vermaalproces gestart. Met keukenapparatuur en heel fijne zeven hebben wij eerst zelf gekeken op wat voor tempo wij het op de vereiste fijnheid krijgen. Het is ontzettend veel werk, maar het kan wel! Een positief punt in dit proces. De komende dagen gaan wij onderzoeken of het vermalen sneller kan. Om nu in de praktijk te gaan werken is ontzettend leuk en leerzaam. Nu het vermaalproces is begonnen, willen wij hier zo snel mogelijk mee gaan testen. Dit ligt aan de snelheid van het malen, wat een nieuwe uitdaging is die wij aangaan. Heb jij nog ideeën hoe dit efficiënter kan, of heb je nog andere tips? Laat het ons gerust weten! Voortaan plaatsen wij onze blogs ook op onze Linked-in pagina. Wil je op de hoogte blijven over dit innovatieve project? Volg deze pagina, of schrijf je in voor onze nieuwsbrief, hierbij krijg je automatisch bericht wanneer wij een nieuwe blog plaatsen: https://lnkd.in/eDD6w9nD #innovatie #studenten #ondernemend #circulaireeconomie #mossel #onderzoek #project #blog","time":"4mo","title":"DownUnder wear"},{"likes_count":29,"text":"Beste netwerk, Het is alweer een tijdje geleden dat we een update hebben geplaatst. Bij deze is het dan zover. We willen jullie graag updaten over de voortgang van ons mosselproject. Wellicht weten velen van ons netwerk al wat het 'mosselproject' inhoudt, maar laten we het nog even refreshen. Sinds september 2022 onderzoeken we met ons bedrijf hoe we de mosselschelp (ná consumptie) circulair kunnen gebruiken met de scope op de keramische branche. Hierdoor willen we de afvalstroom verminderen, een product als kalk substitueren en een betere ecologische voetafdruk realiseren. Na veel testen, onderzoeken en bezoekjes plegen hebben we goed nieuws. Afgelopen maandag zijn we naar Duitsland gereisd om de laatste resultaten van het onderzoek te aanschouwen. We kunnen met vreugde mededelen dat we in staat zijn om het mosselgruis solide te gebruiken in de keramische branche. Om het specifiek te maken: - Keramische producten worden geassembleerd door middel van verschillende soorten klei waarin weer elementen worden toegevoegd om het een bruikbaar product te maken. Zo zit er dus ook kalk in. Door verschillende testen en onderzoeken hebben we het mogelijk gemaakt om de 'standaard' kalk te vervangen door mosselschelpen. - Over veel keramische producten zit ook een glazuurlaag. Hier wilden we ook graag mosselschelpen in verwerken, om zo een complementair product te kunnen maken. Met veel (ook mislukte) testen en onderzoeken van verschillende formules hebben we uiteindelijk de juiste scheikundige formule ontwikkeld wat compatible is met mosselschelpen. Met deze uitkomsten zijn we heugelijk verrast en komen we een stap dichterbij het doel van onze missie. Eindigt het onderzoek hier? Nee zeker niet, dit is nog maar het begin! De vervolgstappen voor ons onderzoek zijn ook al in volle gang. Zo zijn we nu aan het onderzoeken hoe we op de meest efficiënte manier de mosselen kunnen verzamelen, waarna ze door ons eigen verwerkingsproces gaan. In de foto's hieronder geven we jullie een sneak-peak van verschillende momenten tijdens het onderzoek. Heb jij nog tips&tricks en/of ideeën voor ons project, schroom dan zeker niet om ons te connecten. #innovatie #studenten #ondernemend #circulaireeconomie #mossel #HZuniversityofappliedsciences #onderzoek #project","time":"5mo","title":"DownUnder wear"},{"comments_count":2,"likes_count":28,"text":"Beste netwerk, Wij hebben een leuke en interessante update voor jullie! Voor velen van ons netwerk is het ontstaan van ons bedrijf al bekend. Laten we het voor de nieuwe lezer even kort uiteenzetten: Het bedrijf DownUnder wear is ontstaan op de HZ University of Applied Sciences door het traject ‘Student Company’. Hier worden tweedejaars studenten van vijf verschillende opleidingen op willekeurige manier opgedeeld in groepen en krijgen zij de opdracht om voor (minimaal) een halfjaar een echt bedrijf op te zetten. Bij ons is dit traject enorm goed bevallen en is de Zeeuwse Mosselboxershort naar eigen zeggen een grote hit geworden. Dit heeft ons aangespoord om het bedrijf DownUnder wear door te zetten. Inmiddels zijn we een jaartje verder en hebben wij niet stilgezeten. We blijven namelijk altijd opzoek naar nieuwe uitdagingen. Zo zijn we sinds enkele weken een nieuw project gestart. Met het team zijn we aan het onderzoeken wat er allemaal gedaan kan worden met de mosselschelp, ná de consumptie van de mossel. Deze insteek is niet zonder reden. Het is namelijk een feit dat Zeeland een grote producent is op gebied van mosselproductie. Met miljoenen kilo’s per jaar kan men Zeeland als het epicentrum van Noordwest-Europa betitelen. Met deze miljoenenindustrie komt er ook een hoop afval vrij. Van de mossel wordt in totaal slechts 20% geconsumeerd. Deze 20% is namelijk het weekdier zelf. De schelp blijft over en tot op heden is er nog geen structurele oplossing voor. Al deze aspecten hebben ons aangespoord om te kijken op welke manier we de mosselschelp circulair kunnen maken. Om het te concretiseren gaan we onderzoeken hoe we de keramische industrie kunnen ondersteunen. Zo zijn we afgelopen week al van start gegaan met verschillende tests met onze specialisten in de keramiekbranche. Om dit onderzoek te realiseren hebben wij een uitbreiding in ons assortiment bedacht die in lijn ligt met ons doel: de duurzame Zeeuwse Mosselsok. Wat de Mosselsok extra uniek maakt, is dat deze gemaakt is van bamboe. De Mosselsok heeft hetzelfde patroon als de Zeeuwse Mosselboxershort. De opbrengsten van de sokken en de boxers zorgen voor de financiering van het onderzoek. Wij van DownUnder wear geloven dat elke vorm van support een enorme impact kan maken om dit onderzoek tot een succes te brengen. Een aantal dingen die u zou kunnen overwegen om ons hierbij te helpen: - Een kijkje nemen op onze website (www.downundershop.nl) - Overwegen of een van onze producten een mooie toevoeging is aan het kerstpakket van uw bedrijf - Dit bericht herplaatsen op LinkedIn - Uw vrienden, familie, collega's en kennissen vertellen over uw ervaring met ons bedrijf Wij hopen u met ons bericht geïnspireerd te hebben en hopen dat u bereid bent ons te helpen bij het verduurzamen van de mosselindustrie. Wij zijn enorm dankbaar voor alle support en geloven dat elke vorm van steun een grote bijdrage kan leveren aan dit mooie doel. Team DownUnder #ondernemen #sustainable #studenten","time":"8mo","title":"DownUnder wear"}]

name: Scottish Fiscal Commission
location: Regent Road, Edinburgh, Scotland EH1 3DE, GB
about: The Scottish Fiscal Commission is the independent fiscal institution for Scotland. We produce independent, robust forecasts and assessments to improve the transparency and scrutiny of the Scottish Budget. Our official forecasts of devolved taxes and social security spending, and the official macro-economic forecast for Scotland, determine significant elements of the Scottish Government’s budget and assess the resources available to support devolved public services in Scotland. These “Scottish Economic and Fiscal Forecasts” are published on the Commission’s website, along with analysis of how the Scottish Budget is funded and occasional papers: www.fiscalcommission.scot Our values are: everyone can trust our work because: • We are independent – we are impartial, honest and objective • We work well with others • We are transparent and promote transparency in Scottish public finances • We explain complex matters clearly and make our work easy to access • We produce quality work which informs public debate
specialties: forecasting, economics, tax, social security, fiscal sustainability, independence, and transparency

name: Equalizer® Auto Glass Tools
location: 2611 Oakmont Drive, Round Rock, Texas 78665, US
about: Equalizer Is The World Leader Of Inventing And Developing New Ideas For The Auto Glass Industry. Equalizer has invented, developed or brought to market the majority of new products that have been introduced into the Auto Glass industry since 1987. Our goal is to be the leading source of auto glass removal and replacement products in the world. Our products are on the cutting edge of auto glass removal and replacement technology, so our staff travels extensively throughout the world, promoting Equalizer brand tools and products. Each year they teach and participate in many training seminars and trade shows. Many of our staff are regular speakers at dozens of regional, national and international association meetings and trade shows. To help with that goal, Equalizer actively searches for other peoples' inventions, helps them perfect their ideas and brings those ideas to market in the form of new products. People with great ideas are often surprised to find that most of the major carriers/suppliers of auto glass products have no method in place to assist them in the development of their ideas into a marketable product. Equalizer has this method in place and uses it on a daily basis. We offer an outlet for people to create and brainstorm their ideas and make some money in the process. Equalizer currently provides over 1200 auto glass removal and replacement products on a worldwide basis from its facility in Round Rock, Texas in the United States of America.
specialties: auto glass removal tools, auto glass replacement tools, windshield repair products, and auto glass training

name: MAG & More GmbH
location: Machtlfinger Strasse 13, München, Bayern 81379, DE
about: MAG & More has been involved in the field of magnetic neurostimulation for more than 15 years. We have fundamentally taken part in the development of strong and reliable stimulators as well as in the design of new stimulation coils. This experience has given us comprehensive knowledge to answer the needs of our customers in the field of magnetic stimulation. Our focus lies on creating innovative products which fulfil the highest quality standards. We are truly commited to guarantee the satisfaction of our costumers with the quality, functionality and technology of our products and hence we provide our customers with service packages that offer the right solution for their individual requirements. Behind our innovative products stand highly motivated employees with a great deal of experience, who work with a strong team spirit to meet all the needs of our international clients. Our corporate headquarters and production facilities are in Bavaria, Germany. There, we continually develop modern concepts for stimulators, coils and other competences with the objective of providing patients who suffer from various neurological and psychiatric illnesses an alternative therapy with high clinical benefit that improves quality of life. MAG & More GmbH has been a privately managed company since its foundation. As a result, we are capable of acting independently in our future, investing and planning for the long term. MAG & More is a leader in the field of repetitive magnetic stimulation. We focus on the development and worldwide sale of high-quality medical technology «Made in Germany». By providing highest quality products, we are consciously committed to satisfying our customers and towards contributing to the health of their patients. We are motivated daily by the challenge to be an innovative and cooperative partner for our customers and business associates. An emphasis in our philosophy is always on optimal customer support and respectful cooperation with all our customers and business associates.
specialties: rTMS, TMS, and Neuromodulation

name: Langa Soleil
location: 571 Hlophe Street, Vosloorus, Gauteng 1475, ZA
about: The name “Langa Soleil” is a combination of the Zulu and French translation for the word “Sun”. The sun represents life, hope, and light and we desire to emulate these characteristics in the design aesthetic of our timepieces. Every time you adorn the Langa Soleil brand we want you to be inspired that there is so much more to live for. We’ve paid careful attention to detail to ensure our goods exude luxury and the highest quality that will complement any outfit and bring you respectability on any occasion. Like the Sun that is not afraid to shine, we endeavor to encourage our Langa Soleil community to not shy away from being bold about their accomplishments and use their light to inspire themselves and others to keep striving for greatness. The Sun also receives a lot of doubt and criticism. Some complain sometimes that the Sun is too hot, others wish the Sun was a bit brighter but despite the dissatisfaction of others the Sun keeps rising. Our “Keep Rising” tagline embodies the grit and determination our founders have used to keep persisting in building this brand despite the many failures they have had to endure along the journey. More than make you look good and give you the confidence to boldly go after your ambitions we also want to give you the strength to keep rising every time you fall. The addition of “Afrique Du Mzansi” in our identity is a declaration that beautiful things can emerge out of Africa and the combination of Zulu and French in this statement is to say even if this brand finds its roots within Africa it is for the world!
specialties: Watches
updates: [{"text":"We take pride in having the most meticulous, purest, and timeless watches on the market. slogan: A luxury watch brand for the resilient and ambitious who, like the sun, keep rising.

As a multi-disciplined and vertically integrated organization, ProProcess strives to meet our clients’ objectives by drawing upon expertise in chemical process engineering, research and development, instrumentation, controls and process analysis. ProProcess has the capability to provide complete process solutions, including electrical and automation. Our automation & electrical, as well as fabrication arms support both ProProcess Engineering internal projects, as well as stand-alone client projects.
specialties: Modular Process Plant, Containerised Process Plant, Petroleum Storage and Distribution, Chemical Process Engineering, Reagent Plants, Polymer Plants, Process Control and Automation, Mass and Heat Transfer, Pressure Vessel Manufacturing, Containerised Motor Control Centers, Enhanced Oil Recovery, Waste to Energy, Skid Mounted Plants, Lime Slakers, and hydrometallurgy

name: CareerFiX Pty Ltd
location: Sydney, NSW, AU
about: Experts in providing jobseekers with cost-effective and practical tools to develop the skills required to maximise opportunities for employment. CareerFiX has assisted hundreds of individuals at all levels, across multiple industries and sectors to realise their professional potential. We've helped jobseekers develop the skills and personal profile necessary to achieve success in their job search. CareerFiX has a series of easy-access online tutorials to prepare jobseekers for the job market and to differentiate themselves from the competition: ✔️ Tutorial 1: Developing Your Personal Brand ✔️ Tutorial 2: Preparing Your Resume ✔️ Tutorial 3: Interview Skills: Preparation, Practice & Performance ✔️ Tutorial 4: Addressing Job Selection Criteria Founder and career coaching expert, Yvonne Cohen, displays a diverse career, having personally experienced a variety of employment realities, including redundancy and the highs and lows of transitioning between industries and careers. With more than a decade of hands-on experience in establishing, leading and coaching teams for high performance outcomes, Yvonne's proven management and leadership skills have enabled her to pivot to a successful, in-demand, career development coach. Through combined tutorial and one-on-one consultations with Yvonne, we've transformed jobseekers into career satisfied, motivated employees. · Inspire · Discover Core Values · Assess & Consider Options · Develop an Action Plan · Achieve Career Success!
specialties: Career Coaching, Career Advice, Resume Development, Job Interview Coaching, Personal Brand Development, Career Preparation, Interview Development, Resume Development, Skill Assessment, and LinkedIn Profile Optimisation
updates: [{"text":"I'm excited to share with you that, as part of my ongoing commitment to continuous learning and personal growth, I have recently completed Practitioner certifications in NLP and Time Line Therapy®. It is my passion as a coach to empower individuals to achieve their full potential. As a result of these certifications, I will be using these modalities in my coaching practice to enhance the impact of my coaching on a broad range of personal and professional issues you may be experiencing. For example, if you are... · terrified to put yourself out there because you feel like you're an imposter · thinking you're a failure because you haven't achieved the goals you set for yourself · feeling low and uninspired and finding it difficult to move forward in your life · thinking that you're not good enough or deserving of success in your life · feeling unsatisfied in your professional capacity and not reaching your career goals By using NLP and Time Line Therapy® in my coaching, I can help you 'breakthrough' blocks that are currently holding you back from living the professional and personal life you deserve. If you are interested in learning more about the benefits of NLP and Time Line Therapy® in coaching, I would love to speak with you about this in more detail. Let’s work together to unlock your full potential so you can be empowered to achieve the success you deserve. #nlppractitioner #nlpcoach #TimeLineTherapy®Practioner","time":"3mo Edited","title":"CareerFiX Pty Ltd"}]
slogan: Your pathway to career success

name: Bop Kontormøbler ApS
location: ["Fabriksvej 16, Fjerritslev, Jammerbugt 9690, DK",null]
about: Vi har Danmarks bedste og billigste kontorstole. Vi handler både med køb og salg, af såvel nye som brugte kontormøbler, stole, reoler, skærme, lamper, arkivskabe - kort sagt alt fra og til kontoret. Vi giver gerne et tilbud på dine brugte kontormøbler som følge af udskiftning til nyt inventar, flytning til nyt domicil, eller hvis firmaet lukker. Primært handler vi med brugte kontormøbler af god stand, men alt det øvrige inventar giver vi også gerne et tilbud på. Som kurator ved konkurser anbefaler vi Peter Lund Hyldager (98 21 10 02) der giver tilbud på inventaret. Vi kan samtidig påtage os total oprydning ved afhentning.
specialties: Køb og salg af nye og brugte kontormøbler

Der var åbent for besigtigelse og afhentning af donationsmøbler både onsdag og torsdag. I den forbindelse havde vi begge dage besøg af de her to seje gutter fra Odder lille Friskole. De fik fyldt bilen godt op med borde, skuffekassetter, et køleskab og andre gode sager, der nu skal have nyt liv på deres friskole 😊 Selvom møblerne her ”bare” var i overskud efter en flytning, så var de i god stand og kunne sagtens stadig bruges. Vi bliver altid i godt humør af at sende møblerne afsted, så de kan få nyt liv og nye formål, uanset om bilen med møblerne kører til Ukraine, til en gymnastikforening eller som her til en skole, hvor børn og voksne kan få glæde af tingene. Vil du og din forening, nonprofit organisation, skole eller lignende også gerne have mulighed for at modtage donationsmøbler? Så hold øje med vores Facebookside eller tilmeld dig vores donationsnetværk på linket herunder 👇️ https://lnkd.in/eyRw66ce #donation #genbrug","time":"6mo","title":"Bop Kontormøbler ApS"},{"likes_count":32,"text":"Nyt år betyder nye opgaver 😊 Året er kun lige begyndt, men vi har allerede dejlig travlt hos Daarbak Bop Recycle. Januar har indtil nu budt på en opgave i Horsens Kommune, hvor vi skulle hjælpe med at rømme det gamle rådhus og jobcenter samt andre lokationer. I alt er omkring 1.200 medarbejdere flyttet ud af de forskellige lokationer. I den forbindelse har det været vores opgave at rømme lokalerne for de møbler, der ikke skulle med videre til de nye lokaler. Langt de fleste af møblerne bliver genbrugt andre steder i kommunen for eksempel på skoler, i børnehave osv. En stor del af de hæve-/sænkeborde, der ikke skulle videre til et andet sted i kommunen, er blevet eksporteret og solgt videre til andre lande i Europa. Daarbak Bop Recycles store donations netværk har også været sat i spil i forbindelse med opgaven i Horsens Kommune. De møbler, der ikke enten er kommet videre ud i kommunen eller er blevet eksporteret, er nemlig blevet doneret til frivillige foreninger og nonprofit organisationer. En stor del af møblerne er kommet til Ivano-Frankivsk regionen i Ukraine, hvor der er brug for nødhjælp - for eksempel i form af møbler til mennesker, der har mistet deres ejendele. Det varmer, at vi kan være med til at sende brugte møbler afsted, så de kan få nyt liv og nye formål, uanset om det er på skoler eller i spejderforeninger i Danmark eller som nødhjælp i andre lande 🤗 Kender du til en forening eller nonprofit organisation, der kan være interesseret i at modtage brugte møbler? Så hold endelig øje med vores Facebookside, hvor vi løbende laver opslag, når vi har møbler til donation. Du kan også melde din forening til vores donations netværk via vores hjemmeside ved at klikke på linket herunder 👇️ https://lnkd.in/eyRw66ce #nonprofit #donation #genbrug","time":"7mo","title":"Bop Kontormøbler ApS"}]

name: Elido JSC

about: Elido JSC is working in the field of software research and development. Our main focus is on graphical user interfaces and their interrelations with data structures. This has been a natural development of our work in the fields of information systems integration, database architecture and development, IT and database consultancy, efficiency analysis of existing IT solutions, optimization of corporate data flows, development and support of web based information resources, warehouse management software, content management system integration, development of user interfaces for graphical environments, and IT training. about: Tulinx “Your partner for Network Intelligence and Zero-Touch Optimization” Are sure you have real-time insight in your network and be alerted automatically? Tulinx innovative solutions allow operators to automate analysis, correlations and reporting to understand the Network performance and customer-experience. We use all data from RAN, Transport and Core network, probes and CDR data. Have all your network data available in a uniform model and use this to create reports, drill-down analysis, predictions and advanced network monitoring for 2G, 3G, 4G and 5G. Our AI algorithms have been successfully deployed since 2010 and are further developed to cope with new technologies such as 5G. Tulinx is your IT partner for automation and analytics in Service Quality, Performance and Network Optimization management based on an open platform If you are interested in automatic notifications, advanced correlations and most important: solutions that really will work for you, visit the Tulinx stand. Tulinx B.V. www.tulinx.com sales@tulinx.com +31 642 70 88 33
specialties: Assisted Optimisation for Mobile networks (Radio-NDA), Optimisation and reporting solutions for Small Cells and Mobile networks (AWACS), Mobile network data post-processing and warehouse (Minerva), intelligent Self Optimising Network solutions (iSON), Private Network Performance 4G and 5G, ONGO Networks Performance Management, and IoT Wireless Network Performance Management and SLA monitoring
slogan: Zero-touch Operations as the basis for Network Transformation. With AI on 2G, 3G and 4G we are ready for the 5G future.

name: River Ocean Cleanup (ROC)
location: Street P-01, Phnom Penh, KH
about: Cambodia has one of the fastest economic growth (7% annually) compared to countries in the Asia Pacific region due to political stability, increase in local and international investments and tourism. Despite the economic growth, new challenges are emerging for the country, including the amount of waste generation and the management of urban solid waste. The annual solid waste generation is approximately 3.65 million tons per year (2017) and increases between 10% to 15% every year. 48% of this solid waste is not collected and is therefore found on the streets, rivers, and ocean. Mismanaged wastes cause negative impacts on the health and well-being of citizens, water quality, marine lives, wildlife, the tourism industry and it also contributes to climate change. ROC’s strategy is to address the problem through the mobilization of the Cambodian population across the country to lead or join cleanup legacy trashes (especially plastic) on the ground, in the rivers and the ocean.
specialties: Not available

Our highly motivated ROC - everwave team in cambodia is looking for new team members to join our mission. 💪🌊 - Marketing & Fundraising Executive - Admin and Finance Assistance - Boat Operator","time":"8mo","title":"River Ocean Cleanup (ROC)"},{"comments_count":1,"likes_count":15,"text":"Since March 2022, we have joint our forces with everwave to tackle the plastic pollution in #cambodia! 🌊🌊 In collaboration with the Ministry of Tourism, Kingdom of Cambodia, National Committee for Clean City Assessment (NCCA), the Ministry of environment of cambodia and all relevant Municipalities, we are collecting tons of waste in #PhnomPenh out of the Mekong, Tonle Sap and Bassac river and riverbanks. Afterwards, all the collected materials are transported to our sorting facility 'Zero Waste'-center to sort into recyclables and non-recyclables. Together, we have already achieved a lot in a short period of time: - We have collected over 140 TONS 💪 - We have created over 70 jobs (employed & informal sector) - 7,572 volunteers have participated in 40 cleanups including world cleanup day - We have provided environmental education to students and volunteers during our cleanup events and collaboration with schools We will keep you updated about our achievements and activities! Kuehne+Nagel Landmarken AG #sustainability #environment #collecting #recycling #collaboration #partnerships","time":"9mo","title":"River Ocean Cleanup (ROC)"}]

updates: [{"comments_count":1,"likes_count":8,"text":"utilisation des images à lumières rasantes pour la médiation","time":"3w","title":"Mercurio Imaging"},{"likes_count":3,"text":"Nous créons des solutions sur mesure pour les collections d'objets ou les ouvrages spécifiques en utilisant la photogrammétrie et le RTI (imagerie à lumière interactive). De la numérisation jusqu'à la visualisation, en passant par la production et la valorisation des contenus, nous offrons une gamme complète de services pour la transmission de l'information et des connaissances par l'image. #MercurioImaging #photogrammétrie #RTI #patrimoine #numérisation #innovation","time":"4mo","title":"Mercurio Imaging"},{"likes_count":5,"text":"Nous sommes heureux d'annoncer notre présence au colloque CORPUS à Caen pour présenter notre tout nouveau scanner RTI ! Pendant les 3 prochains jours, notre équipe Mercurio sera sur place pour vous faire découvrir notre savoir-faire en imagerie scientifique, et vous présenter les avantages de notre technologie de pointe en matière de numérisation et de valorisation du patrimoine culturel. Ne manquez pas cette occasion de rencontrer notre équipe et de découvrir notre nouveau scanner RTI, conçu sur mesure pour répondre aux besoins spécifiques des archéologues, des restaurateurs et des médiateurs en archéologie. Rejoignez-nous au colloque CORPUS et plongez dans l'univers fascinant de l'imagerie scientifique ! #CORPUS #imageriescientifique #scannerRTI #ReflectanceTransformationImaging #patrimoineculturel #Mercurio","time":"4mo","title":"Mercurio Imaging"},{"likes_count":10,"text":"Le projet THEIA a démarré en janvier dernier et va être développé sur une période de 30 mois. L’objectifs est d’apporter l’expertise technique de Mercurio Imaging sur l’imagerie des objets et l’adapter au domaine de la préhistoire en s’appuyant sur l’expertise de son partenaire le Centre National de la Préhistoire (CNP), l’entité spécialisée de la sous-direction archéologie du ministère de la culture. Plusieurs étapes sont prévues dans le projet : à commencer par l’acquisition de contenus RTI (lumières rasantes) de gravures en provenance de 3 sites différents. Dans une deuxième temps Mercurio Imaging adaptera ses outils d’études aux experts de la préhistoires. Enfin une campagne de médiation participative sera mise en place afin de rapprocher les experts et le grand public. #culture #numérique #3D #archéologie","time":"5mo","title":"Mercurio Imaging"},{"likes_count":4,"text":"Voici notre rig #3D réalisé sur mesure pour notre client F12.","time":"7mo","title":"Mercurio Imaging"},{"likes_count":1,"text":"Nous sommes heureux d'annoncer que Mercurio Imaging sera présent au workshop \"Low Cost 3D\" à Würzburg cette semaine ! updates: [{"likes_count":12,"text":"🍹 Introducing Eye55 Ferris Wheel's newest Addition: Bar & Lounge! 🍹 Imagine enjoying a cold drink with the twinkling lights of a ferris wheel as a backdrop. Combined with a brilliant view over the city our new offering takes you to new heights. As a landmark attraction Eye55 is more than an eye-opener: it is a place to hang-out, socialize and exchange stories. Adding a special twist to your next gathering? With our exclusive lounge you can even celebrate weddings or family festivities. You are looking for an ambient location for your next meeting or team-workshop? Our lounge can cater your event right underneath our wheel. We believe, that this bar and lounge with enhance your stay and add up to the great experience of overviewing the city with state-of-the-art gondolas. [German] 🍹 Vorstellung der neuesten Ergänzung des Eye55 Riesenrades: Bar & Lounge! 🍹 Stellt euch vor, ihr genießt ein kühles Getränk, während die funkelnden Lichter des Riesenrads im Hintergrund leuchten. In Kombination mit einem atemberaubenden Blick über die Stadt bringt unser neues Angebot dich auf neue Höhen. Als Sehenswürdigkeit ist Eye55 mehr als nur ein Augenöffner: Es ist ein Ort zum Abhängen, Geselligsein und Geschichten austauschen. Ihr möchtet eure nächste Feier besonders machen? Mit unserer exklusiven Lounge könnt ihr sogar Hochzeiten oder Familienfeiern ausrichten. Ihr sucht einen stimmungsvollen Ort für euer nächstes Meeting oder Team-Workshop? Unsere Lounge bietet euch den perfekten Rahmen direkt unter unserem Riesenrad. Wir sind der Meinung, dass diese Bar und Lounge euren Aufenthalt bereichern wird und das großartige Erlebnis des Überblicks über die Stadt mit modernsten Gondeln ergänzt. #meyerentertainment #eye55 #lounge #ferriswheel","time":"4w","title":"MEYER Entertainment"},{"comments_count":2,"likes_count":20,"time":"1mo Edited"},{"comments_count":2,"likes_count":20,"text":"A classic ride finds a new home! The inverted roller coaster from Vekoma is being dismantled in a zoo in North Rhine-Westphalia. Together with our partners, the entire installation, including the technology, was dismantled and made ready for transport in just a few days. \"The big challenge was to dismantle the individual parts while the park is operational,\" says Thomas Meyer. \"Since the installation is quite hidden, large cranes had to lift the track sections over the trees.\" Once the tracks are ready on the trucks for transport, a specialist in the Netherlands takes care of a new paint job. After an inspection by the new owner, the roller coaster will be taken to and operated in the UAE. Thomas Meyer, together with his eldest son Hans and the team from Meyer Entertainment, coordinated and carried out the dismantling. \"It is mainly the years of experience from the fairground that almost makes the construction and dismantling of such attractions routine for us. We can adapt very well to special situations - we always find a suitable solution!\" Thomas Meyer adds. [GERMAN] Ein Klassiker findet ein neues zuhause! Die Überkopfachterbahn aus dem Hause Vekoma wird in einem Tierpark in NRW abgebaut. Zusammen mit unseren Partnern wurde die komplette Anlage inkl. der Technik in wenigen Tagen abgebaut und transportbereit gemacht. \"Die große Herausforderung bestand darin die einzelnen Teile während des Betriebs abzubauen\" sagt Thomas Meyer. \"Da die Anlage recht versteckt liegt, mussten große Kräne die Schienenteile über die Bäume heben.\" Sind die Schienen erstmal auf den Trucks für den Transport bereit, kümmert sich in Holland ein Spezialist um eine neue Lackierung. Der neue Eigentümer der Achterbahn wird nach einer Prüfung die Attraktion weiter in die UAE führen und betreiben. Thomas Meyer hat zusammen mit dem ältesten Sohn Hans und dem Team von Meyer Entertainment den Abbau koordiniert und durchgeführt. \"Es ist vor allem die jahrelange Erfahrung von der Kirmes, die den Auf- und Abbau solcher Attraktionen für uns fast zur Routine werden lässt. Wir können uns sehr gut an besondere Situationen anpassen - wir finden immer eine passende Lösung!\" ergänzt Thomas Meyer. Vekoma Rides https://lnkd.in/evyw6auw #rollercoaster #disassemble #meyerentertainment","time":"1mo Edited","title":"MEYER Entertainment"},{"likes_count":2,"text":"Empfehlenswert! 👍 Sehr kompetente & flexible Beratung und Betreuung. #businesstravel","time":"1mo 1mo","title":"MEYER Entertainment"},{"likes_count":7,"text":"Oberhausen.Tourismus wir danken ebenfalls für den interessanten Austausch und freuen uns gemeinsam auf eine erfolgreiche „Hochsaison“ ☀️🎡☀️","time":"1mo 1mo","title":"MEYER Entertainment"},{"likes_count":6,"text":"Liebe Kolleginnen und Kollegen ! Wir alle sind zutiefst betroffen vom tragischen Todesfall der unserer Schaustellerfamilie Bruch widerfahren ist. Wir wünschen der Familie die große erforderliche Kraft um diesen unfassbaren Schicksalsschlag zu überstehen. All unsere mitfühlenden Gedanken sind in diesen schweren Stunden bei Familie Bruch. name: Bioracer Spain
location: Iruña etorbidea, Tolosa, País Vasco / Euskadi 20400, ES
about: Fundada en 1986 y con sede en Bélgica, hogar espiritual del ciclismo, Bioracer siempre ha estado a la vanguardia del diseño, desarrollo y fabricación de ropa para ciclistas. Nuestra misión es clara y sencilla: We make you faster. No se trata sólo de ofrecerte la equipación más rápida posible. También se trata de proporcionarte todas las herramientas necesarias para que seas lo más rápido posible. Esta filosofía va mucho más allá de la simple ropa. Miles de atletas de competición eligen Bioracer porque necesitan el kit más rápido disponible. No sólo tenemos los datos científicos que demuestran nuestras afirmaciones, sino también el historial probado de nuestro medallero. Con más de 616 medallas olímpicas y mundiales, somos los más rápidos. Contemplamos el ciclismo desde todos los ángulos e intentamos encajar aquellas piezas que completan su puzzle. Y lo hacemos con un objetivo en mente: hacerte más rápido.
specialties: Fabricación de vestimenta ciclista de alta calidad, personalizado triatlón, personalizado ciclismo, and personalizado atletismo

name: Homes 4 Humanity, LLC

about: Homes 4 Humanity, LLC is the Northern Shenandoah Valley premier real estate solutions company, and since our inception we have been helping homeowners along with improving our communities. Through our extensive knowledge of the business, network of resources, and years of expertise, we are able to assist homeowners with a wide variety of real estate problems. We pride ourselves on our reputation for working one-on-one with each customer to handle their individual situations. With the ability to directly purchase homes and make cash offers, we can create an extremely fast, and hassle-free transaction. In addition, we re-develop a large number of single family properties throughout the Shenandoah Valley with the intention of revitalizing communities and encouraging home ownership. Our mission is to rejuvenate neighborhoods and increase the standard of living by improving the overall quality of housing for the residents. Call us today and let’s see how we can work together!

name: Afro Rasta House
location: Kilindoni, Mafia Island 61701, TZ
about: Come join us on a tropical haven called Mafia Island and help us build up a farming homestay. Help our foundation in supporting and teaching the local community. We are linked to a whale shark safari business and you will have opportunity to help with the safaris, doing organic gardening, converting our bungalow for budget accommodation and being part of an awesome community! You have the power to open up some amazing opportunities for local Mafian people with skills you don't even know are significant... Mafia Island is the main island situated in the Mafia Archipelago, it is one of a few places around the world where the Whale Sharks go against their natural instincts and remain all year round. Mafia is so blessed that is is a safe place for them to have and nurture their young, so why would they leave? The island is also home to the most beautiful and pristine marine park on the entire East African coastline, boasting coral reefs and underwater life that is unmatched in the region. This makes Mafia Island a hotspot for divers and snorkelling tourists from around the globe, if you join our vibrant team then we would love to share experiences such as these and more, doing it in local Swahili coast fashion. Our homestay is small (max 4 people capacity), super homely, safe and peaceful. We're located in a beautiful forest, the quiet neighborhood is friendly and welcoming, with the stunning beaches of Kilindoni, within 20 minutes walking distance. Travelers come to us in search of tranquility and nature, which there's plenty of all around our house. We keep our home farm very clean and we take the best care of our guests so that they feel like family. We are seeking bright minded and forward thinking individuals with skills in agriculture, permaculture, horticulture, we are also interested in people with skills in website design, social media management, business administration and marketing. We love people who are passionate about art, culture,
specialties: Tourism, Agriculture, Education, Culture, and Learning
slogan: Come join us on a tropical haven called Mafia Island and help us build up a farming homestay. Help our foundation grow.
